
1a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba bzhugs/
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI gu hya sa ma sA d+ha naM sid+d+hi saM b+ha ba ni d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i
1b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zab gsal gnyis
1b3(rgyud 'grel): med dag pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'i sku/ /dpal ldan chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya
1b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rgyal sras rgyu dang bcas pa rab 'byung zhing/ /rtag sogs rgyu 'dras khams kun rab bkang nas/ /ji srid bar du don
2a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad rgyun mi 'chad/ /khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' de dang ni/ /de yi sras rnams la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams
2a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu kun khyab pa/ /snying ga'i dbus bsam de la brtan sogs skye/ /chos bdag khros pas kyang ni mi gnon pa/ /mi
2a3(rgyud 'grel): shigs thig le gang yin rtogs par mos/ /blo dang ldan pa rnams kyi pad+ma kha 'byed pa/ /rmongs pa sreg byed snying ga'i mun pa sel mdzad
2a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /yon tan dag pa'i mkha' la rgyu zhing 'jigs bral mdzad/ /bla ma dam pa rnams kyi zhal snga rgyal gyur cig /dpal ldan gsang
2b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus mtsho chen las/ /bla ma'i brgyud rim gru gzings kyis/ /yid bzhin nor bu rnam pa gsum/ /sman pa'i zhabs kyis rnyed pa'o/ /de rnyed dpe mkhyud spangs
2b2(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /'di ni thun mong cig shos kyi/ /dngos grub 'byung phyir gter 'dra ba/ /phan phyir bdag gis brtsam par bya/ /gzhung gzhan spangs te bla ma'i
2b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyud rim gyis/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i mnyam 'dus sgrub pa'i thabs/ /dam pas gsol ba btab phyir rab brod cing/ /dad pas ci nus bdag gis bshad
2b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de la kha cig ni yang dag pa'i man ngag dang bral ba rnams ni dam pa ma yin par mkhas pa grags pa rnams la bla ma nyid du khas blangs nas de'i lam la
2b5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs te/ dka' thub dang smyung ba dang/ brtul zhugs la sogs pas don dam pa gcig po la dpyod cing/ 'di snyam du bdag gi rgyu'i 'khrul 'khor la
3a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang lhan cig tu skyes kyang/ de rnams kyis stong pa'i dngos po ni yod pa nyid de/ de tsam zhig brtags pas mngon du byed kyang/ dngos
3a2(rgyud 'grel): po la don dam par zhen pas stong pa nyid mi shes te gol ba dang rgyang ring du 'gyur ro/ /ji skad du/ stong pa nyid ni ma shes pas/ /kun las 'das pa nges mi shes/ /
3a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos dang dngos med rnam 'jig pas/ /stong pa nyid ni shes par bya/ /zhes 'byung bas so/ /yang kha cig dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad zin kyang/ dam pa
3a4(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pas de'i lam la zhugs te/ bdag la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phung po dang skye mched dang/ khams rnams mi rtag pa la sogs par 'jig cing/ sdom
3a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snod la brten te/ zhugs pa la sogs pa'i lam gyi phung po la sogs pa la grol nas lhag ma dang bcas pa dang/ lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
3b1(rgyud 'grel): mngon du byed do/ /'di yang ma rig pa dang 'brel ba'i phyir 'bras bu phyir ldog pa can zhes bya ste/ de yang ji skad du/ rtsa ba'i rnam shes log gyur nas/ /lhag bcas lhag ma med 'gyur ba'i/ /rnam
3b2(rgyud 'grel): grol 'bras bu thob 'gyur yang/ /mngon du rgyu ba med pa yi/ /ma rig bag chags dang 'brel phyir/ /rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mchos/ /de la thugs rjes bzung ba'i phyir/ /dpal ldan go
3b3(rgyud 'grel): cha'i 'od zer dang/ /phyag gis dbu la reg mdzad nas/ /de yi ro myang zlog mdzad de/ /yang dag lam la 'dzud par mdzad/ /ces gsang ba'i rim pa che ba las gsungs so/ /yang kha cig ni dge
3b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bshes gnyen dam pa dang phrad du zin kyang/ de rnams kyis brgyud rims 'khyud pas/ sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu skal pa mi nyung bar bsags nas/ sa'i de bzhin nyid du mngon
3b5(rgyud 'grel): du byed cing rims kyis sa bcu mngon du mthar thug par byed do/ /de'i sprul pa'i sbyor bas dga' ldan gyi gnas nyid du skye ba len pa dang/ gling la sogs pa la gzigs par mdzad nas yum gyi lhums
3b6(rgyud 'grel): su 'jug pa dang/ lhums nas bltams pa dang/ gzhon nu rol pa mdzad pa dang/ khab bzhes pa dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas byung ba dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ dka' ba spyad pa
4a1(rgyud 'grel): ston pa dang/ de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon rang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i man ngag rang rig chos kyi sku mngon du byed pa bstan pa'i phyir/ til gyi gang bu bzhin
4a2(rgyud 'grel): du ched du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan te/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya snang nas/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i cho gas rtsa ba'i ye shes dmigs pa dang bral ba/ sbyor ba gnyis kyi bdag nyid/ sngon dang phyis kyi sbyor
4a3(rgyud 'grel): ba mngon du byas te/ bdud btul chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa mdzad do/ /don de lta bu'i snod dkon par gzigs nas/ sba bas mdzad de sangs rgyas pa'i tshul so sor mthong bar mdzad do/ /bla ma
4a4(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i zhal snga nas ji skad du/ ci'i phyir shAkya thub pa yis/ /grangs med bar du tshogs bsags kyang/ /'di don ma gtogs nai rany+dzar/ /ci yang ma yin ting 'dzin gnas/ /de tshe bde gshegs kun gyis
4a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /thal byung blo chags de bzlog ste/ /nam mkha' i dbyings ltar rnam dag pa'i/ /zab gsal gnyis med rab bstan te/ /nam phyed dus su rgyal ba ltar/ /de nyid bsgoms pas tho rangs su/ /skad cig gis
4a6(rgyud 'grel): ni yang dag rtogs/ /byang chub snying por zhugs byas nas/ /dpung chen bdud rnams rab bcom ste/ /sems can gzud par bya ba'i phyir/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o/ /de nas bzung ste don mchog 'di/ /
4b1(rgyud 'grel): bal pa ldan pa 'ga' zhig la/ /zhal nas zhal dang snyan nas snyan/ /brgyud de nges pa'i don bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i tshul 'dis shes par bya'o/ /gal te lam gzhan gyis sangs rgyas pa srid na ni/ /
4b2(rgyud 'grel): de'i tshe bla dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na 'bras bu sku gsuM ni cig kho na ste de'i lam ni sngags kyi spyod pa 'di'o/ /ji skad du/ rnam par snang mdzad byang chub pa'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /gzhal
4b3(rgyud 'grel): med ye shes thob pa ni/ /rdo rje sngags kyi don sgom yin/ /zhes 'byung bas so/ /sngags kyi spyod pa la mes pa de dag kyang bzhir shes par bya'o/ /kha cig ni pyi'i gtsang sgra la soT pa dang/ bdag gi de pon nyid la so pas lhag pa'i lha mnyes par byas pas mngon par mtho ba'i dpal
4b4(rgyud 'grel): nyams su myong bar byas nas/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do/ /yang kha cig ni phyi'i gtsang sbra la sogs pa bya ba dang/ bya ba ma yin pa spangs nas/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang/
4b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong nas/ tshogs gnyis bsags nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do/ /yang kha cig ni gtsang sbra la sogs pa smad cing/ nang gi rnal 'byor dam tshig sems dpa' dang/ phyi rol gyi
4b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pas rang gi lha mnyes par byas pas/ mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong nas/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob
4b7(rgyud 'grel): bar 'dod do/ /de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu la mos pa'i gdul bya gzung ba'i phyir thabs gsungs pa ste/ phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig byed pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig byed pa ni 'di lta ste/ gang dag sems ji lta
5a1(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin du brtags pa'i thabs/ /brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pas skad cig re re la yang snod dang/ bcud lam dang/ 'bras bur bcas par spyod par byed cing/
5a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dang phyag rgya la brten nas/ tshe 'di nyid las rab dang rab kyi mthar phyin par 'gyur ba las som nyi med pas bla na med pa'o/ /de ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni dpal ldan 'dus pa ste/ ji lta bu zhe na/ chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong dag
5a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dus phyir snod yang dam pa'o/ /rmongs pa'i mun nag sel bas na/ /sgron ma'i mchog ni 'di yin no/ /rta rgod lta bu'i sems 'dul bas/ /'thad pa'i srab skyobs mchog yin no/ /rnam shes glang chen yan lta bu/ /'gugs phyir lcags kyu
5a4(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'o/ /rnal 'byor mchog tu nges pa yi/ dam sdom can gyi chod 'dus so/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las/ /sgrol byed gru ni chen po'o/ /mngon mtho nges legs khang bzang gis/ /steng du phyin byed them skas so/ /rnam rtog las
5a5(rgyud 'grel): byung nyon mongs kyi/ /grong khyer 'joms shing grol ba yi/ /'khor lo skyong phyir rgyal po'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen pos/ /nye bar bstan pa'i mdo sde dang/ /de 'dra'i tshul len rgyud 'di ni/ /kun gyi phyi ma gsungs pa ni/ /don rnams
5a6(rgyud 'grel): de ru gtan la phab/ /'di don sgom byed rnal 'byor pa/ /ma 'ongs rdo rje 'chang ba bas/ /dga' dang rtsod pa med pa dang/ /srung ba dang ni dran pa dang/ /bag yod pa yis brtson bya'o/ /de lta bu'i gzhung? de la rtog pa mngon du gtong pa'i nyan pa po
5a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams mkhas len pa'i yan lag dang/ /gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par bshad pas/ gang zag gzhan yid brtan du rung bar bya ba ni/ bsdus pa'i don du bshad pas der zhes bya'o/ /ye shes las sprul pa'i 'khor de bzhin
5b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la rgyud kyi don ji ltar bstan pa yang der shes par bya ste/ de'i phyis 'byung ba'i don rje btsun rnams kyis snod du rung bar byas pa'i gang zag la rgyud kyi don ji ltar bsdus te bstan pa de sgrub thabs kyi rim pa 'dir rgyas bar?
5b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya'o/ /de la dang po snying rje'i stobs las skyes/ /byang chub sems ldan spyan pa la sogs brgyan/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i 'khor lor cho ga bzhin/ /dbang bskur snang ba thob pas rim 'di bya/ /gang zhig dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sogs/ /
5b3(rgyud 'grel): gang rung gnas su stegs bu gru bzhi pa/ /tsan dan mchog sogs byugs nas bde ba'i stan/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung 'dug bsam gtan bya/ /dang po tho rangs nyi dbus su/ /stong sogs kyis dag mthing kha'i hUM/ /'od zer gyis mthong yul dmigs te/
5b4(rgyud 'grel): snying rje la sogs bsgom par bya/ /'od zer gyis gsal sangs rgyas dang/ /bla ma la sogs mdun du dmigs/ /gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i/ /mchod pa'i sprin spro phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gang zhig thog med dus nas srid pa'i chu rgyun la/ /rtog pas rnam par
5b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgos pa'i sdig pa ma lus rnams/ /thugs rje cher ldan khyod kyi mdun du yang/ /gsum du dmigs pa gsal te bshags par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /'phags pa gzhan rnams kyi yang dag pa dang/ /ma lus bdag gis
5b6(rgyud 'grel): de dag yi rang nas/ /bla med yang dag byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ /spros med thugs ni zla ba lta bu ste/ /mdza' yas don du thabs kyi sku chen po/ /rtag tu bdag gis yid dang dbyer med pa/ /bde bar gshegs la rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /rtog pa kun las des par
5b7(rgyud 'grel): grol ba yi/ /dam pa ma lus kun gyi phun tshogs rten/ /dngos po kun gyi ngo bo gcig pa po/ /chos la bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /bcing ba ma lus rnam par spangs pa yi/ /dpal ldan snying rje mchog gis rab drangs pa/ /rab tu dga' sogs sal ra
6a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i/ /'dul ba'i dbang po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsaM pa dag pas rnam smin dag pa yis/ /sgrib pa'i bag chags ma lus kun bcom ste/ /mi 'phrogs pa yis brgyan pa'i sems kyis kyang/ /byang chub tu ni sems
6a2(rgyud 'grel): ni bskyed par bgyi/ /sras dang ldan pa'i dge bar gshegs pa yi/ /thun mong lam ste pha rol phyin pa bcu/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid yid kyis ni/ /da ltar 'di ni bdag gis bsten par bya/ /sdug bsngal la gnas sems can rnams/ /
6a3(rgyud 'grel): snying rjes yang ni dmigs byas te/ /byang chub sems ni dpag med pa/ /rin chen bdag gis bsam par bya/ /rang bzhin med phyir stong pa nyid/ /rgyu med pas na mtshan ma med/ /rjes su dpag pa dang bral bas/ /smon med nyid du nges pa'o/ /oM shU
6a4(rgyud 'grel): n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sngags des bdag gzhan dngos po gsum/ /gcig byas de nyid gsum mtshan ma/ /dgyes mdzad yas mar sbrengs pa yi/ /mdun gyi mkha' la bsam par bya/ /stong las nyi dkyil hUM nag las/ /rdo rje zer 'phros
6a5(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol bcad/ /'og dang phyogs mtshams steng spros pas/ /sa gzhi ra ba bla rer bskyed/ /bruM 'khor rtsibs bcu 'od zer drag /pad nyir khro bo 'khor lor bsgom/ /de dbus hUM mdzad rtag pa sogs/ /gnas gyur de las chos 'byung bskyed/ /gru gsum
6a6(rgyud 'grel): dkar po gyen la gnas/ /sna tshogs 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro/ /mkha' yi dkyil du pad+ma dang/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsam bar bya/ /de dbus zla steng zuM las skyes/ /'khor lo bruM mtshan las byung ba/ /rig ma dang bcas snang mdzad las/ /gyur pa'i khang pa
6a7(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs pa bsgom/ /gru bzhi la sogs yon tan ldan/ /sna tshogs pad+ma bcu dgu'i steng/ /nyi ma'i gdan ni bdun dag dang/ /zla ba'i gdan ni bcu gnyis bskyed/ /de nyid gsum gnas sems babs pas/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis de la
6b1(rgyud 'grel): gzigs/ /rang gi khams su shes rab thabs/ /dbyangs yig bde ba'i yi ger 'gyur/ /dbu brtse la byon ye shes sems/ /'dres gyur rten babs zla gnyis gyur/ /'du zhing 'phro ba'i sbyor ba las/ /gcig tu gyur pa bsam pa'o/ /de las hUM dkar
6b2(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba/ /rdo rje rtse lnga me shel gzugs/ /phyogs kun 'od zer 'phro bsams nas/ /hUM bcas ldan pas nga rgyal bya/ /oM badzra At+ma ko haM/ de las 'phros pa bde gshegs kyis/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid du byas/ /slar 'dus thugs kyi
6b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje las/ /btsud nas bdag la nga rgyal bya/ /oM ya thA sarba ta thA ta sta thA a haM/ sa bon gsang gsum rdo rjer gyur/ /gcig gyur rdo rje sems dpa' mchog /'gro kun ro mnyam gcig pa po/ /kun tu bzang po bsgom par bya/ /sku dang
6b4(rgyud 'grel): dbus zhal zla nor 'dra/ /g.yas nag g.yon ni dmar po la/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa'i/ /phyag gnyis rang snang shes rab 'khyud/ /g.yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri ste/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o/ /mkhyen byed mtshan ma dbu
6b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan la/ /mi bskyod pa yi brgyan pa bsgom/ /de nas 'dod chags chen po yis/ /'dul ba'i 'jig rten gzigs gyur nas/ /sbyor ba'i sgra yis rang lus la/ /rnam snang la sogs gzhug par bya/ /de ni spyan ma la sogs dang/ /gzugs la
6b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yul gyi bdag /rnam pa dgu ni spro byas nas/ /rang gi shes rab nyid la thim/ /shes rab de yi pad dkyil du/ /bde las sprul pa'i 'khor lo bskyed/ /gzigs gyur 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /snod du rung phyir gzhug par bya/ /rang gi sa
6b7(rgyud 'grel): ron? 'od zer gyi/ /nam mkha' i khyab pa'i bde gshegs rnams/ /zla ba lta bur zhu byas pas/ /de rnams dag phyir dbang bskur bya/ /de yi stobs kyis de dag rnams/ /bde dang yid bde thob pa dang/ /tha mal phung sogs bshig pa'i phyir/ /
7a1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba lta bur zhu ba'o/ /de la mig la sogs pa rnams/ /k+ShiM dziM khaM gaM skaM saM gyur/ /de bzhin gzugs la sogs pa rnams/ /je hUM baM ho khaM raM gyur/ /sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dag /laM maM baM te du gyur/ gzugs sogs pa'i?
7a2(rgyud 'grel): phung po'i bdag nyid rnams/ /bruM AM dzaM khaM hUM du gyur/ /de las mtshan ma de yis mtshan/ /de rnams sa snying la sogs par/ /khams kun 'dus par byas nas su/ /dris shing rtogs phul mi smra 'dug /de ni pad+ma'i gzhal yas nas/ /phyi rol phyung nas
7a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod nas ni/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs kyis/ /rang rang khams su 'phros par bsam/ /de nas bar ma'i sems can rnams/ /skar ma lhung zhing zhal zhugs nas/ /rdo rjer phyung nas pad+mar gnas/ /shes rab chags pas de zhu byed/ /de
7a4(rgyud 'grel): yi 'od zer dmar 'phros pas/ /yab yum byang chub sems su zhu/ /de las byung ba'i spyan la sogs/ /glu yis bskul nas thim par byed/ /sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs/ /dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen
7a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa bdag la skyabs su gsol/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor los sems can kun la phan/ /sangs
7a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas don du byang chub mchog tu rab tu phan par gzigs/ /mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na/ /spyod pa dri med kun tu bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba/ /'jig
7a7(rgyud 'grel): rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson/ /mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na/ /spyod pa dri med kun tu bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan yon che/ /yang
7b1(rgyud 'grel): dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs la/ /mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na/ /yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /glu 'di yin dor byas nas/ /zhu ba phun
7b2(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs bral ba/ /zla nyid gyur te yi ge hUM/ /rdo rje sngon po kun zang gdengs/ /des mtshan bshes gnyen zhu byas pas/ /sku dang zhal dbus mthing ga'i mdog /g.yas dkar g.yon ni dmar po la/ /dam pa dang po'i mtshan mar ldan/ /
7b3(rgyud 'grel): dam pa ma yin rnam rtog rnams/ /stong pa nyid du bsam byas te/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhen spang phyir/ /chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sa snying rdo rje nam mkha' dang/ /dbang phyug sgrib sel kun bzang rnams
7b4(rgyud 'grel): k+ShiM la sogs pa'i rim pa yis/ /mig la sogs par dgod par bya/ /de bzhin snying mgrin mgo zla la/ /hUM A(rgyud 'grel): oM las skyes pa yis/ /lte bar thugs rdo rje sogs bskyed/ /de rnams thugs ka nas byung ba'i/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs 'od
7b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /ma lus rdo rje gsum mchod nas/ /byin gyis brlab phyir gsol ba btab/ /dpal ldan thugs ni rdo rje 'chang/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs
7b6(rgyud 'grel): bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba badzra At+ma ko haM/ chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan/ /
7b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje gsung dang 'dra bar mdzod/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje gsung
8a1(rgyud 'grel): can mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ga badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /der bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje sku dang ldan par mdzod/ /phyogs
8a2(rgyud 'grel): bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje sku can mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga takA ya badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ ye shes sems dpa' sa bon gyi/ /'od kyis phyogs
8a3(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i mgon po bskul/ /de yi 'od zer las byung ba'i/ /spyan la sogs pa mchog rnams kyis/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi chus gang ba'i/ /bum pas dbang bskur bkra shis sgra/ /rnga dung dril sogs rol mo sgra/ /dbu rgyan rdo rje 'chang ldan bya/ /de bzhin zla ba
8a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la sogs/ /'gro ba'i dbang bskur ma gtogs pa/ /thams cad sngon bzhin bshes gnyen dang/ /gzugs kyi khyad par shes byas nas/ /byin gyis brlabs cing mig la sogs/ /sa snying sogs bkod rdo rje gsum/ /gnas gsum mtshan la dbu rgyas
8a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas mtshan pa'o/ /mgo snying lte ba gsang rkang par/ /oM hUM swA A(rgyud 'grel): hA rnams sam/ /cha shas ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis dgang bar bya/ /hUM las rdo rje chu skyes ni/ /rtse lnga 'dab brgyad bsam par bya/ /oM as nor bu ge sar
8a6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed/ /phaT kyis gnyis kyis lam 'gog pa'o/ /mtshan nyid lnga dang ldan bsams nas/ /bde mchog myong bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rang gi shes rab la zhugs nas/ /dbang po gnyis sbyar rjes chags byas/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA tan? badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko nya haM
8a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /thugs ka'i sa bon 'od lcags kyus/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo mkha' khyab pa/ /zhal zhugs gyur rdo rjer phyung/ /pad gnas zla ba lta bu'i gzugs/ /de las sa bon hUM bcu dgu /mi bskyod pa yi 'khor lo mchog
8b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar bsams nas 'gro ba kun/ /phan phyir rims kyis dbyung bar bya/ /badzra d+h+rika gis rab bskul la/ /gong ma lta bu'i mi bskyod pa/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byas nas su/ /'dus nas bdag la zhugs par bsam/ /dzi na dzi ka gis rnam snang 'byung/ /
8b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar nag dmar po phyag drug pa/ /'khor lo ral gri rin chen pad/ /'dus nas shar gyi zla bar bsam/ /ratna d+h+rika gis rin chen dbyung/ /ser nag dkar po phyag drug pa/ /rin chen ral gri 'khor lo pad/ /'dus nas lho yi nyi mar bsams/ /A
8b3(rgyud 'grel): ro lig gis 'od dpag med/ /dmar nag dkar po phyag drug pa/ /pad+ma ral gri rin chen 'khor/ /slar 'dus nub kyi nyi mar bsam/ /pradz+nyA d+h+ra ki gis don yong grub/ /ljang nag dkar po phyag drug pa/ /ral gri 'khor lo rin chen pad/ /'dus nas byang gi nyi
8b4(rgyud 'grel): mar bsam/ /dang po rang gi rig ma 'khyung/ /rgyan kun brgyan pa'i na bza' dang/ /rin chen sna tshogs dbu rgyan can/ /gdan ltar 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lo/ /mo ha ra tis spyan ma dbyung/ /sku yi rdo rje dang 'dra ba/ /'khor lo ral gri rin chen pad/ /slar 'dus
8b5(rgyud 'grel): shar lhor zla bar bsam/ /dwe Sha ra tis mA ma kI/ thugs kyi rdo rje dang 'dra ba/ /utpal ral gri rin chen pad/ /'dus nas lho nub zla bar bsam/ /rA ga ra tis gos dkar mo/ /gsung gi rdo rje dang 'dra ba/ /pad+ma ral gri rin chen 'khor/ /'dus
8b6(rgyud 'grel): na nub byang zla bar bsam/ /badzra ra tis sgrol ma dbyung/ /rin chen dbang phyug dang 'dra ba/ /utpal 'khor lo rin chen pad/ /slar 'dus byang shar zla bar bsam/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis lha mo drug /go rims bzhin du dbyung bar bya/ /gzugs kyi rdo
8b7(rgyud 'grel): rje rnam/ snang 'dra/ /me long ral gri rin chen pad/ /sgra yi rdo rje mi bskyod 'dra/ /pi bang ral gri rin chen pad/ /dri yi rdo rje rin chen 'dra/ /dung dang ral gri rin chen pad/ /ro yi rdo rje mdza' yas 'dra/ /snod dang ral gri rin chen 'khor/ /reg gi
9a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje don yod 'dra/ /gos dang 'khor lo rin chen pad/ /chos dbyings rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra/ /chos 'byung ral gri rin chen pad/ /me mtshams la sogs gra bzhi dang/ shang sgo g.yas g.yon zla steng bsam/ /a mAn+ta
9a2(rgyud 'grel): kri ta gshin rje gshed/ /mi bskyod lta bu phyag drug pa/ /tho ba ral gri rin chen pad/ /shar sgor khro dkyil nyi dbus dgod/ /tra dz+nyA trna kri ta shes mthar byed/ /snang mdzad lta bu phyag drug pa/ /dbyug par ral gri rin chen pad/ /lho sgor nyi dbus
9a3(rgyud 'grel): nyi 'od 'bar/ /pad+man ta krita rta mgrin ni/ /mdza' yas lta bu phyag drug pa/ /pad+ma rin chen ral gri 'khor/ /nub sgor nyi dkyil khro dkyil bsam/ /bag+h+nin ta krita bdud tsi 'khyil/ /mi bskyod lta bu phyag drug pa/ /rdo rje ral gri rin chen pad/ /byang sgor nya?
9a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus khro dkyil bsam/ /de rnams rgod dang gdangs pa dang/ /mche ba gtsigs nas bzhad byed pa/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brjes/ /stag lpags smad g.yogs dang ldan pa/ /gtum pa'i sbrul gyis brgyan pa yi/ /dang pos rig ma 'khyud pa
9a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /me yi 'od kyi 'khor lo nang/ /gtum po rab tu bsam pa'o/ /de ltar dngos po thams cad kyis/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong nas su/ /sa bon 'od zer lcags kyu yis/ /gshin rje gshed bskul 'khor lo dgug /de dang lhan cig
9a6(rgyud 'grel): 'ongs pa'i bgegs/ /bskrad nas thim byas khro bo thim/ /bde bas rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /mdun du dmigs la mchod par bya/ /dung gi chu yis bsang gtor dang/ /kun das kha bkab chus nye reg /mchod yon snod kyis mchod yon dang
9a7(rgyud 'grel): mdza' sogs dbye bas zhabs bsil lo/ /de bzhin khro bo gzhan bskul bas/ /'od zer gyis ni gzhug pa dang/ /bcing dang rjes su dgyes bskyed bo/ /chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab/ /mos pas mig la sogs pa rnams/ /rdo rje gsum ni
9b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsum bkod/ /snga ma bzhin du dbang bskur bas/ /rigs kyis dbang bskur bzhag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bzhi po mi bskyod pa/ /lha mo ras nga bdag pos brgyan/ /rnam snang mi bskyod snang mdza' yas/ /mi bskyod sgo srungs mtshan pa'o/ /sa bon 'od bas?
9b2(rgyud 'grel): lha mo bkug /zhal zhugs zhu gyur rdo rjes phyung/ /pad nang laM maM paM taM dang/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho khaM raM gyur/ /de yi 'od kyis bcu po dgug /rang rang sa bon la zhugs pas/ /nus dang ldan par rab byas nas/ /shes rab pa spu'i bu gar spro/ /'od rtse gzugs rdo rje
9b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs ni/ /rang rang mtshan mas rnam mdzes pa'i/ /dri med rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /sgyu ma lta bur spro bar bya/ /de bzhin phyi yi bdug pa sogs/ /'od rtse las spro nam mkha' khams/ /bkang ste bdag dang 'khor lo la/ /mchod pa bya ste mchod pa dang/ /
9b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa po dang mchod gnas gsum/ /rmi lam lta bur shes bya'i phyir/ /tha dad las ni gril bya nas/ /sngags kyi byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA pa At+ma ko haM/ de nas brag ca'i sgra lta bur/ /sgra yul thams cad rab bsams nas/ /
9b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu bde dbyangs kyis/ /rang yid lha yid bstod pa bsgom/ /mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par snang mdzad dga' chen po
9b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhing gyis ni 'od gsal mchog /ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /dngos nyid dag pas gos pa med/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che/ /
9b7(rgyud 'grel): mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dag pa rdo rje gdon mi za/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rlung dang
10a1(rgyud 'grel): me yi dkyil 'khor nas/ /pad+ma ban d+ha ra bdud rtsi lnga/ /zla ba nyi mar yi ge lnga/ /bsams nas 'od zer sbro bya'o/ /rtag sogs bkug nas sa bon gzhug /bzhu zhing bskol bas rlangs las hUM/ /de byung rdo rje zhu byas nas/ /phreng ba'i
10a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyun tu dbab par bsam/ /oM gyis bsil bar byas nas su/ /lha rnams phyag tu spro byas la/ /lce hUM las byung rdo rje bkod/ /snying zla'i 'khor lo tshim par bya/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ye shes sems dpa' i thugs
10a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis/ /thub pa'i dbang pos kun rtog spangs/ /'gro kun sangs rgyas nyid byas nas/ /sa bon la ni thim par bya/ /thugs ka'i mtshan ma nang gnas pa/ /nyi ma'i dbus kyi yi ge hUM/ /'od zer rnam pa lnga ldan pa'i/ /rtsa na'i 'bru tsam thig ler bsam/ /
10a4(rgyud 'grel): de yi 'od kyis gnas la sogs/ /rdo rje mchog gsum gsal byas nas/ /bzhag ste thig le lta bu ru/ /rang gi sems nyid zhugs par bya/ /de ma thag tu ting 'dzin gsum/ /grub pa rab tu bsam byas nas/ /de yi gsum pa las spro zhing/ /
10a5(rgyud 'grel): thig le yan chad gsal bar bya/ /bzhag pa ba spu las spro zhing/ /dkyil 'khor rten la sogs pa nas/ /khams kun bkang nas mdza' la bsdu/ /de ring yang ni spro bsdu bya/ /yang ni sa bon 'od kyis ni/ /bde gshegs bkug gzhag zhu gyur
10a6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rdo rje lam nas phyung nas su/ /ze'u 'bru bum pa'i nang du dbab/ /de las rdo rje mthing ga che/ /nas tshad lte bar rin po che/ /yungs kar tshad tsam dbus su yang/ /rten bcas ting 'dzin gsum po bsgom/ /rdo rje rtse lnga lcags kyu yis/ /phyung ste
10a7(rgyud 'grel): sna rtser gnas par bya/ /rdo rje nang nas thur sel rlung/ /phyung ste gnas bya rnam pa gzhan/ /'di yi ting 'dzin gsum pa las/ /spro bsdu gong ma bzhin du bya/ /de la bzung bas stobs ldan na/ /brtan pa'i mtshan ma skye bar 'gyur/ /de skyes sprul pa
10b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs phyag mtshan rnams/ /yang nas yang du spro bsdu bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang/ /ye shes sems dpa' i sa bon las/ /gsang sngags bzlas brjod so byed pa/ /rim pa'i
10b2(rgyud 'grel): ni cig car bya/ /oM sogs re re brjod skad cig /sku rdo rje la sogs 'khor lo/ /spros pas nam mkha' i khams bkad nas/ /yan lag bcu gnyis gsum ldan mos/ /oM sogs re re brjod skad cig /ma bskul gnyis dang gong ma ltar/ /dang pos byung
10b3(rgyud 'grel): sten mkha' la/ /bkod nas gnyis pa gong ma ltar/ /mchod pa'i lha mo spro byas nas/ /'byung pa'i bde bas thub dbang rnams/ /bde chen dbang du gyur byas la/ /gsum pas nang du thim par bya/ /rdo rje dang ni gsal ba dang/ /lam byung chos kyi 'khor lo
10b4(rgyud 'grel): las/ /steng du g.yas g.yon gnyi ga las/ /drag dang ngal bar shes par bya/ /'byung ba hUM ste 'jug pa oM/ /gnas pa A(rgyud 'grel): ste de nyid gzung/ /ye shes sa bon ngo bo ste/ /bzhi rnams gcig tu brtsi bar bya/ /nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga las/ /bzhi
10b5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus brgya phrag dgu nyid do/ /de ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi rims/ /nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o/ /phra myur rnams kyis ngal ba bsal/ /spyan sogs glu yis bskul byas nas/ /sngon bzhin 'khor lo mchod bya ste/ /sems kyi gzengs ni bstong bya ste/ /nyams
10b6(rgyud 'grel): chung spyi bor mtho gang tshad/ /zla steng oM gyis brlan pa yi/ /bdud rtsi cho ga bzhin phab pas/ /rdo rje gsum sogs tshim par bya/ /baM las byung ba'i bum pa bzang/ /zla gam phyed kyi kha bcad pa/ /thigs pa yid sbyin rin po ches/ /brgyan pa
10b7(rgyud 'grel): rkan gyi dngus su bsgom/ /'od zer lnga ni rab 'bar ba'i/ /oM ni lce yi rtse la bsam/ /de gzer rim pas dbab byas pas/ /nus dang ldan pas bkres bskom gzhom/ /bkres bskom la sogs nyon mongs la/ /rnal 'byor de ni kun brtsams na/ /
11a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur/ /cung zad ngal bsos yul gzhan 'gro /gong ma'i cho gas brtan pya'i phyir/ /rdo rje gsum sngags ma zhen par/ /gsang sngags
11a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod yang bya'o/ /ldang bar 'dod na sngags pa yi/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM nyid brjod byas la/ /de nyid gsum la 'khor lo bsdu/ /las kyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dpal
11a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan gsang ba 'dus pa yis/ /rig pa'i lta ba ma thob pa'i/ /sems can thugs rjes bzung ba'i phyir/ /smon lam 'di ni sngon du bya/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i mi bskyod mgon/ /rnal 'byor gyis thob dge ba gang/ /bde chen ye shes
11a4(rgyud 'grel): rang byung nas/ /sems can kun mkhyen sar 'god shog /gang zhig 'di mthong 'dod pa 'am/ /gang zhig zhu bar 'dod pa des/ /thugs kyi dbang phyug grangs med pa/ /mgon po de ni mthong bar shog /nam mkha' mdza' klas phyogs
11a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu ru/ /sems can kun gyi don spyod la/ /ji ltar thugs kyi dbang phyug la/ /bdag gis kyang ni spyod par shog /ji srid thog ma med pa nas/ /'khor ba yi ni mthar thug par/ /de srid sems can phan pa
11a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /sangs rgyas spyod pa bdag spyod shog /ji srid sangs rgyas sna tshogs rnams/ /'jig rten bshes gnyen mya ngan 'das/ /de yi bstan pa'i don du ni/ /bskal pa'i bskal pa byed par shog /rdo rje 'chang sogs
11a7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyis ni/ /bdag gis phyogs bcur sprul gyur cig /sngags kyi tshul gyis sems can rnams/ /de tshe bdag gis 'dul gyur cig /ting 'dzin las ni langs nas ni/ /lha yi nga rgyal dang ldan bas/ /
11b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul sems tsam shes byas la/ /rang gi lha yi gzugs su dmigs/ /yang na spyod yul de dag nyid/ /rang rang dag pas gnas pa'o/ /so so rang rig chos nyid pas/ /rnam snang mdzad la sogs par snang/ /yang na rdo
11b2(rgyud 'grel): rje 'dzin pa ste/ /rang yid dga' bar byed pa'i phyir/ /dbugs rtog spangs nas rab bsgoms na/ /gsang ba chen po mchod pa'o/ /rang gi kha zas za dus su/ /snying gar 'khor lo rab bsgoms la/ /bdud rtsi sha
11b3(rgyud 'grel): yi sbyor ba yis/ /gong ma lta bur sbyang byas te/ de nyid gsum ni bzlas byas te/ /lce dang dpu rgyan mchog bsgoms la/ /lha rnams ma lus tshim pa yi/ /bsam pas nang gi sbyin sreg bya/
11b4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol sbyin sreg dpag pa tsam/ /ye shes me ni 'bar byed pas/ /phung sogs blun pa'i bud shing bsregs/ /bla na med par bshad pa'o/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i sdom par ldan/ /ji ltar myong par mnyam
11b5(rgyud 'grel): par sbyod/ /blo dang ldan pas dam med pa/ /dus rig byas la gsang bar bya/ /snying rjer gnas pas las gnyis byed/ /'gro ba'i don dang sangs rgyas mnyes/ /lus ngag tha mal khyad par can/ /phyag rgya/
11b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi bdag nyid do/ /chos can gcig la ldog pa ni/ /sna tshogs rnam par snang ba yin/ /sdug bsngal bde ba grol 'byung ba/ /las kyi khyad par mang gyur yin/ /de phyir dge dang mi dge'i las/ /
11b7(rgyud 'grel): lus la sogs pa'i rtog las byung/ /kun rtog thams cad las grol ba/ /nag bo'i lus su ga la 'gyur/ /dam tshig nyams pa bskad don du/ /don yod rdo rje sbyor bsgoms te/ /thugs ka'i zla bar khaM bskyed
12a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsams par bya/ /gzugs sogs nam mkha' bzhin dag nas/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal sems bskyed de/ /bskul ba mngon du 'gro ba yi/ /dbang bskur byas pas dag par bya/ /
12a2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma brnyas pa'i skyon byung na/ /yon tan ldan pa'i ston mo dbul/ /sdig bshags la sogs sngon 'gro ba'i/ /sdom pa bzung bas bskang bar bya/ /phyi yi khrus kyi tshig la/ /rang gi rnal 'byor dmigs byas nas/ /
12a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur gong ma bzhin bsgoms nas/ /mdza' ru bdag po bzhag pa'o/ /de ltar nyin phyed dus dang ni/ /phyi 'phreng du yang bsgom par bya/ /nam phyed dus su sa bon nas/ /bzlas pa'i bar du bskyed par bya/ /gshegs
12a4(rgyud 'grel): su gsol 'dod sdags pa yis/ /mchod pa bstod pa bdud rtsi myang/ /byas nas mdza' ru mu bzhag pa'i/ /yi ge gsum gyis gshegs su gsol/ /de bzhin yi ge gsum brjod pas/ /ye shes sems dpa' i
12a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo la/ /phyi rol 'khor lo bcug byas te/ /shes rab snying rje ldan pas nyal/ /ldad ba'i dus na lha mo yi/ /dbyangs kyis bskul bsam langs nas su/ /sngon bzhin dus bzhir ting 'dzin gsum/ /rtsi gcig
12a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis thams cad bsgom/ /brel ba bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dus dang por ni ting 'dzin gsum/ /ma lus par ni bsgom byas la/ /yan lag rnams ni sngon bzhin bsam/ /de las gzhan pa'i dus dag tu/ /blo bur
12a7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lta bzhengs la/ /thugs las 'khor lo spro byas la/ /dbang bskur ba ni sngon bzhin blang/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la/ /thig le 'am yang na phra mo 'am/ /sdags kyi bzlas brjod yang byas nas/ /'khor lo bsku ba
12b1(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin brtsam/ /de ltar zhugs pa rnam pa gnyis/ /rang gi lam gyis ming mthun phyogs/ /bzlog pas brtan pa'i rtag rnyed pas/ /las dang po yi rnal 'byor ro/ /de yis sku la dmigs pa yis/ /man ngag thob bas ye shes che/ /
12b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bebs thob rang dang gzhan mthong na/ /cung zad ye shes dbang gyur ba'o/ /dus 'dir mig dang lus sogs rnams/ /byin brlabs dbang bsgur rab byas nas/ /mchod pa sogs kyi mnyes byas la/ /bzlas brjod sbyor ba brtsam pa'o/ /
12b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin du ni bsdu byas nas/ /sdom pa bskyang sogs sda ma bzhin/ /rgyun tu gom bslabs bcu dang gcig /mthu can stobs rtog res dmigs pa'o/ /de yis gyung la dmigs pa yis/ /rlung gi rang bzhin rtogs mdzad nas/ /bdag
12b4(rgyud 'grel): rang gzhan gyis dkyil 'khor mthong/ /ye shes dbang du gyur pa'o/ /de la nyin mtshan rgyun du 'am/ /yi ge gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin/ /kun tu spyod las chos thams cad/ /dbyer med gong bzhin bsnyen byed do/ /'di yis phyag rgya chen po yi/
12b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma gsum mthong nas/ /brtul zhugs la sogs rim 'di yis/ /sems dmigs rdo rje 'chang ba thob/ /'di las gzhan pa bcu bzhi yi/ /bsnyen pa'i cho ga 'di bzhin te/ /rang rang lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /'og nas 'byung
12b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don brtson bya/ /de yan chad ni mngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'i cho ga rgyas bar bshad zin to// //da ni slob ma rnams la dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /de la gang gis dbang bskur zhe na/ /
12b7(rgyud 'grel): dang por zhugs dang dang po pa/ /thams cad kun gyi slob dpon no/ /cung zang ye shes dbang gyur pa/ /nus dang ldan pa'i slob dpon no/ /ye shes dbang du gyur pa ni/ /sbyor ba rnyed pa'i slob dpon no/ /de rnams ci rigs mnyes byas nas/
13a1(rgyud 'grel): de yis dkyil 'khor brtsam pa'o/ /gang dag gi don du zhe na/ /dad ldan gtong phod brtson 'grus ldan/ /snod rung srog la mi lta ba/ /tshe 'dir dngos grub thob 'dod pas/ /gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du zhus
13a2(rgyud 'grel): sku gzugs bris dang lder so dang/ /glegs bam rdo rje la sogs dang/ /mchod rten la sogs gnas pa'i phyir/ /gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du zhus/ /gang dag sdig pa'i las dbang gis/ /mngon du 'am rmi lam dag tu ni/ /lha
13a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khrugs pa yi mtshan ma mthong/ /gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du zhus/ /mos mang brtan la dad pa can/ /gzhan la phan dga' mthong nas ni/ /ma zhus kyang ni de bos la/ /phan 'dod phyir ni dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /bum
13a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang gis rab sbyor bas/ /sa brgyad pa ru yang dag gnas/ /gang dag gsang ba'i dbang gis ni/ /dgu pa dad ni bcu par byed/ /shes rab ye shes dbang gis ni/ /rdo rje lta bur rab gnas pas/ /'bras bu 'byung bar nus mthu ldan/ /dang po
13a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi par shes par bya/ /rab gnas ma byas gzugs brnyan la/ /thal par brlag kyang 'bras bu med/ /sngags dang bral ba'i sbyin sreg bzhin/ /lus nyon mongs pa kho nar zad/ /de bas ji srid gnas pa'i bar/ /mchod pa'i rten
13a6(rgyud 'grel): du rung bya dang /'khor los bsgyur ba bzhin de dag /byin gyis brlab phyir brtsam pa'o/ /mngon bsags sdig pa dpag med rnams/ /skad cig gis ni zad byed pa/ /dkyil 'khor zhugs dang dbang bskur ba/ /de yis rab tu byed
13a7(rgyud 'grel): pas nas/ /ye shes kyis kyang 'debs pa yi/ /cho ga zab mos sdig pa zad/ /mtshan ma'i 'bras bu mi 'byung zhing/ /gong gi yon tan ldan par mdzad/ /thabs ji ltar zhe na/ /bdag nyid tshan po de la gong du smos pas zhu ba gsol ba dang
13b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis spro bya rnams tshogs sam/ dri bar bya'o/ /des kyang kha cig ni tshogs/ kha cig ni ma tshogs zhes gsol nas/ 'dzab bzlas ba bya'o/ /'phral du dben par 'dug nas ni/ /lha'i 'khor lo bsgom byas la/ /tshogs 'phel bgegs
13b2(rgyud 'grel): ni zhi ba'i phyir/ /sngags kyi bzlas brjod byas pa yin/ /de nyid gsum par yi ge gzhug /yang na dbyung ba bar du gzhug /sgrub pa de 'am phreng sngags sam/ /rig pa dang bcas bzla par bya/ /du ma rab tu bzla ba 'am/ /'khor bdag 'bum
13b3(rgyud 'grel): ste rang lha'i 'bum/ /gzhan dag khri phrag bzlas byas nas/ /bsam mam dngos su bka' thob bri/ /gsum pa bsrungs nas 'dzob bya ba/ /cho ga bzhin te rang gis sam/ /sbyor ba dag gi dag byas nas/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri ba tsam/ /lha
13b4(rgyud 'grel): khang phrod dam skyed tshal gyi/ /kyang shar mtshams ni ji lta bar/ /shar dang byang du dma' ba yi/ /mkhas pas sa ni btsal bar bya/ /der ni bcas nas sa bskor te/ /lhag 'gyur yang ni rdzing 'dra ba/ /chus bkang mi g.yo g.yas su 'khyil/ /ma
13b5(rgyud 'grel): lus 'khyil ba'i phur bus gzhom/ /der ni sa bdag phyogs skyong ba/ /phyogs su bskyed nas sdon bzhin du/ /gtor ma byin rlabs dbul byas nas/ /sa gsol byas nas gshegs su gsol/ /ting 'dzin rim pa gsum pos ni/ /dkyil 'khor
13b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sogs sta gon gnas/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba dang/ /gtor ma yon dang phyi mchod 'bul/ /sbyin sreg gis ni tshom byas nas/ /gsol ba btab ste nam mkha' la/ /khung bu brko ba'i ched du yang/ /byin gyis brlab phyir dgod par bya/ /
13b7(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rdo rje blob ma yis/ /lto 'phye brtags nas 'jor gyis klog /mgrin pa lte ba pus mo tsam/ /dngos grub rim pas brko bar bya/ /tho bas bod pa dag bkrugs nas/ /zhib mor brtags nas btsugs nas su/ /shis ba'i phyir dang dge ba'i phyir
14a1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'bru sman nang du bzhug /de steng sa gtsang gzhan las kyang/ /stegs bu khru gang spangs brtsigs nas/ /dam tshig lnga yis rab byugs te/ /steng rgyan sogs pas mjos par bya/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor
14a2(rgyud 'grel): ram/ /yang na bgegs dgra'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dbang bskur blangs pas bgegs kyi tshogs/ /bskrad pas nang nyid dag par bya/ /oM b+hu khaM gi sngags kyis ni/ /mkha' la ri rab bskyed par bya/ /hUM laM hUM zhes rdo rje'i bdag /sa gzhir
14a3(rgyud 'grel): byas nas brtan par bya/ /oM me de ni badzri b+hA ba band+ha hUM/ /sngon bzhin bsrung ba'i 'khor lo nas/ /rjes chags mdza' yis sbyor dang po/ /dkyil 'khor phyung ste mnyes mdzad pa/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog bdag nyid/ /'khor lo gong dang
14a4(rgyud 'grel): 'og las byed/ /las kyi rgyal mchog sbyor bdag nyid/ /de yi dbang phyug mgon po ni/ /ting 'dzin gsum gyi mchog gyur yin/ /dpa' bo rdo rje dril 'dzin pas/ /thams cad dang ni bdag mnyam mo/ /rang bzhin gyis ni bdag ngag go/
14a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i bdag nyid nga rgyal bskyed/ /'khor los dbus su gnas pa la/ /rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa yi/ /rtag sogs las kyi rdo rje yis/ /mchod gnas dkyil 'khor gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba'i/ /de
14a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi chos/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spangs/ /kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog
14a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos mchog yang dag byung/ /ye shes spyod yul rnam sbyong ba/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /senaM kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag
14b1(rgyud 'grel): pas dri ma med/ /kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /mi bskyod rdo rje khros byas nas/ /ma dang Ta las rang gi mig /nyi zlar bskyed nas mig 'bras hUM/ /rdo rje las spros sprul par bya/ /rkang mthil haM las rdo rje bskyed/ /g.yas ba rdo
14b2(rgyud 'grel): rje g.yon pa dril/ /'gyid bag mche gtsigs hUM brjod cing/ /phyogs kun 'bar bar blta bar bya/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang zlum po dang/ /sa ga bzhi ste mi bskyod pa'i/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni phyogs bzhi ru/ /dang por rab tu brtsam pa'o/ /khro bo re ras drug drug tu/ /
14b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu rnams su brtsams byas pas/ /'khor lo bgegs kyi tshogs rnams ni/ /bskrad par gdon ma zi bar 'gyur/ /rus spal stabs der rdo rje gar dang sgra/ /lcogs kyu thabs dang ting nga 'dzin thabs dang mdza' yas thabs/ /gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal gyis gnas
14b4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /shar gyi phyogs su rnal 'byor pas bya'o/ /rdo rje gdengs pa dang ni rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang/ /ral gri thabs dang phub kyi tshul dag dang/ /rdo rje skyil krung rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs/ /shes rab mthar byed kyi ni lho phyogs tsam/ /rdo rje 'joms tshul dang ni rdo rje ro
14b5(rgyud 'grel): langs dang/ rdo rje thabs dang mdung gi thabs dag dang/ /pad+ma'i 'dug stangs gsus po che yi thabs/ /rta mgrin gyis ni nub kyi phyogs su brtsam/ /rkang pa ya gcig stangs dang rdo rje thob dang/ /'khor lo'i thabs dang sems dpa' skyil krung dang/ /sprin sgra dang ni gzhu yi thabs
14b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byang phyogs nas brtsam mo/ /seng ge thabs dang rdo rje gdu bu dang/ /ba dan thabs dang thag mdung bskor ba'i thabs/ /bzang po'i 'dug stangs phur bu brdung ba yi/ /shar lho'i mtshams su 'dod pa'i rgyal pos brtsam/ /seng ge
14b7(rgyud 'grel): gla la dang bud med sgyu 'phrul thabs/ /zhag pa'i thabs dang mchod sbyin pa yi thabs/ /cog bu'i 'dug stangs dang ni ra ba'i thabs/ /lho nub mtshams nas dbyug pa sngon pos brtsam/ /rdo rje sgrog dang stobs po che gdangs dang/ /
15a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i stabs dang mtshon rtse gcig pa'i thabs/ /rtse ba'i thabs dang mtshams bcings pa yi thabs/ /nub byang mtshams dang stobs po ches brtsam mo/ /bung ba 'phur stabs zhal bzhir byin brlabs dang/ /gtun shing thabs
15a2(rgyud 'grel): dang mda''phangs pa yi thabs/ /dpa' bo 'dug stangs bkra shis rgyal mtshan stangs/ /byang shar mtshams nas mi g.yo mgon pos brtsams/ /rdo rje gsor ba dang ni rdo rje mche ba dang/ /bcon thabs dang thag pa'i 'khor lo'i thabs/ /phyir 'gyed
15a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang phyogs bcing ba yi thabs/ /steng gi phyogs nas 'khor lo sgyur bas brtsam/ /rdo rje sgeg ba dang ni rdo rje gang mo dang/ /mi 'dzigs pa yi thabs dang phyag 'tshal ba yi thabs/ /phur bus gnas lngar gdab dang mtshon cha lnga yi thabs/ /'og gi
15a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs nas gnod mdzes gyis brtsam mo/ /de rnams kyis ni bgegs kyi tshogs/ /ru dra'i ba bo sha na dang/ /tshangs pa'i srin bu gza' phur bu/ /gtso bo drug cu rtsa bzhi skrod/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson/ /
15a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /gal te gang gis bdag bka' 'goms/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis/ /'dod gsum bskyed lus bshig byed de/ /'jig bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /bgegs
15a6(rgyud 'grel): bsal bya phyir phur bu yang/ /stod ni khro bo smad zur gsum/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsams nas su/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su gdab par bya/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+ha ta ya/ sarba du Sh+Ta na phaT/ kTi la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la
15a7(rgyud 'grel): ya/ badzri re adz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya wA ka tsitat badzra kIM la ya hUM phaT/ /de las 'od zer 'khrugs shing 'bar/ /phyogs bcu bdud bcom srar 'dus nas/ /mtshams dang rab gur bcing pas/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni srung ba'o/ /sa gnon phyag rgyas
15b1(rgyud 'grel): sa la mnan/ /sa yi lha mo bton gyur nas/ /me tog sogs pas mchod nas ni/ /sbran phyir gsol ba gdab par bya/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sbyod ba'i tshul dang khyad par gyis/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang
15b2(rgyud 'grel): por gsol/ /skyob pa shA kya seng+ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi stobs bcom pa/ /de ltar bdag gis bdud bcom nas/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya/ /de skad gsol nas zhal gyis bzhes/ /de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid kyi ni gcing
15b3(rgyud 'grel): gtor sogs/ /byas nas de ru nyal bar bya/ /mtshan mo gnyis pa'i cha dang por/ /dri zhi maM sogs kyis sa bskul la/ /me tog sil ma la sogs bkram/ tsan dan mchog sogs maN+Dal bya/ /de ru ting nge 'dzin gsum mam/ /yang na lhag par mos pa
15b4(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /rten dang bcas pa dam tshig gi /dkyil 'khor rab tu dgod par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid spro bskyed la/ /ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni/ /byin brlabs mchod dang bstod pa dang/ /bdud rtsi myang bas mnyes par bya/ /bum pa nag nog med pa la
15b5(rgyud 'grel): mchu dang zhabs ni brtan pa dang/ rdo rgyus chus byug nyi shu gcig /yang na drug chu sta gon bya/ /mgur pa dang gyi cod pan mtshan/ /a mra la sogs kha rgyan can/ /spos bsreg dri zhim chu yis bkang/ /rang rang sdags kyis bzlas pa'o/ /'bru lnga
15b6(rgyud 'grel): sdu lnga yin chen lnga/ /'khor lo dri chu yin snod bsdu/ /mtshan ma lnga yis brgyan pa yis/ /rnam rgyal bum pa bdag pos bzlas/ /rdo rje pad+mas btsir nas su/ /me tog dkar po de ru gtor/ /bdag gi slob ma thams cad la/ /dbang bskur mdzod cig
15b7(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil bzlas bum pa la/ /ku sha'i bam por bcas pa yis/ /bdag gi slob ma thams cad la/ /bgegs bzlog ogsol zhes snyan gsan gdab/ /de rnams byin gyis brlab byas la/ la/ /thun gsum gtor ma
16a1(rgyud 'grel): phul nas kyang/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la/ /so so'i sngags kyis mnyes par bya/ /'khor lo sngon bzhin mchod byas la/ /lag par bog phor thogs nas su/ /bus mo gtsugs nas thal sbyar bas/ /dkyil 'khor
16a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs la snyan gsan dbab/ /bcom ldan mi bskyod rdo rje yi/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gi snying rje'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /mgon po bri bar 'dod pa ste/ /slob ma rnams la phan phyir dang/ /khyed la mchod pa'i don du
16a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /de bas bcom ldan gus bdag la/ /byin rlabs gnang bar mdzad par rigs/ /dgongs shing bdag la sangs rgyas dang/ /'gro ba'i 'khor lo don byed rnams/ /'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /gang zhig gzhan yang
16a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi lha/ /lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ /'byung po byang chub ston pa rnams/ /sems can bstan la mngon dga' ba'i/ /gang zhig rdo rje'i mig can rnams/ /che ge bdag ni rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor byang chub sems 'byung ba/ /ji
16a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar nyer sbyong nus pa yis/ /'gro dag don du bri par bya/ /slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni/ /thugs rjes nye bar bzung nas ni/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /snyan gsan lan gsum
16a6(rgyud 'grel): du gsol nas/ /mchod pa la sogs rab sbyar nas/ /mtshams la sogs pa bcings nas ni/ /phyi rol byung nas slob ma bzung/ /shes rab chen po dga' chen po/ /nga rgyal med cing drin lan shes/ /rigs ldan yon tan dang pa che
16a7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mdog gzhon pas brgyan pa'o/ /gsang sngags kyi ni grub pa mchog /'dod pa rab tu ldan 'gyur na/ /dman pa'i rigs dang byad ngan dang/ /yon tan med kyang gzung bar bya/ /slob dang yid ches dang ldan dang/ /theg chen dag 'ba' i?
16b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dang/ /dkyil 'khor mthong dang sngags 'grub 'dod/ /tshogs 'phel phyir ni 'khor lor bzung/ /snod ldan 'khor ni bzhi po dang/ /'di dang pha rol bsod nams 'dod/ /snod dang snod min rab bsgrags la/ /bdag nyid rang gi nang du
16b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro/ ting 'dzin rdo rje chu skyes kyis/ /sbyangs pa'i slob mas khang ba'i sgor/ /thal mo sbyor ba byas nas ni/ /tshig 'dis lan gsum gsol ba gdab/ /ston chen khyod la bdag dga' bo/ /bstan po byang chub chen po'i lam/ /mgon po chen po
16b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'dod de/ /de nyid dam tshig bdag la stsol/ /bdag la byang chub sems kyang gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dad dge 'dun dang/ /skyabs su 'gro ba bdag la stsol/ /thar chen khang pa brtsegs pa ru/ /mgon po bdag ni gzhug par mdzod/ /de
16b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar brjod pas bla ma yid/ /slob ma gcig ni gtsor byas nas/ /de sogs rnams la tshig 'di yis/ /gzhug phyir brong pa bskyed par bya/ /bu tshur shog cig theg chen gyi/ /cho ga sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /
16b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul chen khyed kyis bsten par gyis/ /sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /gzhal med ye shes thob pa ni/ /rdo rje sngags kyi don bsgoms yin/ /ci phyir dpag med sngags rnal 'byor/ /shAkya seng+ge sogs rab kyis
16b6(rgyud 'grel): drag po chen po bdud kyi tshogs/ /dpung chen de dag gzhom byas nas/ /'jig rten rjes 'jug rtogs nas su/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de phyir blo ldan bu khyod kyis/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thob par gyis/ /de ltar bgyi zhes der 'dug nas/
16b7(rgyud 'grel): bla mas tshig gis byang chub sems/ /ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/ /bskyed pa yin na 'phel bar bya/ /sdig pa bshags pa rjes yi rang/ /sngo dang gsol ba skyabs 'gro dang/ /byang chub sems bskyed lam bsten dang/ /smon lam
17a1(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa sngon 'gro bya/ /'khyil bzlas bsrungs nas gnas gsum du/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma las/ /oM hUM A(rgyud 'grel): ni bkab byas la/ /rdo rje khu tshur dris chus byug /spyi bor me tog mdun du spos/ /mar me'i dri ni snying
17a2(rgyud 'grel): ga ru/ /las kun byed pa'i sngags bzlas nas/ /mchod pa'i don du sbyin par bya/ /a shwat+tha dang u duM war/ /me tog rtse mor sor bcu gnyis/ /drang po dri zhim gyis byugs pa/ /dngos grub bltas phyir sbyin par bya/ /ha cang ring
17a3(rgyud 'grel): min thung ba min/ /ku sha sngon po 'bus ma zos/ /rmi lam mi 'khrugs bkra shis phyir/ /nyag ma gnyis na sbyin par bya/ /sum sgril mdud pa gsum byas pa/ /'khyil ba'i sngags bzlas pho yig g.yon/ /mo yi dpung pa g.yas
17a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ru/ /bsrung ba bya phyir bcing bar bya/ /'khyil bzlas chu gtsang skyor chu yi/ /kha bshal lan gsum 'thung bcug ste/ /byin chags gtsang bar bya ba dang/ /ngag gi nyes pa spyang phyir sbyin/ /oM h+ri bi shud+d+ha sarba d+ha rma bo so da sa bo ka lpa a
17a5(rgyud 'grel): pa na ya hUM/ /phyir mi ldog dbang dkyil 'khor la/ /byin nas mgon po bdag la gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor lta yi de nyid dang/ /slob dpon gyi ni 'phrin las dang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang/ /gsang ba mchog gi sdom pa rnams/ /
17a6(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu dbang gi slob dpon bgyid/ /sems can kun don byed phyir stsol/ /de nas bla mas thun mong sdom/ /byin nas slob ma de yis kyang/ /rig dbang thob phyir lan gsum du/ /bka' stsal de ni blang bya'o/ /kun mkhyen gang du 'jig rten du/ /
17a7(rgyud 'grel): bde bar 'byung ba mi 'byung ba/ /u duM wa ra'i me tog bzhin/ /gal te brgya lam res 'ga' 'byung/ /de bas thob dka' 'byung ba ni/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'di ni/ /ci phyir dpag med sems tsan don/ /bla na med pa byed nus pa/ /sa yang
17b1(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa du ma yi/ /sngon du byas pa'i sdig pa gang/ /de kun zad par 'gyur pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong bas so/ /gang gzhung mdza' yas grags pa yi/ /sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas nas/ /bla med go 'phang phyin pa ni/ /sngags bzlas pa las
17b2(rgyud 'grel): skye ba'o/ /gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la/ /blo gros gtan du mi g.yo ba/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung ba yi/ /ngan 'gro de dag gis gcod do/ /de ring dpag med rnyed pa ni/ /bdag chen khyed rnams kyis thob ste/ /sras bcas rgyal ba kun gyis kyang/ /bstan
17b3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /thams cad yongs su bzung gnas pa'i/ /skye bar gyur pa bdag chen gyis/ /de phyir khyed kyis bdag chen la/ /bde ba skye bar 'ong 'gyur cig /dpal ldan mchog gi theg pa 'di/ /chen por 'byung ba theg chen po/ /gang gis khyed chag
17b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams 'ong 'gyur la/ /zhal bzang khyed ni de ring 'ongs/ /sang ni 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen/ /mthong dka' nga yi thugs rje yis/ /khyed kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba'o/ /kye bu dag nyon cig do nub ni/ /seng+ge nyal stabs bzhin
17b5(rgyud 'grel): du nyol/ /khyod kyis rmi lam dge mi dge /mthong ba tho rangs bdag la smros/ /de ltar bgyi zhes rab gsol nas/ /de dag nyal bcug 'khyil pa yi/ /sngags bzlas dri chu byugs nas su/ /bsrung ba byas te gnas par bya/ /lhag par mos bas dkyil 'khor dmigs/
17b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas te/ /bsdu zhing ye shes 'khor lo ni/ /kha sbyang dbus su mkha' la bzhag /tho rangs langs nas shar bltas te/ /so shing 'chos nas steng du bsgyur/ /ba lang ko tsam maN+Dal la/ /zhi ba la sogs grub par blta/ /sbyin dang
17b7(rgyud 'grel): srung ba la sogs la/ /'khyil pa'i sngags ni mchog nyid las/ /mthong ba'i rmi lam mi dge bas/ /rang ngam des bzlas gzhom par bya/ /mtshan mo gsum pa'i cha dang por/ /skud pa rtag pa la sogs 'dra/ /de yi sa bon las byung ba/ /nyi shu rtsa lngar mos
18a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /mi bskyod rdo rje mig gnyis kyang/ /je la nyi zlar bskyed des mtshan/ /rdzi ma'i rlab rlab lcags kyu yi/ /mkha' yi 'khor lo las dgug bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad che/ /rang gi 'khor lo la mchod pa'i?/ /?
18a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi stud pa bdag la stsol/ /dipta draSh+Ti? badzra a gu sha dza hUM/ de ltar mi bskyod par byas pas/ /rang rang skud pa rang la thim/ /so so gnas pa'i skud pa kun/ /chos nyid sngags kyis bsgril bar bya/ /sarba dta rma spha ra Na a ru pha pisT?  'gro rnam?
18a3(rgyud 'grel): a tya na ta u nu pra paSh+Ta d+ha rma/ /dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur ring thung dang/ /sgo yi nyi shu chas sdom phra/ /tsan dan mchog sogs dri zhim gyis/ /byugs nas gser dngul snod du bsrung/ /yi ge gsum gyi bar bsams la/ /khrus byas rang lha'i
18a4(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal gyis/ /de nas skud pa bsdogs byas nas/ /'khor lo thig ni gdab par bya/ /bdag nyid mi bskyod shar ltas nas/ /slob ma snang mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /lte bar khu tshur g.yon bzung nas/ /nam mkha' i thig ni ma lus gdab/ /nam mkha' ?
18a5(rgyud 'grel): la gnas de bzhin gshegs/ /sems can don byed dus babs pas/ /gnas 'dir byon pa'i dus phyed du/ /thig gi sgra yis bskul bar bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ gnod sbyin gshin rje brgya byin klu/ /phyogs su kha bltas phyogs
18a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhir gdab/ /me mtshams bden bral mtshams gnas nas/ /grwa yi thig ni rab tu gdab/ /de nas tshangs thig logs gcig tu/ /sum char byas la mdza' gnyis dor/ /dang po cha bzhir rab byas la/ /de yi dang po cha gnyis so/ /de yi gnyis ba
18a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bas la/ /re re yang ni gnyis gnyis so/ /gsum pa'i dang pos cha chung gnyis/ /de nas yang ni cha chung gcig /de nas cha chung gnyis dor nas/ /cha chen gcig ni dor byas nas/ /cha chud gcig ni bcad pa'o/ /yang ni gnyis dor gcig?
18b1(rgyud 'grel): bcad do/ /gnyis dor gcig bcad de steng du/ /cha chung gnyis ni dor bar bya/ /de nas cha chen gsum ni bcad/ /de steng cha chung gsum dor nas/ /yang ni cha chung gsum dor bya/ /lhag ma cha chung gcig lus pa'o/ /de nas thig skud nyis 'gyur byas? tsan dan phur bus dbus su gzugs/ /yang ni nad ga ri ba dang/ /phyi rol ra ba kun bskor bya/ /cha chen lnga ni rab bskor na/ /nang gi rdo rje rab ste/ /lha yi gnas la cha chung lnga/ /byas pa'i phyed gnyis ka bar 'gyur/ /phyi yi 'khor lo
18b2(rgyud 'grel): cha brgyad la/ /cha gcig sgo yi dbus bya'o/ /de tshad lha yi rnams bu ste/ /de phyed 'khor sa chung du'o/ /de yi tshad kyi kha khyer sa/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang/ /phreng bshal 'phyang ba'i snam bu dang/ /de bzhin 'gram pa gshog pa'o/ /logs
18b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyi rol ya phubs te/ /de ltar ka ba la yang ngo/ /de phyed rin chen pha gu dang/ /tshon sna lnga yis mnyam mo/ /de bzhin 'khor lo ka sogs dang/ /rdo rje ra ba'ang de bzhin no/ /ya phubs steng du cha chen gsum/ /twa ra na yi sa ru 'gyur/ /
18b4(rgyud 'grel): cha chung drug la pad+ma dang/ /rdo rje ra ba bskor bar bya/ /cha chen gcig ni 'od dkyil 'khor/ /bskor nas gcig ni nye 'khor las/ /ltas ngan gyis ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /thig skud chad na slob dpon 'chi/ /lhag chad byung na 'bras sogs
18b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung/ /phyogs 'phrul slob ma smyo bar 'gyur/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi/ /rgyan cing dar sham me tog dang/ /'phan dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis/ /brgyan pa'i 'khor lo mthong bar bya/ /grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang/ /sgo yi zur kun
18b6(rgyud 'grel): cha la yang/ /zla ba riN chen rdo rje dgod/ /gam ba'i ri sogs rab brgyan pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo ri dwags gnyis/ /'phan sogs kyis rgyan twa ra Na/ /ji ltar mdzes shing klubs par bya/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam dbang gis/ /'di ni
19a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bas/ //bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyud 'di ru/ /khru ni bcu gnyis nyid du gsungs/ /de la khru bcu gnyis ni/ byang chub kyi sems la dga' ba'i rdo rje sgeg mo dang/ /gzungs dang yon tan gyi rdo rje phreng ba ma dang/ chos
19a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chad pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje glu ma dang/ /sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'i rdo rje gar ma dang/ /grags pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rdo rje bdug pa ma dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi rdo rje me tog ma dang/ 'gro ba gzhan dga' bar byed pa'i rdo rje mar me dang
19a3(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims la sogs pa'i rdo rje dri chab ma dang/ /sbyin pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje kyo ba ma dang/ snyan par smra ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje gsol ka ma dang/ don mthun pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje pho nya ma dang/ don spyod pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'bebs pa ma ste/ de rnams
19a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no// //de bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor la khru bcu drug tu gsungs pa ni/ /byang chub kyi sems brtan par byed pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ /thams cad 'gugs nus pa'i rang bzhin
19a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje chags pa dang/ gzi brjid bstod cing dga' ba'i yon tan rdo rje legs pa dang/ chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje rin chen dang/ gzi brjid gzhan
19a6(rgyud 'grel): las 'phags pa'i yon tan rdo rje gzi brjid dang/ re ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i yon tan rdo rje dpal rab dang/ 'dzum pas lung ston pa'i yon tan rdo rje bzhad pa dang/ chos la dmigs shing so sor rtog pa'i yon tan rdo rje chos rab dang/ sgrib pa
19a7(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gcod pa'i yon tan rdo rje rnon po dang/ sku gsung thugs zad mi shes pa'i kun la khyab pa'i yon tan rdo rje rgyu dang/ gzhung gi chos rab tu sgrogs pa'i yon tan rdo rje smra ba dang/ sems can smin pa dang grol bar byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje las
19b1(rgyud 'grel): rab dang/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing srung ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje srung ba dang/ gdul dka' 'dul bar byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ rdo rje gsum bsdus shing dbyer med pa'i yon tan rdo rje bsdud pa ste/ dernaMs? naM par dag pa'o// //
19b2(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi dkyil 'khor lo khru nyi shu gsungs pa ni/ de rnams dang rdo rje'i rigs rnams sdud cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan sems ma rdo rje ma dang/ rin po che'i rigs sdud cing dbang bskur ba'i byin gyis rlob pa'i rang bzhin
19b3(rgyud 'grel): yon tan rin chen rdo rje ma dang/ pad+ma'i rigs sdud cing chos kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan chos kyi rdo rje ma dang/ las kyi rigs sdud cing las kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan las kyi rdo rje ma ste/ de rnams rnam par dag pa'o/ /ci'i phyir
19b4(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ de rnams sa bcu rnam par dag pa ste/ sa bcu ni ye shes lnga'i rten du gyur pa'i phyir re/ /ji skad du gsang pa'i thig le nor bu'i rgyud phyi ma las/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /lam rnams dag ste rim pa bzhin/ /bcu gnyis bcu drug nyi shu zu/?
19b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes la ni ye shes gnas/ /thos dang bsam pa ngo bo ni/ /kyo ba la sogs rang bzhi no/ /shes rab brtson 'grus ting nge 'dzin/ /thar chags sdud pa la sogs so/ /drong la sogs pa dang por sbyor/ /sgeg mo la sogs ngo bo'o/ /lhag ma nyi shu gnyis gnyis kyang
19b6(rgyud 'grel): sa re bu ni rnam dag pas/ /ye shes brten du yang dag 'tsham/ /stegs bu 'di yang 'khor lo yi/ /rten du yang dag gyur pas na/ /rnam par dag pa mngon du bya'o zhes so/ /mdor na zab gsal gnyis med las/ /grub pa'i khyad par 'byung bas na/ /rigs
19b7(rgyud 'grel): dang tshad sogs nges med pas/ /khru gang nas brtsams stong phrag brgya/ /rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am/ /yang na 'byung khungs nas 'byung dang/ /sA lu btags pa'i phye ma la/ /snga ma'i rim bzhin 'khor los dbab/ /bdon pa'i byin gyis brlabs brjod/ /gser
20a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs snod du bdug par bsre/ /gsal bar bsams nas gsang sngags 'dis/ /mngon par bzlas pa rab tu bya/ /badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ /rdo rje shugs kyis zhugs nas su/ /chos dbyings kyis ni 'di nyid dag /sems can dbyings ni rab
20a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrol mdzad/ /rgyal ba'i mchog ni mi bskyod mgon/ /bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /skyon kun las ni grol bar mos/ /bla mas g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /dbang ldan mtshams nas phyi rol nas/ /ri mo lnga ni bri bi'o/ /dkar po ser po dmar po dang/ /
20a3(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu nag po nang du'o/ /g.yas su bskor cing tshad med pas/ /rdul tshon ri mo bri ba'o/ /sbom po ri bris na nang 'byung ste/ /phra bas nor zad 'khyog 'thar 'byung/ /chad na slob ma bla ma 'chi/ /de bas phyogs kun mnyam par 'gyur/ /g.yas skor tshul du mi 'debs na/ /
20a4(rgyud 'grel): tshon la phur bus gdab par bya/ /rdo rje rtse mo gnyis dkar mo/ /gzhan ni ser por shes par bya/ /pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba gzhan/ /ma ra ga ta lta bu ste/ /dbus ma nag por shes byas nas/ /tshon gyi rim pa de ltar ro/ /shar gyi phyogs su dkar po che/ /lho ser nub dmar
20a5(rgyud 'grel): byang ljang gu/ /dbus ma'i cha phyogs ra bas bskor/ /in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog go /de dus rlung dang sbrul sogs sbrul/ /bgegs dgra'i phyag rgya dran byas nas/ /sdang ba'i dgra yi sngags rgyal 'di/ /brjod pas de dag sel bar bya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzrA
20a6(rgyud 'grel): sman? mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daSh+Tra 'oT ga Ta b+hi ra pa ya a si mus la pa ra shu pA sha ha sta ya/ oM a mra ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA ti khA ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Thar/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ pi spho Ta yi pa spo Ta ya/ sarba big+hu na bi nA ya ka/ mahA
20a7(rgyud 'grel): ga na pa ti/ dzI bi ta an+ta ka ra ye hUM phaT// //de ltar rdul tshon btab gur nas/ /pad+ma'i gdan la nyi ma dang/ /zla ba rab tu bkod byas nas/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dgod pa'o/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra/ /shar du lce
20b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad 'khor lo ni/ /zla ba lta bu'i 'od zer dang/ /lho ru rin chen zur dgu pa/ /mrgad lta bu'i 'od zer ldan/ /nub tu pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /dmar po 'od zer dang ldan pa/ /byang du ral gri rin chen yu/ /sngon po 'od zer dang ldan pa'o/ /me mtshams spyan ni sngon po'o/ /bden bral
20b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su rdo rje bri/ /rlung mtshams pad+ma sdong bur bcas/ /dbang ldan utpal ljang ser can/ /phyi rol me mtshams la sogs dang/ /shar sgo g.yas g.yon gru gnyis la/ /me long pi wang dung dang snod/ /gos dang chos kyi 'byung gnas bri/ /tho ba 'bar bshad sgo bjo/?
20b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbyug pa lho sgor bri/ /pad+ma nub kyi sgo ru bri/ /rdo rje kha bye byang du bri/ /shes rab thabs su rab ldan pas/ /ldan du mnyam par bzhag ste bya/ /rang rang gi ni ngo bo rnams/ /'phro ba'i sngags kyis gdab par bya/ /de nas lha rnams gnas bya'i phyir/ /sme sha can gyi bdag nyid che
20b4(rgyud 'grel): bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /mA ma kI ru byin gyis brlab/ /gnyis sbyor rjes su chags bskyed nas/ /sangs rgyas rang gi nang du gzhug /cho ga gsum gyi sgrub byas nas/ /bzhi pas gnyis su med par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i sgri yis ni/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnam par dgug/
20b5(rgyud 'grel): bskad nas bsrung bya sngon bzhin du/ /mchod yon la sogs dbul bar bya/ /mchod stod bdud rtsi myang byas nas/ /shes rab mthar byed kyis gzhug dang/ /bcings te dga' byas nye bsgrub dang/ /sgrub pa dbang bskur gyis mtshan pa'o/ /sngon bzhin mchod pa yang byas te/ /de
20b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bstod dang dung rtsi myang/ /gsal bar bsgoms nas bzlas brjod dang/ /reg pa'i mchod pas mnyes bya'o/ /de bzhin phyi yi dri li sogs/ /sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas/ /rang gi sa bon las sprul te/ /'khor lo yang dag mchod pa'o/ /'di ni yang dag bdug pa ste
20b7(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dang ni sbyang ba'i dri/ /bdag gi 'bul ba 'di bzhes la/ /bdag la bka' drin stsal du gsol/ /badzra d+hu pe pu dza spha ra Na/ sna tshogs me tog gi yid 'ong ba/ /rab tu yid 'ong 'bar ba yi/ /byang chub yan lag me tog 'di/ /bdag la brtse dgongs zhes su gsol//
21a1(rgyud 'grel): badzra puShpe pU dza spha ra Na/ ting nge 'dzin mar me dge bar 'di/ /sreg byed ngan 'gro 'jigs las skyob/ /lha yi spyan ni thob byed pa/ /bdag la brtse dgongs bzhes su gsol/ /badzra A lo ke pU dza spha ra Na/ /ga pur la sogs 'byug pa ni/ /dri zhim la sogs
21a2(rgyud 'grel): me tog brgyan/ /hUM dbyangs snyan par rol 'byung 'di/ /bdag la brtse dgongs bzhes su gsol/ /badzra gand+he pU dza spa ra Na/ /sna tshogs bza' ba yid 'ong ba/ /bza' dang bcas dang ldag dang bzhib/ /yid 'ong gdung ba sel ba 'di/ /bdag la rtse dgongs bzhes su gsol/ /
21a3(rgyud 'grel): badzra nai bi dye pU dza spha ra Na/ sna tshogs btung ba yid 'ong ba/ /'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang/ /myos byed bdud rtsi dpa' bo 'di/ /bdag la brtse dgongs bzhes su gsol/ /badzra su ra pU dza spha ra Na/ rin chen ri 'am rgya mtsho rin chen rnams/ /bzhang dang sgeg dga' 
21a4(rgyud 'grel): rol dang bde ba dang/ /dpag bsam shing dang na bzang shing rnams kun/ /'khor lo bla mar bcas la dbul bar bya/ /bo d+hi ratna a laM ka ra/ ha sa la se ra ti kri ha so/ byA? a nut+ta ra/ a nu t+ta ra bo d+hyaM laM ka ra bstar/ pu dza me g+ha sa mu tra spa ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes
21a5(rgyud 'grel): dbul lo/ /srungs nas phyi rol byung nas kyang/ /phyogs skyong rang rang rnal 'byor gnas/ /sdig med sha khrag chu zen gyi/ /gtor ma phul nas nang du 'gro/ 'di ni gzhan du bshad pas der shes par bya'o/ /gos dang rgyan gyis rab brgyan te/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad
21a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag bsgyur la/ /dkyil 'khor bskor ba yang byas te/ /phyag 'tshal me tog sngon po ngor/ /bdag pos bcings bsams mgo ru bcings/ de yi gong 'og cho ga rnams/ /rnam par dag par 'gyur bas na/ /dag pa'i dag pa rnam dag pa'o/ /de nas lha rnams
21a7(rgyud 'grel): tshim bya'i phyir/ /thob la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i/ /sbyin sreg gnas su song nas kyang/ /sbyor ba ldan pas mnyes par bya/ /'di'i cho ga yang gzhan du bshad pas der shes par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor mchod pa yang byas te/ /shis pa'i phyir na bkra shis glu/ 'khor
21b1(rgyud 'grel): lo bskor nas bdag nyid kyis/ /phreb? rdob pa yi gar gyis kyang/ /hUM hUM 'khor ba don byed sku 'dzin pa/ /gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'i mchod/ /mi bskyod rdo rje khyod 'ba' zhig/ te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la/ /lha dang mi yis 'dud pa'i mchog
21b2(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa'i me tog sna tshogs dag /mi bskyod rdo rje khyod 'ba' zhig /te na hUM te na hUM te te hUM/ /dngos po rnam grol rnam par bsnyen/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba 'dzin pa khyod/ /bdud rtsi mdza' med gsol ba khyod/ /khyod kyi dgongs pa pad rgyas yin/ /te na hUM te na hUM te te hUM
21b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsam spangs sems can don mdzad pa/ /rgyu med gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ dung dad ku mu da yi gzugs/ /rgya mtsho dangs ma zla gzugs 'dra/ /te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ /rol pa gnyis med rnal 'byor mdzad/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya 'dzin/
21b4(rgyud 'grel): ten hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ /sgyu 'phrul las kyi 'gro ba bzung/ /rkyen gyi ma byas gzugs can yin/ /te na hUM te na hUM na te te hUM/ /de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i rim/ /bdag nyid zhugs byas lha yis kyang/ /chu nas bka' stsal bar gyi dbang/ /bskur bsams 'khor lo
21b5(rgyud 'grel): de la ni?/ /slob ma rnams ni gzhug pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'chang ba las byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor rten dang bcas pa yi/ /de bzhin nyid ni lan gsum brjod/ /nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i sems/ /rdo rje sems dpa' che rang bzhin/ /mi
21b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyod rdo rje dang grub shog /mchog chen dngos grub thams cad dang/ /dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lha/ /thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs/ /dam pa'i yi ge grub par shog /skyon med rtag pa la sogs pa/ /'dod chags kun la rjes su chags/ /'dod chags chen po dga' 
21b7(rgyud 'grel): ba che/ /de nyid bcom ldan bdag la grub/ /gtan du dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdong ma nas grol de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub po/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyag chen po'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje snying gtso
22a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag la ni/ /rdo rje sngags chen grub par shog /sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa/ /sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /sems can kun gyi de bzhin pha/ /dam tshig mchog gis 'dod pa'i mchog /bden pa gang gis ye shes kyi/ /shes rab
22a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs dag dkyil 'khor ni/ /mgon po khyod kyi bden pa des/ /bdag gis 'dod pa yongs su bskod/ /gzugs brnyan dang ni mnyam pa'i chos/ /dag cing dang ba rnyog med pa/ /gzung med brjod du med pa yang/ /rgyu dang rkyen la kun tu gyur/ /de nyid de nyid bskyed pa ni/ de
22a3(rgyud 'grel): dag bden pas dkyil 'khor la/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob pa ni/ /sdig med pas ni blta bar bgyi/ /thun mong sdom pa dang ldan pa/ /bsnyen sgrub gsum gyis bsgrubs nas su/ /yol bas bar du bcad pa la/ /'khyil bzlas chu yis gtor bar bya/ /dmar lo
22a4(rgyud 'grel): sham gyis gdong g.yogs nas/ /dga' ba khyod gang yin zhes dri/ /dga' ba skal ldan bdag yin zhes/ /'jug pa po yis smra par bya/ /de nas me tog snyim bkang nas/ /'khor los bzhes shes gtor nas ni/ /gtong sems bskyed nas bla ma la/ /yon
22a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rab tu dbul bar bya/ /yul mkhar khyim dang glang po rta/ /bran dang bran mo chung ma drug /bu mo shin tu yid 'od dang/ /gang gis rang gi lus 'di yang/ /deng nas brtsams te dbul bar bgyi/ /ci'i phyir na dbul bya na/ /slob dpon du ni nyer gnas phyir/ /rdo rje chen pos
22a6(rgyud 'grel): nyer gnas phyir/ /sems can thams cad skyob don du/ /bdag gi lus 'di dbul bar bgyi/ /hUM gi snying gar rdo rje bsgom/ /oM badzra yo ga ts+tshit+ta utpa da ya mi/ su ra ta stAM sid+hi badzra ya thA su khaM/ /brjod pas byang chub sems bskyed la/ /lus kyi 'khor lo bskul bar
22a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ byin gyis brlob par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi gsang chen 'di/ dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /dad par mi byed pa yang bi rung?
22b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gshin rje gshed la sogs pa 'am/ a khaM bi ra hUM brjod nas/ drangs nas 'jugs pa'i sgor gnas te/ snga ma'i sdom pa brtan par bya/ /de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rigs la rab tu chud do/ /de bas ngas khyod la rdo rje yais bskyed par
22b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /ye shes des khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de'i thabs 'di khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du ma smra zhig /khyod dam tshig las 'da' bar ma rung ba'i phyir ro/ /snying gar
22b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bzhag nas ni/ /de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /khyod kyi snying la yang dag gnas/ /gal te tshul 'di 'das na ni/ /snying 'gas sdug bsngal de ltar 'byung/ /badzra satwa hUM/ pad+ma'i ban d+har bdud rtsi lnga/ /yi ge gsum gyis 'bar byas la/ /rdo rje yi ni de yi khar/ /mi ldog phyir ni
22b4(rgyud 'grel): khrud par bya/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal pa'i chu/ /dam las 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub pa'i/ /bdud rtsi rdo rje chu 'thung zhig/ badzra u da ka Tha/ de nas de yis mi 'gyur byas/ /sems g.yi dogs phyir bstan pa yi/ /dam bcas 'di Ni bla ma yis/
22b5(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum du ni bsgrags par bya/ /de ring phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje da yin gyis/ /ngas ci smras pa'i bya ba thams cad khyod kyi bya dgos so/ /khyod kyi bdag la brnyas par mi rung ste/ /brnyas na ya nga ba ma spangs bas shi ba'i dus byas nas/ dmyal bar ltung bar ma 'gro
22b6(rgyud 'grel): zhig /de nas slob ma de yis kyang/ /brtan nas rang nyid dag bya'i phyir/ /gsol ba gdab pa 'di yi mchog /smros shig ces ni bla mas smras/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag cag la dbab du gsol lo/ /de yi snying ga
22b7(rgyud 'grel): ru ni hUM/ /yaM byung dbang chen dbus su bsam/ /mgrin par a ni baM byung ba'i/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su bsam/ /spyi bor haM ni dkar bo che/ /yaM byung rlung dbus bsams nas ni/ /skul byed dzhi ni rkang mthil gnyis/ /rlung gis bskyod pas 'bar byas dbab/ /oM
23a1(rgyud 'grel): A be sha ya staM b+ha ya ra ra ra ra tsA la ya tsA la ya/ hUM a ha dzhai/ rdo rje dril bu sgra dang bcas/ /'jigs rung gar gyis smin rings bskyod/ /mig bgrad so gtsigs bzhad byed pas/ /slob ma dbab pa rab tu bya/ /lce la thig le'i yi ge A(rgyud 'grel): bsaM
23a2(rgyud 'grel): nas bzlos shig dge mi dge/ 'bru hi badzra zhes brjod nas/ /dbab pa brtan par bya'o/ /pra ti badzra ho brjod la/ /me tog dkyil 'khor dor du gzhug /de yis bcings bar rab bsams la/ /blangs nas mgo ru bcings bar bya/ /'di ni stobs chen sems dpa' bas/ /'di yi
23a3(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dres so sor bzung/ /phyag mtshan nye ba 'am mi nye ba/ /re'u cha'i gnas las shes par bya'o/ /yang na rang gi skal ba yis/ /gdong phye me tog de la gtor/ /mig gnyis oM 'bar bsams nas ni/ /gdong phye las kyi kha dog bstan/ /de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /
23a4(rgyud 'grel): nan tan byas te khyod mig phye/ /bla na med pa'i rdo rje mig /thams cad la ni mig phye 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo gnas brtsams nas/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bstan pa 'am/ /yang na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa las/ /gtso bo'i par du bstan bya'o/ /slob mas thal mo sbyar byas
23a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor nyid du bdag bzhugs so/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor de ring bdag gis mthong/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur/ /de skad lan gsum brjod par bya/ /
23a6(rgyud 'grel): bum pa rnams chu gcig tu bya/ /mi bskyod rdo rje rab bskyed la/ /zhugs nas slob ma'i mgo bo ru/ /'khor lo bsgyur bzhin dbang bskur bya/ /rin chen la sogs dbu rgyan la/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyur byas te/ /dbus su rang gi lha bzhag pas/ /cod pan dang ldan dbang bskur
23a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rdo rje rtse mo dgu lnga pa/ /'od dpag med bsgoms yongs gyur te/ /byin nas snying gar de bzung ba/ /rdo rje'i dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /dril bu don yod grub pa ru/ /bsgoms nas yongs gyur byin nas ni/ /rdo rje dril bu la 'khyud tshul/ /bdag por dbang ni bskur ba bye/ /spyi gtsug?
23b1(rgyud 'grel): ltag pa rab bcug ste/ /spyi bor phyag reg ming gi dbang/ /che ge rdo rje zhes bos nas/ /khyad par gzhan yang mthong bar bya/ /gang gang snang ba kun bdag ste/ /de yi gtso bo mi bskyod mgon/ /chos rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge tshul/ kun gyi
23b2(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo yin pa'i phyir/ /ming gong dpal gyi sgra gzhug bya/ /go ba nyid du bsgrag pa'i phyir/ /dang po kye 'byor mdza' yi bar/ /hUM bskyed rdo rje lag byin nas/ /'chang ba'i rdo rje lan gsum gsor/ /brtul zhugs 'di ni dang po ru/ /rnal 'byor pa yis blang bar bya/ /'di ni sangs
23b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad dang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na gnas/ /rtag par khyod kyis kyang bzung ste/ /lag pa rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+hi badzra sa ma ya taSh+Thi e Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi/ hi hi hi hi hUM/ de yi de nyid bshad par bya/ /sngon mdza' med pa'i sems
23b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /rdo rje snying po'i gtso bo'i gtso/ /a las byung ba'i dril bu ni/ /lag g.yon byin nas phyogs brgyad dkrol/ /brtul zhugs 'di yang dang bo ru/ /de yi grogs su sbyin pa'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /
23b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dbyangs chen 'khrol bar 'dod/ /rtag par khyod kyis kyang bzung ste/ /rgyal ba byang chub mchog tu 'dod/ /de nyid bshad par bya pa ni/ /'di ni chos kyis dkrol bya ste/ /srid ba rang bzhin gyis dag phyir/ rang bzhin gyis ni 'byung bar byed/ /rang bzhin dag pas sems
23b6(rgyud 'grel): can kun/ /dam pa'i srid pa byed pa po/ /slob ma rdo rje dbyings phyug dang/ /ldan par bsams nas bcom ldan 'das/ /mngon byed 'das pa mchog 'di yis/ /phyag rgya'i dam tshig sbyin pa'o/ /phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs te/ /snying po bsnyen pa la sogs grags/ /dam tshig
23b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod gzugs sogs rnams kyis/ /sngags ni dbul su rtogs nas bzla/ /rang gi rang bzhin de rnams kyis/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum khyab pa yi/ /ma lus gtso bo mchod byas nas/ /bdag dang gzhan yang mnyes par bya/ /dka' thub dam bcas de dag gis/ /bsten par byas
24a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'grub pa med/ /mi snang mngon shes mkha' 'gro med/ /sku gsung thugs las brub bskyes so/ /de bas sangs rgyas sems can rnams/ /sngags kyi spyod pa mchog bzung ste/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas/ /chos kyi yi ge mchog thob 'gyur/ /bde sdug gnyes
24a2(rgyud 'grel): med bdag nyid kyis/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bsten te/ /chags chen ye shes don sbyor na/ /de kho na nyid kun kyang 'grub/ /sku gsung thugs grub yang dag ste/ /gang gzhan dman pa yang skye 'dod/ /de yang sku gsung thugs bsgoms nas/ /sngags bzlas pa yis 'grub pa'o/ /thun
24a3(rgyud 'grel): mong ma yin sdom bar ldan/ /sbyor ba ma nyams yon phul nas/ /rdo rje slob dpon dbang nod phyir/ /de yis lan gsum gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /mchod chen ji ltar bgyi ba bzhin/ /bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha' rdo rje bdag la stsol/ /'jug pa'i sgo ru
24a4(rgyud 'grel): khru do bar/ /pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad la/ /sa bon gyis mtshan dbang stegs bri/ /seng+ge mtshan par 'dug tu gzhug /de nyid ting 'dzin gsum ldan par/ /byas nas bla ma'i lus dkyil 'khor/ /sangs rgyas sogs spro rnam dgug cing/ /nam mkha' i khams kun dga' bar bya/ /de yis rda
24a5(rgyud 'grel): dril sil snyan dang/ /rgyal mtshan 'phan sogs pheg rdob cing/ /bum pa gtso sogs gzung byas nas/ /sngon bzhin chu sogs dbang bskur bsam/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /khams gsuM kun gyi phyag byas pa/ /gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin
24a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /de skad lan gsum brjod nas su/ /dge ba'i phyir dang shis pa'i phyir/ /bum pa spyi bor rab bzung ste/ /bkra shis dbyangs 'di brjod par bya/ /dpal ldan gser gyi ri bo ltar 'bar ba/ /'jig rten gsum mgon dri ma gsum dang bral/ /bcom ldan par rgyas lta bu'i
24a7(rgyud 'grel): spyan mnga' ba/ /bkra shis des ni deng khyod ni byed shog /de yi bstan pa'i dri med mchog rab ni/ /'jig rten gsum grags lha dang mis mchod pa/ /cho ga skye dgu rnams ni zhi bar byed/ /bkra shis gnyis kyi deng 'drir khyed la shog /dam pa'i chos ldan thos gang bkra shis
24b1(rgyud 'grel): shing/ /dge 'dun lha dang lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /ngo mtshar dpal rab mchog rab tshogs rnams kyi/ /bkra shis gsum pa deng 'dir khyod la shog /de nas de dag thams cad kun/ /ye shes ngo bor zhugs bsams pas/ /dbu rgyan ye shes sems dpa' bskyed/ /bskor
24b2(rgyud 'grel): byas slob dpon gnas par bya/ /sngon bzhin mchod dang bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi myang ba yang byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid bstan bya/ /sangs rgyas ma rgyas mnyam pa'i phyir/ /gru bzhi ru ni rab tu bstan/ /dran pa nye bzhag shar gyi sko/ /yang dag spong ba lho yi sgo/ /rdzu 'phrul
24b3(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa nub kyi sgo/ /dbang po stobs ni byang gi sgo/ /bsam gtan bzhin twi ra Na/ /ting 'dzin rnams ni kha khyer brgyad/ /gzungs rnams der gnas lha mo'o/ /bsams pa skod phyir lha tshogs brgyan/ /gsung rab yan lag 'phags sogs so/ /byang chub yan lag dra ba sogs/ /rnaM
24b4(rgyud 'grel): par thar brgyad ka ba brgyad/ /sngags tshul rdo rje phreng ba zlum/ /phyin log rnam dag yon tan lnga/ /dri med stobs sogs mchod pa lnga/ /bum pa chus gang thugs rje dang/ /tshogs rdzogs ser po ye shes gter/ /'gro ba rnams dang dbyer med kyang/ /de yi nyes pas mi gos phyir/ /sna tshogs
24b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma bcu dgu ni/ /sdong bu dang ni bcas pa'o/ /mi dge 'dam rdzab skam mdzad phyir/ /dge ba'i myu gu gso mdzad pa/ /nyi ma'i gdan ni 'dun rnams so/ /nyon mongs tsha ba bsil byed dang/ /ma rig mun nag sel ba'i phyir/ /zla ba bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'o/ /tshor ba gsol ba sogs
24b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /'ju ba la sogs dus bcu gnyis/ /zad dus sgron bdun rnam dag pas/ /grangs ni nges par bstan pa'o/ /nyon mongs thams cad las grol phyir/ /gzhal yas khang du btags pa yin/ /snying po la ni 'dus pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad pa yin/ /rnam par shes pa
