24b7(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang thugs/ /chos dbyings rnam dag mi bskyod pa/ /gzugs phung gti mug phye dang sku/ /me long rnam dag rnam snang mdzad/ /tshor ba'i phung po mnyam pa nyid/ /nga rgyal rnam dag rin chen 'byung/ /'du shes phung po 'dod chags gsum/ /so sor rtog pa snang mdza' yas/ /'du byed phung
25a1(rgyud 'grel): po nan tan dang/ /phrag dog rnam dag don yod grub/ /sa dang stong nyid thabs dang ni/ /snying rje zhi byed spyan ma'o/ /byams dang mtshan med smon lam dang/ /chu khams srung byed mA ma kI/ /dga' dang smon med stobs dang ni/ /me khams rgyas byed na bza' 
25a2(rgyud 'grel): dkar/ /btang snyoms ye shes rang bzhin gsal/ /rlung khams sgrol byed sgron ma'o/ /sbyin pa rnam dag gzugs rdo rje/ /tshul khrims rnam dag sgra rdo rje/ /bzod pa rnam dag dri rdo rje/ /brtson 'grus rnam dag ro rdo rje/ /bsam gtan rnam dag reg rdo rje/ /shes rab rnam
25a3(rgyud 'grel): dag chos rdo rje/ /phyi yi longs spyod kyis mchod phyi'i/ /dbyung sngags ting 'dzin gsungs pa'o/ /mi la sogs pa rnam dag phyir/ /de nyid du ni bkod par gsungs/ /dbyung sngags ting 'dzin ma gsungs pas/ /sa snying la sogs phyir mi dgod/ /'jigs sogs shes
25a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phung po'i bdud/ /dad dag gshin rje gshed 'gugs pa/ /nyon mongs de bdud mthar 'dzin lha/ /brtson dag 'jug byed shes mthar byed/ /skye sgrib 'chi bdag log par lta/ /dran dag 'ching byed rta mgrin no/ /las dang lha bdud mchog 'dzin lha/ /ting 'dzin
25a5(rgyud 'grel): mgu mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /chos dang longs spyod sbrul pa dang/ /ngo bo nyid de rnam bzhin ni/ /thugs sogs rdo rje ye shes sems/ /phyag rgya bzhi zhes bshad pa yin/ /rnam par rtog pa dang bral phyir/ /gting dpag dka' bas zab mo ste/ /phyag rgya chen por rab snang pa/ /
25a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gzhan smin byed gsal ba po/ /zab mo dag ni yang dag gsal/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid de/ /mdza' gnyis skyon ni rab bkab pas/ /dus thams cad du dbyer med do/ /de bzhin slong ma dbang bskur dang/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /sgrub pa'i
25a7(rgyud 'grel): thabs ni rab bstan pas/ /gang zag gnyis su shes par bya/ /gzugs brnyan glegs baM la sogs pa/ /yod na khyod kyis rab gnas mdzod/ /de ni ji srid bar du ni/ /sems can don du 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar lung bstan dbugs dbyung dang/ /bka' stsal pa zhis?
25b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur nas/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa kun bstan te/ /dka' lung g.yar gyi blang ba'o/ /bum pa'i dbang gi cho ga'o/ /lo 'am yang na zla ba ru/ /rig dang slob dpon dbang thob pas/ /lus dang zang zing thabs dang bcas/ /spyod pa mchog gi bla ma bkur/ /rin
25b2(rgyud 'grel): chen sna bdun la sogs pa/ /rjes su mthun pa dbul bya ste/ /bla ma dgyes par byed pa'i ched/ /bu mo gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba/ /rgyan ldan dam sdom dbyang bcas pa/ /lus rgyas mdzes pa dbul byas na/ /bla ma'i g.yon du du mo bzhag /rgyal po mu stegs chom kun
25b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /gnod med dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mchog gi dris byugs pad sogs gdan/ /bla re rgyal mtshan sogs kyi klubs/ /rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs sgras/ /gong gi 'khor ram yang na sku/ /tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po yis/ /dbyer med 'khor lo mchod byas nas/ /
25b4(rgyud 'grel): me tog snyim bkang gsol ba gdab/ /kun mkhyen ye shes phung po sogs/ /pus gtsugs thal sbyar mgrin dma' bas/ /gsang ba mchog gi sdom pa chen/ /yang dag blangs nas srung bar bya/ /ji ltar dbang bskur sogs tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas la sogs thob pa bzhin/ /byang
25b5(rgyud 'grel): chub spyod pa gzhan gyi ni/ /'dul ba'i dge ba de bzhin med/ /de bas dam tshig bus srungs shig /rtag tu sdom pa yang skyongs shig /sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga bza' ste/ /de las gzhan yang dam tshig srungs/ /dkon mchog bla ma brnyas byed gzhom/ /gzhan gyi bud med spyad pa
25b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ma phyin par yang blangs byas nas/ /rdzun gyi tshig kyang sma bar bya/ /rnal 'byor rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin/ /de ni cho ga bzhin du srungs/ /de ltar bya'o zhes gsol nas/ /yang ni me tog phreng ba gtor/ /thal mo sbyar nas gsang ba yi/ /dbang nod /phyir ni gsol ba
25b7(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ /rdo rje sems khyod la sogs pa/ /tshigs bcad lang yis lan gsum du/ /zhugs nas slob ma dam pa ni/ /mdzes pas chas ldan gyis bya'o/ /de nas bla ma yon tan mtsho/ /mchog gi mchog gis de gsan nas/ /zhal ni mdangs dang ldan byas nas/ /snying rje de
26a1(rgyud 'grel): la bskyed bar bya/ /gzugs sogs phun sum tshogs ldan pa'i/ /lha mo de ni byin brlabs nas/ /thub pa'i dbang po zhus byas zhus/ /rdo rje nang du gnas par bya/ /mthe bo srin lag gis bkab nas/ /slob ma dpal ldan snang mdzad khar spro ba'i
26a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis phab nas su/ /gnyis gas 'di ni brjod par bya/ /a ho a ho su kha ho/ /gzhan yang blo yi bye brag gi /dbang bskur byas nas mgrin pa ru/ /de nyid myong bar byas nas su/ /de nas 'di yis sngags pa'o/ /de 'di rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /dbang bskur mchog tu bsngags pa ste
26a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sngags ni grub 'gyur te/ /las mchog khyad par can yang 'grub/ /zla ba za ba rab byung ba/ /lung bstan dbugs dbyung bka' stsal pa/ /'og nas 'byung bzhin sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje bzlas bas phyi nang tshogs/ /sgyu ma rmig rgyu la sogs pa'i/ /'dod don phyag mtshan mdog
26a4(rgyud 'grel): dang dbyibs/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i rnam smin sku/ /bsgom pa la gnas de bsgom gzhug/ gsang ba'i dbang gi cho ga'o/ /de bzhin gong ma'i rim pa yis/ /mtshan dang ldan pa'i rig pa che/ /btsal te bla ma dag la yon/ /rjes mthun dang bcas dbul bar bya/ /sngon bzhin gsol
26a5(rgyud 'grel): btab sdom pa blangs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhin te/ /sku gsung thugs su sbyor pa na/ /phyag 'tshal na ni ma rungs 'gyur/ /kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /lus ngag yid kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /bsam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor bas/ /sngags
26a6(rgyud 'grel): zlos bas ni bsam gtan bya/ /mdor na sems can thams cad ni/ /bsam gtan rdo rje bskul bar bya/ /de 'di rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /dam chos rab tu bstan pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor dag kyang yong mi gri/ /glegs bam klag bar mi bya zhing/ /mchod rten dag gi las mi bya/ /rdo rje gsuM
26a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog phyag mi bya/ /gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo/ /de ltar bya zhes gsol bar bya/ /yang ni me tog gtor byas nas/ /mchod sbyin rdo rje la sogs pa'i/ /tshigs bcad lan gsum gsol btab nas/ /shes rab ye shes yang dag blang/ /
26b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha mo bdag nyid dang/ /dam tshig sdom pa'i mchog smras nas/ /bde chen za ma tog gi ni/ /lha mos sngags pa rab tu brjod/ /de dag mdun du gnas pa'i lag /g.yas g.yon 'og dang steng bzhag nas/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i lha mo 'di/ /sngags 'di yis ni sbyin par
26b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /yid 'ong gzungs ma 'di nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyad du gnang/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rim pa yis/ /dam pa'i bde ba khyod kyis myong/ /de nas rab mnyam bzhag pa yis/ /dal ba'i bya ba rnam gsum gyi/ /rdo rje skyil krung nang du sems/ /rin chen dkyil du
26b3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par bya/ /rang gi lha yi 'khor lor ldan/ /dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang 'brel ba/ /yol bas bcad de bde myong la/ /sngon bzhin dbang bskur byas nas thim/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badzra swa b+hA pa At+ma ko haM/ gti mug rang bzhin gti mug sbyor/ /gti mug dga' 
26b4(rgyud 'grel): dang yang dag ldan/ /gti mug rgyun gyi dbang bskur na/ /gti mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ /zhe sngar rang bzhin zhe sdang sbyor/ /zhe sdang dga' ma dang ldan par/ /zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /'dod chags rang bzhin 'dod chags sbyor//
26b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags dga' dang yang dag ldan/ /'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /shes rab ye shes bdag sbyar na/ /rdo rje dga' ma dang ldan par/ /ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur/ /shes
26b6(rgyud 'grel): rab ye shes so/ /de nas bla mas g.yon pa yi/ /phyag ni slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag /de bzhin gshegs kun dbang byas la/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya/ /de bas rig ma 'di ni mchog /chos kun gnyis su med pa la/ /gnyis kyis rnaM
26b7(rgyud 'grel): par mtshon pa yin/ /de bas rtag tu 'khor ba ru/ /khyod kyis 'bral bar ma byed cig /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ /blun chen gang zhig 'da' byed na/ /mchog gi dngos grub de la med/ /de ltar de bzhin gzhir yang brang bas/
27a1(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin gnyis ni rgyas btab pas/ /gsal zhing rab dga' mkha' 'dra ba'i/ /man ngag tu ni de nyid brtag /bla ma de bzhin gshegs gyur nas/ /snying khar khu tshur chos gos g.yon/ /g.yas pas mchog sbyin phyag rgya bya/ /bdag nyid bzhengs
27a2(rgyud 'grel): nas lung ston bya/ /oM khyed la bdag gis lung 'di bstan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid ba'i ngan 'gro mthar byas nas/ /yang dag sring pa grub pa'i phyir/ /sa bla sa steng sa 'og tu/ /kye rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba/ /rang 'byung rang nyid grub gyur cig /sngags
27a3(rgyud 'grel): pa gang la lung 'di bstan/ /de ni 'gro ba kun gyi gtso/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub la/ /bde gshegs kun gyis lung bstan yin/ /lung bstan pa'o/ /ji ltar dbang bskur thob pa yis/ /slob mas yon tan brjod par mos/ /dam tshig gsum gyis dbugs phyung nas/ /'di yis sngags
27a4(rgyud 'grel): pa brjod pa'o/ /dam tshig gsang chen dkyil 'khor la/ /rab tu zhugs nas mthong bas na/ /khyod ni sdig pa kun las grol/ /de ring shin tu kho nar gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /phyin chang shi ba yong med de/ /mi thub mi shigs gzhan gyis kyang/ /rol zhing 'jigs par
27a5(rgyud 'grel): ba la 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal srid las mya ngan 'das/ /srid pa gtan du dag pa'i phyir/ /yang dag 'byung ba ston pa'i mchog /sring pa bstan du dngos grub bo/ /dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa 'di/ /rig ma rtag tu srung bar bya/ /dam pa'i shes rab bstan pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun
27a6(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam par gsungs/ /byang chub sems ni spang mi bya/ /gang zhig rdo rje phyag rgya zhes/ /de ni bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang/ /sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med/ /dam pa'i chos ni smad mi bya/ /ma rig pa dang gti mug gis/ /de ni bor bar mi bya'o/ /rang bdag yongs su spangs pa dang/ /
27a7(rgyud 'grel): dka' thub sdug bsngal gzir mi bya/ /ji ltar bde ba 'di bzung na/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa 'di las 'byung/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang spang bar byar mi rung/ /bla ma sangs rgyas dang mnyam phyir/ /rdo rje slob dpon smad
27b1(rgyud 'grel): mi bya/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun mnyam phyir/ /slob dpon la ni smod byed na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad smad pa yin/ /de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob/ /rims dang 'or dang dug dang nad/ /mkha' 'gro gtses dang bzung ba dang/ /bgegs dang tshogs bdag dras bo yis/ /bsang nas dmyal bar 'bra
27b2(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /mchog gi dge ba mngon 'gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon bla chen la/ /nam yang brnyas par byar mi rung/ /gus pas bla ma'i yon du ni/ /rjes su 'thad pas dbul bar bya/ /de ni rim ngan la sogs pa/ /byi nas 'byung ba
27b3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsgrub/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /sangs rgyas kun dang de mnyam phyir/ /de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de byin bsod nams tshogs yin pas/ /
27b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs las byang chub mchog tu 'gyur/ /ci? phyir shin tu 'dir gnas pas/ /khyed kyi tshe 'di 'bras bur bcas/ /dam tshig lha dang mnyam pa ru/ /gnas par the tshom med pa'o/ /rdo rje dang bcas sangs rgyas kyis/ /de ring khyed rnams dbang bskur bas/ /rgyal po
27b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po khams gsum na/ /rgyal po gtso bo bston par 'gyur/ /de ring bdud rnams rnam bcom nas/ /gzhal yas khang mchog tu chung phyir/ /sangs rgyas nyid phyir de kho nar/ /khyab bdag gis ni the tshom med/ /rab tu dang pa'i yid kyis ni/ /rdo rje de dag kun mdzod cig
27b6(rgyud 'grel): zad med rang gi dam tshig bde/ /bde bar sems bskyed la bsnyen cing/ /myur bar 'gro ba'i bde chu ru/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra ba yi/ /mnyam pa de ru gyur nas su/ /khyod rnams de la 'gro bar shog /dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /de nas slob mas phyag 'tshal te/ /bla ma'i
27b7(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/ /sogs pa'i tshig gis thams cad kun/ /snang ba'i dbang ni blang bar bya/ /ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba/ /sems can rang bzhin du 'gro ba gyis/ /de lta de ltar sems can don/ /'dod chags la sogs dag par bya/ /nyin re yi ni
28a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams gsum la/ /ting 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ldan ni/ /bsgrubs nas sgrub pa thun mong dang/ /cig shos dngos grub bsgrub par bya/ /mi snang stong ni chung ngu la/ /mngon shes nyi stong bar ma la/ /rigs 'dzin dag ni stong gsum la/ /rdo
28a2(rgyud 'grel): rje 'dzin pa 'gro kun gtso/ /zhi ba rgyas pa sogs las gang/ /de las gzhan rnams gang 'dod pa/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu chags sbyor na/ /bsgrub pa myur du 'grub par 'od/ /rdo rje bdag po thams cad kyis/ /'dod chags de nyid don bsams te/ /sems can thams
28a3(rgyud 'grel): cad phan byed pa'i/ /byang chub 'dod chags las skye mdzad/ /de bas byang chub 'dod sngags pas/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms byas te/ /cho ga bzhin du las byed na/ /de kun rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /de dag byang chub thob 'dod kun/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis thams
28a4(rgyud 'grel): cad dbul/ /gang zhig phongs pas yid mi bde/ /dad pa'i mchog ldan de yin no/ /bka' stsal pa'i dbang ngo/ /dad pa mchog tu gus ldan pas/ /bla ma'i zhabs ni spyi bor blang/ /ji lta rje btsun bka' stsal ltar/ /de ltar bya zhes spyan sngar gsol/ /bkra shis smon lam dang ldan
28a5(rgyud 'grel): par/ /yang dag gnas par gyur cig brjod/ /snod rung byas pa'i slob ma la/ /bla ma shin tu dgyes pas na/ /de dag kun las gsang ba dang/ /rab gsang shin tu gsang ba yi/ /bsgrags min sna yis btab byas nas/ /som nyi med par bshad par bya/ /'byor ldan slob ma kun
28a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs nas/ /sbyin sreg gnas su gnas byas nas/ /bla ma slob ma sbyor bar ldan/ /mar la sogs pa rgya chen rnams/ /slob mas g.yon pa'i mthe bod ni/ /bla ma'i g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang/ /grud mo yis ni bzung byas nas/ /sdig pa rnams ni zhi bar bya/ /de bzhin de rus bdag dang
28a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs skyong rgyal po la sogs pa/ /zhi bar bya phyir bdun nam ni/ /yang na gsum mam gcig tu bya'o/ /bdag nyid bshad dang nyan pa dang/ /bsam dang sgom dang dngos grub bsgrub/ /tha na 'jig rten las grub dang/ /khyod kyis grogs ni mdzod cig ces/ /gsol ba btab nas?
28b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /sngon bzhin mchod pa thams cad dang/ /glu gar sil snyan la sogs dang/ /bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams kyis/ /bdag gzhan 'khor lo mnyes par bya/ /de nas pog snod lag thogs te/ /dril bu gsil nas bus mo gtsuT/ ye shes 'khor log mas
28b2(rgyud 'grel): cad kun/ /sngags 'dis gshegs su gsol ba'o/ /oM sems can kun don mdzad nas su/ /dngos grub stsal te rigs pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /yang ni 'byon par mdzod cig mu:/ /de bzhin oM dang A(rgyud 'grel): dang hUM/ /brjod pas ting 'dzin 'khor lo rnams/ /rdo rje
28b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum la bsdu byas nas/ /de yang nam mkha' lta bur mos/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA naM A dya nutpan+na twA ta oM a hUM swAhA zhes brjod pas/ /gzugs brnyan stod pa nyid dmigs la/ /snod gtsang ma ru bsdus nas su/ /'dod pa la ni nyung shas sbyin/ /lhag ma chu yi skye
28b4(rgyud 'grel): ba sogs/ /phan phyir gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ /'phan sogs sil snyan rab ldan pa/ /dge 'dun tshogs kyis bteg nas su/ /chu bo chen por blugs par bya/ /rdo rje rtse mos ri mo dbyi/ /bum pa bla re la sogs pa/ /spyad rung bla mas blang bya ste/ /lhag ma gong bzhin dor
28b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ru gzugs brnyan dang/ /glegs bam la sogs rab gnas kyi/ /cho ga bya ba gzhan du bshad/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis der shes bya/ /'di ni dang po rnal 'byor pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga dang por gsungs/ /gzhan du khyad par ma gtogs pa/
28b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga rgyas par 'dir shes bya/ /cung zad ye shes dbang thob pas/ /'bebs pa'i cho gas bri bar gsungs/ /khams gsum skye bos smon 'jug phyir/ /rnam pa gzhan du mi bya'o/ /ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang/ /nags tshal rab tu dben pa 'am/ /mchod rten kun dga' 
28b7(rgyud 'grel): ra ba sogs/ /dgon pa'i gnas su spyad bya'o/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma/ /de bzhin bcu gnyis lon pa'i khye'u/ /cho rigs bcun zhing drang por skyes/ /rma sogs spangs dang bzhin mdzes shing/ /so yi thags bzang rab gtsang ba/ /skra gnag mig kyus ring pa dang/
29a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dul ba rig pa che/ /bzung nas dbab par rab tu brtag /de la gong du smos pa dang/ /snod rung sogs kyis zhus nas su/ /de rnams don du tshogs bskyed phyir/ /rnam par dag pa'i bzlas pa bya/ /de bzhin sa btsal la sogs nas/ /sbran pa'i cho ga'i
29a2(rgyud 'grel): bar byas nas/ /lha dang bum pa sems can rnams/ /lta gon du ni gnas par bya/ /thig skud rdul tshon byin brlabs nas/ /gong gsungs snod ni/ brus byas te/ /gos dang rgyan gyis rang klubs te/ /ri sga la sogs kyi gdug bya/ /de yi gnas gsum snga ma bzhin/ /?? chen bu?
29a3(rgyud 'grel): dang rlung dkyil 'khor/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs la/ /rkang mthil gnyis su skul byed pa/ /rlung gis sbar bas sdig pa sreg /ye shes yang dag dbab pa'i phyir/ /rigs gsum bdag nyid rdo rje dril/ /'jigs rung gar dang bcas pa yis/ /de yi snying ga phye byas nas
29a4(rgyud 'grel): chu dang mar bzhin ro gcig gyur/ /gzi byin la sogs ldan gyur na/ /babs pa'i rtags kyis shes par bya/ /spyan dang rnam par snang mdzad zhugs/ /khru gang tsam 'am khru do 'am/ /khru lnga tsam ma brgyad tsam du/ /'jigs shing skrag tshul 'phar bar 'gyur/ /snang ba mdza' yas gos
29a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar zhugs/ /phreng ba'i sngaT dang dbyung ba'i sngags/ /de bzhin snying po rigs pa sogs/ /ma brlabs par yang brjod par 'gyur/ /mi bskyod mA ma kI ba bam pas/ /'das dang ma 'ongs dus dag gi/ /ji ltar byung 'byung dngos po rnams/ /skad cig gis ni yang dag
29a6(rgyud 'grel): ston/ /de nas sngags kyis brtan par bya/ /de gnyis bla ma slob ma'i tshul/ /thig 'debs dang ni tshon 'gyed dang/ /phyag rgya 'am sku sogs 'god par byed/ /de nas mdun du 'dug byas nas/ /ji ltar bgyi zhes bka' nod byed/ /mchod pa sna tshogs rab byas la/ /ye
29a7(rgyud 'grel): shes lha ni gshegs su gsol/ /gnod gnyis zas dang skom rnams dang/ /yon gyis mnyes par byas nas su/ /grangs lhag rung bar bya ba ste/ /rang gi gnas su btang bya'o/ /de nas 'khor lo gnas bsam dang/ /mchod dang zhugs dang dbang bskur ba/ /bsdu ba dang po
29b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bzhin/ /cho ga rgyas par bya ba'o/ /'di 'am gong du slob ma 'am/ /gzhan don rab tu bya ba'i phyir/ /bri ba'i gsung ba'i cho ga ni/ /gzhan du bshad pas der shes bya/ /'di ni cung zad dbang gyur pa'i/ /khri ba'i chog gsungs pa'o/ /sgrub pa la yang ri mo ni/ /tshul 'di dang gi
29b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs zhes bya/ /ye shes dbang bskur rnal 'byor pas/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog las rgyal mchog /rdzogs pa'i khams gtan gyis bsgrub bya/ /bla ma'i man ngag rab thob cing/ /sbyor shes de dag lhur len pa/ /rtag shes dang po pha
29b3(rgyud 'grel): rol phyin/ /yul la zhen pa dang bral ba'i/ /bdag nyid chen po nyag cig des/ /de 'dra'i sa bcu mgon po che/ /rang gi nus pa dang phrad ba/ /mnyes bya de yis yang dag blang/ /me tog la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs/ /phyi rol nang du bcas sngon song/ /thal sbyar pus mo
29b4(rgyud 'grel): gtsugs nas ni/ /bla chen de la gsol ba gdab/ /'jig rten sgron mchog rnal 'byor kun la 'phags/ /khyod ni skyon rnams dag pa'i pha rol phyin/ /srid pa'i mcho las sems can kun sgrol ba/ /ded dpon chen po/ /byed la skyabs su mchi/ /bdag cag 'thab bral 'khor
29b5(rgyud 'grel): bar 'khyams gyur te/ /ma rig mun pas bsgribs pas dmus long gyur/ /sdug bsngal gyis gzing yang dag don ma rnyad/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod kyis skyab du gsol/ /de skad gsol nas de yi tshe/ /bla ma bdag nyid chen po des/ /snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas/ /tshig 'dis
29b6(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba sbyin pa'i/ /bu tshur shog cig bsam gtan gyi/ /'khor lo chen po de yis bstan/ /khyod kyis kyang ni mnyam zhog la/ /da yi bkod pa lta bar gyis/ /de skad gsol nas bsam gtan gyi/ /dkyil 'khor rim pa 'di yis bsgom/ /lhun gyis grub ba'i
29b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba ni/ /skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo sbyar ba yis/ /bsam gtan 'khor lo rab rdzogs bya/ /ye shes 'khor lo bsam gtan gyis/ /'khor lo can kun mngon sum zhugs/ /gong gsungs mchod pa'i cho ga ni/ /bsam gtan
30a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas mnyes par bya/ /de nyid brjod pas 'khor lo bskul/ /zhugs sogs gong bzhin rab byas te/ /ye shes dbab pa sngon 'gro ba'i/ /mthong ba'i yul bzhin rnam par gnas/ /ye shes kyi ni 'khor lo la/ /gnyis med 'khor lo gzhug lnga
30a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de nas byin gyis brlabs brjod la/ /sa bcu'i mgon po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dngos grub rtags ni shes bya'i phyir/ /me tog 'dod par bya ba ste/ /sku 'am dbus su nub 'gyur na/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya/ /zhal kyi dkyil 'khor la babs na/ /sngags kyi dngos
30a3(rgyud 'grel): grub thob par bshad/ /lte ba'i dbus su rab babs na/ /thun mongs dngos grub brgyad 'grub bo/ /sku smad cha ni gar babs kyang/ /zhi sogs dngos grub 'byung ba'o/ /ring zhing thal bas dngos grub kyang/ /da dung rgyang rang 'gyur ba'o/ /phyag rgya chen po ji lta bzhin/ /sgrub pas
30a4(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin dus thob bo/ /ye shes babs pa'i mthu nyid kyis/ /dman mchog gsum dang rang gi las/ /ji skad bshad bzhin gyis rab thob/ /de las gzhan pa ji snyed pa/ /bla ma'i ye shes stobs kyis ni/ /sbyar ba yis ni rnyed pa'o/ /de nas mkha' dbyings thams cad
30a5(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rig pa'i lha mo khro bo tshogs/ /chu sogs rkyen bzung gang bar bsam/ /de dag kun gyis bum pa dang/ /gsang dang shes rab ye shes dang/ /brtul zhugs lung bstan dbugs dbyung dang/ /bka' stsal pa rnams rim
30a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dbang/ /de yis de yi byang chub ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi byang chub che/ /sems can thams cad phan 'dod bas/ /ngo mtshar chen po rab tu grub/ /bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis/ /mchod dang dbang bskur de bzhin du/ /byas nas gzhan la 'ga' 
30a7(rgyud 'grel): yi don/ /bsgrub phyir lung 'di bsgo ba'o/ /nga yis khyed ni dkyil 'khor du/ /bcug zin dbang bskur yang zin gyis/ /khyod kyis slob dpon sgrub po las/ /'dod bzhin du ni gyis shig ces/ /gnang nas bsnyen la sogs pa la/ /'jug par gang yin 'gyur ba ste/ /
30b1(rgyud 'grel): de yis kyang ni khyad shes bya/ /bsam gtan 'khor los sbyang phyir ro/ /gnyis pa da ru 'jug mi nus/ /mthong ba'i yul la mngon zhen zhing/ /blo gros ngan zhing sbyor ba spangs/ /dad ldan snod rung de mthong nas/ /don rnams yal bar mi 'dor phyir/ /snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas/ /ngag sogs rto
30b2(rgyud 'grel): ga sngon 'gro ba'i/ /phyi yi bya ba bsten bya ste/ /ye shes cung zad dbang gyur ltar/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /dbang skur yang dag brtsam bya ste/ /gnyis med man ngag gis spyang bya/ /de bzhin sku sogs 'khor lo la/ /cho ga sngon bzhin rgyas bya ste/ /kun khyab chos kyi dbyings
30b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes/ /thams cad de ru rnam dag pas/ /bde gshegs gnas su mi bskyod dgod/ /gzhan gyi gnas su gzhan bkod de/ /gnyis shes rdo rje mtshan la sogs/ /khyad par gzhan yang rtogs pa bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma sogs/ /gong dang 'og gi cho ga rnams/ /sems kyi 'ba' 
30b4(rgyud 'grel): zhig gtso bor gsungs/ /dman pa las ni mchog mi 'gyur/ /sems nyid glang po yan lta bu/ /gzugs la sogs la 'phan byed pas/ /dan 'gro g.yang sar lhung bar 'gyur/ /de nyid rab tu rtogs byas la/ /dran pa'i theg pa dam po yis/ /dmigs pa'i ka ba la btags te/ /
30b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod bzhin pa yi yul spyod pas/ /ji lta bzhin du 'dus par bya/ /ji skad du/ /sems can kun gyi sems gang ni/ /brten pa'i phyir na sems dpar brjod/ /mnyam par bzhag na ting 'dzin te/ /de bstan pa las rdo rjer 'gyur/ /sems dpa' i byin rlabs sbyor ba las/ /slar yang rdo
30b6(rgyud 'grel): rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /zhe'o/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lus ngag gi /bya ba bstan te drang srong ltar/ /dang po rab tu 'bring ba'o/ /khang skas yan lag dang po bzhin/ /steng phyin ma yin dgos med min/ /de yi brten gyis de bzung ste/ /de nyid 'bar?
30b7(rgyud 'grel): zhig rtog par bya/ /de bas sems la khyad par 'byung/ /longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku/ /de yi zhing khams yongs dag npa/ /sems nyid 'ba' zhig las 'byung ste/ /mtshams kyi rnam shes ji lta dang/ /klu khros pa yi sems bzhin du/ /mi mthun ltar yang snang ba ste/ /de
31a1(rgyud 'grel): bas sems nyid rtogs par bya/ rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum gyis slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad zin to// //da ni dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /de la sgrub pa po gang zag ni/ /brtul
31a2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs sdom pa sngags ldan pa/ /mi brtan lha yi nga rgyal bral/ /cung zad ye shes dbang gyur pa/ /thun mong sgrub pa shes par bya/ /rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas pa rnams/ /sgyur 'drar sems can dbyer med rtogs/ /thun mong cig shos dngos grub kyi/ /sgrub pa ye shes dbang gyur
31a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de yi yid dang 'thun pa'i gnas/ /shin tu dben pa'i ri dgon dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs ri bo dang/ /rlung dang 'bab chu rnams dang ni/ /dur kyi khrod la sogs par yang/ /bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di bsgom mo/ /dgon po chen po'i sa phyogs ni/ /me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis
31a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /ri bo dben pa dag tu ni/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa 'grub/ lam gyi bzhi mdo shing gcig drung/ /mtshan ma gcig dang zhi gnas su/ /rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par gyis/ /sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam/ /rab tu rnam par dpen
31a5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am/ /ri bo nags 'dab chu dogs su/ /ting 'dzin byas nas ting 'dzin 'thog /rdo rje 'gugs gnas mig san dang/ /ka pA la ru bsgom par bya/ /yid du 'od dang shis pa'i gnas/ /sgrub pa la yis rab nges bya/ /rjes su mthun pa'i shis pa'i zas/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang/ /chu dang
31a6(rgyud 'grel): shel dang sman dang dri/ /phyag rgya chen po rig 'dzin gyis/ /lam la mkhas pa rnams kyis sngags/ /glang chen sha yis mngon shes sgrub/ /rta yi sha yis mi snang bsgrub/ /'gugs pa ba lang sha yis bsgrub/ /khyi sha yis ni thams cad bsgrub/ /nus pa yis ni dgug/
31a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /med na bsam pas rnam par brtag /ngo bo nyid dang mthun dag dang/ /rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub ba'o/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes/ /'dod khams 'jig rten dbang phyug gi /las kyi go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /
31b1(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo gzi chen stobs dang ldan/ /mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong/ /mthong bas bskul ba ma byas kyang/ /'jig rten 'di dag dbang du 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ gsang ba dam pa byang chub ste/ /yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di/ /rmongs pa'i man ngag sems dpa' o
31b2(rgyud 'grel): mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang/ /dam tshig chen po bsgrub pa dang/ /rdo rje 'gugs pa mchog dag kyang/ /dam tshig 'di yis rnam par 'grub/ /grub pa yi ni mtshan ma ni/ /shin tu 'babs pa thob pa yis/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub 'gyur te/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi yan
31b3(rgyud 'grel): lag rdzogs/ /spyi yi mtshan mar shes par bya/ /bzlas dang bsgom dang rang lha yi/ /khyad par gang yin rtogs par mdzad/ /rmi lam bye brag rab byed pas/ /so so'i mtshan ma shes par bya/ /bsam gtan ngag gis bzlas pa yis/ /dus sam byin rlabs rab sdud du/ /'dod pas
31b4(rgyud 'grel): rnyed pa'i mtshan ma ni/ /rmi lam du ni shes par bya// //rmi lam na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i gzugs tha dad par mthong ba dang/ rmi lam na bdag nyid ye shes mchog thob nas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mthu mnyam par mthong
31b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ rmi laM na mtshan dang dpe byang du ldan pa'i longs spyod rdzogs gi sku? rgyud dag pa la snang bar bdag nyid mthong ba dang/ rmi lam na brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang drag po la sogs pas bdag nyid la me tog la sogs pas mchod par mthong ba dang/ rmi lam na sangs rgyas dang byang
31b6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyi nang gi 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bdag la mchod par mthong pa dang/ /rmi lam na bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang ba 'am/ rtag pa la sogs pa'i gzugs su mthong ba dang/ /rmi lam na rdo rje gsum 'am/ spyan ma la sogs pa 'am/ phyogs bcu'i sangs
31b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyis bdag la btung cing phyag 'tshal bar mthong ba dang/ rmi lam na mngon dga' la sogs pa'i zhing du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa mthong ba dang/ /de dag kyang thugs rab tu dgyes nas chos kyi mdzod chen po gnyad par mthong ba dang/ rmi lam na bdag nyid shAkya thub
32a1(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa'i gzugs lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas bskor zhing chos bshad par mthong ba dang/ /rmi lam na bdag nyid la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nam mkha' la bdug dkar po bteg cing/ seng+ge'i khrigs?
32a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag nas chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang/ rmi lam na gdol pa'i bu mo 'am/ /khyi 'am rta rgod ma la sogs pa 'am/ snyoms par 'jug pa de dag phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /gzhan yang rmi lam na kha dog sna tshogs pa'i kun dga' rab
32a3(rgyud 'grel): dang skyed mos tshal yid du 'ong ba mthong ba dang/ rmi lam na lha'i bu mo gdu bu dang/ /dpung rgyan dang/ snyan cha dang mgur chu dang/ shu 'bur dang/ zur phung la sogs pas brgyan pa dang mi'i khye'u dang bu mo yid du 'ong ba bcu drug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mthong ba ni/ thun
32a4(rgyud 'grel): mong gis grub pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /rigs 'dzin la sogs yongs smin las/ dzam+bu gser 'dra'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de bas de dag thams cad kun/ /cig shos mtshan mar shes par bya/ /sngon du bya ba'i las kyi rgyal po mchog ni/ /sngags pa rnam par dag pa yis/ /de dag
32a5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu rtogs byas nas/ /sngon gyi phyir na gnyis kyis kyang/ /ci rigs gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya/ /dben par gcing gtor byas nas su/ /bkegs bskrad sa la gsol ba gdab/ /cig shos la yang gsol byas nas/ /bka' stsal sa ni brko bar bya/ /sngon gyi rim pa shes
32a6(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /sa stong rgyan dang ldan pa dang/ /dag bya'i phyir na gong bzhin du/ /dbang bskur blang bas yid sbyar bya/ /rdo rjes khyad par byas pa yi/ /sa 'dzin lta bur byin rlabs la/ /bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsum gnas pas/ /de dbus nga rgyal gsum ldan bya/ /sngon bzhin rtag so
32a7(rgyud 'grel): gsol btab nas/ /byin brlabs stangs thabs brtsam pa'o/ /phur bus btab nas sa srung ste/ /nub gcig sta gon gnas par bya/ /lta rnams gnas bar byas nas su/ /brod bskyed mchod pa sna tshogs brtsam/ /dgongs bar bya phyir gong ma bzhin/ /'khor lo gsol ba gdab
32b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /lha mo bzhi dang mi bskyod pa/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bum pa ni rdzas dang ldan par sta gon bya/ /yod na bcu dgu ngas pa'o/ /skud pa tshon rtsi 'dus byas la/ /sngon bzhin 'bebs pa'i cho ga bya/ /de yis thig dang tshon btab rnas/ /zhal sogs ldan par phyag rgya dgod/ /gzhan
32b2(rgyud 'grel): la ma thos sems can rnams/ /gzung bar bya phyir sngon bzhin bshad/ /gnas rnams stong pa mi mdzes pas/ /dang chung srid pas dam sngags/ /mi rnams kyis ni phyi ma yis/ /zhal la sogs pa rdzogs mi 'gyur/ /yan lag ma rdzogs byin mi rlob/ /de bas lta yis mdzas par sngags?
32b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi phyag rgya'am sems kyis su/ /lha rnams rab tu gnas byas nas/ /byin brlabs mngon du mchod pa sogs/ /brtsams te 'byung gtor khyad par du/ /rnam rgyal sbyor bas skyon bsal nas/ /tshim par bya phyir lha rnams la/ /ji srid rdzas kyi thabs rnam su/ /sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes
32b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /slob ma zhugs pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /bdag nyid 'khor lor zhugs par bya/ /sdig bshags me tog 'dod pa'i bar/ /byas nas lha rnams kyis gnad pa'i/ /sngon bzhin bum pa gsang ba dang/ /shes rab ye shes brtul zhugs dang/ /lung bstan dbugs dbyung bka' 
32b5(rgyud 'grel): stsal thob/ /de yis bsgrub pa brtsam pa'o// //sgrub pa'i thabs gang zhen/ /dang po de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /rigs 'dzin sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o/ /ji bzhin byas pa'i sngags pa yis/ /thun mong cig shes bgegs bsal
32b6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /spyi gzug gyur nas rtag pa las/ /byung ba'i gzhal yas khang pa bsgom/ /lnga dang bzhi pas mchog dang po/ /rab bskyed skye rims bzhi spangs nas/ /dri za rab tu zhugs byas pas/ /de na tsho ga bzhin du zhu/ /rang gi tshangs pa'i spyod pa bzhi/ /mA ma kI la sogs gyur nas
32b7(rgyud 'grel): bskul te thim gyur sa bon gyur/ /phyag mtshan des mtshan bshes gnyen zhus/ /de las rtag pa mngon bzhin bskyed/ /de yi thugs kar zla ba la/ /oM las 'khor lo oM gyis mtshan/ /bsams nas sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /oM d+harma d+hAtu sa b+hA ba At+ma konyaM/
33a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sogs ma gtogs de phyag rgya/ /gnas nas sngags 'di bsgom par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): oM dzi na dzi ka hUM/ /brjod pas oM las 'od zer tshogs/ /dkar ba'i rgyun gyis nang gsal te/ /de sbu bu ga nas spros pa'i/ /'od rtse rtag pa'i tshogs rnams kyi
33a2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i khams kun bkang byas nas/ /sangs rgyas rtag pa spyan drangs nas/ /rang gi ba spu bu gar bzung/ /brtan pa'i ngo bos phyag byas nas/ /yang nas yang du dus bzhir bsgom/ /de nas zhag bdun la sogs nas/ /nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni/ /'byung po rnams la gtor
33a3(rgyud 'grel): byin nas/ /yang ni sbyor ba der zhen bya/ /'di lta bu yi sbyor ldan pas/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rgya mtsho dag /zla ba phyed na nges pa ru/ /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten nas ni/ /rnam par snang mdzed dang 'dra ba'i/ /sangs rgyas sku ni 'bar ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje
33a4(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas te/ /'od dpag med bsgoms mgrin pa ru/ /A las pad+ma A yis mtshan/ /bsams nas bzlas brjod yang bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): A ro lig hUM/ de yis sngon bzhin 'od dpag med/ /spros ti bkug nas
33a5(rgyud 'grel): rang la btsud/ /bstan byas sngon bzhin rab bsgrubs nas/ /zla ba phyed na 'grub par nges/ /ye shes lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje chos ni bsten byas nas/ /de dang 'dra ba'i 'od thob ste/ /rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /sngon bzhin mi bskyod rab bskyed de/ /thugs kar hUM las
33a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje la/ /hUM gi mtshan pa rab bsams la/ /sngags kyis bzlas brjod bya ba'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM badzra d+h+rika hUM/ sangs rgyas mi bskyod chags rnams kyang/ /btsud nas chags par byas nas su/ /mngon bzhin nye mtshan mthong bsgrubs nas/ /zla phyed 'grub par the tshom med/ /ye
33a7(rgyud 'grel): shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/ /ston pa rdo rje thugs 'dra ba/ /ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur/ /rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /thams cad sngon bzhin rab gnas te/ /mi bskyod cho ga bzhin bskyed nas/ /thugs kar rdo rje bum pa ru/ /oM bsams bzhas brjod bya ba'o
33b1(rgyud 'grel): oM d+ha rma d+hA dz+nyA na rastu hUM/ /mi bskyod tshogs bkug sngon bzhin du/ /zhugs nas chags byas nye ba mthong/ /gtor ma btang nas rab bsgrubs nas/ zla phyed mi bskyod 'dra ba thob/ /mi bskyod pa yi sku dag dang/ /gsungs dang thugs mchog 'dra ba 'dzin/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad
33b2(rgyud 'grel): du/ /ma bskyod rdo rje mchod par 'gyur/ /rin chen 'byung ldan sngon bzhin bskyed/ /thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i/ /oM bzlas pa yis 'grub pa'o/ /de dang 'dra bar bsgrub par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): oM sa man+ta dz+nyA na rastu hUM/ de yis rin chen 'byung ldan tshogs/ /spros pa bkug nas rab tu
33b3(rgyud 'grel): btsud/ /brtan byas gong bzhin rab bsgrubs na/ /zla ba phyed na rab tu 'grub/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i 'od dang 'dra/ /de ni byang chub bdag med dang/ /ye shes gsang ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /'od dpag med pa bsgom byas la/ /de yi thugs kar pad+ma la/ /gnas
33b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i oM ni bzlas byas pas/ /dpag med 'dra ba bsgrub par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): oM pra ta bek+Sha Nadz+nyA na rastu hUM 'od dpag med pa'i tshogs spros pas/ /bkug nas brtan byas chags byas nas/ /gong ma bzhin du rab bsgrubs nas/ /zla ba phyed na 'grub par nges/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/ /
33b5(rgyud 'grel): dpag med pa yi 'od dang 'dra/ /'di ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /theg chen lam gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /sngon bzhin don yod grub bsgoms la/ /thugs kar ral gri yu ba la/ /zla ba'i dbus su oM bsams la/ /sngags kyi bzlas brjod brtsam pa'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): oM kri ta a
33b6(rgyud 'grel): nu stan dz+nyA na rastu hUM/ /de yis don yong grub pa'i tshogs/ /spros te bkug byas zhugs byas la/ /gnas brtan ngo bor chags byas nas/ /zla ba phyed na de dag 'grub/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/ /rdo rje thogs med 'dra ba 'ong/ /de ni dpal ldan ye shes mtsho/ /sems can don kun
33b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin snang mdzad bsgoms byas te/ /sngags kyis bzlas brjod bya ba'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): oM A da rSh+dz+nyA na badzra rastu hUM/ /sngon bzhin zhugs sogs rab byas nas/ /zla phyed de dang 'dra bar 'grub/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te/ /snang mdzad mdzad mgrin thugs kar
34a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje la/ /zla ba'i dbus nas oM gsum gnas/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): oM oM oM tri ka ka ra yastu hUM/ de yis rdo rje gsum gyi tshogs/ /bkug nas gnas gsum du brtan par/ /byas nas nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong/ /gong bzhin byas na zla phyed
34a2(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/ /sangs rgyas snang mdzad 'dra ba'i mdog /de ni byang chub ye shes dang/ /sku gsung ye shes 'grub par 'gyur/ /de yi rim pas mi bskyod sogs/ /rang rang ngo bos rab bsgrubs nas/ /dpal ldan zla ba phyed grub nas/ /rdo rje bskal pa gsum
34a3(rgyud 'grel): du gnas/ /de bzhin de ltar de gnyis sam/ /gcig la 'am gsum du goms byas nas/ /rgyal ba'i sras po mos pa yis/ /nyung ngam lhag par gnas par 'gyur/ /sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /rnam par snang mdzad cho ga bzhin/ /bskyed nas chos dbyings byi rlabs
34a4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /lag pa g.yas par 'khor lo bskyed/ /'khor lo gser sogs dngos byas la/ /oM bskyed lte bar rtag pa yi/ /'khor lo chen po rab bsgoms te/ /sngags kyi bzlas brjod brtsam pa'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): 'dzi na dzika ca kra artha sid+d+hI hUM swAhA/ /'od zer gyis bkug rtag dkyil
34a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor/ /bsdus te bcug nas brtan byas pas/ /drod dang dung 'thul 'bar ba dang/ /nam mkha' la ni 'phar bar 'gyur/ /de yi steng du sum bsams nas/ /lag tu babs nas spyan mas bzla/ /'byung po rnams la gtor sbyin la/ /phyag byas zla ba phyed nas 'grub/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug
34a6(rgyud 'grel): gi/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed kyi/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun/ /de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ /sngon bzhin mi bskyod rab bsgoms la/ /rdo rje dngos byas hUM bskyed de/ /rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo bsgoms/ /sngags kyis bzlas brjod bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra d+h+raka badzra artha sid+d+hi hUM swAhA/
34a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ri rigs kyi spyo dang bsdu/ /brtan par byas la chags byas nas/ /sngon bzhin rab tu sgrub gyur na/ /zla ba phyed na 'grub par des/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi/ /de snyed kyi na bud med rnams/ /yon tan can gyi bdag gir 'gyur/ /drag po dag gis phyag byas pa/
34b1(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur/ /sngon bshin rgyas par rin chen 'byung/ /bsgoms nas swA bskyed rin chen dngos/ /rin chen rigs kyi lha bsgoms la/ /sngags kyis bzlas brjod bya ba'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): radna d+h+rika ratna artha sid+d+hi swAhA/ /rin chen rigs kyi lha rnams kun/ /spro zhing bsdu ba
34b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan byas nas/ /nye ba'i mtshan mthong sngon bzhin bsgoms/ /zla ba phye 'grub the tshom med/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/ /bskal pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /gsang ba gsum la bsnyen bkur byed/ /de bzhin dpag med
34b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms la/ /gser sogs pad+ma a las skyes/ /lte bar gsung rigs lha bsgoms la/ /bzlas brjod rab tu bya ba'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): A ro lika ka ma la artha sid+d+hi swAhA/ /de spros gsung gi rigs bkug nas/ /bcug nas brtan bya yang yang bsgom/ /mtshan ma thob nas gtor ma
34b4(rgyud 'grel): btang/ /zla ba phyed na de 'grub 'gyur/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi /rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed la/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid 'jog par byed/ /don yang grub pa sngon bzhin bsgom/ /ral gri dngos byas ha las bskyed/ /las kyi lha rnams yu bar bsgom//
34b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam pa'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): phra dz+nyA d+h+rika karga artha sid+d+hi swAhA/ /las kyi rigs kyi lha rnams spro/ /bsdu zhing bcug nas chags byas nas/ /de mtshan mthod nas mngon bzhin sgrub/ /zla phyed kyis ni nges par 'grub/ /khams gsum kun gyis rab mchod cing/ /tshangs
34b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas phyag byas kyang/ /stong gsum na ni mchog tu dpa' / /mi mchog gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur/ /gang rnams 'dod dang bsam pa dag /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje thugs las rab byung ba/ /de lta bu yi dngos grub ster// //
34b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo la sogs grub pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gang gi bye snyed thams cad du/ /grub pa kun tu rnam par spyod/ /dam tshig dam pa thams cad kyi/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /rdo rje sku ni rab bsgoms pas/ /gdaM tshig mchog tu 'gyur/ /thams cad snga ma
35a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin byas te/ /'jam dpal bskyed ba'i cho ga rdzogs/ /thugs kar ral gri yu ba la/ haM gi 'od ldan bzlas brjod bya/ /oM a haM many+dzu sh+rI hUM phaT/ re yi 'od kyi nang gsal nas/ /ba sbu lag byung 'od zer lnga/ /thams cad 'jam dpal bskur byas te/ bkug
35a2(rgyud 'grel): cing bu gar thim par bya/ /yang nas yang du bstan byas pas/ /ba spu dbang po gzhu mthong nas/ /'byung po gtor byin chags byas nas/ /zla ba phyed kyis des bar 'grub/ /'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi/ /byang
35a3(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpar de 'gyur ro/ /yang ni 'jam dpal de bzhin sgom/ /ral gri yu bar bcug 'phen gnas/ /bzlas brjod byas la go dang bzhin dpag /de dang 'dra bar bsgrub par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): thliM many+dzu hUM swAhA/ /de ni zla ba phyed na yang/ /'od zer 'bar bar gyur pa yin/ /rdul phran rdo rje
35a4(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag gi /rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /snga ma bzhin du kun shes bya/ /gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bcu/ /longs spyod rjod byas pas byams pa yi/ /tshogs kyis khams gsum dgang? bar byug pa pad+ma dang/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dbyug gsal zhing/ /ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje rnams/
35a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos byas 'khor lo gcig bsgom brjod/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): a mAn+ta krita mud ga ra sid+d+hi hUM/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): pradz+nyA na ta krita bdzra d+ha na da sid+d+hi hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): padmAn ta krita pad+ma sid+d+hi hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): bag+hI na ta krita badzra sid+d+hi hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): nI la DaN+Da sid+d+hi hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): mahA pa la h+ri shu la sid+d+hi hUM/ oM
35a6(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): tsal khaDga sid+d+hi hUM oM A(rgyud 'grel): tsa kra ba ra ta tsikra sid+d+hi hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): suM b+ha badzra sid+d+hi hUM/ de yis khro bo'i tshogs bkug ste/ /bcug nas bstan par byas nas su/ /mngon bzhin gtor sogs kyis bsgrubs na/ /de 'dra zla ba phyed na 'grub/ /yang na rtag pa 'od dpag med/ /mi
35a7(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa yis mtshan ma rnams/ /bsgrubs te rang gi lha bcug pas/ /zla phyed de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /mi snang ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /sngon du spyi yi cho ga sogs/ /rgyas pa rab tu bshang 'gyur yang/ /bang blag tu ni rtag bya'i phyir/ /yang ni thugs rjes bsdus
35b1(rgyud 'grel): nye bstan/ /mtshan ma thong ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'dzab bzlas cho ga la sogs nas/ /lhas dbang bskur ba'i bar zhugs la/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug par bya/ /bgegs bzlog cho ga nas brtsams te/ /brgyad kyis nam mkha' i snying po bskyed/ /chos dbyings byin brlabs lus kun la/ /
35b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas bzhi ma rtogs khaM gis mtshan/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): khaM ga na kha garb+ha hUM/ /de yi 'od kyi sangs rgyas rnams nam mkha' i snying po'i skur byas la/ /bkug ste khaM kun la bstim la/ /nam mkha' rang bzhin du stod par bsam/ /bdag gi yan lag gi mthong sogs/ /'byung po gtor ma yang byin te/ /na
35b3(rgyud 'grel): byas yang du bsgrub 'gyur na/ /zla ba phyed na mi snang 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /yang dang yang du mchod pa dang/ /bskal pa gcig tu gnas pa dang/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs 'gyur/ /bzhi yis 'dras bu gzhan yin phyir/ /de bshad gsang ba'i thig
35b4(rgyud 'grel): le las/ /rim pa 'di bzhin chog 'grub pa/ /'jig rten dbang po sgrub pa bshad/ /thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bsgom par bya/ /de lce h+ri las pad+ma ni/ /'dab brgyad mdun du rdo rje ni/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+ri lo ke shA ra b+ha d+ha na artha sid+d+hi hUM swAhA/ /
35b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa thos pas sangs rgyas rnams/ /'jig rten dbang ni bskur byas te/ /bkug ste lce la bcug nas ni/ /gnas brtan ngo bor chags par bya/ /lce de rdo rje mthong gyur nas/ /gtor ma byin te yang yang bsgom/ /zla ba phyed na nges pa ru/ /tshig gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub/ /bden pa
35b6(rgyud 'grel): du ni smra ba dang/ /shags dang rgol ba sun 'byin dang/ /kun thos rnams ni yid 'ong bar/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/ /de las yang na sgrub pa'i mchog/ /mtshon cha rnams ni 'jig 'gyur pa/ /phyi mar gsungs pa 'byung ba'i phyir/ /de yi bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad/ /sngon gsungs
35b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par bshad pa yi/ /chog rnams ni rdzogs byas la/ /klu shing ma tog mtshan pa yis/ /snang mdzad 'dra ba'i byams pa bskyed/ /thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i/ /me ni cho ga bzhin bsgoms la/ /bzlas brjod byas pas byams pa yi/ /tshogs kyis khams gsum dgang
36a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): me mahA me b+ha ra sa ra Na hUM swAhA/ de yis sems can thams cad la/ /byams pas dmigs byas snying rje sogs/ /khro dang bral bar rab bsams la/ /sems can de dag rab tu bsdu/ /brtan par rab tu chags byas la/ /gris? bri so sogs
36a2(rgyud 'grel): ma gtogs te/ /'byung po gtor sbyin yang bsgoms na/ /zla phyed mtshon chas mi tshugs so/ /'phen dang mi 'phen la sogs pa/ /mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig par 'gyur/ /btab 'gyur 'thor ram me tog 'gyur/ /gang mthong byams sems dang ldan pa'o/ /sngon bzhin
36a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba thams cad bya/ /'jam dpal cho ga bzhin bsgoms na/ /thugs kar ral gri yu bar maM/ /bsams nas bzlas brjod par bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): maM many+dzu sh+rI artha sid+d+ha hUM swAhA/ /'od zer stug ngos nang gsal te/ /ba spu bu ga las byung bas/ /sangs rgyas thams
36a4(rgyud 'grel): cad 'jam dpal skur/ /byas te bkug nas ba spu yi/ /bu gar bcu gnas stong pa nyid/ /bsams nas sngon bzhin rtogs gyur na/ /bar chad zhi bar byas nas su/ /bsgrubs na zla ba phyed na 'grub/ /dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od dag gis
36a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi/ /grub pa'i mtshan ma snang bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas/ /nam yang mthong bar mi nus so/ /yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya/ /phyag rgya chen po gang yang rung/ /cho ga bzhin du dang pos bsgrub/ /de yis sgrub
36a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ri lu gsungs/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am stag shar sbyar/ /khyi sha 'am sha chen dag dang sbyar/ /ba lang sha'am bshang srin bu/ /ga bur tsan dan dang sbyar ba 'am/ /'gi haM a ka rur sbyar ba'am/ /ga bur gur gum sbyar ba yi/ /ril bu skrod byed lnga sbyor tsam/ /nyi ma zla ba
36a7(rgyud 'grel): sreb byed kyi/ /nyi ma man cha shi dang ni/ /sreg byed gcig ste zla ba gnyis/ /bkri ba tsa na'i 'bru tsam du/ /oM 'am a(rgyud 'grel): 'am hUM las bskyed/ /khar bcug nas ni de dbus su/ /rang gi 'khor lo rab bsgoms la/ /de yis de yi sangs rgyas tshogs/ /bkug ste bcug nas
36b1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): gu la arwa sid+d+hi hUM/ brtan pa'i ngo bor chags byas nas/ /'bar sogs mtshan ma mthong bar 'gyur/ /'byung po gtor ma yang byin nas/ /bsgoms na zla phyed mi snang 'gyur/ /rdo rje sku dang rab 'dra zhing/ /nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra ste/ /dza mU na da'i
36b2(rgyud 'grel): gser 'od kyi/ /byang chub ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra ba 'gyur/ /dpag tshad bya ba gang+gA yi/ /steng du rdo rje 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo ni/ /lha yi longs spyod brtul zhugs sam/ /yang na gzugs
36b3(rgyud 'grel): khams gnas pa la/ /stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyod/ /thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas te/ /rang gi lha ni dang po dmigs/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su man 'ji'i steng/ /thod pa yis ni brgyan par bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni go rims bzhin/ /gong gi cho gas dag byas na/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM yig
36b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum po ni/ /brgya dang brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /de yi dro ba la sogs pa/ /mthong nas bar chad zhi bya ste/ /yang ni sbyor bas brtan byas na/ /zla phyed sangs rgyas kyis mi mthong/ /de bzhin bshad pa 'ba' zhig gam/ /khyi sha rta sha 'bras chen sha/ gong gis cho gas rab zos na/ /
36b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo/ /mi snang gyur pa kun las mchog /stong khams dag ni snang bar byed/ /sangs rgyas kun la 'phrog pa dang/ /lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod// //mig sman bsgrub pa bshad par bya'o/ /mtshan ma
36b6(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba ni/ /longs spyod dang pos rdzogs par bya/ /nya yi dus su brtsams na ni/ /dro sogs rgyu las rab byung ba/ /brgyad kyi dus su shes byas la/ /bcu bzhi'i dus su bsgrub par bya/ /gong gi gnas su song nas
36b7(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /thod pa nyid kyi steng 'dug nas/ /mdun du thod pa'i man 'ji la/ /skyes pa'i thod pa bzang po bzhag /de yi nang du tshil tshan la/ /khrag dang bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang/ /pad+ma'i khong srog dur ras dkris/ /de la mi mar 'bar bar bya/ /spyad mkhan thod pas steng bkab nas/
37a1(rgyud 'grel): de yi dud pas blangs nas su/ /'ug pa'i mgo ni bsregs byas nas/ /pad+ma'i rak+ta bsre bar bya/ /srod kyi dus su btags nas su/ /bya rgod rje ngar nang bkang la/ /pad+ma'i zil pas brlan par bya/ /'od med thur mas mig la sku/ /de yi tho rangs dus nas ni/ /
37a2(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gter rnams mthong ba dang/ /'gro kun dbang du 'gyur ba dang/ /gzi can kun gyis mi mthong 'gyur/ /rigs 'dzin grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /bskal par gso bar gnas pa'i rgyu/ /bdud rtsi sman gyi cho ga mchog /ji bzhin du ni bshad par bya/ /thabs dang
37a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dbye ba yis/ /dkon mchog dpa' dang 'od dpag med/ /dbu rgyan la ni bsam byas la/ /gnyis su med pa'i ros zhu 'gyur/ /tshim pa'i cho ga bzhin drangs nas/ /rtsa rgyud thams cad khyab par byas/ /rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa ni/ /khros par gyur kyang mi thub bo/ /skal
37a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang rnams la gsum po yis/ /mos pa'i sems can bzung ba'i phyir/ /mthun pa'i cho ga la gnas nas/ /rang rang dam tshig gis gnas bya/ /thugs rjes non pa'i sngags pa yis/ /nyan thos gzugs kyis gnyis med spangs/ /dge ba bcu la btsud nas ni/ /rang
37a5(rgyud 'grel): gi ngo bor 'gyur ba'o/ /de bzhin rang sangs rgyas gzugs kyis/ /lus kyi rdzu 'phrul dpag med mdzad/ /btsud nas de don 'di la bkod/ /slar yang rang gi ngo bor 'gyur/ /de bzhin skad cig oM las bskyed/ /tshangs pa chen po zhal bzhi pa/ /mtshan dang rgyan rnams
37a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa/ /tshangs skud se ral cod pan la/ /rdo rje sems dpas mtshan pa yi/ /dang po dbyug pa rtse gsum gyis/ /mtshan pas zhi ba'i ku tsa btsir/ /gnyis na bgrang phreng 'gu De 'dzin/ /dang steng pad+ma zla bar gnas/ /gti mug lam gyis dman pa rnams
37a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa bskyed cing mos ma thag /rang gi lha yi skur 'gyur ro/ /a las bskyed pa'i drag po ni/ /thal mdog zhal gcig spyan gsum pa/ /zla phyed dang ldan cod pan la/ /rdo rje sems dpas mtshan pa'o/ /khwa TwAM mgul pa dril mtshan pa'i/ /phyag g.yas kyis ni
37b1(rgyud 'grel): phrag pa brten/ /bdud rtsi lngas gang thod pa ni/ /g.yon pas bsnan shing 'khyud pa'o/ /u ma sku mdog ser? po ste/ /me tog sna tshogs sku la dkris/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan pa/ /rdo rje rtse mo nang bltas bsnams/ /gnyis kyis de yi ku tsa 'dzin/ /stag lpags sham thabs
37b2(rgyud 'grel): glang steng na/ /pad+ma zla ba la gnas nas/ /zla ba'i 'od kyis rgyan du mtshan/ /de yi gzugs kyis 'dod chags can/ /bud med dngos po gsum spyad na/ /btsud nas mos ma thag tu ni/ /rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba'o/ /hUM las bskyed pa'i khyab 'jug gzugs/ /nag po rin chen dbu rgyan
37b3(rgyud 'grel): can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ral pa mtshan/ /phyag bzhi 'khor lo rtse gsum dang/ /'bud dung rin chen ldan pa'o/ /lha mo gser sku'i bdag nyid 'dra/ /thod du me tog sna tshogs dkris/ /mtshan ma bdag 'dra rgyan rnams brgyan/ /dang po gnyis kyis legs par 'khyud/ /khyud steng
37b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma nyi ma la/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis rgyab brten mdzad/ /de yis gzugs khams gsum na gnas/ /sdang ba rnams ni bsad nas su/ /yal bar mi 'gyur brtson byas nas/ /slar yang rang gi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /de ltar de bzhin sha bza' zhing/ /gzhan gyis bud med spyod pa
37b5(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /gnod sbyin pho mo bsgrubs na ni/ /don byas yang ni grol bar 'gyur/ /'o ma dang ni phra ma dang/ /'dod yon lnga dang dri rnams kyis/ /klu yi bu mo bsten byas na/ /yang ni grol nas ngo bo gnas/ /khro zhing nga rgyal gnod sems ldan/ /spros dang me tog spyad pa yis/ /lha min bu
37b6(rgyud 'grel): mo mnyes byas la/ /grol nas rang gi skur 'gyur ro/ /thos rung sdug pa 'bru mar gyis/ /srin po rnams ni dga' bar bya/ /de bzhin 'byung po rnams kyang ngo/ /des kyang gtsang ba'i don chen byed/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am khrag dag gam/ /chang la sogs pa 'thungs pa yis/ /go'u ri la
37b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs mnyes byas la/ /sdang ba ma lus bsad par bya/ /de bzhin brgya byin la sogs pa'i/ /ngo bo dam tshig la gnas nas/ /de 'dra'i sems can gdul bya'i phyir/ /gzugs kyis de tsam gnas pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba/ /khams rnams dag na rnam par spyod/ /
38a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun la phan 'dod pas/ /dam tshig ma lus spyad par bya/ /gang dang gang gi bsam pa yis/ /'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs can de/ /thugs rjes non pa de dang der/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams kyis bstan/ /da ni mngon par shes pa lnga
38a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sngon bzhin bzlas pa'i cho ga nas/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas/ /lha yis dbang bskur bzhugs te/ /bgegs dgra sbyor ba nas brtsams te/ /chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab/ /gnyis
38a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsgrub pa rnam par bshad/ /gcig la 'bras bu gnyis su shes/ /mig gnyis dang ni rna ba gnyis/ /dbral ba snying ga lte ba ru/ /sngon bzhin k+ShiM sogs mdza' gnyis las/ /'khor lo la sogs de yi mtshan/ /de las bzhi po gcig gnyis bskyed/ /de rnams
38a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi 'od zer gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams bkug zhugs byas pas/ /rdo rje sngar gyur bcud 'phen mtshan/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzri d+h+rag pany+dzA b+hi b+hyid artha sid+d+hi hUM swAhA/ /de brjod 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /sangs rgyas sa snying sogs byas pas/ /bkrug ste gnas bcug brtan
38a5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /bar du chod pa'ang mthod la sogs/ /dngos grub bar chod nyer zhi'i phyir/ /'byung po sogs la gtor byin nas/ /gang gi sbyor bas chags byas na/ /zla ba phyed na 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rtag pa rin chen 'byung/ /'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ /'khor
38a6(rgyud 'grel): lo rin chen pad+ma dang/ /ral gri gyur pa bcud 'phen mtshan/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): dzi na dzi ka pany+tsa a b+ha b+hyod artha sid+d+hi hUM swAhA/ /oM randa d+h+rika pany+tsa a b+hi b+hyid artha sid+d+hi hUM swAhA/ /oM A ro lika pany+tsa a b+hi b+hyid artha sid+d+hi hUM swAhA/ /oM pradz+nyA d+h+rika pany+tsa a b+hi b+hyid artha sid+d+hi hUM swAhA/ /brjod cing
38a7(rgyud 'grel): spros pas gong ma ltar/ /sa snying la sogs bcu byas te/ /mtshan mthong bar chad zhi byas nas/ /zla ba phyed na nges par 'grub/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /nyid kyi rdo rje gdan bzhugs pa/ /shing rtog lag tu bzhag pa bzhin/ /rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /
38b1(rgyud 'grel): gang+gA'i bye ma snying zhing dag na/ /rna ba'i drung na 'khor ba bzhin/ /sgra grags pa ni ji snyed pa/ /mngon shes rna bas thos pa'o/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag gi /sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis mtshan/ /gar mkhan la sogs rig par 'gyur/ /bskal pa
38b2(rgyud 'grel): gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /'khor ba dag na gnas pa yi/ /sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs brtags/ /zhag gsum bzlas pa bzhin du dran/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag tu/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ rdo rje rdzu 'phrul mchog gis 'gengs
38b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mngon shes rgyu yi phyir/ /phul du 'byung bar bshad pa ste/ /grangs dad tshad du rab ldan pa'i/ /mngon par shes pa rtogs par bya/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa'i/ /'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su/ /rdo rje sku dang gsung thugs kyis/ /'jig rten khams kun
38b4(rgyud 'grel): bgrod par 'gyur// //da ni dgug pa'i cho ga'i las 'ga' zhig bshad par bya'o/ /mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gong gsungs gnas su ji lta bzhin/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri byas nas/ /lha yis dbang bskur byas nas su/ /bka' 
38b5(rgyud 'grel): yi 'khor lo sogs sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sngon 'gro ba'i/ /'dod pa'i lha ru dmigs byas la/ /mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab/ /lcags kyu gnas ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje gsum gyis byin gyis brlab/ /yi ge gsum par rang rang sngags/ /rig pa dang bcas
38b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas par bya/ /rdo rje gsum las 'phros pa yi/ /lcags kyus mtshan pa'i lha rnams spro/ /skyes pa bud med la sogs pa/ /sems can ma yin pa yang rung/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor thog gnas pa/ /lcags kyus snying gar sbyar bar bya/ /rims bzhin 'ongs te lam byung
38b7(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /phab te mdun du zla gnas la/ /'og 'byung cho gas mA ma kI/ /spyan ma zhi dang bsrung bar bya/ /de ltar byas pas ji tsam du/ /'dod pa'i las ni byed nus pas/ /cho ga'i mchog ni 'di nyid ni/ /dgug pa kun la spyi ru sbyar/ /de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang/ /rdo rje gsum
39a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis mtshan pa bsgom/ /sngon bzhin rlung dkyil la gnas pa'i/ /mi yi bu mo chog rnams dgug /oM A big+h+nan ta krita bu mo che ge mo A karSha ya dza hUM dza/ /brgya rtsa lnga bcur brjod par bya/ /sngon bzhin 'dod pa'i rgyal po yang/ /rdo rje gsum gyis byin??
39a2(rgyud 'grel): brlab la/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /nam mkha' i bu mo dgug par bya/ /oM A Tak+ki ra dza nam mkha' i bu mo A karSha ya dza hUM ja/ sbyor ba de ltar gnod mdzes kyang/ /rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan bsgoms la/ /lha ma yin gyi bu mo mchog /rlung dkyil ti shu stsal??
39a3(rgyud 'grel): kyus dgug /oM A suM ba ra dza lta ma yin gyi bu mo A karSha ya dza hUM dza/ sngon bzhin 'jam dpal rdo rje bskyed/ /rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlab la/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /gnod sbyin bu mo'i cod pan la/ /mnan phyir khro bo gshin rje gshed/ bskal pa'i bsregs pa ltar
39a4(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ /lcags kyu zhags pas snying khar sbyar/ /mngag gzhug don du dgug par bya/ /rang rang sngags kyi khyad par dang/ /phyag rgya'i khyad par thams cad kyis/ /dgug par rang rang thabs su gsungs/ /gzhan du byas na mi 'grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po
39a5(rgyud 'grel): che/ /yang dang yang du bskul bar bya/ /de nyid lha rnams thams cad dang/ /rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'o/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho rkang pas gnon pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /ri mo'i cho ga sngon bstan bzhin/ /chu yi drung sogs bris nas kyang/ /lha
39a6(rgyud 'grel): yis dbang bskur bar gyis zhugs/ /bka' yi 'khor lo la sogs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed nas kyang/ /dri za 'jug pa la sogs pas/ /byang chub sems su zhu bar 'gyur/ /de las phyogs bzhi dbus lnga'i chu/ /bruM aM dzi khaM hUM du phyur/ /de la mtshan ma de yis
39a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /spro bsdu las ni rigs lngar gyur/ /mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bkod/ /de rnams kyis ni ye shes kyis/ /bskul sogs sngon 'gro dbang bskur bya/ /de yi dbu la bdag nyid ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ba rig mar bcas/ /mi bskyod
39b1(rgyud 'grel): dbu gnas zhabs bzhi yis/ /sangs rgyas bzhi yi spyi bor bsgom/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): sarba bud d+ha ma ku At+ma haM hUM/ nga rgyal de yis brtan par gnas/ /chu la sogs pa reg rung ste/ /'byung po mnyes par byas nas su/ /chags byas zla ba phyed na 'grub/ /de nas rtag pa la sogs pa'i?
39b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ldan pas chu yis rdul/ /spyan la sogs pa bsgoms byas nas/ /dus de nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jam dpal rdo rje la sogs pa/ /chu rnams rang gi gzugs su bsgom/ /gong bzhin brtan par rab byas nas/ /zla ba phyed na 'grub par 'gyur/ /grub nas rgya mtsho bzhi
39b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs/ /thams cad kun tu 'chag 'gyur te/ /thang la bya ba ji bzhin du/ /rnal 'byor pa ni spyod par byed/ /thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sngon 'gro ba'i/ /bi dang rdo rje ser po las/ /dpa' bo rdo rje bsgrub par bya/ /cung zad ser la g.yas g.yon zhal/
39b4(rgyud 'grel): nag dang dkar po bsgom par bya/ /dang pos 'khyud cing lhag man/ /rdo rje ral gri ner bu pad/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /mig dang lus rdzogs byin brlabs nas/ bskul ba la sogs sngon 'gro ba'i/ /mi bskyod pa yis dbu brgyan bsam/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): bi ba ri
39b5(rgyud 'grel): badzra hUM phaT swAhA/ /bzlas pa sngon bzhin rab byas pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad de ru byas/ /bkug ste bcug nas brtan byas pas/ /zla ba phyed na bka' nyan te/ /dgug dang dbang dur bya ba sogs/ /sman dang sngags kyi dngos grub rnams/ /bsgrubs pa po ni ci 'dod pa'o/ /de
39b6(rgyud 'grel): dag thams cad spyin par byed/ /yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /cu dang pad+ma dkar po las/ /cu gyis mtshan pa bsam par bya/ /de yi 'od 'phros sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyogs bcu la gnas sangs rgyas sogs/ /skul byed pa
39b7(rgyud 'grel): yi gzugs byas nas/ /bkug ste de ru gzhug par bya/ /de la sangs rgyas rdo rje ma/ /dkar mo g.yas g.yon nag dang dmar/ /dang po thabs la 'khyud pa dang/ /pad snod ral gri nor bu 'bar/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi/ /mig dang lus sogs
40a1(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs la/ /bskul ba sngon du 'gro ba yi/ /mi bskyod pa yis dbu rgyan bya/ /de yi ye shes sems ma yi/ /thugs kar zla ba tsuM bkod de/ /spro bsdu gzhug pa snga ma bzhin/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ba'o/ /oM a tsa le cu la dun le??
40a2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA hUM swAhA/ de yis zla ba phyed na ni/ /zhi ba la sogs gang yang rung/ /sgrub pa po yid la 'dod pa'i/ /dngos grung rnams ni ster bar 'gyur/ /khyad par du ni bum bzang dang/ /yid bzhin nor dang dpag bsam shing/ /rnal 'byor pa ni gang 'dod pa/ /sgrub pa po la sbyin par
40a3(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya/ /rdo rje sems las byung ba yi/ /dzaM dang ral gri 'bras bu ni/ /dzaM gis mtshan pa bsam par bya/ /de yi 'od kyi sangs rgyas rnams/ /gnod gnas kyi ni bskur byas nas/ /bkug nas de la thim par bya/ /de la gnod sbyin dbang po
40a4(rgyud 'grel): che/ /gsus che rkang pa 'thung ba ste/ /gser 'dra g.yas g.yon nag dang dkar/ /dang pos 'phags ma nor rgyun 'khyud/ /lhag mas pi dza pu ra dang/ /sre mo rin chen skyug byed dang/ /rin chen ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas rdo rje mtshan pa yi/ /bum pa bzang
40a5(rgyud 'grel): la rab bzhag ste/ /g.yon pa btsan dkyil du gnas pa/ /zla steng de yi 'od kyis mtshan/ /nor rgyun de 'dra dang po na/ /mchog sbyin 'bras kyi snye ldan pa/ /sku 'jam dbu la me tog gi /sna tshogs thod bcings zhi ba'o/ /gzhan gyis spyan zlum yid dga' ba'o/ /
40a6(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo snying kha lte ba dang/ /gsang ba dang ni rkang mthil du/ /zla ba nyi mar go rims bzhin/ /rtag pa mi 'khrug rin chen che/ /'od dpag med dang don grub bsgom/ /sku sogs byin gyis brlabs nas/ /bskul ba sngon du 'gro ba yi/ /i bskyod pa yis dbu rgyan byas
40a7(rgyud 'grel): de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /thugs kar zla bar dzaM bkod de/ /sngon bzhin nor gyi char 'bebs pa/ /brtsom pa bcug ste bzlas brjod bya/ /oM A dzaM b+ha la dza lan+d+ra ya hUM phaT swAhA/ /de yi zla ba phyed na ni/ /nyin re gser srang stong stong gi /sgrub pa po la
40b1(rgyud 'grel): rang sbyin par/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med// //yang ni rang 'dod sbyor ba yis/ /yan lag brgyad ni rdzogs byas te/ /rdo rje pad+ma sbyar brtsams nas/ /bde gshegs rang gi zhal du gzhug /zhu nas rdo rje phyung ba de nang du byang chub sems tsam
40b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu dgu'o/ /de las gtso bo gnod gnas kyis/ /'brel pa'i 'khor lo brtan par bya/ /de yi mig la sogs pa dang/ /sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlabs/ /yang ni rang gi sa bon gyis/ /'od kyis bde gshegs dgug par bya/ /zhal zhugs zhu gyur rdo rjer phyung/ /de
40b3(rgyud 'grel): yi lce la dza bkod nas/ /'od kyi drangs nas sngags 'di yis/ /zhal du dbab par byas nas dbul/ /oM A dzaM dan de hi de hi hUM/ de yis tsham nas dbu rgyan la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgom zhing/ /zla ba phyed du dus bzhi ru/ /de 'dra'i chu rgyun byin nas 'grub/ /ji tsam 'dod
40b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nor ldan zhing/ /'bru yi char ni 'bebs par mdzad/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs pa'i/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor ram/ /'jam dpal rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gnod sbyin mo ni bsgrub par
40b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /ci gsungs gzhal yas khang bsgoms la/ /de yi sbyor bas dbus su gnas/ /mdun du gser mdog zla ba la/ /zla gam thig le rtse ldan pa/ /k+Shi bsgoms de las 'od zer spre/ /kha dog sna tshogs phros pa yis/ /spyan sogs lha mo bkod pa la/ /phog pas gnod
40b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin mo ru 'gyur/ /bkug ste de la thim gyur nas/ /de gzugs gnas gyur gnod sbyin mo/ /rgyud gzhan las ni gsungs pa bzhin/ /bsgrub pa'i mdun du rnam par bsams/ /gser mdog mdzes pa'i cha lugs can/ /bud med gzhon nu'i skra tshul ldan/ /dang byin bzas
40b7(rgyud 'grel): lhod smad dkris/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas pas gdugs ni dkar po thogs/ /g.yon pas dpag bsam shing la brten/ /cung zad 'jum ni zhal mdzes shing/ /kha dog lnga pa'i me tog las/ /me tog phreng ba sogs kyis mdzes/ /byas pa'i phyi
41a1(rgyud 'grel): krung thor tshugs can/ /rin po che yi ri phug ni/ /gnas par rab tu bsam pa'o/ /de yi gzugs la sogs pa lnga/ /sh+rI b+hu d+d+ha haM b+ha lnga yis/ /lha mor skyed nas gnas gsum du/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab/ /bskul ba sngon du 'gro ba yi/ /
41a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur byas pas dbu rgyan la/ /gshin rje gshed po rnam bsgoms te/ /de yi ngar 'dzin mnan par bya/ /de nas rang gi sa bon gyi/ /'od kyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug /thugs kar bcug te snyan tshig gis/ /bzhams te bsgo bas bsgrub par bya/ /de nas de yi ye
41a3(rgyud 'grel): shes sems/ /rang gi sems dpar rab bcug pas/ /rang bzhin gcig tu gyur bya nas/ /sngags kyi bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas sha dang khrag dang ni/ /til phye sgur gdong la sogs pa'i/ /gtor mas mnyes par byas nas su/ /zhi ba'i sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ /
41a4(rgyud 'grel): yang ni de yis ma grub na/ /drag shul gyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /ye shes sems dpa' der bcug la/ /rdo rje sbyor ba brtsam bar bya/ /gnod sbyin mo la 'khyud byas nas/ /rdo rje rtse lnga 'od zer 'bar/ /pad+mar rtsal nas sngags bzlas pas/ /nang du 'od zer spro bar bya/ /oM A
41a5(rgyud 'grel): ya mAn+ta kri ta yak+ShiM yak+ShiM dzwa la dzwa la hUM phaT/ 'od zer me ltar 'bar ba yis/ /ye shes sems dpa' gdung byas pas/ /tsha ste skrag nas sgrub po la/ /zla phyed 'phral du dngos grub ster/ /sgrub po'i mdun du thal sbyar nas/ /rje gcig bdag la bka' stsol zhes/ /'dzum pa'i bzhin
41a6(rgyud 'grel): bltas bka' len te/ /sgrub pos de la bka' stsal pa/ /ma dang srid mo chung ma dang/ /g.yog mo bya ba gyis shes bya/ /de nas de yi rje zhig gi/ bka' ni spyi bos nod ces len/ /gal te ma yi bya ba byed/ /tho rangs srod la 'ongs byas nas/ /gser srang bcu dang mu tig gi /
41a7(rgyud 'grel): ha ra bdun ni bzhag nas 'gro/ /sring mo yi ni byi ba byed/ /nyi ma'i gung la drung 'ongs te/ /gser srang bdun dang ha ra bdun/ /phul te ming po sang 'ong zer/ /gal te chung ma'i bya byed na/ /yid kyis 'dod pa'i dus su ni/ /'phral du drung du 'ong bar byed/ /cang mi smra bar 'dod pa sbyar/ /
41b1(rgyud 'grel): gser srang lnga dang ha ra gcig /bzhag ste rang gi gnas su 'gro/ gal te gtam smras gyur na ni/ /phyin chad ci yang mi gter ro/ /g.yog mo bya ba byed pa yis/ /zas dang gos dang gser la sogs/ /bzhon pa la sogs ci 'dod pa/ /bka' tsam gyis ni sbyor bar byed/ /gzhan na ni chung yid du
41b2(rgyud 'grel): 'ong/ /bkug nas byin te rang gnas skyel/ /de sogs gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi/ /yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab 'thob/ /sngags kyi khyad par rnams kyi bsgrub pa khyad par bshad zin to/ /da ni zhi ba'i las kyi rim pa bshad par bya'o/ /spyan gyi tshul gyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsam gtan
41b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni brtag par bya/ /yang na mos pa'i rnam pa yis/ /rnal 'byor rab tu brtsam pa'o/ /grong dam yang na grong khyer ram/ /ljongs rnams gang ba'i nang la sogs/ /zhi bar bya phyir bsam gtan mchog /'di ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya/ /thams cad sdem bzhin byas la/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis shar
41b4(rgyud 'grel): bltas te/ /rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa mchog /ta la bdun tsam nam mkha' la/ /phyogs te 'phrer bur rnam par bsam/ /de yi bum pa gzhal yas khang/ /gang na dang bcas pa rnam bsams te/ /de na rtag pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /dkar po sngon bzhin nyi shus bsgoms/ /mchod stod bdud rtsi myang byas
41b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa las byung ba'i/ /'od zer rnam par spro bar bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): bruM dzi na/ dzig che ge mo'i nad twaM la ja hUM swAhA swAhA/ de brjod lha dang rdo rje yi/ /lus la 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /zad dus me 'bras 'gro kun gyi/ /nad rnams rab tu bsweg 'gyur ro/ /shel ltar rab tu
41b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa la/ /mi ldog bya phyir rgyas bya'i phyir/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod pa yis/ /spyan la sogs pa spro bar bya/ /oM ru ru spu ru dzwa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi lo tsa ni sarba arbba sA da ni nang shan+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /mkha' dbyings yongs su bkar byas nas/ /bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yis/ /de rnams spyi
41b7(rgyud 'grel): bor bkra shis sgra/ /ldan par blangs nas dbang bskur stsol/ /oM ka ya badze nad sh+rIn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM wag badzra nad shIn+ti ku ru swAhA/ oM tsit+ta badzra nad sh'n+tiM ku ru swAhA/ de rnams brjod pas rdo rje gsum/ /ba spu bu ga las spros pas/ /sngon bzhin dbang bskur rab sbyin na/ /des pa'i nad
42a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang zhag bdun 'jig /rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni/ /dgang dga' ba'ang rab tu 'gengs/ /de ni sbyin pa rab grub cing/ /yid sbyin nor bu dpal 'drar 'gyur/ /bskal pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing/ /sangs rgyas thams cad byin
42a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis rlob/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o/ /yang ni 'ga' zhig don gyi phyir/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /chu zla'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rtag pa'i 'khor lo nyi shus bskyed/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la/ /de ya ye shes
42a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' yi/ /thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni/ /zhi bar 'dod pa bzhag par bya/ /de na sgong du gsungs pa yi/ /spyan ma'i sngags ni rig mar bcas/ /bzlas brjod byas pas ba sku yi/ /bu ga las ni sbyun tshogs spro/ /de rnams 'od zer lnga 'bar ba'i/ /'od zer
42a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis nad pa la/ /zhi bar bya phyir rgyas bya'i phyir/ /de la gzi brjid dbab par bya'o/ /yang ni mi ldog bya ba'i phyir/ /gong gi dbyung ba 'am sa bon nam/ /yi ge gsum par rig par bcas/ /bzlas pas rtag pa'i tshogs spro bya/ /de rnams spyan dang bcas pa yis/ /bdud
42a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsis gang pa'i bum pa bzung/ /dbyangs dang bcas pas dbang bskur bya/ /nad ni zhag bdun gyis zhi byed/ /rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni/ /dgang dka' ba'ang rab tu 'gengs/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /thams cad sngam bzhin byas la/ /spyan
42a6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog /cho ga nyi shu rdzogs byas la/ mchod bstod bdud rtsi byang ba bya/ /de yi ye shes sems ma yis/ /shi ba'i ro ni bzhag byas nas/ /sngags 'di rnam par brjod par bya/ /oM ru ru sphu ru dzwa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba maTwa sA d+ha ni shi ba
42a7(rgyud 'grel): bskos par gyur cig swAhA/ de yis de nas lam 'phros pa'i/ /lcags kyu'i gzugs su phyung byas te/ /de yis shi pa'i rnam par shes/ /bar ma do na gnas pa 'am yang na skye gnas chung kyang rung/ /dri med mar me'i tshul gnas pa'i/ /bkug ste ro yi snying ga ru/ /bcug mas bung?
42b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags de la dgong/ /de yi zer gyis ro bsregs te/ /rang ming tha mas spyan ma yi/ /gzugs su bskyed nas phung po dang/ /khams dang skye mched kyis dag bya/ /de lus gong pa'i phreng sngags kyis/ /phyi nang bar mtshams med par gtam/ /sngags las sngon bzhin spyan ma spro/ /bud la nas?
42b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer spro bar bya/ /bskal pa'i bar du gnas bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas brtag pa'i tshogs spros pa'i/ /dbang bskur byas pa las skyes pa'i/ /shi ba'i zhag ni bdun nas 'tsho/ /'tsho na'ang lnga brgya 'am stong gi bar/ /'di nyid du ni gnas par 'gyur/ /spyan gyi ye shes kyis bteb
42b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /rim gyis sangs rgyas thob pa'o/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te/ /rnam par snang mdzad rnal 'byor pas/ /lta ba rdo rje dug la sogs/ /mi bzang dug ni dbrog par bya/ /bdag nyid g.yas pa'i bar ma ru/ /'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa/ /lte bar oM dkar po yis mtshan/ /
42b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dkar po spros nas brtsam/ /nad pa bdun du bzhag byas la/ /sgrub pos spyi bo la bzhag ste/ /dug rnams dbrog pa'i ched du ni/ /sngags 'di brjod la 'od zer spro/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): dzi na dzi ka che ge mo'i dug zhi bar mdzod cig hUM swAhA/ brjod pas 'od zer dkar po ni/ /spyi bor zhugs pas
42b5(rgyud 'grel): nag po dbyung/ /'od zer de yis nam mkha' khams/ /phyogs bcu kun tu gtor bar bya/ /de yis shul du 'od zer ni/ /dkar zhing bsil ba phab byas pas/ /zhag bdun na ni nam mkha' kun/ /gang ba'i dug kyang med par byed/ /yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya/ /mi bskyod 'khor lo
42b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas/ /ha la ha la la sogs pa/ /sbyor ba 'di yis gso bar bya/ /bsgrub bya 'dun du rab bzhag la/ de yi thugs kar hUM byung ba'i/ /rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa/ /'od zer dkar po 'bar ba bsam/ /de yang zla 'od ltar bsil zhing/ /bsil bas lus kun khyab pa'i dug /snying ga lkog
42b7(rgyud 'grel): ma dgral ba dang/ /mgo po'i gnas su yang dag bsdu/ /de ltar lan gsum par bsams la/ /thams cad snying ga'i dbus su bsdu/ /de nas 'di ni brjod pa yis/ /nag po skyug pa'i tshul du bsam/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra d+h+ri ka che ge mo'i dug bsos bar gyur cig swAhA/ de ltar byas pas zhag
43a1(rgyud 'grel): bdun na/ /nam mkha' khams kun gang ba yi/ /dug rnams kyang ni zad byed na/ /bsgrub bya'i lus ni smos ci dgos/ /sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /'od dpag med kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /'bras dang phol mig 'brus gran sogs/ /
43a2(rgyud 'grel): nye ba'i dug rnams dbyung bar bya/ /g.yas kyi bar mas as skyes pa'i/ /pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad pa'i/ /lte bar 'od zer lnga 'bar ba'i /a bsams nas ni byab par bya/ /bsgrub bya mdun du rab bzhag la/ /a yi 'od zer gyis bsdus nas/ /nag po mdog ni rnam pa
43a3(rgyud 'grel): ru/ /bsgrub bya'i lus las byung bar bsam/ /de yis kun tu rab spros pas/ /dug spangs kha dog dkar po bsam/ /de ltar dus bzhir gsang sngags 'di/ /bzlas pas zhag bdun dug rnams 'byang/ /oM A ro li ka che ge mo'i nye ba'i dug zhi bar gyur cig hUM swAhA/ /de yis
43a4(rgyud 'grel): las skyes snying 'bar ba'i/ /dug rnams thams cad zad byed na/ /bsgrub bya'i lus gcig la gnas pa'i/ /nye ba'i dug rnams smos ci dgos/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /khro bo rgyal po rta mgrin ni/ /kha dog dkar po rab bsgoms te/ /dug rnams thams cad
43a5(rgyud 'grel): bsal bar bya/ /bsgrub bya mdun du bzhag byas la/ /de yi snying gar zla ba la/ /hUM dkar 'od zer dkar po 'bar/ /'od zer de yis lus kun gyi/ /dug rnams rab tu sbar byas la/ /g.yas ba'i bar mar hUM dkar po/ /de bskyed pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /dkar po'i lte bar hUM
43a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /rang ming yi ge dang po yis/ /bsgrub bya rnam par bsams nas ni/ /gsang sngags 'di yis de yi ni/ /dug rnams kun tu bsal bar bya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa matna kA yA wa k+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM tu ru la bi ru la/ sarba bi sha ga ta ya/ tsha li ta/ bi spu ling+ga ta ta/ ha sa ke sa
43a7(rgyud 'grel): ri sa ta ta pa/ badzra khur nirga ta/ tsa li ta ba su ta ta lin shtsa sa ma ru tod k+Shi ba da da ra ni nga ra/ bi sha na ha ha sa a pA ra mi tA/ pa la pa ra kra ma/ Arya beg ste b+hu ta ga na/ b+hu ta b+hu ta/ ha ya gri ba kha ta kha da/ pa ramna tra na tshind+ha tshind+ha/ sid+d+hi me de ma med dbi sha ma snya? be sha ya rak+Sha dza/ bi
43b1(rgyud 'grel): sha tsa nan/ sarba kra he shtsa bya/ /pra ti ta to ta b+ha badzra daSh+TaM ki tsaM ra ya si/ i dan du Sh+Ta/ gra ha na du Sh+Ta/ sarba na/ dun dum ma tha ma tha/ ma ta ma ta/ bud+d+ha ra ma si ga nu/ dz+nyA na ta ka ra naM/ ku sri ran ha ya grib ya phaT/ badzra ya phaT/ badzra ga ta ya phaT/ /badzra mA rbas? phaT
43b2(rgyud 'grel): badzra daSh+TaM ya phaT/ badzra khu ra ya phaT/ badzra khu ra na ri ga ta ya phaT/ pa ra man+ta ba ni sha na ya phaT/ trai lo ka ta pa yi ga ra ya phaT/ sarba ka rma shtha pa ti ha ha ta ya phaT badzra ku la ta sa na phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ swA hA/ hUM/ las 'od zer dkar po yis/ /bdud rtsi babs? pas
43b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya yi/ /lus las nag po'i dug blangs te/ sa la sogs par spro bar bya/ /shul du bdud rtsi dkar po yis/ /'od zer babs par byas nas su/ /de bzhin thun bzhir byangs gyur na/ /zhag bdun na ni nam mkha' i dbyings/ /dug gis yongs su gang ba yi/ /rdo rje mi bzang
43b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi dug/ sbyar ba tsam gyis sel bar byed/ /sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /yang ni dug rnams zad bya'i phyir/ /sbyor ba rnams la brgyad ldan par/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur bsgom/ /gser 'dra g.yas gnag g.yon dkar te/ /dang pos rang 'od rig ma
43b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud/ /g.yas par 'og 'byung 'khor lo 'dzin/ /lhag ma ral gri rin chen pad/ /'di la rnam snang lta bur sbyar/ /bruM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ni/ /dkar po bruM gis mtshan pa bsam/ /bsgrub bya ming gi dang po bskyed/ /sgrub po'i mdun du rab bzhag la/ /sbyor ba
43b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis spang bya'i phyir/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod bsu/ /bruM las 'od zer dkar po spro/ /nam(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta kA ya wa k+tsit+ta/ badzra NAM/ oM A sarba la bu ti/ /li ka da ra shi/ /yan+t+ra man+ta tan+t+ra/ tsU rdza bra yo gi ti/ ma ma kri ti yin ke na tsi ta kri ti/ tA ni sarba n+ti/ tshind+ha/ bind+hi
43b7(rgyud 'grel): bind+ha/ ha na ha mang ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ki pa ya ki pa ya/ bid+hwa sa ya/ sha ta sA ta swA/ bi tsu r+Na ya/ oM u Sh+NI Sha badzraM tsa kra wa ra ti/ /b+h+ruM b+h+ruM b+h+ruM/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ /swA hA/ de nas 'od zer sna tshogs spros pas/ spyi bo nas ni phul byas te/ /rkang pa'i mthil du phyung byas la/ /sa yi gting du
44a1(rgyud 'grel): gtan par bya/ /yang ni 'od zer de yis kyang/ /mdun du bsnun pas dug rnams kun/ /rgyab tu phyung bas sa la sogs/ /'byung ba rnams su spro bar bya/ /de bzhin 'od zer kyis bsdus nas/ /byung ste gtor nas de shul du/ /bdud rtsi graT zor?
44a2(rgyud 'grel): rab 'babs pas/ /dug ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /dkar po dang ni ser po dang/ /nag po bsam gtan 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sprul pa yis dug rnams kyang ni zhig bdun 'byin/ /yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che/ /kha dog dkar
44a3(rgyud 'grel): po bsam byas te/ /'don pa'i sngags kyis nang rnams bsal/ /nad pa mdun du bzhag byas te/ /bdag nyid khros nas gsang sngags 'di/ /brjod pas 'od zer tshogs spros pas/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la gzhug par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): dzi na dzi ka che ge mo'i nad a phan?
44a4(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM/ de yi nad rnams bskul bar bya/ /rlung mkhris bad kan las byung ba'i/ /spre'u yi gzugs brnyan lta bu 'am/ /de bzhin khyi ni rkang pa gsum/ /yi dgas gcer bu'i gzugs dag tu/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la byung na su/ /phyogs bcu dag tu rab rgyug cing/ /'bros
44a5(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pas rnam par bsam/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): dzin dzi ka che ge mo'i nad ma ra ya hUM phaT/ brjod pas thugs las 'phros pa yis/ /khro bo'i 'khor los mtshan ma yi/ /spre'u la sogs pa'i nad rnams kun/ /mtshan mas phye mar brlag par byed/ /bkug ste 'ongs pa rang
44a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi/ /mtshan mas phye mar brlag 'gyur te/ /bsgrub bya nad dang rnam bral bas/ /shel 'dra'i kha dog lta bur bsam/ /de nas bdag nyid 'khor lo che/ /kha dog dkar po rnam bsams la/ /slob bzhin spyan ma'i sngags brjod pas/ /'od zer 'babs pas lus dgang
44a7(rgyud 'grel): byag oM A(rgyud 'grel): dzi na dzi ka nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shi ny+tsa hUM swa hA/ zhes brjod pas sngon bzhin rtag pa'i tshogs spyan dang bcas pa bum pa 'dzin/ /dbang bskur byas te brgya rtsa brgyad/ /zhag bdun par du dus bzhin bya /de ltar byas na phyi nang gi/ myong bar des pa'i nad kun yang/ /
44b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /the tshom med par 'byang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin mi bskyod rin chen dpal/ /'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ /yi ge'i tshig ni gang mos pa/ /dang pa bskyed de nad rnams bsal/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra d+h+ri ka che gi mo'i nad a la na a hUM/ oM sarba?
44b2(rgyud 'grel): ran+ta d+h+ri ka che ge mi'i nad a pa na a hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): A ro li ka che ge mo'i nad a pa na ya hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): pra dz+nyA d+h+ri ka che ge mo'i nang a pha na ya hUM/ oM A/ badzra d+hi ka che ge mo'i nad ma ra ya phaT hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): A ro li ka che ge mo'i nad mA ra ya phaT/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): bra dz+nyA d+h+ri ka nad pa che ge mo'i nad mA
44b3(rgyud 'grel): ra ya phaT hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra d+h+ri ka nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM swAhA/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): ratna th+ra ki nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): a ro la ki nad pa che ge mo la a b+hi Shany+tsa hUM swAhA/ om A(rgyud 'grel): pradz+nyA Dh+ri ka nang la che ge mo la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM swAhA/ da yis nang rnams byung byas
44b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ /rang rang mtshan mas sngon bzhin bsang/ /stobs dang dbang bskur sogs pa yi/ /snga ma bzhin du rab tu bya/ /sbyor bas zlos pas zhag bdun du/ /myong bar des pa'i nad rnams kun/ /rdo rje bsam gtan cho ga des/ /phyi dang nang du bcas pa sel// //
44b5(rgyud 'grel): da ni rgyas pa'i las kyi lam gyi rim pa rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /sngon bzhin bzlas pa'i cho ga nas/ /dpa' bskur yan chad rdzogs ste/ rdo rje pad+ma can gyi ni/ /sbyor bas rgyas pa'i las brtsam mo/ /stobs la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang/ /lhag ma'i cher
