44b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur 'dod pa dang/ /mdzod po che ni rgyas bya'i phyir/ /rgyas pa'i sems kyis bya ba'o/ /bka' yi 'khor lo sbyor ba yis/ /sngon bzhin khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas pa yi/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor ser po'i dbus/ /nyi ma'i
44b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/ /gser zhun lta bu'i 'od dpag med/ /'khor lor bcas pa bsams byas la/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya/ /de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni/ /'dod pa rnam gsum bzhag nas ni/ /thams cad
45a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags 'di ni zlos/ /oM ka Te pi ka Te ni ka Te ka taM ka ro ba le he ge mo buSh+TaM gu ru hUM/ na bza' dkar mo la sogs tshogs/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i don char 'bebs/ /nam mkha' khams kun rab dkang nas/ /rjes su 'od zer bsdu bar bya/ /de ni
45a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer rnam pa lnga/ /'dod pa'i sbyi bo mgrin pa dang/ /thugs ka'i gnas ni gsum po rung/ /'dod pa gsum gyi tshul du gzhag /de rnams de mi bzang bya ba'i phyir/ /thams cad kyi ni gsang sngags 'di/ /brjod nas 'od dpag med pa'i tshogs/ /bum pa gang ba bzung par bya/ /
45a3(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): dzi A ro li ka che ge mo buSh+Ti ku ru hUM/ bkra shis glu dbyangs chig bcad kyi/ /dbang bskur ba'i stsel bar bsam/ /de ltar dus bzhir zhag 'dun du/ /sbyor bas thams cad rgyas par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni/ /dgang dkar ba'ang rab tu 'gegs bte?
45a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa rab sgrub cing/ /yid sbyin nor bu dpal 'drar 'gyur/ /yang na 'di ltar gos dkar ba'o/ /'khor lo ldan pa'i sbyor ba bsgom/ /ye shes sems ma'i thugs kar/ /'dod pa dag ni gzhug par bya/ /oM ka Te ri ka Te ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te ka ro ba re che ge mo'u Sh+Tir?
45a5(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ brjod pas de mdza' dbus yig la/ /nam mkha' i khams ni dkar mos gang/ /de nyid gzi brjid tshul gyis su/ /rjes su 'od zer sngon bzhin dbab/ /gong gis sngags kyis 'od dpag med/ /spros nas dbang bskur stsal bar bsam/ de ltar dus bzhing zhag bdun du/ /
45a6(rgyud 'grel): byas pas bsgrung bya rgyas par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba 'dis/ /rtag par chos kyis rgyas par mdzad/ /rtag tu mdzod po che dang ldan/ /nad rnams med cing che rgyas 'gyur/ /da ni dbang gi las kyi rim pa bshad par bya'o/ /thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la/ /
45a7(rgyud 'grel): di mo'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /dbang du bya ba brtsam pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang/ /sems can khams rnams ma lus pa/ /dbang du khyed dam byed 'dod phyir/ /chags pa'i yid kyis bya ba'o/ /dka' yi 'khro lo rab bskor bas/
45b1(rgyud 'grel): khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zla gam la/ /ji bzhin sbyor bas ban du ka/ den yong grub pa'i 'khor lo/ /bsgoms nas mchod pa stod pa dang/ /bdud rtsi myang bas mnyes par bya/ /de yi ye shes sems
45b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' yi/ /thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni/ /gong gi gnyis po bzhag nas ni/ /thams cad kyi ni gsang sngags brjod/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): khaM pradz+nyA d+h+ra ki che ge mo ba shaM raM rA ga ya he/ /de brjod thams cad ba spu yi/ /sgo las sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams
45b3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis/ /mkha' dbyings yongs su dgang bar bsam/ /de rnams 'od zer rnams lnga yis/ /tshul gyis thams cad 'dus bya sla/ /thug kar 'dod pa de lus la/ /thugs kar 'dod pa de lus la/ /rjes su stobs ni dbang par bya/ /gong gi sngags brjod sngon bzhin du/ /dbang bskur de la stsol bar bsam/ /de ltar
45b4(rgyud 'grel): spyor bas dus bzhi ru/ /bzlas pas zhag bdun 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis thugs byon/ /'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam/ /las thabs byed par de 'gyur ro/ /dga' bas myong ba'i dbang po dang/ /dgyam nas ci 'dod rab tu
45b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsol/ /bskul ba chen po ma byas kyang/ /'gro ba 'di kun dbang du 'gyur/ yang ni de ltar sgrol ma yi/ /'khor lo ldan pa rab bsgoms la/ /de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni/ /dbang du bya ba bzhag nas ni/ /dbus su yi ge taM dmar po/ /
45b6(rgyud 'grel): mdza' ma breng sngags dmar po ni/ /gyen du 'breng bas bskor bas bsam/ /dmar pa'i mchan ma rnams dang ni/ /taM las 'od zer dmar po'i tshogs/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod nas su/ /bsgrub bya bskul phyir dbyur bar bya/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu de che ge mo ba shaM ku ru ho/ /skyes
45b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snying dang pas? mgrin par bskul/ /bung med bsang ba nas bskul bya/ /phreng ba'i sngags las 'od zer dmar/ /rang gi skye gnas nas phyung bya/ /phong gi sgo ru rab zhugs bas/ /bsgrub bya'i sems na bkag 'dra ba/ /zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra bkug nas ni/ /rim pa gnyis su chung
46a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /gal te lha mo mnga' can ma/ /'o gnas 'byung bzhin byin brlabs la/ /bskul ba la sogs de bzhin bya/ /des kyang dbang du byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang snga ma bzhin du 'dod/ /de ni thugs kar rab bzhag la/ /dpa' bo btang sogs cho ga yis
46a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la stobs ni dbab par bya/ /de ltar sbyor bas dus bzhi ru/ /zhag bdun bar du rab byas na/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sde tshan dang/ /sems can khams rnams ma lus pa/ /de ma thag tu bran bzhin du/ /thams cad yod med dbang du byed/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin bsgoms?
46a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ 'jam dpal rdo rje 'khor lo yis/ /dbang du bya ba brtsam pa'o/ /sngags byed dang ni dal byed dang/ /'dod byed dang ni rmongs byed dang/ /dbang gi rang bzhin mda' lnga ni/ /cho ga 'di yis byin brlab bya/ /sgyug ma a yis byin brlabs te
46a4(rgyud 'grel): mde'u ni hUM gis byin brlabs la /g.yon gyis mi bskyed gzhu gzung? nas/ /dbu rgyan rtse mor sbyar byas la/ /drangs te rna drung du bkang nas/ /sngags kyis rab tu gdab pa'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): maM many+dzu sh+rI che ge mo ba shaM ku ru ho/ /de yis spros pas bsgrub bya yi/ /mgo dang snying ga lta ba
46a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /gsang ba dang ni rkang mthil du/ /khro bo'i tshig gis rab tu gang ba/ /sngags kyi 'od zer dmar po yi/ /rdo rje gnyis las phyung nas kyang/ /zla ba spyad ldan lta bu'i sems/ /'od zer gyis ni dgug par bya/ /bdag ni skye gnas nas bcug ste/ /ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin
46a6(rgyud 'grel): no/ /yang? shing brgyal bar rab bsgoms te/ /sdeng bo bcad bzhin zhabs 'og 'gyel/ /sbyor ba de yis dus bzhi ru/ /zla ba phyed du rab bsgom na/ /byis pa'i blo ni grags chen pos/ /gsang ba'i bskul ba bsgoms byas pas/ /rdo rje kun gyis rab gsang ba'i/ /rdo rje don ni
46a7(rgyud 'grel): chud par gsungs/ /da nas mngon spyod lam gyi rim pa bshad par bya'o/ /sngon bzhin bzlas ba la sogs pa'i/ /dbang bskur yan chad rdzogs byas te/ /rdo rje khro bo rnal 'byor gyis/ /las 'di rab tu brtsam pa'o/ /dkon mchog gnod byed ma chags pa/ /gdug pa'i
46b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnal 'byor gcod/ /bla ma smos brtson ma rungs ba/ /gtum pa'i yid kyis bsgrub pa'o/ /de rnams bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /sta gri gtun shing lag na 'dzin/ /gnod par byed pa rab brtson pa/ /bsams nas bsam gtan rab tu bya/ /mkha' dbyings
46b2(rgyud 'grel): sems can sangs rgyas kyis/ /yongs su gang bar rab tu bsam/ /gdug pa'i sta re gtun shing gis/ /bsad par rab tu bsams pa'o/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsam/ /sta re gtun shing gis bsad par/ /bsams
46b3(rgyud 'grel): nas dgra rnams myur du 'chi/ /de yis dran rnyed mtshon cha bor/ /skyabs med skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs/ /sdug bsngal dang ldan gzigs byas la/ /snying rje chen pos khro ba bskyed/ /rang lha goms pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /rnal 'byor byas nas gsum pa ru/ /
46b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' 'od zer gyis/ /sangs rgyas tshogs spro bka' lung blang/ /khams bzhugs mgon po rnams kyis ni/ /bdag rtsom las 'di gzigs mdzad phyir/ /gro ba tsandan dkar po sogs/ /las brtsom bris pa snyan du gsol/ /phan mdzad khyed cag rnams
46b5(rgyud 'grel): la ni/ /'di yi thabs 'di ma brtsams na/ /'di ni mnar med skyi g.ya''di'i/ /bud shing du ni 'gyur bar des/ /snying rjer ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /khyod kyi bka' lung bdag cag byed/ /de bas las ni bgyid pa la/ /rdo rje can rnams bdag bka' stsol/ /bdag cag
46b6(rgyud 'grel): khyad par ma mthob par/ /rad? pa kho na dang ldan pas/ /snying rje 'di la phan pa'i phyir/ /khyed kyis bka' stsol byed pa'o/ /god bzhin khro bo'i tshogs sbros pas/ /de dag snyan du rig pa dang/ /sngon bzhin du dang gal bcu yis/ /snyan gsan dbab par bsam pa'o/ /las mdzad 'di
46b7(rgyud 'grel): la khyod kyis ni/ /grogs po mdzad pa rigs pa yin/ /de ltar min na khyed cag 'dir/ /dam tshig 'gal bar gyur pa'o/ /de nas de dag thams cad kyang/ /zhal gyis bzhes par bsam byas nas/ /'khor lo dang bcas nag por bsgyur/ /khros nas bka' yi 'khor
47a1(rgyud 'grel): lo spro/ /bgegs kyi tshogs kun nyan par byos/ /sku gsung thugs la gnas pa yi/ /dpal ldan bdag ni che ge mo/ /bka' yi 'khor lo byed pa'o/ /gal te nga yi bka' 'goms nas/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis/ /'dod ??
47a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed lus 'jig byed de/ /'gas par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /de nas sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /mkha' khyab sangs rgyas zhal bcug ste/ /zhu gyur rdo rje pad+ma ru/ /cho ga bzhin gyis bskyed byas la/ /mi bskyod lta bus dang pos 'khyud/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ral gri zhiT?
47a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i khro bo suM b+ha'i gzugs/ /de yi srungs ma dgug don bskyod/ /snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dbyangs yig 'og la hUM yig steng/ /rdo rje rgya gram kha sbyor phyir/ /sngags 'dis srungs ma dgug pa'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): he suM b+ha ni che ge mo'i srungs ma khugs
47a4(rgyud 'grel): cig dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ de yis dgug la g.yon du bzhag /gnod mdzes de la bcug byas te/ /de yi lus gnas 'khor lo la/ /de yi nyes pa bsgo ba'i phyir/ /dpal ldan gnod mjos mdun du gnas/ /rig pa'i tshogs kyis gsol gdab bya/ /las kun rnam pa
47a5(rgyud 'grel): gang gis ni/ /da lta mthu ni yod 'gyur ba/ /ma 'ongs bde ba 'dod pas na/ /khyod kyis 'di nyid spang bar bya/ /sangs rgyas gsod byed ma chags pa/ /bla ma smod par byed pa'o/ /'di yi srungs dang byin brlabs kyis/ /da lta ru ni spang bar gsol/ /de ltar min na khyed cag
47a6(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /rang gi bstan pa 'di la ni/ /rdzun gyis sgrub po bslus 'gyur bas/ /khyed rnams dam tshig 'gal ba'o/ /de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu/ /bdag gis spangs kyis 'dod bzhin gyis/ /dgyes te bsad dbyung rang lha yi/ /'khor lo ru ni gzhug par
47a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /bsrung ba la sogs rnams dang yang/ /de yi lha rnams mnan bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kun bgegs dgra'i gzugs/ /sngon bzhin phur bus bskyed byas nas/ /g.yas pas tho ba bzung byas nas/ /g.yon pas mgul ba brtan byas te/ /stong pa dran par
47b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir/ /sngags 'dis rab tu btab pa'o/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TaM na phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba du Sh+Ta na ye shes srungs ma phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ro A dzA pa ya ti/ sarba du Sh+Tan ye shes sems dpa' i kA ya wA k+tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ /
47b2(rgyud 'grel): da yis rang gi ye shes sems/ /gnyis su med par 'gyur par bsam/ /skra bshig gcer bu 'bru mar byugs/ /'jigs bcas dran nyams srog med pa/ /me la gnas shing gzi brjod bral/ /skyabs byed srungs mas rnam spangs pas/ /khang stong lta bur bsams nas
47b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /las kyi dngos gzhi la 'jug bya/ /sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /dang po mgon po las byung ba/ /sa bon las skyes kha bzhi ba'i/ /rtsa lnga mgon pos byin gyis brlabs/ /'od zer bde gshegs thams cad la/ /bsgrub bya'i skyon brtsod? de dag kun/ /mi
47b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyod ngo bor khros gyur nas/ /zhugs bzhin des la thim par 'gyur/ /de gnyis zhu bar gyur pa las/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang mi bskyod pa/ /drag po sbrul gyi ska nags can/ /mgon po rten sogs kyis mtshan pa/ /dad po sbyor bas rnam bsgoms te/ /de kho na bzhin
47b5(rgyud 'grel): stag pa sogs/ /sbyor ba gnyis pas bsgom byas te/ /mchod pa sogs kyis ma nyes par bya/ /de nas badzra d+h+rika sogs ni/ /yid kyis brjod pas rab bskul la/ /sangs rgyas zhi ba'i tshul spros pas/ /skrag pa spang phyir dang po dgra/ 'od kyi gong bu tshul du ni/ /sha glan phyir
47b6(rgyud 'grel): na gnas gsum du/ /btsud de rang sngags brjod pa yis/ /ji lta gzugs bzhin sbro bar bya/ /oM a badzra d+h+rika che ge mA ra ya phaT hUM/ sems lus khros pa'i khro bo che/ /mi sdug 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs/ /bsod ba'i don rnams sems dpa' i phyir/ /sta'i tho ba sogs
47b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin sbro/ /gzhan yang gri dang ka pA la 'dzin/ /skra 'greng srin po'i tshogs rnams dang/ /ring du sgra 'byin pa yi tshogs/ /khwa dang bya rog sna tshogs spro /bya rgod lcags kyi chu can dang/ /lcags kyi mche ba can gyi khyis/ /nam mkha' i khams kun gang bar spro/ /bskal ba'i?
48a1(rgyud 'grel): me bzhin 'bar ba yis/ /gru gsum la gnas sngon bzhin du/ /gnas pa'i bsgrub bya de dag gis/ /khros nas rtog cing 'thab pa'i tshul/ /drag po'i tshig gis bskul bar bya/ /sha rnams gcod cing rgyus rkang drangs/ /rus 'chos khrag
48a2(rgyud 'grel): 'thungs rab bsgoms te/ /dus bzhin rab tu brtan byas te/ /nyi ma bdun du bsgrub par bya/ /de ltar bsgoms na dgra rnams 'chi/ /snying rje'i dbang gis 'og bzhin brtsam/ /gal te rmongs pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin yang zla phyed 'chi/ /sngon bzhin thams
48a3(rgyud 'grel): cad rab byas la/ /gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo che /rang gi rdo rje rab brtan la/ /gsum pas las 'di brtsam pa'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): ya mAn+ta krita hUM phaT/ de yi ba spu bu ga las/ /zhi ba'i tshul spros sangs rgyas kyis/ /sems can bsdu ba byas nas su/ /rang gi sku gsung
48a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gzhug /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Tri(rgyud 'grel): wi kritAn na che ge mo na sha ya staM pa ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ brjod pas de dag spre bar bya/ /gshin rje gshed gzugs 'ba' zhig tu/ /spros pas gdug sems dgra bo rnams/ /sngon bzhin gcod pa byed par bsams/ /thun mtshams
48a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ru zhag bdun du/ /brtan pas rab tu chags byas nas/ /ma mo'i bdag gshed yid 'chi na/ /gdug sems ldan pa smos ci dgos/ /rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang/ /bsrung ba'i dam tshig bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /nyin mtshan bzlas pa la sogs brtson /bdud
48a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi la byil pas gdug pa gzhom/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /gdug pa'i dgra bo 'ba' zhig gam/ /'khor los bcas pa bsam byas nas/ /mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): bahh+ni nata kri ta che ge mA ra
48a7(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM phaT/ brjod pa ba spu bu ga las/ /gong ma lta bu'i srin po dang/ /gtum zhing mi bzad khro bo spos/ /me steng gnas pa'i bsgrub bya ni/ /bcings shing brdeg pa la sogs pa/ /de ni skrag par byas par bsam/ /de bzhin 'ug pa khwa ta dang/ /ring du sgra byin pa spros
48b1(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /mig dang rna ba la sogs par/ /rtse zhing deng bar rab bsams te/ /skrag cing 'jigs par bsams gyur nas/ /dgra bo de yi mod la 'chi/ /de bzhin sbrul nag mgo brgya pa/ /re re lce gnyis mche phreng can/ /rgyud dang gnas dug bdag nyid spro/ /dpral bar dug bsams
48b2(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa 'chi/ /yang na bdag gi lag pa ru/ /tho ba rab tu drag po bsam/ /bsgrub bya gong mas mdun bkug la/ /'og ma'i sngags kyis snying gar brdeg /de bzhin lag na gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje sta ra gtun shing sogs/ /bsgrub bya ba shig cing gtub bsams na/ /rdo rje
48b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' 'ang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sngags kyi cha lugs dran byas nas/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs sbyor ba yis/ /spros pa rnams kyis bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sngags 'di brjod par bya ba'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta ka yA wA ka tsit+ta badzra nA oM hu lu hu lu/ taSh+Thi taSh+Thi/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha
48b4(rgyud 'grel): na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ga rdza ga rdza/ bi spo Ta ya bi spo Ta ya/ che ge mo'i srog ji pi tIn+ta ka ra ya phaT/ sngags rgyud sbyin sreg las rnams la/ /'di yi las la de mchog yin/ /phyogs bcu sems can thams cad la/ /'tshe zhing gnod pa 'byung ba yi/ /dgra rnams 'jigs
48b5(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa la/ /bskul ba dam pa 'di mchog yin/ /snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /dang po las byung h+ri bskyod/ /de la tri shUl h+ri yis mtshan/ /de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ /mkha' 'gro'i
48b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs byas h+ri la zhugs /de gnyis rdo rje mkha' 'gror bskyed/ /drag po mi sdug khros pa ni/ /utapal sngon po lta bu la/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar phyag drug pa/ /dang po rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khyud/ /g.yas pa h+ri shUl rdo rje bsnams/ /g.yon pa thod pa rin chen 'dzin/ /nyi ma'i
48b7(rgyud 'grel): gdan la brkyang bskum du/ /khro bo'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bskyed/ /dkon mchog bzhon pa la sogs pa'i/ /bsgrub bya nam mkha' i dbus su ni/ /khaM bskyed dmar gyi rkyal pa ltar/ /brgyangs ba'i ye shes drang byas nas/ /mi bskyod pa ru bskyed byas te/ lus de khang stong lta bur saM/ /
49a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi lce la h+ri bsams te/ /de yi 'od zer mthing ga dang/ /dkar ser dmar po ljang gu'i tshogs/ /lus dang yan lag bzhi ru bsam/ /?? gi mtshan nas tri shul dang/ /rdo rje rin chen phur bu yis/ /?? rab tu phug byas ?? bsam
49a2(rgyud 'grel): gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/ /'od zer lnga yis thod pa ru/ /khrag drang ba ni bsam par bya/ /hUM h+ri khaM badzra d+h+rika ni a nu ka sa ma ya rag ta A kapda ya tsu sha ya hUM/ brtan par zhag bdun thun bzhi ru/ /byas pas sangs rgyas chos sku yang/ /skams par 'gyur na bdug pa kun
49a3(rgyud 'grel): smos ci dgos te de lta yin/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /brgyad kyis dbyug sngon 'og bzhin bskyed/ /mchod pa bzlas pa mnyes byas la/ /sngags brgyud ldan pa'i las bzum? mo/ /sha chen dur khrod sol ba dang/ /bal mi khams sa khre rtsi phug /bsgrub bya'i
49a4(rgyud 'grel): rkang rjes rnams dang ni/ /bung bu'i gcin gyis gzugs brnyan bya/ /de yi snying khar dur ras la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram la/ /gnas pa'i me yi dkyil 'khor te/ /bsgrub bya'i ming dang phreng sngags spel/ /shi ba'i sa bon ston nas su/ /hUM phaT ldan par mi dgug par/ /
49a5(rgyud 'grel): dug khrag ram gyis bra byas la/ /de yo snying gar gzhug ba bya/ /bsgrub bya bkug ste bcug byas nas/ /rabs chad thod kha sbyar bzhag/ shin tu khros pa'i g.yon pa yis/ /mnan te brgya dang brgyad du ni/ /nyi ma'i gung dang nam phyed du/ /bzlas te rdo dang rus pa dang/ /
49a6(rgyud 'grel): rim? pa'i lo ma rnams kyis ni/ /gzugs brnyan de ni mnan par bya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra NAM?/ oM e hye hi b+ha ga ban nI badzra daN+Da ku ru ku ru/ la hu la hu/ hA hA/ ku la ku la/ ku la pA ya ku la pA ya/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha ga ba na/ ba yu be ge na/ /bu dan shi kra na/
49a7(rgyud 'grel): da ha da ha/ ha ra ha ra/ ba ha ba ha/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma ta ma ta/ ma ta pA ya ma ta pA ya/ sarba karma ni tshind+ha tshind+ha/ bind+ha bind+ha/ bak+Sha ya bak+Sha ya/ me ta maM sarba ru d+ha ri/ mam sa med madzdza ru ti pri ya/ oM e hye ha bchi ga ban sarba bag+h+nin/ mu la karma ni/ sarba mu la kra ha na/ ha na
49b1(rgyud 'grel): ha na/ bany+dza bany+dza/ marda marda/ i daM me dz+nyya sya da ya/ hUM nI la ya nI la ya badzra/ d+ha na d+ha na/ du ru du ru/ bi g+ha naM bi nA ya ka nA sha ya/ hu druM hu druM/ d+habdi d+had+ha ya/ sarba man+t+ra na sha truM nan/ h+ri da ya ni/ bri da ya/ tshind+ha tshind+ha/ badyi nan/ tiSh+Tha a nu smra ra ya sa ma ya badzra da ra bci nan/ da ra ??
49b2(rgyud 'grel): ni ni krin+ta hUM/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ du ru du ru/ ku ru ku ru/ phaT phaT/ hUM hUM/ kri dan+ta ya/ de ba ri Shi baryi ka pa ya/ badzra sten che ge mo ma ra ya hUM phaT/ g.yel med pa yis zhag bdun du/ /tshan ma mnan nas bzlas byas pas/ /de yi nyi ma kho na la/ /gdug pa rnams ni gsong
49b3(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /de ru gal te ma grub na/ /nam phyed dus su dur khrod du/ /gang gi gzugs brnyan khyer nas ni/ /mi ro bsreg pa'i thal ba la/ /mngon spyod hoM khung gzhung bzhin byas/ /nim pa'i me ni spar byas nas/ /zhal dang spyan rnams 'gyur pa yi/ /dbyug sngon kha gsangs
49b4(rgyud 'grel): dbus bsams la/ /gzugs brnyan mtshon cha rnon po yis/ /g.yon pa'i rang nas bcad gtubs nas/ /gong gi sngags bzlas sbyin bsreg bya/ /de yi mtshan mo 'chi bar des/ /yang ni khro bo gang rung gi/ bzlas pas sngags pa dag byas la/ /rab tu dben pa'i
49b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas dag tu/ /'bum phrag tu ni rang sngags bzlas/ /ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam/ /khang stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang/ /ling ga gcig pa shing gcig drung/ /mngon spyod las ni brtsam pa'o/ /dbyung sngon can gsungs rdzas la ni/ /gzugs brnyan ming dang bcas
49b6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /gan rkyal du ni bzhag byas te/ /dgug pa sngon 'gro kha sbyar dbye/ /de nas khro bo gang rung gi/ rnal 'byor khros byas khrag chu yis/ /gshed po'i gros ni gyon pa 'am/ /bshang gcis gsher ba'i gos gyon bya/ /gzugs brnyan rkang pas mnan nas ni/ /mngon
49b7(rgyud 'grel): sum bzhin du bsams byas nas/ /rang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzla/ /de bzhin chu dron 'ba' zhig gam/ /bshad gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos/ /ngan pa rus pa di snam pa/ /bgos te sngon bzhin bzlas pa bya/ /de bzhin thal ba'i skyo ma yis/ /gsher ba'i gos gyos
50a1(rgyud 'grel): lus ngan 'khrugs/ /sngon bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang 'jigs par 'gyur/ /yang na gcer bur rab phyung ste/ /skra bshig thur du 'phyang byas te/ /mche gtsigs mig ni bsgyur byas las/ /rkang pas gzugs brnyan
50a2(rgyud 'grel): mnan nas ni/ /sngon bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ /lus ngag yid gsum khros byas nas/ /thun bzhir zhag bdun sogs sbyar bas/ /nam mkha' i dbyings kyang 'jigs par nus/ /yang na gong ma'i gnas de ru/ /rnal 'byor der gnas phur bus gdab/ /ro bsregs
50a3(rgyud 'grel): sol dang thal ba dang/ /chu dogs sa dang phug ma dang/ /rkang rjes dang ni bshad gcis brdzis/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan snying ga ru/ /ske tshe dug dang lan tshwa dang/ /nyungs mar sna tshas dur ras la/ /khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i/ /lte bar sngags dang ming spel ba'i/ /rang
50a4(rgyud 'grel): rang sngags ldan mi dgug par/ /bris nas snying gar bzhug pa'o/ /kha sbyor dbye ba sngon 'gro ba'i/ /dgug pas gzugs la phab nas su/ /mi yi rus pa las byas ba'i/ /sor brgyad pa yi phur bu la/ /rang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /gzugs brnyan snying gar
50a5(rgyud 'grel): btab nas ni/ /dgra yi khyim 'am sgom ?? ni/ /brod la sogs pa sba bar bya/ /sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa/ /shes dang mi shes rnams spangs pa/ /zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyi/ /skams sam yang na 'jigs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsum gyi rnal 'byor gyis
50a6(rgyud 'grel): mngon spyod las la bgegs dgras sbyar/ /dkyil 'khor gsum dang rigs lnga'i las/ /ting 'dzin dag pas byed phyir ro/ /de yi rnal 'byor sngon bzhin bya/ /gzugs brnyan gong ma bzhin byas la/ /dgug pa sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /rtag pa'i sbyor bas las
50a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di? bya/ /mi yi rus pa'i phur bu la/ /sor brgyad rtse mor 'khor lo bsam/ /me tog sngon pos mchod cing ni/ /'khyil ba'i sngags ni rig bcas ??/ /de yis spyi bor btab 'gyur na/ /brtag pa yang ni klad zer can/ /'gyur na bdag sems ?? pa yi
50b1(rgyud 'grel): dgra bo dag ni smos ci dgos/ /de bzhin ser ldeng rtse mo las/ /byas pa'i phur bus pad+ma can/ /byin gyis brlabs bzlas sngon bzhin mchod/ /snying gar btab nas ling ga de/ /thod pa kha sbyar nang bcug ste/ /dur khrod me la gdungs byas na/ /che ba'i nang kyis 'debs byed
50b2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /dpag med rnal 'byor gyis bya'o/ /de bzhin mi bskyod rnal 'byor pas/ /gsong byed lcags byas phur bu la/ /rdo rje rtse mor byin brlabs la/ /mchod cing sngaT? ba? zla? snying gar gdag /me 'bar nang du de bcas bsgyur/ /de yi mod la gang sbyar ba'i/ /sku gsum 'jig par byed
50b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /bdag sems ldan pa smos ci dgos/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sngon bzhin gzugs brnyan rab byas la/ /de mnan khro bo bka' nod bsngo?/ /de nas btang nas bkug ste gzhug /sngon ma'am yams nad 'tsheb? 'am/ /yum du sna tshogs 'byung byed pa/ /
50b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan de la phab nas ni/ /snying ga nas ni rkad pa'i bar/ /de bzhin du ni spyi bo'i bar/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sngags brjod cing/ /gdug dang sdig pa bsal byas nas/ /che ge lus ngag yid gsum la/ /rdo rje phur bus thob ces bya'i/ /sngags ni gong ma bzhin du
50b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /thun bzhir g.yel med zhag bdun du/ /phur bu'i rnam 'phrul 'di bya'o/ /bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'bebs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /phur bu btab na 'ang myur du 'chi/ /de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yi/ /rnal
50b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor sngon bzhin rab byas te/ /kha sbyor dbye ba sngon 'gro ba'i/ /sbyor ba bdun gyis sgrub par bya/ /dur khrod thal ba la sogs la/ /sngon bzhin gzugs dang ming bcas pa/ /dgug pa sngon 'gro dur khrod du/ /skra bzhig gcer bur phyung byas te/ /mtshan ma mnan nas sngon ma yis/ /
50b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzla/ /zhag ni bdun du thun bzhi ru/ /sbyor ba de yis khams gsum 'dzigs/ /ro bsregs thal ba 'ba' zhig la/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs sngon bzhin byas/ /gong ltar stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ /sbyor ba de yi mod la mchi/ /chu 'gram gnyis
51a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sa sogs la/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan rab byas te/ /ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang/ /dug dang da dur snag tshar sbyar/ /dur khrod ras la de yi ming/ /sngags sbel bris nas ming bcug ste/ /gan rgyal mgo ni byang du bstan/ /srang ko ce dang 'byi
51a2(rgyud 'grel): rtseg/ gzhan ma bcos pas de'i lus la/ /til 'bru tsam du btsags byas la/ /bskul ba'i tshig dang sngags bcas pa/ /dgang zhing thun bzhir zhag bdun byas/ /sbyor ba de yis sangs rgyas kyang/ /'jig par 'gyur na gnod sbyin kun/ /smos ci dgos
51a3(rgyud 'grel): te de lta yin/ /rus phye dug dang khrag rnams la/ /gzugs brnyan ming dang bcas byas la/ /sol khur sbangs pa'i gos gon la/ /khros nas rkang pas mnan te bzlas/ /che ge mo rak+Sha seng kra ha ya/ /bskul ba'i tshigs bcad thun bzhi ru/ /zhag bdun bzlas pas
51a4(rgyud 'grel): dgra ba de/ /srin bos khyer bar gdon mi za/ /ske che mar dang bshad gcir sbyar/ /gzugs brnyan yog par blugs byas la/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rkang pa mchog /mi yi 'khor lor byin gyis brlab/ /pra sha dza la che ge mo ma ra ya hUM phaT/ gong gi sngags
51a5(rgyud 'grel): spel thun bzhi ru/ /zhag bdun g.yel med sems kyis bsgrub/ /tsha ba'i nad kyis 'debs par byed/ /gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor bas/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /phran tshegs rdo rje gsang ba yis/ /bsad pa'i las 'di bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rgyus sam dur khrod
51a6(rgyud 'grel): sol ba la/ /de nyid gsum gyi bar bcug pa'i/ /khaM ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ /dur khrod sa la sprul gzugs bri/ /nag po mi sdug 'jigs byed pa/ /'od 'bar sems 'khrugs mche breng gtams/ /lce gnyis myug ma mig bgrad pa/ /mjug ma brdebs pa'i tshul
51a7(rgyud 'grel): can? no/ /de yi kha ru mi thad du bsreg? byed lta bu dmar nag tu/ /gnas pa'i yi ge khaM bsams te/ /de yis sgrul te gnas las bskyed do/ /de yi lce yi rtse mo la/ /h+ri ljang gu yi lcags kyu yis/ /rgyu ba dang ni gnas pa'i dug /ha la ha la la sogs kun/ /bkug ste?
51b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas khyer 'ongs nas/ /lce yi rtse la gzhug par bya/ /de ye khams gsum dug blangs nas/ /de nyid dug gis gang dang bsam/ /o kriSh+Na sarba che ge mo'i dpral grih+Na na? khaM h+ri phaT/ /brjod pas de gsod dpral bar bzung/ /mtshabs? phug ste lces reg? pas/ /rdo rje 'cha? dang
51b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po yang/ /dug gis 'chi nges dogs pa med/ /de kho na bzhin sdig pa dang/ /sre mong bltab la en pa/ /chu sprul rlung sprul la sogs pa/ /sa yi zas can sbal pa yis/ /bsgrub bya 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir/ /bri ba'i rdzas dang gzugs dang bskul/ /gdub pa kun
51b3(rgyud 'grel): nas sbyad btang bas/ /de yis mi'i tshe dogs pa med/ /bshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ldan pas/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /dkon mchog gnod byed gzhom ba'i phyir/ /sbyor ba bzha yis bsgrub par bya/ /oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI wikri ta na na che ge mo pa ta ya hUM phaT/ /de yis dur
51b4(rgyud 'grel): khrod sol? ba la/ /stong rtsa brgyad ni btab nas kyang/ /ro bsregs shul gyi sa la yang/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris bkug ste gzhug /bkas pa'i bsam pas sol ba de?/ /gang gi sngags bzlas spu gri ltar/ /bsams te mgul pa'am spyi bo nas/ /de ltar thun bzhir zhag
51b5(rgyud 'grel): bdun sbyar/ /spyi bo 'gas sam mgo chad par/ /'gyur ba 'di la som nyi med/ /de bzhin de 'dra'i rnal 'byor bas/ /de nyid lag pa g.yas par 'gyur/ /mdun du bsgrub bya'i lus bsams la/ /sngags 'di nyid kyis bsnun zhing rgyab/ /oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TA wikri tA na na che ge mo mu dkar
51b6(rgyud 'grel): a ta ya hUM phaT/ /de yis thun bzhing zhag bdun du/ /bsnun zhing brdungs pas bsgrub bya ste/ /g.yang du lhung nas 'chi bar nges/ /yang ni de yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /g.yas par hUM las byung ba'i/ /rdo rje rtse lngas bsgrub bya yi/ /lus la bsnun zhing rab brjod do/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI wikri ta na
51b7(rgyud 'grel): na che ge mo badzra a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ de yis thun bzhir zhag bdun du/ /kha phye bsnun pas bsgrub bya de/ /srin po la sogs 'jigs par byed/ /de ltar de yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /sngon bzhin sngags btab rdo rgyus sam/ /sol bas dur khrod sa gzhi la/ /bsgrub bya pho mo'i gzuT
52a1(rgyud 'grel): bris la/ /hUM bskyed sta re lab bar bsam/ /khros te mgul par sngags bzlas nas/ /mid pa bcad par bsam pa ni/ /sbyor ba thun bzhir zhag bdun du/ /o h+ri?(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI wikri tA na na che ge mo bAka ti ba ta hUM phaT/ brjod cing g.yel ba med pa yis/ /bzlas
52a2(rgyud 'grel): pas sgrub bya mgul 'gags nas/ /kha zas mi thar nad kyis 'dzin/ /de bzhin bgegs dgra'i sbyor ba yis/ /ro bsregs thal ba rus la sogs/ /khro bo nyi shu 'am de phyed kyis/ /me thab dkyil 'khor gru gsum bya/ /mar chen dud pas kha dog bsgyur/ /kha bye rdo rje rtse
52a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum pas/ /dbus su kha khyer gsum byas te/ /cher ma'i me ni khros nas sbar/ /bshad pa'i cho gas me lha bskyed/ /gong gsungs rdzas byas gzugs brnyan gtub/ /de yi zhal du lan gsum du/ /gang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul bar bya/ /de yi ye shes sems dpa' ru/ /
52a4(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhal gdangs pa/ /hUM ljags mcha ba rnon po can/ /khro dang ldan pa sngon bzhin bsams/ /srog song steng ngam sra ba 'am/ /yang na ci yang med pa ru/ /rkang pas rkang pa mnan nas su/ /sos ni so yang 'cha' bar byed/ /ba lang sha dang khyi yi sha /zangs phud can
52a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs sha rnams ni/ /bsgrub bya'i yan lag tu bsam la/ /gong ma'i sngags kyis sbyin bsreg bya/ /sha chen 'ba' zhig khe na la/ /dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /de yi zhal du sbyin sreg byas/ /rdo rje las byung 'jig par bshad/ /sngon bzhin dgra yi gzugs
52a6(rgyud 'grel): brnyan la/ /bshad gci 'bru mar bcas byugs nas/ /sngon gsungs sngags dang bskul bar bsam/ /tsher ma'i me la khros te bsreg /thun bzhir zhag bdun brgya rtsa brkyang/ /bzlas bas sangs rgyas kyis sbyar ba'i/ /las kyang 'jig na dgra bo yi/ /sbyar ba'i las ni smos ci
52a7(rgyud 'grel): dgos/ /bsad pas de dag thams cad kun/ /thugs rjes gzung phyir rnal 'byor ches/ /gnyis bral 'das pa'i de ma thag /'jug pa'i las 'di brtsams pa'o/ /de dag rnams kyis dngos po rnams/ /ma skyes par ni gzhigs nas kyang/ /'bras bu myong bar des pI
52b1(rgyud 'grel): dus/ /ye shes rang rig chen po mchog /sa bon 'od zer gyis bkug nas/ /zhal du zhugs nas zhu 'gyur te/ /rdo rje lam byung pad+mar gnas/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i gzugs gyur la/ /spyan sogs lha mos bskul ba la/ /hUM las rdo rje hUM gis mtshan/ /spro bsdus mi bskyod
52b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjer bskyed/ /chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab/ /rang las dgu gnyis drug phyung nas/ /gnyis dang gsum du rdzogs byas la/ /dang po rtog pa yongs dag phyir/ /sngags kyis phur bu dbyung bar bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra ki lo ta kI la ya hUM/ phyung nas de yi gnas su yang/ /rang gi ye shes
52b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo can/ /gnas bcas bsams nas 'od zer gyis/ /sngon bzhin rang dgra sangs rgyas su/ /bskyed dang des bskyed lha mo'i chogs/ /bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yis/ /dbang bskur de dang bla mar bcas/ /zhugs pas rdo rje sems dpar bskyed/ /oM badzra d+h+rika sngags kyis
52b4(rgyud 'grel): byung ste/ /mdun du rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng/ /'khor lo bcas pa mos byas la/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya/ /a ho yaM gis sngags brjod pas/ /rlung gis bteg nas mngon dga' ru/ /gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags 'phangs pas/ /de bdag sras su skye bar nges
52b5(rgyud 'grel): rang rang lha yi sbyor ba 'am/ /de yi gnas pa gang rung du/ /blo gros ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sbyor ba de kho na yis bya/ /gnyis po rang zhugs de ma thag/ de yi ye shes rang lha'am/ /zhe sdang dag pa'i sbyor kho nas/ /gong ma bzhin du rab tu brtsam/ /bdag med sems med
52b6(rgyud 'grel): bems po ni/ /lan gsum gyi ni gzhig byas pas/ /gong gi sbyor bas 'bras bu che/ /'jug tu brtsam mi dgos par 'byung/ /de ltar thabs dang sngags ldan pas/ /'khor ba'i 'og ma'i rgyu ldan pa/ /bsang bas rang dang gzhan dag pas/ /ma 'khrul ba ru gsungs pa'o/ /
52b7(rgyud 'grel): srad pa zhe sdang gis slad pa'i/ /sems kyis gsod ba'i gti mug can/ /thabs med ye shes dang bral bas/ /thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro/ /da ni gnas nas spo ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /gnyis kyis rab
53a1(rgyud 'grel): tu bsgrub byas pa/ /gsum pa las 'di brtsam pa'o/ /thod pa srubs ni gang ba dag /pho dang mo yi bskrad pa la/ /de yi rigs pas btsal byas la/ /gnod byed yul gzhan 'byung bar bya/ /a ri le ma'i khu ba dang/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i
53a2(rgyud 'grel): srin lag khrag/ snag tshar byas te bya rgod kyi/ /sgro rtsa'i smyu gus bri bar bya/ /'gar ba'i dur khreng ras ma la/ /gzhu 'dra rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng/ /ral gri yi ni mtshan pa bri/ /de steng bsgrub bya'i gzugs gzhan la/ /gong gi ras la de yi ming/ /sngags kyi bar bcug
53a3(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo'i/ /uts+tsha Ta ya phaT bris la/ /de yi snying gar gzhug bar bya/ /bkug ste bcug nas de bkris la/ /thod pa ru ni bcug byas te/ /khro bo'i tshig gis rang rang sngags/ /rigs dang bcas par brgya rtsa brgyad/ /thun bzhir zhag bdun bzlas byas nas/ /khyim
53a4(rgyud 'grel): mam grod dam sgo dag tu/ /sbas te bzhag na dus de ru/ /sangs rgyas dpung yang skrod par 'gyur/ /de bzhin tA la'i lo ma la/ /gro ga 'am shog shog ras la sogs/ /snod med cho gas gong ma ltar/ /stong rtsa brgyad ni rig bcas bzlas/ /dgra yi khyim mam
53a5(rgyud 'grel): sgo dag tu/ /sbas te bzhag na myur ba ru/ /dkon mchog 'joms pa'i dgra bo che/ /skams sam 'chi 'am skrod par nges/ /las de bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yi/ /sbyor ba yis kyang rab tu bsgrub/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /cho ga 'di ni rab tu brtsam/ /rgyal
53a6(rgyud 'grel): mchen ras mchig gang la/ /gru bzhi lha ma bar kha ti dang/ /a ri sha yi lo ma dang/ /ro sregs smyo byed sol ba dang/ /mu zi'i dug dang rkang g.yon gyi/ /ming med khrag la snag tshar byas/ /khwa yi gshog pa'i smyu gu yi/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra la/ /phyogs
53a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi mchems brgyad rtse bstan pa'i/ /ral gri brgyad ba'i 'khor lo la/ /de dbus bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris la/ /de yi snying gar phreng sngags ni/ /gong gi rig pa dang bcas pa/ /dgug med bris nas snying gar glan/ /bkug ste bcug nas rkang g.yon gyis/ /a? nan te
53b1(rgyud 'grel): brgya dang rtse brgyad bzlas/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra naM/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ mahA daM Sh+TO Ta/ ka Ta b+hai rab ya/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu/ pA sha ha ta ya/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li kha kha kha hi kha hi/ hiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ ba ca ba ca/ gardza gardza ??
53b2(rgyud 'grel): Ta ya/ bi spho Ta ya/ sarba bag+hIn/ bi nA ya ka nAM/ che ge mo uts+tsha Ta ya phaT/ de yang phyag 'tshal 'jug tu yang/ /bskul ba 'di ni bya ba dang/ /phyag 'tshal bskul dang bod pa dang/ /las brgyad de dag tu shes bya/ /de ltar bsngags nas ras ma de/ /ma mo la sogs
53b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas su sba/ /sangs rgyas dpung yang skrod byed na/ /bgegs kyi gnod pa smos ci dgos// //da ni bsgrub bya srin po la sogs bas/ /'dzin du gzhug pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /gzhan gyi
53b4(rgyud 'grel): mi thub rnal 'byor gyis/ /gsum pa'i dus su rdzas ldan par/ /cho ga 'di yis las 'di byed/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun dang/ /shi ba'i thod pa gnyis btsal la/ /dur khrod kyi ni sol ba la/ /khro bo'i sngags ni rigs bcas bzlas/ /de yi thod par srin
53b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i gzugs/ /'jigs rung gyen brdzes mche gcigs pa/ /sha rlon za zhing khrag 'jag ba/ /g.yas g.yon ro langs gri dang ni/ /sdigs mdzub bye ba hUM bskyed bri/ /de yi snying gar rus phye dang/ /dug dang mthe'u chung khrag gis mi /che ge mo ni zud zhig bri/ /yang ni
53b6(rgyud 'grel): thod pa gnyis pa la/ /bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes sa dang ni/ /ro bsregs sa dang thal ba dang/ /sol ba gcin gyis sbrus byas la/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su/ /dug dang rus phye mdzub mo khrag /mid dang sngags bcas ta ler bris/ /de yi snying gar gzhug par bya/ /
53b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyig bkug ste bcug byas nas/ /de ni 'og bzhag gong ma steng/ /srin po de yis bsgrub bya rnams/ /bzung bar bsams nas khros byas te/ /nag po gnyis las dur khrod du/ /nam phyed sod nas bsgred byas te/ /sngags bzlas srin bos 'dzin par 'gyud/ /na ma:
54a1(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta nan/ kA ya waka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM hUM dzin ri ta che ge mo rak+Sha g+hih+na hUM phaT/ de bzhin sbrul dang seng ge dang/ /'byung po sdig la sogs pa rnams/ /cho ga gong bzhin gnyis par bri/ /gong gi sngags de rig bcas bzla/ /g.yel med gnyis
54a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi mtshan dus su/ /khros nas bsgreng zhing bzlas byas pas/ /gal te mi bskyod yin na yang/ /de dag rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de dag thar bar byed 'dod pas/ /'dzin byed de dag thams cad kun/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la bsdus byas la/ /rkang pa gnyis kyis mnye bar
54a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /lag gnyis 'bar ba'i rdo rjer bskyed/ /de yis byugs pas bdug par bya/ /rdo rje 'bar bas brdung ba dang/ /sngon gyi sngags bzlas lcug mas gdab/ /che ge mo rak+Sha sa 'di phyi mo tsa ya/ /srin mo ma rungs gtum po dang/ /'jigs pa chen pos 'khrugs pas/ /sbyor ba
54a4(rgyud 'grel): de yis rab sbyar na/ /cho ga bzhin du grol bar byed// //da ni dgug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /lha yis dbang bskur yan chad ni/ /thams cad gong ma bzhin byas la/ /bsam gtan 'khor
54a5(rgyud 'grel): los dgug par bsgrub/ /rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo chen po rnam bar bsam/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la/ /lcags kyu gnas ni bsgom par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): dza ni dzika che ge mo sems can nam sems can ma yin pa A karSha ya dza brjod pas de
54a6(rgyud 'grel): las rab 'phros pas/ /lcags kyu zhags pas mtshan pa yi/ /lha yi sku ni mang po dag/ bsgrub bya 'gugs phyir spro bar bya/ /dgug bya ming gi yi ges bskyed/ /yaM byung rlung dkyil la bzhag ste/ /lcags kyus snying btab zhags pas bcings/ /rlung gis bteg nas
54a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'bar bsam/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo sogs/ /mtshan ma'i lha rnams spros byas nas/ /de yis btab pas de bzhin du/ /dgug par the tshom med pa'o/ /laM gis phab ste mdun bzhag nas/ /sngon bzhin lha mo gnyis kyis ni/ /'tshe ba bzlog nas? bka' nod
54b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /de ltar sbyor bas zhag bdun du/ /thun bzhir rab tu sbyar byas nas/ /dgug las mi 'da' kun gyis kyang/ /sgrub po las thabs byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin mi bskyod rdo rje dang/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'od dpag med/ /'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ba yis
54b2(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu gnas sam rang sngags brjod/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra d+h+rika che ge mo A karSha ya dza/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): ro lika che ge ma A karSha ya dza/ gzhan kun sngon bzhin dpag byas la/ /thun bzhir zhag bdun sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gsum gyi nus pa yang/ /'gugs
54b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bsgrub bya smos ci dgos/ /sems kyi spyod pa gzhan bral bas/ /rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /de yi bsam gtan 'ba' zhig gis/ /dgug pa dag ni thabs su gsungs/ /dga' dang dga' ba bar ma yin/ /bskyed pa gang du mngon byas
54b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /bsgrub bya ye shes ngo bo ru/ /byas te gnyis par chung byas te/ /ma 'phros rtse gcig pa yis bzung/ /ye shes gsum gyis sku gsum mchog /de yi rgyud la 'gugs 'gyur na/ /sngags rgyud la sogs bsgrub bya ni/ /smos ci dgos te de
54b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog yin/ /de bas rnam pa thams cad du/ /las rnams kun 'di bsten pa yis/ /lus sogs med pa 'ang dgug sogs 'gyur/ /gshin rje gshid kyi rnal 'byor bas/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /rang gi sngags kyis rig pa
54b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog /grangs med bzlas pa rab tu bya/ /de nas lung rtsal thob pa yis/ /'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa bya/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris byas la/ /lha yis dbang bskur bar gyis zhugs/ /bud med gzhon nu'i thod pa ni/ /ma chags cing ni ma
54b7(rgyud 'grel): gas pa/ /pad+ma ltar mdzes yid du 'ong/ /dum bu gcig pa blangs byas nas/ /gi wang la ni sngags bzlas nas/ /rlung gis dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bris te/ /lte bar dgug par bya ba ni/ /gur gum go ro tsa nas bri/ /gro ga shog
55a1(rgyud 'grel): shog la sogs la/ /phred sngags 'di ni mi dgug par/ /swAhA bton te dza bcug nas/ /bskul ba dang bcas bris nas ni/ /de yi snying gar glan par bya/ /thod pa de yang kha sgpu nas/ /gshin rje gshed kyi zhabs g.yas brgyad/ /g.yon
55a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bskum bas mnan byas la/ /khro dang bcas bas gsang sngags 'di/ /rdo rje gsum dang bcas bsam par/ /lan gsum drag tu brjod par bya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta/ ka ya wA ka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Tan satA dam ka/ /a si mu sa la pa ra
55a3(rgyud 'grel): shu ?? sha ha stA ya/ tsa turb+hu dza tsa turmu kha/ Sho Da sha tsa rA ya/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ sarba duSh+Ta na prA NAM a ha ri ni/ mahA bid+hA na bi nA ya ka/ bi kri tA na na sarba b+hu ta b+ha yi ka ra ya/ A gat+ta ha sa da da ni/ byA g+h+ra tsad ma Ni pa sa na/ /ku ru ku ru/ sarba karma tshind+ha tshind+ha/ sarba man+t+raM/
55a4(rgyud 'grel): b+hind+ha? b+hind+ha?/ pa ra mu traM/ bu mo ce ge A karSha ya A karSha ya/ sarba bu ta/ ni rma tha ya ni rma tha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta na/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ maN+Da laM be bi be ba swAhA/ dzEe bi tAn+ta ki pra ya/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma karyaM/ ma ma karyaM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma bi laM ba ma bi laM ba/ sa ma ya ma nu sma
55a5(rgyud 'grel): ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ spho Ta ya spho Ta ya/ sarba nA sha ya sha ni suM ka ra ka pa he he b+ha ga ban/ kiny+tsi ra ya si ma ma anwa sA d+ha yadzdza/ de las 'phros pa'i gshin rje gshed/ /lcags kyu thogs pa mang po yis/ /sngon bzhin rlung dkyil la gnas pa'i/ /bsgrub bya bud med dgug
55a6(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /skreg pas 'cho ba bzlog pa'i phyir/ /sgyan ma'i sngags kyis sngon bzhin du/ /ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ /mA ma kI ni sbyor bas gsung/ /de bzhin skyes pa'i thod pa la/ ]/g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum pas mnan te/ /cho ga sngon bzhin rab yas te/ /skyes
55a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyang dgug par byed/ /bsam stan sngags rgyud sbyor ba yis/ /zhag bdun thun bzhir rab brtsams nas/ /gshin rje gshed kyi yon tan yang/ /dgugs 'gyur gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po khro bo che/ /

55b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /'og nas 'byung bzhin rab bsgoms la/ /lha chen chung mar bcas pa dgug /skyes pa'i thod pa ma gas pa/ /mdzes shing srubs med gsal/ /'thab tshe g.yul du shi ba yi/ /skyon med pa de btsal bar bya/ /rkang pa g.yas pa'i sor mo'i khrag /lan tshwa bud?
55b4(rgyud 'grel): kar ski? tshal/ /snag che byas nas bya rgod rkad?/ /lha chen chung mar bcas pa kun/ /thod pa de la bri bar bya/ /de yi snying gar gong ma ltar/ /rig bcas sngags ni dgug par bya/ /bris nas snying gar glan par bya/ /bkug ste bcug nas khas spub la/ /g.yon bskum g.yas brkyang
55b5(rgyud 'grel): sa mnan na/ /sngags 'di thun bzhir zhag bdun du/ /rig ba dang bcas bzlas dgug bya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta/ kA ya wa k+tst+ti badzra NAM/ a tsa la ga na tse ta/ na TA na TA/ no Ta mo Ta/ so ta so ta/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ sa ha sa ha/ ha na ha na/ taSh+Thi taSh+Thi/ a bi sha a bi sha/ ma hA ma da ta
55b6(rgyud 'grel): la la ka/ b+hu na b+hu na/ nyi ni nyi ni/ kha da kha da/ pig+ha naM ma ra ma ra duSh+Ta na na/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sardaM ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ mahA bi sha badzra spho Ta ya spho Ta ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ tri ba li baM ga na rta ya/ aM haM aM haM/ a tsa la tsa ta/ spa ta ya spa ta ya/ hUM hUM/ a sa man+ti ka/ tra ta ma hA ba la/
55b7(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya man+t+ri na/ haM maM shu ta bu lo ka du sh+ya du/ badzra na mo sta pri ti ha ha ba la bya/ /dza la ya tra ta a sa ha na na ma/ lha chen po bud med dang bcas pa A karSha yadzdza/ sngags las byung ba'i khro bo che/ /lcags kyu thogs pas 'gugs bsams nas/ /sngon bzhin rab mchod
56a1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba yis/ /g.yog dang chung ma'i bya ba byed/ /de bzhin lha min la sogs kyang/ /sbyor ba de yis rab bsgrubs na/ /skrag cing 'jigs pa gong mas bsrung/ /kha sbyar lus su bcas pa 'grub/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /'og nas
56a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i cho ga yis/ /gnod mjos rgyal po bsgoms byas te/ /bu mo rnams ni dgug par bya/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa/ /rgyal mtshan gyur pa'i thod pa la/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i ming med khrag /snag tsha byas nas ne co sgros/ /bsgrub bya'i du mo'i gzugs
56a3(rgyud 'grel): bris la/ /de'i snying gar gong ma ltar/ /rig bcas sngags bri glan byas la/ /de yi b+ha gar gnod mdzes kyi/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mnan/ /thun bzhir zhag bdun gsang sngags 'di/ /bskul dang bcas pas khros byas nas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du gzas? pa ro/ /
56a4(rgyud 'grel): oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha bu mo che ge mo hUM/ grih+Na grih+Na bu mo che ge mo hUM/ grih+Na pa ya grih+NA pa ya/ bu mo che ge mo hUM/ A na ya ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga ban bi dya rA dza bu mo che ge mo hUM phaT dzdza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /gnod mdzes gyur pa lcags kyu zhags/ /thogs pa 'bros bas
56a5(rgyud 'grel): rlung dkyil la/ /gnas pa'i bu mo snying ga phug /zhags pas ske nas bcings nas ni/ /'ongs pa'i tshe na bzlog pa'i phyir/ /zhing dang bsrung bas brtan byas pas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed/ /gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya/ /
56a6(rgyud 'grel): kha ti la sogs bsgrub byas la/ /skyes pa bud med dgug pa bsgrub/ /zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe/ /btsag gam rdo rgyus la sogs pa/ /rang gi kha ru bcug nas kyang/ /de nyid gsum bskyed lha ru bsam/ /de bar rang sngags bcug nas ni/ /spa ra Na yis spro byas pas
56a7(rgyud 'grel): de las byung ba'i lha rnams ni/ /lcags kyus mtshan pas nam mkha' dgang /bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun bsdus nas/ /rdzas kyis lha la bstim bar bya/ /brtan pa'i ngo bos yang dang yang/ /zla ba grol byi bar du gzung/ /de nas brtsams te thun bzhin ru/ /zhag bdun goms
56b1(rgyud 'grel): byas de bton pa/ /tshangs pa drag po la sogs lha/ /gang gi ming rnams bris 'gyur na/ /rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /skrag cing 'jigs nas 'ongs 'gyur na/ /tha mal skyes pa bud med sogs/ /smos tsa dgos par 'od bar 'gyur/ /sngon bshin? bzlas pa la sogs
56b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /dbang bskur yan chad zhugs byas te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i/ /thor tshugs gcig ya bsgom par bya/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbu ma sngo/ /dang pos rang gi thabs la 'khyud/ /g.yas gnyis gri dang ral gri dang/ /g.yon gnyis thod ba nor bu bsnams/ /
56b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnams ku ni phyas rnam brgyan pa/ /rnam par smin sogs mos pa yis/ /rnga sgra dang na ldan byas na/ /cung zad mche gtsigs dmigs par bya/ /mtshams thung mi smrar gyur pa yi/ /thod pa klu shing me tog dang/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i ming med khrag /bsres te 'o mar sbyar
56b4(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /de yi sgra yi bar gyis na/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi/ /nor rgya la sogs bu mo bri/ /de yi snying gar rig sngags ni/ /bskul ba dang bcas bris te glan/ /bkug ste bcug nas g.yas brkyang ste/ /g.yon bskum pa yis gnas byas la/ /sngags 'di brgya
56b5(rgyud 'grel): dang rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /oM A badzra shu li ni klu'i bu mo che ge mo A karSha ya dzdza/ brjod pas gsum las byung ba yi/ mdud can nam ni lcags kyus mtshan/ /rlung dkyil la gnas bsgrub bya ni/ /bcug ste sngon bzhin 'tshe ba zlog/ /da ltar zhag bdun thun bzhi ru/ /sngags rgyud
56b6(rgyud 'grel): de yis rab sbyar nas/ /klu yi bu mo mig bzad ngag /bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i/ /khro gnyer ma yi sbyor ba yis/ /nam mkha' i rigs 'dzin bu mo dgug /dmar skya g.yas sngo g.yon dkar ba/ /dang po
56b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi thabs? la 'khyung/ /g.yas gnyis pad+ma ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen 'khor lo 'dzin/ /gsum po mos pas dpag med mtshan/ /se ral thod pa'i phreng brgyan/ /rgyan kun brgyan pa'i na bza' klubs/ /mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa bsgom/ /rgyal po 'dra
57a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bu mo yi/ /thod par rigs 'dzin bu mo'i gzugs/ /rung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas ba/ /gong gi rdzas kyis bri bar bya/ /snying gar sngon bzhin ming bris nas/ /bkug ste bcug nas g.yas brkyang dang/ /g.yon bskum pa yis
57a2(rgyud 'grel): mnan byas la/ /'di ni brgya dang rtsa gcig bzla/ /oM ba yan sha ni tra sa pra b+he ni tra ya tras ya/ be ti pe ra ti/ shthe pa ti shthe pe ta/ dza ti ni rig pa 'dzin a'i bu mo che ge mo A karSha ya dzdza/ brjod pas sngags las byung ba'i/ /khro gnyer lcags kyus mtshan pa
57a3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog /gser gyi rna rgyan 'chad ba rnams/ /bkug ste 'ongs ba rgyas btab bo/ /lhun gyis grub pa gnyis mi dgos/ /thun bzhir zhag bdun sbyar na 'grub/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas/
57a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /mar ngo bcu bzhi tshes brgyad la/ /ro bsregs sol ba blangs nas ni/ /sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad du ni/ /bzlas nas srin po la sogs pa/ /ming bcas grog la sogs la/ /bris nas de yis dgug par byed/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI wi kri
57a5(rgyud 'grel): tA na na srin po la sogs pa che ge mo skyes pa 'am/ bud med 'di bdag la byin zhig staM pa ya hUM phaT dzdza/ brjod cing de mnan thun bzhi ru/ /bdun spyar srin po la sogs pas/ /rang gis bka' stsal gang yang rung/ /khrid nas nges par 'bul bar byed/ /'das ma thag
57a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /ji skad bshad pa'i phyag rgya mchog /bslub? phyir spyin sreg chog bya/ /dur khrod thal bas sol pa la/ /ho ma khung gru gsum khru do pa/ /zabs su khru gang kha khyer ni/ /sor mo brgyad pa'i tshad du bya/ /rdo rje rtse
57a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum sor bcu gnyis/ /rtse dbus lcags kyu ltar byas nas/ /dbus dang kha khyer la bkong do/ /dmar nag kha khyer rams kyis byug/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i gshin rje gshed/ /hUM bskyed rdo rje lce ldan pa'i/ /zhal du nges par bsgyur byas la/ so so cha sogs
57b1(rgyud 'grel): me sbar ro/ /dug ni khrag dang rab tu sbyar/ /lan tshwa ske tshe de bzhin sbyar/ /du du a yi 'bras bu yis/ /zhag du bsreg cing lus dang dag /khro zhing bsgrub bya'i ming bcas pa'i/ /sngags 'di stong dang rtsa brgyad du/ /blo dang ldan pas g.yel med pas/ /
57b2(rgyud 'grel): zla zhing sbyin bsreg brtsam pa'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Ti wikra tA na na bu mo che ge mo staM pa ya na sha ya hUM hUM phaT dzdza/ de las 'phros pa'i gshin rje gshed/ /lcags kyu thogs pa 'phros byas pas/ /rlung dkyil la gnas bu mo yi/ /snying gar sbyar te dgug par
57b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /nyi ma'i gung dang nam phyed na/ /'di ni shis pa'i dus yin pas/ /blo dang ldan pas sbyor ba des/ /nyi ma gsum dang drug tu bya/ /'ongs pas 'tsho ba bzlog pa'i phyir/ /sngon bzhi ma ni dang srung ba bya/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum du 'ang/ /de yis rtag
57b4(rgyud 'grel): tu 'dul bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sam ni chos 'dzin nam/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gang yang rung/ /gal te rmongs pas bzla na? ni/ /de yi tshe ni der zad 'gyur// //da ni klu skams pas char bcad par bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /sngon
57b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid/ /kha dog ser po bsgoms byas la/ /char mi bcad pa 'gog pa bya /yul yul kun nas phyogs gcig ste/ /hUM bskyed sna tshogs rdo rje ni/ /rab 'bar me stag 'phro ba ni/ /'dod pa'i phyogs ni
57b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yogs par bsam/ /de yi lte bar hUM bskyed pa'i/ /rdo rje rtse lnga 'greng bu ni/ /ta la'i tshad tsam me 'bar ba'i/ /bum par rten gyi dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de ru gong gi sbyor ba ni/ /'khor lo dang bcas de bzhin bsgom/ /bdag ci 'dra bar 'khor rnams kyang/ /brjod
57b7(rgyud 'grel): pas bsams te sngags 'di bzlas/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ma hA ba ra sha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de rnams ba spu bu ga las/ /'phros pa'i 'od zer ser po yis/ /'dod pa'i phyogs ni khyab bsams pas/ /sna tshogs rdo rje me yis ni/ /sa gzhi thams cad bsregs nas ni/ /klu
58a1(rgyud 'grel): skams 'gyur zhing 'bros bsams na/ /rang 'dod gnas las phyi rol du/ /'bab bam 'on te mi 'bab 'gyur/ /yang na sbyor ba des gnas la/ /ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang/ /dug dang da du ra dag gis/ /dur khrod ras la 'khrul
58a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bri/ /dang po pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /klu brgyad nam gi sa bon nam/ /rang rang snying po bri ba'o/ /phu phaM phe pho pha phi phi/ /snying po phaT gnyis bar du ni/ /chu yi snying po bA bris la/ /de rnams bkug ste sa bon la/ /bcug ste gsal bar bsgom par bya/ /yang
58a3(rgyud 'grel): ni ras ma gnyis pa la/ /las kyi rdo rje ser po ni/ /'od zer 'bar ba pri byas la/ /lte bar rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /hUM gis mtshan pa bri bar bya/ /geng gi sbyor bas byin brlabs la/ /dang po ras ma bkan te bzhag /ras ma gnyis pa khas spub nas/ /rdo la sogs pa
58a4(rgyud 'grel): mnan byas pas/ /gong ma'i sngags ni bzlas brjod bya/ /klu rgyal 'bum ni khros gyur yang/ /char pa 'gog pa'i mchog yin no// //da ni pha rol gyi dag dang dpung gnon pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /snga ma bzhin du
58a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad byas/ /ting 'dzin 'di yis zhag bdun du/ /thun bzhir gzugs brnyan gcig sbyar bya/ /'phral du mngon du phyis byed 'gyur/ /gang yang rung ba'i sbyor ldan pas/ /gcer bu la sogs phyir rgol rnams/ /ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed/
58a6(rgyud 'grel): spobs pa mnan phyir de yi mgod/ /laM la dbang chen ser po la/ /gwa bzhir rdo rjes mtshan par bsam/ /de steng haM byung las rdo rje/ /de steng paM bskyed pad+ma la/ /gzhal yas khang pa ji bzhin bsam/ /de dbus khro bo'i 'khor lo che/ /kha dog ser po bsgoM
58a7(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /de ni gnon par rnam par bsam/ /kan gyi dbus su haM bskyed pa'i/ /sna tshogs rdo rje kha bzhi yis/ /gsum pos spyi bos rna ba? yis/ /lkog mar phug bsam sngags bzla'o/ /de nyid gsum par rang rang sngags/ /che ge ba sha pa ya hUM/ /brjod
58b1(rgyud 'grel): cing bltas pas bsgrub bya de/ /mig mi blta zhing smra mi nus/ /gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'di yang sngon bzhin rab sbyar nas/ /gang tshe dpung tshogs mthong ba yi/ /de che las la yang dag sbyar/ /dpung rnams kun gyi spyi bo ru/ /sa sogs rten ni sngon bzhin bskyed?
58b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo thams cad khro bo che/ /pad+ma ser po mdog ltar bsgom/ /ri yi rgyal po tsam bsams te/ /de nyid gsum par rang rang sngags/ /ba hu pa ya hUM zhes brjod/ /dpung rnams sa 'og 'bying bar 'gyur/ /khro bo rnams ni phar bltas sam/ /ba hu bi ra hUM zhes brjod/ /
58b3(rgyud 'grel): de dag phyir ni mi ldog par/ /'bros par rab tu gyur pa'o/ /gal te khro bo rang mdun bltas/ /ba hu grihTA hUM zhes brjod/ /de ni 'bros par byed 'dod kyang/ /mdung bzhin du ni rengs par 'gyur/ /tshu rol pham par byed 'dod pas/ /gnyi ga mdun gyi phyogs byas pas/ /
58b4(rgyud 'grel): ba hu e hi hUM brjod pas/ /pha rol rgyal bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar sbyor ba'i rnam pa yis/ /g.yel ba med par sbyar 'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas dpung yang gnod byed na/ /mi dbang la ni dgos pa med/ /yang ni sngon bzhin rab byas la/ /gang tshe dpung tshogs mthob 'gyur nas/ /
58b5(rgyud 'grel): de rmongs bya phyir phur bu yi/ /bsam gtan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /hUM las bskyed pa'i phur bu ni/ /steng ni rtse lnga 'og rtse gcig /sor brgyad tshad tsam rab bsams la/ /ded dpon dang pos dpung rnams bskyed/ /thams cad snying ni phyogs bsams nas/ /de ni rdo rje tho ba yis/ /khro
58b6(rgyud 'grel): shing thams cad phog bsams la/ /sngags 'dis rab tu gdab pa'o/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya/ dpung thams cad phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ dpung thams cad/ phaT hUM hUM hUM/ badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ro a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ dpung thams cad kA ya wA ga tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT
58b7(rgyud 'grel): khros pa bzla zhing btab 'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas dag gi dpung dag kyang/ /ting 'dzin de yis 'jig 'gyur na/ /mi yi dbang po smos ci dgos// //da ni char dpa' pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /'og byung ba yi ra mi pa yis/ /stobs po che
59a1(rgyud 'grel): yi rnal 'byor pas/ /grang med bzlas pas bka' lung thob/ /'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa bya/ /thams cad dmar por rab bsams la/ /rdza phor so ni ma btang la/ /ral gri rtsa brgyad 'khor lo la/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad po bri/ /de la ram sa?
59a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi khu pa yis/ /rdo rje thor tshugs gcig ma yi/ /sngags kyi snying po 'dri bri'o/ /oM shu li ni naM swA hA bri/ /de dang 'dra ba'i kham phor bzhag /kha sbyar skud pa sngon dmar dkri/ /de dang des 'dul rab bkug ste/ 'khor lo 'di la gnas par bsam/ /de ni ji bzhin gzhan mthal
59a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /mchod pa tshogs kyis mchod byas nas/ /klu gnas mtsho dang rdzing bu sogs /gzhan la gsangs nas gzhug pa'o/ /bdag nyid gnas dgon dben pa ru/ /sa sogs cho ga sngon 'gro bas/ /me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum steng/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam bri/ /chu
59a4(rgyud 'grel): yi dkyil 'khor zlum po ste/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad po ni/ /phyogs dang mtshams ni ma 'khrul par/ /sbrul brgyad phyi rol snol mar bri/ dbus su chu bdag dkar po che/ /sbrul mgo bdun pa zhabs klu gcig /skyes bu'i gdong can sbrul zhags bsnams/ /lto 'phye mkha' 'gro zhon
59a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bri/ /shar gyi 'dab mar mdza' yas ljang/ /utpal thogs ba bri bar bya/ /lho yi 'dab mar nor rgyas dkar/ /rin chen bum thogs bri bar bya/ /nub kyi 'dab mar 'jog bo dmar/ /dgra sta thogs pa bri bar bya/ byad du ka rko Ta nag po/ /sbrul gshog thogs ba bri bar
59a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ nub phyogs 'dab mar pad+ma dkar/ /pad+ma thogs pa bri bar bya/ /bden bral 'dab mar pad chen dkar/ /pad dkar thogs pa bri bar bya/ /rlung mtshams 'dab mar dung skyong ser/ /dung phor thogs pa bri bar bya/ /dbang ldan rigs ldan sna tshogs pa/ /rgyal bu 'dzin pa bri
59a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /de dag kun kyang sgrul mgo gdengs/ /zhabs kyang sbrul 'khyil sbrin gyis ni/ /gdan la bzhugs pa bri bar bya/ /g.yo ba drag po la sogs ba/ /rang rang phyogs su brgyad pa ni/ /zur dang sgo ru gnyis 'khril nas/ /sgo zur gnyis su mgo mjug bsnol/ /de ltar dkyil
59b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bris nas ni/ /bum pa 'o mas gang ba dgu/ phyoT mtshams rnams su bzhag nas ni/ /rgyan rnams kyis kyang mdzes par bya/ /de yis rtog pa las bshad pa'i/ /cho gas klu rnams nam gis bskyed/ /srog pa bcas pa bzhin du ni/ /gong ma lta bu bsgom par bya/ /de rnams tsha naM dza
59b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod/ /de nas bkug la gtsang gtor sogs/ /byas nas de la zhugs par bsam/ /de nas gtor ma 'o mar bcas/ /bur me la sogs lha bshos che/ /phul nas rang rang sngags 'di ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dga' bar bya/ /oM ngaM ba ru na ya ga ti par pa nA ga na?
59b3(rgyud 'grel): parsha ya hUM naM hUM swAhA/ /oM aM a nan+ta ya hUM naM hUM swAhA/ /oM baM ba su ke hUM naM hUM swAhA/ /oM te tak+Sha hUM naM hUM swAhA/ oM kaM ka rko Ta hUM naM hUM swAhA/ oM paM pad+ma hUM naM hUM swAhA/ oM maM mahA pad+ma hUM naM hUM swahA/ /oM sa sa kha ba la hUM naM hUM swAhA/ /oM a na pa ta tha hUM naM hUM swAhA/ de nas phog
59b4(rgyud 'grel): snod bzung byas te/ /gtor ma sogs kyis mnyes byas la/ /stobs chen sbyor ba de nyid kyis/ /bzhag ste tshig gis gsol ba gdab/ /klu chen po ni khyed rnams kyis/ /bdag la yang dag dga' ba dang/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' yis ni/ /char gyis rgyun ni dbab du
59b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /lan gsum brjod pas klu rnams kyis/ /dga' bas char ba 'bebs pa sams nas/ /rang go sbyor ba ma nyams par/ /ji bzhin rang gi sngags bzla'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta kA ya wA k+tsi tsit+ta badzra NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM su gra la shu la ba ni hUM hUM hUM phaT
59b6(rgyud 'grel): phaT phaT/ oM jo ti ni nad hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM oM oM mahA pa lA ya swAhA/ de yi dbang du rab byas nas/ /sa gzhi thams cad char gyis ni/ /rgyun gyis doms par byas nas ni/ /thams cad bod la gnas par byed/ /de yis phebs par ma gyur na/ /stobs po
59b7(rgyud 'grel): tshe yi rnal 'byor pas/ /thams cad dkar pos bsams byas te/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni bsgrub/ /to khung zlum po khru gang bar/ /khru phyed zabs su kha khyer la/ /sor bzhi chad tsam de tsam 'phags/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mas bskor bar bri/ /'khor lo 'khor lo phreng bskor la/ /
60a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rgyus sogs kyis byugs byas te/ /ji bzhin ba yi cho ga yis/ /me lha la sogs mchod par bya/ /de yi dbus su stobs po che/ /'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du byas/ /phyogs dang mtshams su klu brgyad kyang/ /de yi zhal ltas thal
60a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bsam/ /gong gi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas/ /bsang gtor zhabs bsil la sogs pa/ /byas nas de la thim par bsam/ /de rnams lce yi dbus su ni/ /yi ge naM ni bsam byas te/ /blugs gzar dgang gzar chog bzhin/ /byas nas bsang
60a3(rgyud 'grel): gtor la sogs pa/ /yang ni byas nas sbyin bsreg dbul/ /'o ma dang ni 'bras chan dang/ /bu ram sbrang rtsi li kha ra/ /dbang po la sogs sman rnams ni/ /dang por gsum gsum dbul bar bya/ /gong gi sngags la zhi ba yi/ /rig pa dang bcas bzlas na ni/ /klu rnams
60a4(rgyud 'grel): kun la ci 'dod pa'i/ /gong gi rdzas ni sbyin bsreg bya/ /tshim par byas nas rang gi sngags/ /gong ma bzhin du rab brjod pas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i phyogs rnams su/ /char gyi rgyun ni 'thebs par byed/ /de yis phebs par ma gyur na/ /stobs chen khro bo'i rnal 'byor
60a5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /thams cad nag por bsams byas te/ /'khrul 'khor cho ga bsgrub par bya/ /chu bo'i ngos gnyis sa dang ni/ /grog mkhar sa dang bshad gci bsres/ /klu yi gzugs brnyan mtho gsum pa'i/ /snying gar 'khor lo 'di ni gzhug /dur khrod kyi ni ras ma la/
60a6(rgyud 'grel): ske tshe lan tshwa yungs mar dang/ /khrag dug rams kyis sna tsha yis/ /ral gri rtse brgyad 'khor lo bri/ /de steng pad+ma 'dab brgyal la/ /phu sogs brgyad ni bri ba dang/ /snying por yi ge bA bris la/ /sngon bzhin bsams te dgug gzhug bya/ /gzugs brnyan yan lag thams
60a7(rgyud 'grel): cad kun/ /che ba gsum dang ske tshe dang/ /da du ra dang yungs mar dang/ /byugs nas me la gdung bya zhing/ /gong gi sngags ni brjod bya zhing/ /klu rnams gzugs ni rab tsha bas/ /bye ma me yis 'jigs pa yis/ /'jigs nas char rgyun 'jam bo yis/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i
60b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs ni 'bebs/ /de bris char ni mi 'bebs na/ /sngon bzhin klu yi dkyil 'khor bri/ /stod g.yogs ser po smad g.yogs dmar/ /ze'u kha sngon po bcings nas ni/ /gos ni dmar bo bgo ba 'am/ /yang na gcer bur byung byas la/ /skra bshig so ni gtsigs
60b2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /rkang bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje 'bar bar byin brlabs la/ /klu ni gan rkyal gnas par bsam/ /g.yon pas de yi dkyil 'khor mnan/ /skrag ste gdengs ka g.yo bar bsam/ /gyen bltas kha las byung 'debs shing/ /de yi
60b3(rgyud 'grel): khrag gis mkha' khyab nas/ /rgyu mtsho lta bur gyur bsams nas/ /sngags 'di g.yeng ba med par bzla/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzrA hAM/ oM naM hUM naM hUM naM hUM/ phaT naM phaT naM/ oM u gra la shu la ba ni naM/ hUM naM hUM naM/ phaT naM phaT naM phaT/ oM dzo ti nir na da/ hUM naM
60b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM naM hUM/ phaT naM phaT naM phaT/ oM mahA pa la naM phaT/ de yis klu rnams stobs chen la/ /skrag nas sa gzhi rgyas pa ru/ /dam tshig dbang gis de dag gis/ /char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed/ /des kyang char ni mi 'bab na/ /sngon bzhin sngon spyod haM khung du/ /po
60b5(rgyud 'grel): so cha yis tsher mas dgang/ /sme sha can gyi me sbar bya/ /me lha sngon bzhin mchod byas nas/ /de dngus stobs po che bsams nas/ /zhal gdangs rdo rje rtse ldan pa/ /mcha ba gcigs pa bsam par bya/ /sngon gzugs klu yis gzugs brnyan ni/ /dug dang lan
60b6(rgyud 'grel): tshwa da du ra/ /ske tshe sogs pa rab byas la/ /phus bskyed bkug cing bzhug par bya/ /de ni bshad dang gci bas byugs/ /gdug pa'i dgra yis g.yon pa yis/ /de yi mjug ma'i rtse mo nas/ /gtub cing gong ma'i sngags bzlo zhing/ /klu rnams mar ya
60b7(rgyud 'grel): phaT zhes/ /brjod cing sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad/ /byin pas klu rnams thams cad kyang/ /tsha ste skrag nas char 'babs byed/ /gal te de ltar byed pa la/ /char ni 'bebs par mi byed na/ /stobs po che yi 'gal ba'i phyir ro/ /de gnon pa yi cho ga bya/ /chu sogs
61a1(rgyud 'grel): sa la sogs pa yi/ /sngon gsungs rdzas la kho bo che/ /gzugs brnyan zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /byas te gan rkyal bzhag par bya/ /bdag nyid dpal ldan gsum pa yi/ /rnal 'byor 'og nas 'byung bzhin bskyed/ /she ni
61a2(rgyud 'grel): bkug nas gzugs brnyan bcug/ g.yon bas mnan te sngags bzla'o/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ni/ mahA ba la bar Sha shI g+h+ram hUM phaT/ grih+NA grih+Na mahA ?? bar Sha shI g+h+raM hUM phaT/ grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya/ mahA ba la bar Sha shI g+h+raM hUM phaT/ A na a ho b+ha ga
61a3(rgyud 'grel): ban bi dyar dza mahA ba la bar Sha shI g+h+raM hUM phaT/ de 'am ji bzhin khri phrag gnyis/ /bzlas brjod byas nas gong ma yi/ /hoM khung dbus su gnod mdzes che/ /zhal gdangs hUM gi lce cen bsam/ /bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas pa yis/ /gzugs brnyan
61a4(rgyud 'grel): gtub cing khri phrag gcig/ de yi zhal du sbyin sreg bya/ /stobs po che yis char phab nas/ /'dzam gling 'di dang thams cad kun/ /chad gyis ngoms par byas pa yi/ /lo legs 'bru rnams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /'khrul 'khor brgyud ni kun la grags/ /de nas
61a5(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i hoM khung ni/ /sngon bzhin du ni rab byas nas/ /spyan ma dkar mo bsams nas ni/ /de yi sngags dang de'i cho gas/ /mar dang 'o ma 'bras chan sogs/ /de yi zhal du dbab byas nas/ /sreg blugs khri phrag gcig dbul bas/ /klu dang kho bo stobs po che/ /
61a6(rgyud 'grel): tshad bcad de yis zhi bar byed de/ /des na de yis dga' 'gyur te/ /gzhan du sbyar ba tsam gyis ni/ /mod la char gyi rgyun 'bebs byed/ /las kyi tshogs ni de dag gam/ /gzhan la bsgrub po bsrung ba 'am/ /yang na bdag gis gzhan bsrung phyir/ /sbyor ba 'di ni
61a7(rgyud 'grel): brtsams pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i/ /mA ma kI ni sngon bzhin bsam/ /ye shes sems ma'i thugs ka ru/ /bsgrub bya bzhag nas sngags 'di bzla/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): shad ka re shan+tiM ka re g+huT Ta g+huT Ti ni g+ha ta ya swAhA che ge mor?/ /
61b1(rgyud 'grel): bak+Sha? hUM/ brjod pas sngon bzhin stobs dbab dang/ /dbang bskur byas nas bsgrub bya ste/ /rdo rje sems dpas sprul pa yang/ /srung na gzhan sbyar smos ci dgos/ /gal te khyi gtsos la sogs la/ /mtshon cha nor ni gzhan lta bsgrub/ /de tshes gsum sgra 'gengs tshe/ /rnal 'byor 'di yis
61b2(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar bya/ /rang gi lta yi sbyor ba yi/ /spyi bor hUM las rdo rje bskyed/ /de yi lta bar zla ba la/ /mA ma kI ni sngon bzhin bsam/ /de yi ye shes lha mo ni/ /thugs kar maM la bzlas pa'i sngags/ /yang 'greng rig bcas bskor bar bsam/ /de nyid bzlas pas 'od zer 'phros/ /
61b3(rgyud 'grel): de yis spyi bo nas brtsams te/ /rkang mthil bar gyi rdo rje yi/ /go chas bar mtshams med gtams te/ /'byi lo ka ni chur blugs bzhin/ /sbyor te yang dang yang bsams te/ /bdag dang gzhan mi srung bar byed/ /'jigs pa stong gsum gdab yang/ /srung byed stobs
61b4(rgyud 'grel): su 'gyur bar bshad/ /mngon rtog nye ba'i rnal 'byor bas/ /las ni bzhi ste gcig la gsum/ /bsgrub phyir nye dang mi nye bas/ /bsam gtan ri mo srung ba'i phyir/ /rang bzhin dkra? bI chos rnams kyis/ /don dang 'bras bur bcas pa rnams/ /dag pa'i khro bo rnams kyi
61b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /bsgom pa'i cho ga bshad par bya/ /sngon bzhin rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ /dang po mgon po bskyed byas nas/ /sems can skye rim bzhi spangs nas/ /bar ma'i sems kyi dang por 'gyur/ /bskul bas hUM lnga bruM du byung/ /hUM lnga lcags kyu dbyug tho dang/ /rtse gsuM
61b6(rgyud 'grel): ngal gri rdo rjer 'gyur/ /b+huM ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'gyur/ /de yang de dag rnams kyis mtshan/ /'od kyi khams bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams/ /rang dang 'dra ba'i skur byas te/ /bcug ste sa bon nang du thim/ /Ta ki rgyal po khro bo che/ /sku dang dbu zhal mthing ga la/
61b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dkar g.yon dmar phyag drug pa/ /g.yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o/ /dbyug sngon can ni khro bo che/ /sku 'dog de 'dra phyag drug pa/ /g.yas gnyis dbyug tho ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o/ /
62a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs po che ni khro bo che/ /zhal gsum de 'dra phyag drug pa/ /g.yas gnyis rtse gsum ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o/ /mi g.yo mgon po khro bo che/ /zhal sum de 'dra zur gyi bas blta/ /g.yas gnyis ral gri 'khor
62a2(rgyud 'grel): lo 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po khro bo che/ /sku dang dbu zhal de 'dra ste/ /g.yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri dang/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o/ /gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur rgyal che/ /sku dang dbu zhal gser btso 'dra/ /g.yas gnag
62a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dkar phyag drug pa/ /g.yas gnyis 'khor lo rdo rje 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma 'dzin/ /de dag dang pos rig ma 'khyud/ /stag lpags sham thabs dang ldan pa/ /'gying bag tu ni rab khro ba/ /mchi ba cung zad gtsigs pa ste/ /rin chen sna tshogs
62a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyis brgyan/ /pad+ma nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /sbom po g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang ba'o/ /me yi 'od kyis dkyil 'khor nang/ /'khor lo 'bar bas gtsug tor bskor/ /mi bskyod cod pan mtshan ma bsgom/ /de dag dran pa gcig pa ste/ /las kyi khyad par sgrub
62a5(rgyud 'grel): byed pas/ /'di ni 'khor lor ldan pa yi/ /zhar la de yis bsgrub pa gsungs/ /dgug dang dbang gi dang po dang/ /chos tshe rgyas mdzad mang bo zhi/ /ma yin las kyi khyad par rnams/ /dang po gnyis pas yang bya ste/ /dus kyi bye brag nges med pas/ /'grub ste
62a6(rgyud 'grel): dang po thun mong lus/ /khyad par gzhung 'dis bzlog byas te/ /dad pas de rnams nan tan bya/ /gti mug nyes pa'i 'dod chags dang/ /sgrib pa las ni rnam dag pa'i/ /rang bzhin gzung dang dga' ba dang/ /tshul dang mi g.yo rgyu nyid dang/ /'bras bur dag ste de rnams kyis/ /
62a7(rgyud 'grel): spyi yi mtshan nyid rnam dag pa/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /gang phyir ri mo'i brtul zhugs kyis/ /gzhung du nges par gsungs pas na/ /las kyi rim pa bkang ba'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i thig le rgyud las gsungs
62b1(rgyud 'grel): de phyir sgrub thabs rim pa ni/ /rdzogs par bya phyir bla mas kyang/ /sgrub po rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /'dus pa'i cho gar gsungs pa yi/ /sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad rnal 'byor gnas/ /dbus zhal sku ni mthing gal/ /g.yas dkar
62b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dmar phyag drug pa/ /dang pos rang gi rig ma 'khyud/ /g.yas gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams/ /g.yon gnyis pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa ste/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan/ /dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes/ /gtum pa'i hUM
62b3(rgyud 'grel): ging ro sgrogs/ /stag lbags smad g.yogs dang ldan pa/ /drag po g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gis/ /lha chen chung mar bcas pa yi/ /ldan g.yon sra ba'i nu mar mnan/ /cod pan mi bskyod mtshan ba bsgom/ /de ltar bsgoms nas de yi sngags/ /hUM gzhi 'am
62b4(rgyud 'grel): der gsungs bcu bdun po/ /rtse gcig las rnams kun la ni/ /sngar bcas cho ga bzhin du bzlas/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): kro d+he hUM ka ra na ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'o/ /oM h+ri da ya hUM nying ga'o/ /oM ka pA la hUM phaT/ /mtshogs ma la'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ka
62b5(rgyud 'grel): ra ke ka be ra hUM phaT/ spyi gtsug tu'o/ /oM dzwa la dzwa la/ li ta bA kra ha hUM phaT/ go cha la'o/ /oM be bas swa tan ta ka hUM phaT/ mtshon cha la'o/ /sbyor ba de yis bdan dang/ /thal ba sna ga tsha tseg sor gtub/ /skrod byed dag gi las rnams dag /ji bzhin du ni sgrub
62b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /dur khrod ras la ba ngan ni/ /kha dog mthing gsor bcu drug/ /smyug ma'i yu ba khru gang la/ /btags te dur khrod gnas su bsgrub/ /de na lag tu bzung byas nas/ /zhag bdun sngags bzlas nam langs na/ /de thogs dgra dpung la g.yabs pas/ /the
62b7(rgyud 'grel): tshom med par gnon par 'gyur/ /mtshon thegs bdag la gnod byed gzhan/ /sgrub pa po ni mthong tsam gyis/ /de dag mdud bzhin rengs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin glang rgyal myos pa dang/ /shing rta rta dang srog chags rngam/ /rkang thang 'khrugs pa mang bcas pa
63a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong btsam gyis rengs par 'gyur/ /mtshan mo mi ro bsregs pa yi/ /gnas song skra bshig gcer bur byung/ /bzlas pa bskor zhing rab byas nas/ /rnam langs thal ba sbar gang blang/ /lag pa g.yon pas blangs nas ni/ /rang
63a2(rgyud 'grel): gi khyim du 'gro bar bya/ /yang na lha khang stong par 'gro /phyir ni bltas par mi bya'o/ /de nas der yang thal ba de/ /zhag bdun sngags bzlas bsrung bar bya/ /snod sar nang du rab bzhag ste/ /sal bzhag par mi bya'o/ /de yi gong gi dud ba gi tshogs/ /mthong na
63a3(rgyud 'grel): lan cig gtor tsam gyis/ /rengs par 'dod na rengs par 'gyur/ /rlung phyogs dag tu sbyar ba na/ /ldog par 'dod na ldog par 'gyur/ /mdun du bsnyen te gtor byas na/ /myos par gyur te mchon cha rngam/ /de kho na bzhin 'dor bar 'gyur/ /tshil chen snum lam
63a4(rgyud 'grel): me ni/ /thog pa bzang por spang par bya/ /steng gi thong bar du ba bsgo/ /snag tshar byas te de blangs la/ /zhag bdun sngags bzlas nam langs na/ /du ba'i snag tsha mig la bsku/ /de yis gang mthong thams cad kun/ /ci bgyi zhes ni bka' nyan 'gyur/ /yug snaM
63a5(rgyud 'grel): btsag ni dge ba dag /bsreg pa'i gnas 'gro khar bcug la/ /de phyed tshig pa'i dus su ni/ /grogs med par ni mtshan mo blang/ /lha yi khang stong du khyer nas/ /gong gi sngags na zhig bdun bzla/ /de tshe bgegs kyang sna tshogs 'ong/ /mi 'jigs 'dug cing
63a6(rgyud 'grel): de la bzla/ /de nas nam langs gyur pa na/ /ras ni dmar pos dkri byas la/ /mchod cing bsrungs nas bzhag par bya/ /de yis sems dang ldan pa 'am/ /mi ldan gang gi ming bris pas/ /bskul nas dogs pa med pa yang/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i bka' 
63a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /'ongs nas las rnams thams cad byed/ /srog song dur khrod khyer ba na/ /gser gyi sor gdub de yi khar/ /bcug nas bdag nyid gcig pu ni/ /khro bo'i sngags ni zlos shing 'dug /ro de me yis tshig 'gyur na/ /kha yi sor gdub
63b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa po'i/ /lag pa g.yon pas blangs byas la/ /zhag bdun bar du bzla bar bya/ /de nas sor gdub bzang po de/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo la/ /bcug ste lag pa de yis ni/ /gang dang gang la reg 'gyur ba/ /de dang de yis las kun byed/ /phyi bzhin dus?
63b2(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu 'brang/ /rten 'brel bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /'di la dpyad par yod mi bya/ /sing ta'i shing la gab tshe yang/ /bzang po sor ni brgyad pa bya/ /de yi nang du bskrod byed kyang/ /dngos grub sbyin par byed par blug /zla ba gzas? ni zin pa'i tshe/ ma grol bar du de la
63b3(rgyud 'grel): bzla/ /de nas sngon bzhin 'khor lo bri/ /'byung po gtor ma sbyin byas la/ /gab tshe nang gi skrod byed kyang/ /sgra byung yang na gas kyi bar/ /de srid zhag bdun de la ni/ /khro bo'i sngags kyis bzlas pa bya/ /de tshe skrong byed grub ma thag /blangs nas yang yang rung ba
63b4(rgyud 'grel): ru/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyar na ni/ /de yis mi nus gcig kyang mod/ /sa yang 'gas byed chu yang skems/ /rin chen phye ma bzhin du rlog /ri rtser sbyar na brnyil bar byed/ /khrag dang sol ba'i sol 'bebs byed/ /gnam lcags dag ni 'thor ba dang/ /sa g.yon
63b5(rgyud 'grel): sprin ni gtor ba dang/ /rnal 'byor ba yis rab sbyar na/ /glo bur du ni thogs med 'grub/ /mtsho g.yo klu rnams skrag pa dang/ /shing rnams 'bras bu glo bur 'byin/ /gzhan yang sgrub po ci bsams pa'i/ /las rnams thams cad de yis byed/ /'di ni rdo rje
63b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM mdzad kyi/ /sngags rgyud ldan pa'i las rnams de/ /gzhan yang de las gsungs pa yi/ /las rnams mkhas pas shes par bya/ /da ni thun mong gi dngos grub kyi mjug tu ngag gzhug sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /rdo rjes bzlas gnas rnal 'byor
63b7(rgyud 'grel): las/ /rang gi dgos pa rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /bdag gi rigs kyi khro bo mchog /mngag gzhug pa ru bsgrub par bya/ /'dod pa'i lha yi rnal 'byor pa'i/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la/ /h+ri ni 'od zer lnga 'bar ba/ /nam mkha' i dbus su bsam par bya/
64a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dbyings bde gshegs byang chub sems/ /rig pa'i lha dang khro bo'i tshogs/ /gang bar bsams nas sngags 'di yis/ /sku gsung thugs la gnas la gdab/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+ri a mo g+ha sid+d+hi nan b+ha k+Sha A karA ya hUM/
64a2(rgyud 'grel): phab pas gnas de rigs kyi rims/ /mi bskyod pa o? a gyur te/ /tshe dpag med pa'i khaM du gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad ding gyur to/ /cho ga de la skad cig gis/ /cho ga gnyis pa bsgrub par bya/ /a de bdud rtsi 'khyil par gyur/ /thal sbyar
64a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la sngon bzhin bsam/ /khaM de pad+ma mthar byed gyur/ /de ni gshin rje gshed gyur te/ /de dag sngon bzhin nyi ma la/ /gnas te dang po thal sbyar bsam/ /lha mo spangs pa'i phyag mtshan yang/ /g.yas kyi tha mar dpa' bo dang/ /lcags kyus
64a4(rgyud 'grel): bkang ba'i snod bcud nas/ /sgrub pa po la stobs byad bsgom/ /de dag gnas gsum gong ma yi/ /a khaM de ni bkod byas nas/ /de nas bskul ba la sogs pas/ /don yod grub pas dbu rgyan te/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i thugs ka ru/ /nyi ma'i
64a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /mi bskyod pa ni bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma mthar byed thugs ka ru/ /de nas tshe dpag med par bsgom/ /gshin rje gshed kyi thugs ka ru/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom/ /da nas
64a6(rgyud 'grel): rig gsum phyag gnas pa'i/ /mdud rtse gsum dang kya ba dang/ /rdo rje dang ni gtun shing gis/ /gsang ba'i gnas la brdab cing bskul/ /oM mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje mchog /khyed kyi rigs kyi khro bo che/ /nga yi re ba rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /khyed kyis
64a7(rgyud 'grel): mdag gzhug pa ru bskul /cho dpag med dang snang mdzad kyang/ /de bzhin du ni bskul byas te/ /nyams dga' ba yi ri dag dang/ /chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su/ /bsam gtan 'di ni zla byed bsgom/ /ri rab sum chu rtsa drug gis/ /rab tu phra ba'i
64b1(rgyud 'grel): rdul snyed dang/ /'khor lo can gyi byang chub 'grub/ /des khrid sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro/ /zab cing rgya che'i chos thob 'gyur/ /de ni gnyid sogs dang bral yang/ /bde gshegs kun gyis byin rlabs nas/ /gnyid 'od de ru gong gsungs pa'i/ /mtshan ma rnams na
64b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dang yang/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /lha yis bka' yis brtan par byed/ /nam mkha' chos rnams spangs pa yang/ /rta dang glang chen la sogs pa/ /sgrub pa po yis bskul ba yi/ /bdag gshug de yis byed par 'gyur/ /gong gsungs 'og nas
64b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba la/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni ji snyed pa/ /nus dang ldan pas de rnams las/ /lha sogs rnams kyis khyad shes 'gyur/ /'don po'i dang po'i gnas bzhin du/ /thams cad brjod pas lung rdo thogs/ /de bas dad pa mngon 'gro bas/ /gzhung gi don la brtan par bya/ /
64b4(rgyud 'grel): da ni phyag rgya chen pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /sngon gsungs yang dag rim gnas la/ /gos dang don byed ma rtogs pa/ /bya ba thams cad mchil thal bzhin/ /spangs nas rdo rje 'chang ba yi/ /sbyor ba thob phyir dus rtag tu/ /sangs rgyas
64b5(rgyud 'grel): mchad dang 'gro don la/ /dad pas brtson 'grus kyis sbyor byed/ /thabs shes sbyor bas skyon kun gsal/ /thob pa'i zas ni za bar byed/ /chags pa sdang ba rnams dang bral/ /'jig rten chos brgyad ma rtogs pa'i/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thob bzhin spyod/ /bka' yi
64b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhung lugs 'jigs spangs nas/ /lus gnas pa yi chog shes te/ /bya ba gsum gyi mdza' la spyod/ /dgos pa 'grub pa des bsgrub bya/ /ci gsung mtshan ma mthong 'gyur nas/ /rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya mchog /gong du bstan pa'i cho ga yis/ /bkug ste bdag
64b7(rgyud 'grel): gir bya ba'o/ /de dang lhan cig yid 'ong mgon/ /rang nyid ma gtogs gzhan gyis ni/ /mi phyed gnas su zla drug tu/ /gsang ba'i brtul zhugs spyod pa bya/ /brgyud pa'i man ngag las gsungs pa'i/ /lus ngag yid kyi spyod pa'i mchog /phyag rgya dag phyir nyin mtshan du/ /
65a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dbang phyug brtson par bya/ /de yis zla ba gcig gis ni/ /skal ldan gyur pa'i the tshom med/ /de dang lnga yi bar du ni/ /rjes mthun shis pa'i zas longs spyod/ /rang gi khams na rang gnas pa'i/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis thugs
65a2(rgyud 'grel): gdungs nas/ /de ru byon nas sgrub po la/ /'phral du bka' stsal ster bar 'gyur/ /de nas bka' stsal thog ma thag/ rang gi mthu stobs rtogs bya'i phyir/ /gong dang lhan cig zla drug tu/ /phyi yi rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /yid 'ong dben par cho ga bzhin/ /'dus pa'i 'khor
65a3(rgyud 'grel): lo bri byas la/ /mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes byas te/ /bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid de dang ni/ /bcos ma'i gdong la sogs pas mtshan/ /yang na phyogs gos 'ba' zhig gis/ /mtshan te kun tu rgyu bar bya/ /di yi gtsong rong nags
65a4(rgyud 'grel): tshal gnas/ /glang chen seng ge sbrul dang stag /gdug pa'i sems can 'jigs pa'i sar/ /bdag rgyu de dag rtse par byed/ /rdo leb rgya cher bdag nyid 'dug /ri dags lte ba'i dri bro ste/ /in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra/ /snum dang mi gstong gdan bzhin no/ /cher mang chu ma'i
65a5(rgyud 'grel): grog ral mang/ /mi sdug gnas su bdag rgyu bas/ /me tog 'bras bu bzang po dang/ /dri zhim chu ni mdangs dang ldan/ /gzhan gsungs phyag rgya rnams kyis mtshan/ /gang byed glu blang brkam tshig smra/ /mi shes blun pa'i gzi can rnams/ /'dul zhing lus kyi rgyu mthun pas/
65a6(rgyud 'grel): gso bar byed cing stobs mthong bas/ /nags tshal dag tu bsong snyoms bslang/ /sgrub dbang de yi gzi brjid kyis/ /nags tshal lha rnams skrag nas ni/ /kha zas bzang po bster ba dag/ /sgrub pa po la rab tu sbyor/ /phun sum tshogs pa ma sbyar na/ /dam tshig
65a7(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis de rnams 'chi/ /de ltar spyi dang dngos gzhi yis/ /mtshan thob pa yi rnal 'byor pas/ /rang gi khams ni dag bya'i phyir/ /'og nas bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /dus mtshan bzhi ru zhag bdun du/ /bsgom pa'i dbang bskur rnam dag pas/ /nyi
