65b1(rgyud 'grel): shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /'khor lo'i bdag nyid dri med bya/ /rang gis sa bon 'od lcags kyu/ /rtag dang sbyor ba'i spyan ma'i tshogs/ /'og min nas ni bkug byas nas/ /nam mkha' i khams kun gang bzhugs bsgom/ /de nyid bde chen ro zhu bas/ /'o ma'i rgyu
65b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar de dag gi /spyi bo nas ni mdun rgyab dang/ /lnga stong ngag ni zhugs par bya/ /de bzhin bde ba can zhing nas/ /dpag med dang sbyor gos dkar dgug/ /sngon bzhin bsams nas de'i dus/ /de dag rnams kyi lce la bzhung/ /mngon dga' las byung mo
65b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyod dang/ /mA ma kI ni gnyis med zhu/ /de dag rnams kyi thugs ka ru/ /lnga stong bdun brgya'i bar du zhugs/ /'od des kha ti ka nas kyang/ /don yod grub dang sgrol ma yang/ /bde chen gzhan gyi dbang gyur nas/ /lte bar de dus zhugs byas nas/ /nam mkha' 
65b4(rgyud 'grel): lta bur de bzhin nyid/ yang dang yang du brtson par bya/ /gang phyir de nyid yang bsgoms pas/ /dngos po dag par byed pa'o phyir/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis de nyid bsngags/ /de dang de yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan pa ni/ /khyu mchog de ni mnyes par 'gyur
65b5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar sbyor ba gsum ldan pas/ /dngos gzhi'i las la 'jug don du/ /gong gsungs las kyi phyag rgya che/ /rigs gsum bye brag gis gzung bya/ /mi bskyod rdo rje rnal 'byor pas/ /sme sha can gyi mthu chen gyi/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu drug pa/ /utpa la yi
65b6(rgyud 'grel): mdog 'dra bsgrub/ /de bzhin rtag pa'i sbyor ba yi/ /btso brlag mkhan gyi bu mo dkar/ /lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa/ /spyan ma'i ngo bor bsgrub par bya/ /tshe dpag med kyi rnal 'byor pas/ /gar mkhan bu mo rab mdzes shing/ /dmar po bzhin sdug mig dkyus
65b7(rgyud 'grel): ring/ /nyi shu lon pa gos dkar bsgrub/ /yang na bram ze rgyal rigs dang/ /rje'u? rigs dmangs rigs gzhan bud med/ /gang gi rnal 'byor gyis gnas bsgrub/ /de yis gsang ba'i sku gsum thob/ /'dis ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lta
66a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /lhag pa'i bya ba bya zhes bsgrub/ /chags min chags dang bral ba'ang min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/ /'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog /bud med sgyu ma'i rgya 'di yis/ /sgyu ma dag ni thams
66a2(rgyud 'grel): cad pas/ /bud med sgyu ma khyad par che/ /ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis/ /rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum 'dir bud med 'dis/ /gus pa byed pa dag tu 'gyur/ /rnyed dang bde ba dga' kun gyis/ /dan spyod rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang
66a3(rgyud 'grel): gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur nas/ /bud med kun gyis sgyu ma 'grub/ /ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i byag rgya 'di/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi brdar bstan to/ /de bas de dang lhan cig tu/ yid 'ong gnas su sngon bzhin du/ /ri mi'i dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang/ /byin brlabs la sogs sngon
66a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bya/ /de ru stegs bu gru bzhin ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas byug /bde ba'i stan la de dang ni/ /lhan cig sgyu 'dra'i ting nge 'dzin rol/ /bsrung ba la sogs rten sgrub la/ /dang po'i mgon pos bdag nyid bsgrub/ /god ma rig ma'i 'du byed pas/ /rab tu bsgrubs
66a5(rgyud 'grel): te pad+mar bzhag /phrin las la gnas bde chen po/ /de yi sku gsum goms bya'i phyir/ /yang dang yang du nyin mtshon du/ /zla ba drug tu bsgrub par bya/ /de yis sgrub po bdag nyid kyis/ /phyi nang dus su sangs rgyas kyi/ /mtshan gyis brgyan par ma gyur na/ /
66a6(rgyud 'grel): yang ni cho ga de kho nas/ /de yi 'dod pa longs spyod cing/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa dang bcas pas/ /sa bcu de la gnas bcas te/ /zla ba drug tu yang sgrub bya/ /gal te de ru sgrub pa pos/ /gong gsungs mthod par ma gyur na/ /ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis/ /
66a7(rgyud 'grel): yang ni zla drug rab tu brtsams/ /drug gsum bco brgyad cho ga bzhin/ /bsgrub pas rdo rje gsum gyis ni/ /dngos grub ster te phyis 'byung ba'i/ /phyag rgya chen po rab tu 'thog /de ltar byas pa'i sgrub pa pos/ /bsgoms pas dngos grub mchog ma mthong/ /snyan
66b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig zhi ba'i bskul ba yis/ /dngos grub bslang bar bya ba'o/ /sngon gyi 'khor lo khang pa'ang/ /gzhan yang gang yang rung ba ru/ /bgegs bskrad phur bus btab na su/ /sngon bzhin gtsang gto ras gsol gdab/ /sangs rgyas la sogs snga ma bzhin/ /
66b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol gdab stegs bu 'dus byas te/ /byin brlabs ting 'dzin gsum gnas la/ /skye gcig thogs bsam gsol ba gdab/ /drug cu rtsa bzhis bgegs bskrad nas/ /sa srungs sa yi lha mo yang/ /mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes byas la/ /dbang por
66b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal gyis bzhes par bya/ /de nas me tog sna tshogs dang/ /dri zhim la sogs ldan pa yi/ /maN+Dal sngon bzhin 'dus byas la/ /de nas gnas pa dmigs par bya/ /rang gi sa bon 'od zer las/ /lcags kyu rdo rje gsal shing sogs/ /mtshan pa'i khro
66b4(rgyud 'grel): bo spro byas la/ /de dag mchod sogs kyis mnyes bya/ /sgrub bos 'og nas 'byung ba yi/ /tshigs bcad sngags kyi khyed rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /bskul cig ces ni smra bar bya/ /de nas zhal gyis bzhes nas ni/ /song
66b5(rgyud 'grel): ste 'jig rten khams gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sogs la phra mo dang/ /snyan tshig 'debs pa'i dbyings kyi skul/ /che ge zhes bya rdo rje che/ /'di yis gnas su dam sdom can/ /rig ma'i brtul zhugs spyod pa yis/ /tshogs ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /
66b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa bzlas brjod yongs rdzogs nas/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa yang gnas nas/ /khyed kyis bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri/ /khyed cag de ru byon nas su/ /de yi 'khor lo byin brlabs la/ /mchod pa la sogs bzhes
66b7(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang/ /phyag rgya chen po gnang bar mdzod/ /de ltar brjod pas de dag kyang/ /rab tu dgyes nas khro bo la/ /de ltar bya zhes bsams nas kyang/ /lhan cig byon bsams gnas su dgod/ /khro bos sgrub pa po la smras/ /bdag cag rnams kyis gsol
67a1(rgyud 'grel): ba gdab/ /de dag kyang ni 'di skad gsungs/ /rdo rje che ge zhes byas la/ /bdag cag phyag rgya chen po bzhin/ /gsungs nas 'di ru byon pa lags/ /khyed kyis mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /mnyes par byas nyid mchod
67a2(rgyud 'grel): bskul/ /de nas sgrub pos sangs rgyas dang/ /khro rgyal lha mo mnyes bya'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkug nas/ /rang gi ba spu bu gar bcug /de nyid lha mo sgeg pas brgyan/ /spros nas sangs rgyas byang chub sems/ /khro bo dang bcas
67a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo la/ /bde ba chen po'i ros mchod pa/ /byas nas bstod pa bdud rtsi myang/ /sna tshogs kyis ni mnyes byas nas/ /srog dang bcas pa bsams nas kyang/ /bdag nyid kyis ni snyan gsan gsol/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos grub kyi/ /dkyil
67a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bdag gis bri bar 'tshal/ /sad na di ru byon nas kyang/ /bdag gis mchod pa la sogs bzhes/ /bzhes nas bdag la dngos grub stsol/ /gal te ma stsal byed khyed rnams kun/ /rang nyid kyis ni bstan pa la/ /rdzun du smra bar gyur pa'o/ /de ltar snyan
67a5(rgyud 'grel): gsan lan gsum du/ /gsol nas de dag zhal bzhes nas/ /mchod pa la sogs kyis mnyes par bya/ /steng gi gnas su gshegs su gsol/ /yang ni mchod pa'i bum pa rnams/ /sngon bzhin sta gon gnas byas nas/ /me tog spos la sogs pa yis/ /
67a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod nas ji bzhin gnas su dgod/ /de nas phyi de nyid par yang/ /skud pa tshon rtsi sngon bzhin bsgrub/ /gos dang rin chen rgyan ldan pa'i/ /khye'u dang bu mo dbab byas nas/ /de yis dngos grub dkyil 'khor mchog /yang dag sbyin byed bris nas kyang/ /dbye ba
67a7(rgyud 'grel): byas nas de nyid kyang/ /mchod nas rang gi gnas su btang/ /de nas phyag rgya dang lhan cig /'khor lo sgrub pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /gnyis 'dres byas nas steng nas dbab/ /sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor dbyer med bya/ /bdag po lnga la bzhi po'i dus/ /bdag po gnyis
67b1(rgyud 'grel): pas yang mtshan bya/ /yang na de dag klad rgyas dang/ /lkog ma snying ga lte ba dang/ /gsang bar rgyu yi skyes bu dgod/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum las skyes/ /sgrub pa po ni blo ldan la/ /'jigs shing bskrag nas byin gyis brlob/ /de dag gsad pa'i
67b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog sogs pa/ /sngon gsungs mchod pa nyi shus kyang/ /mchod nas 'od zer rtse mo las/ /yid dga' i rin chen sna bdun spro/ /gser mdog lta bu'i rgyan rnams kyis/ /brgyan pa'i bde bI longs spyod 'dzin/ /pad+ma'i steng na gnas pa yi/ /bud med
67b3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen dbul bar bya/ /gnod sbyin lta bu'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ /gos sngon dgos pa rin chen gter/ /gzung ba'i khyim bdag rin po che/ /sgyu ma lta bus sprul pa bya/ /mche ba drug ldan glang po dkar/ /gser gyis brgyan pa spro bar bya/ /utpa la
67b4(rgyud 'grel): mthing ka'i 'dab 'dril rta/ /rin chen chas brgyan spros te dbul/ /chang gzugs rin chen sna bdun gyis/ /spras pa'i ral gri rin po che/ /'od zer dang ldan pad+ma la/ /gnas pa spros te dbul bar bya/ /lha yi gos kyis rab brgyan pa/ /'od zer sna tshogs
67b5(rgyud 'grel): spro ba yi/ /gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ /sbyor ba bshes pas spro bar bya/ /mkha' kun gsal bar byed pa yi/ /'od zer mdza' yas rab spro ba/ /blon po rin chen spros nas kyang/ /de dag phyir rgol pa rgyan par bsgoM/ /de ltar lha sogs bu mo dang/ /
67b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs 'dzin rnams kyi bsgyur ba yi/ /glu dang gar dang gling bu dang/ /dung dang rdza rda la sogs pas/ /nam mkha' i khams kun g.yos par bsgom/ /shin tu zhi ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'i/ /khu byug bung ba dang pa sogs/ /mdangs dga' rnams kyis gang bar bsam/ /
67b7(rgyud 'grel): me tog shing gis mdza' brgyan pa'i/ /mdzes pa'i rdzing bu sna tshogs dang/ /dpag bsam shing gis nags tshal ni/ /'khor lo'i phyogs bzhi nas 'byung ngo/ /de bzhin bza' bca' kha zas dkar/ /tshal dang theg pa gdan rnams dang/ /myos byed btung ba'i tshogs
68a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang/ /'khor lo mnyes phyir spro bar bya/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid la/ /chos kyi dbyings ni gnas med de/ /rdo rje las byung rtog pa ni/ /gsungs pa nyid kyang ma grub bo/ /de ltar sna tshogs mchod pa yi/ /mnyes
68a2(rgyud 'grel): byas sngon bzhin rang nyid zhugs/ /bdag po nga rgyal dang ldan par/ /'khor lo bdag la zhugs byas te/ /dga' ba'i ye shes par gnas nas/ /zhag bdun sogs par yang du rtag /de ltar de ru phyag rgya che/ /ji skad gsungs pa thob par 'gyur/ /de
68a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar byas kyang phyag rgya che/ /sgrub pos kyang ni thob ma gyur/ /sngon bzhin nyams pa sna tshogs dang/ /dbye ba'i sgo nas bsgrub par bya/ /rang gi 'dod bzhin gsol btab nas/ /bris pa'i 'khor lo gshegs su gsol/ /smon lam rnams ni byas nas su/ /byang
68a4(rgyud 'grel): chub chen por bsngo bar bya/ /rtog pa las byung ji snyed pa/ /rje btsun rnams kyi spyan sngar bshags/ /ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /rang gi rjes su mthun pas bsgrub/ /'khor lo gang dang gang bstan pa/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya mchod pa yis/ /
68a5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang des/ /mchod pa byas nas de bsgrub bo/ /rang gi 'khor lo tshogs ldan pa'i/ /rang gi bla ma la sogs gzhan/ /yid dga' gnas su spyan drangs nas/ /dngos grub rnam par 'phrul 'di bya/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i lha rnams mchog
68a6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen sa tshogs kyis spras pa/ /dril bu rgyal mtshan mchod sogs ldan/ /bla re dam pa bres pa ru/ /rdo rje sngags dang mchod la sogs/ /glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'bul/ /me tog bdug sogs rab sbyor bas/ /dag pa'i gdan chen bsham par
68a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /der ni de dag thams cad kun/ /ji lta'i gnas su ji bzhin 'dug /bskal bzang rang gi phyag rgya dang/ /dngos grub phyir ni rnam par rol/ /sha dang chang la sogs pa yi/ /bza' bca' btung ba'i tshogs rnams dang/ /lus dang ngag gi spyod pa yis/ /de kun
68b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyas par bya dgos so/ /de bzhin phyogs skyong la sogs kun/ /gzhan bzhin 'khor lor bsgrub byas la/ /gong gsungs gtor ma'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /de dag tshim par yang bya'o/ /sgyu 'dra'i ting 'dzin lha rnams dmigs/ /'khor lo yang dang yang du
68b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /bla ma mdun du bzhag nas ni/ /nyams par dogs pa thams cad bsal/ /de ltar gom pa brtan bya zhing/ /ma nyams skyon med spyod par ldan/ /mchog gi dngos grub lam la gnas/ /dam pa'i rig ma ma 'khrul pas/ /zhag bdun dang ni zla phyed dang/ /
68b3(rgyud 'grel): zla gcig zla ba phyed dang gnyis/ /rdo rje dam tshig bskyed byas nas/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar yang dang yang bsgoms pas/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi dngos grub mchog /mi 'grub 'khrul pa'i rgyu yis ni/ /sgrub pa po la bkag 'gyur na/ /
68b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid du ni sgrub pa pos/ /go skabs gzhan ni med pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje che ba'i gsang ba kun/ /de la khros par rig pa yin/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis de dag rnams/ /rang rang tshogs dang rang khams dang/ /sgrub pa po la mi gzigs te/ /btang snyoms chen por
68b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o/ /bka' yis 'jigs med 'khrul bsal dang/ /thub pas spyan ras gzigs bya'i phyir/ /dam pa'i gzhung las gsungs pa ltar/ /de dag rnams kyi snying po bskul/ /bdag dang 'khor la dmigs byas nas/ /de dag rnams kyi spyi bo dang/ /
68b6(rgyud 'grel): mgrin pa de 'og thugs ka ru/ /sngon bzhin phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab/ /de bzhin phra mo'i 'khor lo la/ /sa bon sogs pas spro bar bya/ /spros te mdun du rab g.yeng pa'i/ /shing rta spro bar bya/ /spros te mdun du rab g.yeng pa'i/ /shing rta
68b7(rgyud 'grel): de dag bka' nod pa/ /gnag cing khros pa bsam byas te/ /sgrub pos de la bka' yis bsgo/ /da ni dpal ldan che ge mo/ /khyod ni rtag tu sgrub la gnas/ /dam sdom lam la rtag brtson pas/ /bdag la dngos grub stsal du gsol/ /oM sh+rI ban ??
69a1(rgyud 'grel): aM gu sha ga te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad h+rid ya tsun de A ka ri Sha ya phaT dza/ oM sh+rI ban pad+ma aM gu sha ga te/ /gong gi bsgrub bya h+ri da ya tsun de a ka ra Shi ya phaT dza/ /oM sh+rI ban kha rga aM gu sha ga te/
69a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya h+ri da ya tsun de a ka ri Sha yang phaT dza/ /oM sh+rI ban badzra yang gu sha ga te bsgrub bya tsun de a ka ra Shi ya phaT dza/ /rin chen la sogs rang sngags kyis/ /rang rang mtshan mas mtshan ma yi/ /ye shes sems dpa' la sogs pa/ /de dag
69a3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu spro bar bya/ /spros te phyogs bcur song nas kyang/ /rang gi zhing na gnas pa yi/ /bde gshegs rig bcas btang snyoms gnas/ /lcags kyu thugs kar brdeg cing bskul/ /che ge zhes bya rdo rje la/ /khyed kyis dngos grub dam pa stsol/ /gal
69a4(rgyud 'grel): tem stsal khyed rnams rdzun/ /smras pas rang nyid bslus pa'o/ /de bzhin lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ /sku yi bug kun nas kyang/ /de 'dra bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'phros pa'i mtshan ma rnams kyis bskul/ /mi gzigs mngon par gyur pa'i don/ /
69a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs te zhag bdun par du bya/ /de yis rgyu kun rdzogs pas na/ /de dag rnal 'byor pa la 'jug /de yi 'og 'byung mchog bzhi po/ /rdo rje tshul mchog 'di brtsams pas/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyis gsang/ /mchog stsol zhing ni rnam par gzigs/ /
69a6(rgyud 'grel): yang ni 'jigs shing skrag 'gyur nas/ /yid la mgu zhing dgar 'gyur ba'i/ /dngos grub dam pa de dus te/ /de la rol mo 'byung ba'o/ /gal te gnyis kyi bdag nyid rmongs/ /de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur/ /de yis sngon du ma byas na/ /de dag chad
69a7(rgyud 'grel): pas bcad par bya/ /rang nyid 'khor lor bcas pa khros/ /nag po me dpung dkyil na bzhugs/ /bsnyen pa la sogs dang ldan pas/ /phyag rgya lhan cig gnyis med bya/ /sngon gsungs 'phros pa rnams kyis kyang/ /rang khams gnas pa'i rtag pa
69b1(rgyud 'grel): pa sogs/ /rang rang kha dog dang ldan pa/ /lcags kyus bkug par byas nas su/ /phyag rgya'i gsang bar nyi ma'i steng/ /me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum du/ /bzhag ste de dag dam tshig gis/ bsnyengs pas 'dar bar bsam pa'o/ /de nas rang gis ??
69b2(rgyud 'grel): can nyid/ /nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya'i 'od/ /ldan pa'i pad+ma kha bye ba'i/ /nang du bcug nas phan tshun dkri/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i/ /gshin rje mthar byed stong sngon bzhin/ /'od ldan smad ni rtse gcig gzugs/ /rdo rje las ni dbyung
69b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /de yis de dag brtag pa yis/ /spyi bo nas ni sngags 'di yis/ /btab pas rlung gis thal ba ltar/ /sngags kyi lus ni mi snang byas/ /oM tshind+ha tsind+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ dapti badzra tsakra hUM phaT/ de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs 'byung ba'i/ /pad+ma mthar
69b4(rgyud 'grel): byed spros nas kyang/ /sngon bzhin snang ba mdza' yas kyis/ /kha ru sngags 'dis gdab par bya/ /oM h+ri phur pa hUM phaT/ /rdo rje rigs las byung ba yi/ /shes rab mthar byed de bzhin spro/ /de yis mi bskyod thugs ka ru/ /sngags 'di yis ni gdab
69b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /oM a badzra ra tsa hUM phaT/ yi ge gsum gyi bar bcug pa'i/ /sngags 'di bskul nas de yis bdag /rtog pa las byung ji snyed pa/ /bsal bas shes bya'i sgrib sogs bcom/ /ta ta ku la na shwa kI la ya hUM phaT/ /btab pa tsam gyis rdo rje
69b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /sku gsum dri med las byung ba yi/ /dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur/ /yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga legs par byas nas ni/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje mdza' klas par/ /'debs par gyur
69b7(rgyud 'grel): pha gdon mi za/ /bsgrub bya de dag zhi ba'i phyir/ /bsdu dang spro ba'i sgo nas kyang/ /phur bu sngags kyis phyung nas ni/ /ye shes tsam du gnas par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra d+ha ro A dz+nyA uta kI la ya hUM/ /oM badzra d+ha ro A dz+nyA uta kI la ya hUM/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): sarba kI
70a1(rgyud 'grel): la ya ka na bud d+ha sa ten badzra ya hUM/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): sarba kI la ya ka na d+harmma sa te badzra ya hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): sarba kI la ya ka na saM g+ha sa te na badzra da ti a badzra ya hUM/ ye shes mar me lta bu'i tshul/ /rang gi mi shes dbyer med
70a2(rgyud 'grel): byas/ /dbugs 'byin mchog dang lhan cig tu/ /cho ga 'di ni ma lus brtsam/ /dbung brkyang ma 'gul pa nas 'khyud pas/ /mi g.yo skra bzung brla gnyis par/ /bltas te seng sgra'i glu blangs nas/ /bung ba lta bur rtsa bar bya/ /'gying bag
70a3(rgyud 'grel): stabs kyis 'khyud nas ni/ /g.yon gyis spyi bo nas bzung nas/ /g.yas kyis ko ko bsten nas ni/ /ma mchu sbrang rtsi bzhib par bya/ /bzhib cing sid ces rab brjod pas/ /'gram gnyis su ni 'o bya zhing/ /dpung pa'i bar du rab byas la/ /kha yis
70a4(rgyud 'grel): de la rtse bar bya/ /rna ba de bzhin mchan khung dang/ /mgrin pa'i glo dang sum mdo rnams/ /sen mos re mos gdab bya zhing/ /yang dang yang du byug par bya/ /g.yon gyis pad+ma mnye ba dang/ /lag gnyis sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje
70a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyis sor mo gsum/ /chos 'byung nang du brung cing rtse/ /bsnyen dang nyer bsgrub sgrub pa yis/ /'di ltar bskyod pa tsam gyis ni/ /snying 'dar dran pa nyams par 'gyur/ /spyi bo skra bkrol gos 'dor byed/ /rngul chu thigs pas kun tu khyab/ /
70a6(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa'i ngang tshul shor nas ni/ /ba spu rnams kyang g.yo bar byed/ /dmar ba'i mig ni phra bas blta/ /bdag nyid bsgrub pa la gnas na/ /zla ba lta bu'i rigs can 'char/ /rtse gcig yid kyis ma spros par/ /yang dang yang du brtag par bya/ /
70a7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma gtogs phyag rgya yis/ /lhan cig dus ni bdun du rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par 'gyur/ /dpag tshad bye pa'i chod tshom med/ /rdo rje ma nub nas ni/ /sgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya/ /yi ma bdun gyi 'grub 'gyur ba/ /skya rengs 'char ba'i dus na'o/ /
70b1(rgyud 'grel): de ru sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /rdo rje 'chang chen kun gyi gnas/ /chos rnams kun gyi chos nyid de/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs byas thob/ /de ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa/ /sangs rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par 'gyur/ /dpag tshad bye pa'i chad tsam du/ /
70b2(rgyud 'grel): de yi 'od kyang snang bar byed/ /de nyid yang dag ye shes thob/ /gzugs brnyan bdag nyid spyi gzugs kyis/ /'khor lo gsum po mdza' yas khams/ /'gro ba'i pan don mdzad pa'o/ /'khor ba ji srid gnas kyi bar/ /sbyor ba bdun ldan rdo rje sems/ /
70b3(rgyud 'grel): ro myang mtshan nyid brgyan brnyes nas/ /bla na med par 'gyur ba'o/ /rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i chog rgyas par bshad zin to// //gang phyir rgyu dang bcas pa yi/ /dngos po de dag ngo bo ni//
70b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems yin de yi phyir/ /de yi rang bzhin brjod par rigs/ /thog dang tha ma med zhi ba/ /dngos po dngos med zad pa'i gtso/ /stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa/ /byang chub sems su gsungs pa'o/ /byang chub sems de'i nang du ni/ /bdag po 'ga' yang
70b5(rgyud 'grel): mi dmigs so/ /de yi gnyen po rnam gsum la/ /tha dad dbye bar rnam par rtog /de yang rang bzhin la mi dmigs/ /'od gsal sems ni dag pa la/ /gcig dang du ma brang ba'i phyir/ /don gzhan 'gyur ba yang mi dmigs/ /sgyu ma tsam gyi sems
70b6(rgyud 'grel): de ni/ /dag dang ma dag gnyis mi rung/ /de bas rang bzhin rnam dag pa'o/ /byang chub sems su nges pa'o/ /de yi de bzhin nyid ngo bo/ /gang dang 'brel pa ma yin no/ /ma 'brel pa yang ma yin no/ /kun rtog yang ni snyam mi sems/ /nam mkha' rtag med ltar
70b7(rgyud 'grel): mi snang/ /chos rnams kun kyang de bzhin no/ /chos rnams sku gsum mnyam pa ste/ /gang yin sems kyi ngo bo'o/ /sems de de bzhin nyid gnas la/ /de ni khams gsum gnas ma yin/ /mi gnas de ni kun brtags kyi/ /skye med ngo bo med pa'o/ /
71a1(rgyud 'grel): yin yang bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid de/ /rgyu gsum mi gnas chos de ni/ /skye med ye shes 'byung ba'i gnas/ /sad dang rmi lam dbyer med pas/ /'das pa rmi lam lta bu ste/ /'di
71a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar byung ba rmi lam 'dra/ /ma 'ongs rmi lam las byung ba'o/ /bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /sems can rnams ni ji snyed pa/ /rmi lam lta bur bdag med de/ /sgyu ma lta bur de bzhin no/ /dper na yid bzhin rin po che/ /rtog
71a3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad rab bral yang/ /skal pa ldan pa'i sems dbang gis/ /'dod pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin byang chub sems de las/ /chos rnams thams cad 'byung bas na/ /nam mkha' rjes 'brang chos rnams la/ /sangs rgyas chos
71a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams rjes su 'brang/ /de bas dngos grub thams cad dang/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad ni/ /lus dang ngag dang sems la gnas/ /de ni khams gsum mi gnas so/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dag pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin gcig la gcig mi
71a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /de dag de bzhin nyid gnas pas/ /de ni smra brjod yul las 'das/ /de 'dra'i de bzhin nyid la ni/ /rang gi ye shes rab sbyor zhing/ /gzhan yang bdag po 'di snyam du/ /sku mi 'gyur ba 'di snyam du/ /gsung dang thugs kyi
71a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid med/ /nam mkha' rdo rje rtog las byung/ /log pa dag tu 'dzin snyam nas/ /bdag gcig ston pa mi gsung bzhugs/ /de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sogs/ /de yi gnyis pa bdag pa'i phyir/ /bde bar gshegs la yang
71a7(rgyud 'grel): zhus pa/ /gsung la log 'byung mi rtag gsol/ /ci phyir sngon gyi rgyal ba ltar/ /rdo rje 'chang bas mdzad par rigs/ /yod de tshangs pa la sogs pa/ /yang dag mngon shes ma thob pas/ /kun rdzob rgyun la 'khrul pas na/ /bdag yo 'di
71b1(rgyud 'grel): yis shes nas sam/ /yang na mi sems 'chad do sems/ /de bas log 'byung bkag pa'o/ /skye med rdo rje mngon byang chub/ /ngo bo med pa mi 'gyur ba/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis kyang mi shes/ /des ni sems can kun la khyab
71b2(rgyud 'grel): des na de dag thams cad kun/ /byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/ /de blangs de ni thob pa'o/ /de bas chos 'di thams cad kun/ /ngo bo nyid dag gnas med la/ /chos dbyings shes rab gnas su rtog /rdo rje las
71b3(rgyud 'grel): byung ltar smra ba/ /smra ste smra ba yang ma yin/ /sngon bzhin thams cad mkha' la gnas/ /nam mkha' gang du mi gnas pas/ /de ni rang bzhin 'od gsal dbyings/ /de du yang dag kun rdzob rgyan/ /dbyer med pa yis rnam par bsgom/ /de
71b4(rgyud 'grel): ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /byang chub sems ni bsgom pa'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems bsgom pas/ /rnam dag gsang ba'i yi ge gsum/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'i sku/ /dad pa'i 'bras bu rdzogs par 'gyur/ /gang phyir bud med
71b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa dang/ /ma ning gsal byed thams cad ni/ /yi ge gsum bsdud de ma phyir ro/ /de ni kun gyi gtso bo'o/ /dngos po gzugs can thams cad dang/ /sgra grags pa ni ji snyed dang/ /bsam rtog ma lus thams cad kun/ /rdo rje gsum gyis
71b6(rgyud 'grel): sdud pa'o/ /de 'dra'i de nyid gsum pos ni/ /kun khyab gzhan gyi spyod yul min/ /nyag gcig rtogs pa'i spyod yul bas/ /de ni gsang ba'i yi ge'o/ /de bas rdzogs ldan la sogs par/ /de ni snod ni ma gzigs pas/ /rdo rje 'chang ba de yi
71b7(rgyud 'grel): tshe/ /de 'gyur gsang ba'i don ma bshad/ /pha rol phyin pa la sogs pas/ /bskal par 'bad kyang mi brnyas pa/ /gsang ba'i don 'dis tshe 'di la/ /skad cig thang gcig yud cam gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub che/ /sku gsum dbyer med
72a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mchog /rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi gnas/ /bla na med pa des 'gyur ro/ /gong gsungs sems can de dag kun/ /'di yi gnod ma yin thos nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /snying
72a2(rgyud 'grel): rje gar gyis de dag dus/ /don de zab mor bstan pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i yi ge rnam dag pas/ /thun mong gi ni sdug bsngal te/ /de bas bde gshegs rnams kyis bkag /dus 'dir bdag cag snod du gyur/ /de yi chos nyid der blangs pas
72a3(rgyud 'grel): sku gsum rdo rje'i chos nyid de/ /'ga' 'gas rtogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar bstan pa'i dngos po rnams/ /rnam pa bzhi ru yang dag dbye/ /skyes bu lam dang de sngon 'gro/ /lam gyis bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu'i/ /skyes bu gsum ste dang po
72a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /cung zad tsam dang ye shes thob/ /bsnyen pa thun mong cig shos kyi/ /bsgrub pa 'jug pa'i skyes bu'o/ /rdo rje can gyis bstan pa yi/ /lam gyi rim pa rnam gnyis te/ /bskyed pa yin ni rim pa dang/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa kho na'o/ /
72a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i rim pa bsnyen pa dang/ /thun mong thun min bsgrub pa la/ /snod dag skye bo'i rim pa gsum/ /bsgom pa'i rim pa ji snyed pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa rnal 'byor dang/ /phyag rgya las skyes chos thams cad/ /sgyu ma la sogs 'drar bsgrub pa/ /
72a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bzhin gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /de yi sngon 'gro rnam gsum ste/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni dam tshig dang/ /de yis bsgrub pa'i ngo bo ni/ /rdo rje 'chang bas rab tu gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ste ri mo dang/ /lus dang byang sems b+ha ga ste/ /
72a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lnga la sogs pa yi/ /thob byed gnas su yang dag bshad/ /dam tshig la ni rnam gnyis te/ /thun mong sdom par bstan pa dang/ /thun mong ma yin sdom pa'o/ /thun mong ma yin rnam gsum ste/ /spang ba'i dam tshig sdom pa dang/ /bza' dang bsrung
72b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dam tshig dang/ /rnal 'byor snying po sdom pa ste/ /snod sogs rkyen du yang dag bshad/ /dbang gi rnam pa gsum dag ste/ /bum pa'i dbang ni dang po dang/ /gzhis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang/ /shes rab ye shes gsum pa'o/ /de
72b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang/ /bla ma dam pa'i zhal las ni/ /thob pa yin te rnam pa gsum/ /kun la rab tu khyab pa'o/ /'bras bu la ni rnam gnyis te/ /thun mong gi ni grub pa dang/ /phyag rgya chen po'i grub pa'o/ /thun mong grub pa rnam pa brgyad/ /rigs
72b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin mngon par shes pa lnga/ /mdag gzhug sngags kyi khyad par dang/ /a dza las kyi dbye ba'o/ /cig shos rdo rje gsum yin te/ /de dang de ru rab bstan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas nyid grub dngos grub ni/ /yang dag ye shes dbang thob pa'o/ /rnal 'byor chen
72b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i rgyud rnams kun/ /tshul 'di las ni ma 'das pas/ /shes rab ldan pa rnams kyis kyang/ /'di rnams kho na bsgre bar bya// //gsang dang rab gsad shin tu gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'i rgyud/ /phra zhing shes dka' 
72b5(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs rnams kyi yul 'di rtog bral dpyad las 'das/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi bla med thugs rje nyi zer gyis/ /bskal par 'dus byas pa yis mun pa kun bsal bde gshegs spyod yul bstan/ /bdag gis cung zad rtogs nas
72b6(rgyud 'grel): dang po grogs mchog bzang po gsang ba dang/ /kos la yi grogs mchog dri med pa yi bzang po zhes bya dang/ /shes rab lha zhes bya ba'i grogs mchog sany+tsa la yi dur khrod gnas/ /legs pa'i tshul mang sh+ri len+t+ra yi gtsugs lag khang gnas/ /dge
72b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i spun gyis gsol btab rgyud kyi rgyal po de la blo dman pas/ tshogs ni chung ngus rtogs par bya phyir nga rgyal ma yin dang pa yis/ /bsdus pa'i don dang sgrub pa'i thabs 'di 'bad pas sems khral cher byas la/ /sangs rgyas la sogs dpa' bo
73a1(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa rnams kyis bdag la bzod par mdzod// //de ltar byas pa las byung dge ba dri med de yis 'gro ba rnams/ /'di gzhung rim pas chogs ni rab rdzogs rigs bzhi la sogs pas
73a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni/ /tha mal pa yi skad cig sogs bsgres de 'gag de yis bzlog bya ste/ /rang gi phyag rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba thob nas bdud las rgyal gyur cig /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba/ slob dpon
73a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po bi ta pA ngas mdzed pa rdzogs so/ //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu ha dang/ /bod kyi lo tsa ba lha bcan po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
73a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba bdun pa zhes bya ba dbang gzhi rab tu byed pa slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad pa bzhugs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ yo ga sapta nA ma tsa tu ra b+hi she ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ sbyor ba bdun pa zhes bya ba dbang gzhi'i rab tu byed
73a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig dpe med tshul ldan pa/ /gnyis med bde chen rang bzhin med/ /thugs rjes rgyas shing bar chad med/ /'gog med sangs rgyas de la 'dud/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu kun khyab pa/ /gang gi snying gi
73a6(rgyud 'grel): pad dbus su/ /mi shigs thig le dbus gnas pa/ /gzhom med chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de 'dra rab tu ston byed pa/ /sems ni de nyid la bzhag pa/ /g.yang sa'i lam sgrol dge 'dun che/ /bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la 'dud/ /lam gyis mi
73a7(rgyud 'grel): pa sngon 'gro ba/ /dkyil 'khor dam tshig dbang sogs te/ /bum pa la sogs rim pa yis/ /dbang gi dbye ba cung zad brjod/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs cho ga yis/ /thar chen yang dag bslu ba ste/ /de nyid med pas mi 'grub pas/ /bzhi
73b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don ni yang dag bshad/ /thams cad mkhyen pas ji skad du/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud bstan la/ /dbang ni rnam pa gsum dag tu/ /rgyud 'di las ni rab tu bshad/ /bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste/ /gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang/ /gsum
73b2(rgyud 'grel): pa shes rab ye shes dbang/ /de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang/ /bla ma'i bka' las shes par bya/ /dbang ni dang po dbye ba yang/ /cung zad kyang ni bshad bya ste/ /rgyu yi slob dpon chen po yis/ /de ni yang dag skur bar 'dod/ /yul ma khar khyim
73b3(rgyud 'grel): dang glang po sogs/ /rjes mthun de la dbul bar bya/ /de yi thun mong gzhan pa yi/ /sdom pa snod du rung phyir sbyin/ /ri mo dang ni lus kyi ni/ /dkyil 'khor du ni de nyid thob/ /rig dang 'di rgyu slob dpon dbang/ /cho ga'i rim pa gzhan du bshad/
73b4(rgyud 'grel): de yi rang gi ngo bo ni/ /sku yi rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ /srong gcod la sogs snga phyi yi/ /ngag dang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /thabs kyis khyad par 'phags pa'i phyir/ /sa brgyad pa ru yang dag bshad/ /sbyor gsum yan lag bcas pa ru/ /de la yang
73b5(rgyud 'grel): dag bstan par bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams kyis/ /snang srid dben par rtogs pa'o/ /snod du rung phyir bum pa ste/ /blugs gtor dag par byed pas dbang/ /'di ni yang dag rgyu rim pa'i/ /lung gis nges par bshad pa'o/ /dang po'i
73b6(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba bstad nas ni/ /gnyis pa yang ni bshad bya ste/ /rgyu dang rkyen gyi slob dpon gyis/ /dbang bskur de ni yang dag thob/ /gser dang dngul la sogs pa yi/ /rjes mthun de la dbul bar bya/ /srog gcod la sogs thun mong ba'i/ /sdom pa stsod
73b7(rgyud 'grel): du rung phyir sbyin/ /lhag pa byang sems zhes bya ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor du ni de nyid thob/ /blo yi bye brag gis bskur ba'i/ /cho ga'i rim pa gzhan du bshad/ /de yi rang gi ngo bo ni/ /gsung gi rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ /rdzun la sogs pa snga phyi yi/ /ngag
74a1(rgyud 'grel): dang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /thabs kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir/ /dgu dang bcu la yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i ngo bo yis/ /sgyu 'dra'i ting nge 'dzin bstan par bya/ /mig sogs nang gi chos rnams kyi/ /snang srid dben par
74a2(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'o/ /bsgrags min phyir na gsang ba ste/ /blugs gtor dag par byed pas dbang/ /'di yang brgyud pa'i rim pa yi/ /lung gis yang dag bshad pa'o/ /gnyis pa'i dbye ba bstan nas su/ /gsum pa yang ni bstan par bya/ /rgyu dang
74a3(rgyud 'grel): rkyen dang lhan cig byed/ /slob dpon gsum gyis thob pa'o/ /pad+ma rA ga pur sha sogs/ /rjes mthun de la dbul bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba la sogs 'gog /sdom pa mchog ni sbyin pa'o/ /b+ha ga rnam dag zhes bya yi/ /dkyil
74a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du ni de nyid thob/ /shes rab dbang dang ye shes dbang/ /cho ga'i rim pa gzhan du bshad/ /de yi rang gi ngo bo ni/ /thugs kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ /brnab sems la sogs sngo phyi yi/ /ngag dang nye bar mi 'gyur re/ /thabs
74a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi khyad par phye ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje lta bur yang dag gnas/ /mchog gi dngos grub grub pa'i phyir/ /brtul zhugs cho ga de la bstan/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo yis/ /chos kun dbyen par rtog pa'o/ /shes rab las kyis ye shes te/ /ma
74a6(rgyud 'grel): rtogs rtogs phyir dbang yin no/ /'di yang brgyud pa'i rim pa yi/ /lus kyi yang dag bshad pa'o/ /da ni yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bzhi pa mngon par byang chub pa/ /bla ma'i zhal nas nges thob pa/ /sbyor ba bdun gyi de nyid bshad/
74a7(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gnas phyir slob dpon med/ /rin thang med phyir yon med de/ /sdom pa pas ni sdom pa med/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor med/ /stobs kyis thob phyir dbang med de/ /spyi pas rang gi ngo bo med/ /chos kun gnyen po gnyen po
74b1(rgyud 'grel): med/ /rdo rje 'dzin gnas sa med de/ /rang bzhin med phyir cho ga dang/ /lta ba nges tshig med pa ru/ /bla ma yis ni yang dag bshad/ /shes rab las skyes ye shes ni/ /bzhi pa yin par shes par bya/ /mkha' gnyis rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /
74b2(rgyud 'grel): man ngag tu ni de nyid brtag /legs par goms pa'i phyag rgya las/ /'bad pa'i bya bas rtogs pas na/ /'dod chags chags bral bar ma ste/ /sbyor ba bdun gyi mtshan nyid ngo/ /nam ba'i khams ni rdo rje sbyor/ /yang dag sbyin can pa'i tshan
74b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung/ /gang gang yang ngag dga' byed chags/ /dga' gnyis rab tu dben nyid mthong/ /pad+ma'i dkyil du rdo rje nor/ /pad snying lan ni 'byor pa ste/ /rdo rje'i skyil mo krung nad sems/ /nor bu bar du mthong byas pas/ /gang de nyid ni ye shes
74b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ /'di nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa ru/ /bla ma'i zhal snga nas kyis bshad/ /de la sbyor ba bdun gyi ni/ /rim pa bzhi par shes par bya/ /ci lta zhe na/ legs par bsgoms dang lhan cig tu/ /ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis/ /nang nas
74b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gsal bya ste/ /sor mo cung zad go byas te/ /snying 'dar dran pa nyams pa dang/ /spyi bor skra grol gos kyang 'dor/ /ngul chu thigs pas lus kun khyab/ /brtan pa'i ngang tshul shor nas ni/ /rang gi ba spu kun kyang g.yo/ /mig
74b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar pra bas rab bltas pa'i/ /dga' ba'i ye shes yang dag 'byung/ /rtag pa'i mdog gis yang dag brgyan/ /de ni dpe med bde rdzogs so/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i sku la ni/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa/ /'ja' tshon lta bur rab gsal ba/ /gsal
74b7(rgyud 'grel): ba nyid na ma skyes pa'i/ /sku chen dang du blangs gyur na/ /chos kyi sku dang sprul sku yang/ /stobs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yi/ /sku mche blta bas mi doms pa'o/ /zhal gsum phyag drug ltar snang ba/ /mchog sku ldan
75a1(rgyud 'grel): pas rig mas 'khyud/ /shes rab ye shes dbang dus su/ /mtshan nyid de yi tshul du gnas/ /ye shes dbang du gyur pa yis/ /brtul zhugs la sogs rim pa yis/ /gnas nas de yi don bsgrub tshe/ /de
75a2(rgyud 'grel): yi dus su de 'thob pa'o/ /dpe med bde rdzogs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// //da ni rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dpe med bde rdzogs sku de yang/ /pha rol phyin pa'i rdzogs sku las/ /khyad par mthong bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rang
75a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od rig ma dang ldan pas/ /sbyor ba gnyis pa bshad par bya/ /gnyis med dang bral sku de ni/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa tsam yin la/ /de dang mnyam pa dag pa'i phyir/ /rang gi rig mas 'khyud pa'o/ /de la gnyis kyi spros med pas/ /dngos
75a4(rgyud 'grel): po kun la ma zin pa'i/ /rgyu ni de la yod pa'o/ /de 'dra ma yin 'di la ni/ /gnyis med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /'dod chags chen po'i bde ba yis/ /'dod pa'i 'bras chen rab sbyin pas/ /de bas rgyud chen 'di las ni/ /sbyar ba 'di ni bshad pa
75a5(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /ye shes dang ni chos nyid dang/ /don dam dang ni kun rdzob dang/ /thabs chen dang ni shes rab ste/ /bde ba dang ni byang sems sogs/ /de ltar gnyis kyi rnam pa kun/ /dbyer med mtshon phyir gnyis med de/ /sgyu ma'i skyes bu med pas?
75a6(rgyud 'grel): shes rab ye shes dbang dus su/ /dga' ba'i ye shes dus su ni/ /khyad par gnyis med rang 'byung ba/ /gnyis su med par de la bshad/ /rnal 'byor gsum pas brtul zhugs kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshe ni de bzhin du/ /gnyis med 'gyur bar 'gyur
75a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ru/ /nges pa nyid du bshad pa yin/ /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba ste gnyis pa'o// //da ni rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dga' ba bar ma'i ye shes mchog /chos skur yang dag nges pa yi/ /lus sems gnyis
75b1(rgyud 'grel): med byed bshad pa/ /bde ba de ni ma lus kyi/ /sems can kun la gnas gyur kyang/ /de las 'di ni khyad mthong phyir/ /chen po ru ni rab tu 'dod/ /rgyas pa dang ni sim pa dang/ /nyon mongs med dang bar chad med/ /khyab cing 'gog pa yod med
75b2(rgyud 'grel): par/ /ji srid 'khor ba gnas kyi bar/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis su/ /de nyid du ni rab tu 'jug /de 'dra'i bde chen khyad par ni/ /shes rab ye shes la yang med/ /legs goms phyag rgya rtogs pa dang/ /mi rtog zhing ni nyon mongs pa dang/
75b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje pad+ma bskyod dus su/ /rdul ni tsha ba drag pa dang/ /kun lam khyab phyir dang ni/ /lus kun la ni ma rgyas dang/ /nor bu tsam la gnas pa dang/ /yud tsam gyis ni 'gog pa ste/ /de phyir chen po zhes mi bya/ /'on kyang shes rab ye shes la
75b4(rgyud 'grel): bde chen mtshon nyid gzugs su gnas/ /de bas legs goms phyag rgya las/ /yu dum ba ra'i me tog ltar/ /rlung dang rang gi bya ba yis/ /skyes bu gang la thang gcig tu/ /bde ba de nyid rdo rje ru/ /'dug byas 'dar ba'i dus su ni/ /
75b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu de yis rab tu brtag /mi gnas kyang ni mi bslu'i phyir/ /bde ba chen po zhes su bshad/ /'di ni dngos po thams cad kyis/ /mdza' yi de bzhin nyid yin par/ /bla ma mchog rnams kun gyis bshad/ /sbyor ba gzhan kun sbyor ba'i 'di
75b6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag tu ni shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor ye shes dbang gyur pas/ /brtul zhugs la sogs rig ma yis/ /gnas nas de yi don sgrub tshe/ /de yi dus su de thob pa'o/ /bde ba chen po'i sbyor ba ste gsum pa'o/ /
75b7(rgyud 'grel): da ni rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dngos po kun la rnal 'byor gyis/ /phyin log rab tu bzlog pa'i phyir/ /sbyor ba bzhi pa bshad par bya/ /rang bzhin med phyir rang bzhin med/ /gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang/ /bral phyir stong pa nyid du
76a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /dngos po kun la mu stegs dang/ /nyan thos gnyis dang rnam shes smra/ /dbu ma pa yi gzhung gis su/ /tha dang so sor rtog pa yang/ /'di nyid la ni yongs 'khrul ste/ /so sor kun tu rtog pa'o/ /
76a2(rgyud 'grel): de dag kun kyang don dam pa/ /rtogs pa min pas bla dang bcas/ /de bas de yi rang bzhin kun/ /med pas 'di kun sgyu ma dang/ /smig rgyu sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'khor lo ru ni yang dag bshad/ /de bas de la bdag po dang/ /
76a3(rgyud 'grel): gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa'i chos/ /dngos po'i ngo bor 'dzin pa dang/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /gnyis su 'dzin pa yod pa med/ /'di kun mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /'khor lo 'di ni nges pa yin/ /de la rang bzhin med pa dang/ /
76a4(rgyud 'grel): bsres pa'i don ni mchog tu gsungs/ /dngos po kun gyi nang nas kyang/ /rang bzhin med pa gtso bor bshad/ /ci phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /'di bsgoms pas ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub/ /
76a5(rgyud 'grel): kha cig gis ni gzhung ngag gi/ /chad pa'i stong pa stong pa min/ /rang bzhin med pa ma yin no/ /de yi rang bzhin de yin no/ /de ni lung skal can yin pas/ /de ltar gang bsgoms rnal 'byor pas/ /gzung bsgrub ma legs sbrul sogs
76a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /de bas rang bzhin med pa 'di/ /bde ba chen po'i skad cig la/ /dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ /gang min gsal ba'i gsal ba ni/ /rang bzhin med par bshad pa ste/ /rang bzhin med dang de bzhin nyid/ /chos nyid dang
76a7(rgyud 'grel): ni chos mnyam pa/ /don dam la sogs rnam grangs kyang/ /rang bzhin med pa 'di nyid las/ /der ni gzhan dag ma gsungs so/ /dngos po kun ni gzhig pa dang/ /gzhom pa yis ni stong pa min/ /de 'dra'i stong pa la sems kyis
76b1(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum du ni btang ba yi/ /stobs kyis rang bzhin med par 'gyur/ /med pa nyid ni rgyu sogs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag 'gog mi 'gyur/ /mi 'gog dus na rang bzhin med/ /rnal 'byor gsum pas brtul zhugs kyis/ /spyod
76b2(rgyud 'grel): pa de don bsgrub pa na/ /de yi dus su de thob pa'o/ /rang bzhin med pa'i sbyor ba ste bzhi pa'o// //da ni rab tu bshad bya ba/ /rang bzhin med pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bkra shis med pa dgag don
76b3(rgyud 'grel): du/ /sbyor ba lnga pa bshad par bya/ /thugs rjes rgyas pa 'di med par/ /rnam pa kun gyi sems can don/ /byed par nus pa ma yin te/ /de bas thams cad mkhyen pa rnams/ /thugs rjes gang bas rgyas pa ste/ /khams gsum gyi ni sems
76b4(rgyud 'grel): can rnams/ /sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas pa las/ /grol bar 'dod pa thugs rje'o/ /thugs rje de yang rnam gsum ste/ /sems can ma lus thams cad kun/ /sdug bsngal de rgyu las 'gog par/ /rtse gcig dmigs pa gtod pa ni/ /las dang
76b5(rgyud 'grel): po yis shes par bya/ /khams gsum 'di ni chos dbyings tsam/ /de la sems can ming yang med/ /don dam par yang ming yang med/ /don dam par yang mi dmigs pa/ /sa gnas byang chub sems dpa' o/ /dmigs pa thams cad dang
76b6(rgyud 'grel): bral pa/ /ji ltar nam mkha' khams su yang/ /sprin 'byung lta bur snang ba ni/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ /thugs rje chen po yin par gsungs/ /de 'dra'i snying rje rje btsun che/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyas pas na/ /thugs rje rgyas pa
76b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bshad do/ /'khor ba ji srid yod kyi bar/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rim pa dang/ /shAkya thub pa la sogs pa'i/ /gzugs kyis gdul bya'i rgyud la ni/ /ji ltar 'dul ba der snang ste/ /kun don byed par shes par bya/ /sprul sku 'di ni dang
77a1(rgyud 'grel): po ru/ /dga' bral shes pa'i dus su ni/ /thig le 'gog par 'gyur ba ste/ /nam mkha' i khams kun gang 'gyur ba'i/ /gzugs kyi rab tu gnas pa'o/ /ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu ni/ /mi rtog bzhin du skal ldan
77a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ /don rnams byed de de bzhin du/ /bde chen rang bzhin med pa las/ /dmigs pa med kyang don 'byung ba'o/ /ye shes dbang du gyur pa yis/ /brtul zhugs la sogs rim pa yis/ /gang tshe de don bsgrub pa na/ /de yi dus su de
77a3(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'o/ /thugs rjes rgyas pa'i sbyor ba ste lnga pa'o// //da ni rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dpe med bde rdzogs chos sku dang/ /thugs rje sku yi ngo bo ste/ /res 'ga' ba nyid 'gag pa'i phyir/ /sbyor bdug
77a4(rgyud 'grel): ba bshad par bya/ /dpe med bde rdzogs sku chen yang/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'da' tshul gyis/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /rgyud dag rnams la rtag tu snang/ /de bzhin bde chen chos su yang/ /khyab dang rgyas pa'i tshul gyis su/ /nam
77a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i ji srid gnas kyi bar/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis 'jug /thugs rje'i rang bzhin sku de yang/ /gdul bya ji ltar mos pa ltar/ /srid pa srid du gnas nas ni/ /bar chad med par rgyun tu 'jug /de 'dra'i rgyun mi chad pa'i
77a6(rgyud 'grel): sku/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa ste/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /shes rab ye shes dbang dus su/ /dga' ba gsum gyi gnas skabs su/ /skad cig gnyis sogs chu tshod dang/ /nyin gcig zla ba lo la sogs/ /gnas pa
77a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyun mi 'chad ces bya/ /phyis kyi 'bras bu mi bslu phyir/ /de la yang ni de skad du/ /bla ma'i zhal las bshad pa yin/ /ye shes dbang du gyur pa yis/ /brtul zhugs cho ga de bsgrub cho/ /de yi dus su de thob nas/ /de nas 'khor bI
77b1(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yi bar/ /rgyun gyis rtag tu gnas pa'o/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sbyor bste drug pa'o// //da ni rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dpe med bde rdzogs sku chen dang/ /bral ba dgag par bya ba'i phyir/ /sbyor ba bdun pa bshad par bya/ /
77b2(rgyud 'grel): gong du yang dag gsung pa yi/ /dga' ba'i ye shes dus byung ba'i/ /dpe med bde tshogs rigs ldan sku/ /lan cig byung nas med pa ni/ /'gog pa zhes ni rab tu bya/ /'gog pa de las byung ba na/ /phyis kyi 'bras bu mchog gyur pa/ /
77b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa med par shes par bya/ /snying rje che ba'i dbang gis ni/ /'khor ba ji srid bar du ni/ /dbang phyug brgyad kyi bcom ldan 'das/ /mi g.yo gzhug phyir 'gog med dang/ /gnas la yang ni de bzhin du/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par
77b4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /skal ldan rnams kyi sngon du yang/ /shes rab ye shes dbang dus su/ /bla ma'i zhal las des thob pa/ /dga' dang dga' ba bar ma dang/ /dga' bral dga' ba 'gog pa las/ /de 'dra'i sems rgyun myong ba ste/ /'gog pa med pa zhes
77b5(rgyud 'grel): bshad do/ /ye shes dbang du gyur pa yis/ /brtul zhugs la sogs spyod pa la/ /gnas nas de yi don bsgrub tshe/ /de yi dus su de thob pa'o/ /bya ba byas pa'i dbang phyug che/ /mdza' yi pha rol phyin pa'i mchog /mi gnas mya ngan
77b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o/ /'gog pa med pa'i sbyor ba ste bdun pa'o// //de ltar sbyor bdun ldan pa yi/ /bzhi pa mngon par byang chub pa/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ba'o/ /dpal ldan
77b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi gnas/ /chos rnams kun gyi chos nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis thabs bya'o/ /de ni 'khor ba ji srid kyis/ /bar du gnas pas rtag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi/ /ngo bor gyur pas gcig
78a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de la sgrib pa bzhi yi ni/ /tsha ba med pas bsil ba'o/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa ni/ /gcig tu gyur pas bde ba'o/ /gzugs la sogs pa rtog pa yis/ /ma gos phyir ni mi gdud? pa'o/ /phyir yog?
78a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul rtog dang bral bas/ /dag cing dri ma med pa'o/ /zab gsal byang chub las mi ldog /gzhan don mdzad pas dga' ba'o/ /chos nyid dang ni sems can la/ /sems mnyam bzhag pas yid dang pa/ /'di ni bde ba chen po yi/ /ro myang
78a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi mtshan nyid brgyad/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /bzhi pa'i don ni bla med pa'o/ /dngos po kun la cher gnas dang/ /gang mi gsal ba'i dngos po ru/ /de nyid bla ma dam pa yi/ /zhal nas nges par thob pa la/ /som nyi yid gnyis
78a4(rgyud 'grel): mi bya'o/ /de yi ngo bo bshad nas ni/ /rnam grangs dag dang bshad pa bya/ /'dod chags dang ni bar ma dang/ /chags bral du ni shes par bya/ /dga' dang dga' ba bar ma dang/ /dga' bral gyi ni dga' ba'o/ /bde rdzogs sku dang chos sku dang/ /
78a5(rgyud 'grel): sprul sku ru ni shes par bya/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni/ /stong dang mtshan med smon pa med/ /gsang dang gsang chen shin tu gsang/ /rnal 'byor lhag pa'i rnal 'byor dang/ /rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya'o/ /bdag dang gzhan dang lhan
78a6(rgyud 'grel): cig byed/ /dpal gsum du ni shes par bya/ /dang po rnal 'byor las rgyal mchog /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog shes par bya/ /thig le phra mo gsang sngags bzlas/ /rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/ /dam tshig gsum dang ting nge 'dzin dang/ /
78a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' shes par bya/ /lus dang b+ha ga byang sems kyi/ /dkyil 'khor gsum du shes par bya/ /bum pa dang ni gsang ba dang/ /shes rab ye shes shes par bya/ /de la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi/ bzhi pa yi ni tshig gi
78b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /de 'dra'i rang bzhin mi shes la/ /de nyid sngags kyi sku ru bshad/ /dpe med bde rdzogs ye shes sku/ /hUM sogs bskyed pa'i lha yi gzugs/ /bzhis bsgrub sku ru rab tu gnas/ /gong gi bzhi la gnas byed phyir/ /bar chad med cing
78b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa med/ /de ltar dpal ldan gsang 'dus su/ /rtog pa yi ni rnal 'byor pas/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa la brten te/ /bzhi pa'i don la spyod par 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i don rnams mi shes pas/ /phyi rol don la mngon zhen te/ /rin chen sems ni
78b3(rgyud 'grel): dri can byas/ /des na dge dang mi dge ba'i/ /las byas pas ni mtho ris dang/ /dmyal la sogs par 'chod 'gyur ba/ /chos 'di rang bzhin gyis dag pa/ /rnam rtog dra bas blun byas la/ /dge sdig phung po gnyis su brtags/ /de spangs nas ni skye
78b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i/ /rang bzhin don ni rtogs par bya/ /yang dag don du dge spangs na/ /dge ba smin pas smos ci dgos/ /dper na mi gang chu klung gi /pha rol tu ni 'gro ba dag /rtsa shing la sogs bsdus byas pas/ /chu la rgal pa'i gzings byas te/ /de la
78b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jus te rab brgal nas/ /bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar/ /de bzhin bzhi po'i ngo bo yi/ /don rtogs pas na 'bad rtsol gyi/ /bya ba de la ci zhig bya/ /de phyir bla ma dam pa nyid/ /mnyes byas dbang gi don mchog gi /bdud rtsi mchog 'di gang zag
78b6(rgyud 'grel): gang/ /bdag gzhan don du 'thung byed pa/ /gang nge rgyal ba'i sras zhes bya/ /de phyin chad ni gang cung zad/ /'dod chags la sogs dngos po rnams/ /bdud rtsir zin phyir de la dbul/ /skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /sgom par ldan pa smos ci dgos/ /
78b7(rgyud 'grel): de ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /de ni yang dag rkang gnyis mchog /de ni 'khor ba'i pha rol son/ /de ni phyin log khur chen por/ /de ni bya ba thams cad byas/ /de ni kun gzigs rnams kyis bzhag /de ni gang du gnas gyur kyang/ /sangs rgyas kyi gdung
79a1(rgyud 'grel): ma chad pas/ /bstan pa rin chen gnas pa yi/ /gtso bo ru ni de gnas so/ /de ni gang du 'dug kyang rung/ /de dang de ru 'jig rten mgon/ /bzhugs dang bzhud par shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor de la thams cad kyis/ /dngos po
79a2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis phyag byar 'os/ /srid gsum bdag po kun gyis kyang/ /dkyil 'khor mchod par 'os pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang/ /nyin re lan gsum byon nas ni/ /phyag byed cing ni sngags brjod na/ /gzhan ma rnams ni
79a3(rgyud 'grel): smos ci dgos/ /de bas kun nas 'bad pa yis/ /bla ma yang dag mnyes byas te/ /bzhi pa'i don mchog blang byas nas/ /dgon pa'am yang na gror gi mthar/ /gang rung ci rung de lta bur/ /gnas nas bla ma'i zhal snga yi/ /bskyed pa'i
79a4(rgyud 'grel): rim pa bsnyen bya ste/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtogs par bya/ /dngos po thams cad dngos med pas/ /rgyu sogs don ni rtogs pa dang/ /rdo rje pad+ma spyad pa dang/ bdud rtsi lngas ni rang dgar byed/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la ni/ /rnal 'byor ci
79a5(rgyud 'grel): dgar sbyor byed cing/ /gsang bar bya ba'i chos gsang bas/ /gsang zhing sbas te spyad par bya/ /longs spyod chen po dka' thub dang/ /bsam gtan smyon pa'i tshul gyis su/ /de 'dra'i ngo bo ma shes pas/ /lag pa dang ni rkang pa dang/ /mig sogs
79a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa btang bas kyang/ /bskal pa chen po brgya ru lang/ /bdud rtsi'i ro thob mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas dngos po 'di gcig gis/ /dam pa rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /zab cing legs par gsal ba'i sku/ /kun nas 'od zer 'phro ldan pa/ /kun tu bzang po de
79a7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi yid/ /rnal 'byor gang gis sgom mi byed/ /de bsgoms pas ni tshe 'di la/ /zla ba drug gis dngos grub mchog /the tshom med par 'grub pa ste/ /su yis dngos po de bzlog 'gyur/ /'khor lo gcig pa'i shing rta la/ /rta bdun sbrul
79b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi thag pas sprel/ /kha khyod ro smad med pa yis/ /mkha' la 'khrid nas mdza' ru phyin/ /rang dang gzhan don byed pa ltar/ /dngos po yis ni chos kun dang/ /mdzes gyur min ltar snad gyur yang/ /rang dang gzhan gyi dngos grub pas/ /skyes bus
79b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni blang bar 'os/ /dal 'byor 'di ni g.yo bas na/ /drag po'i rlung gis mar me ltar/ /skad cig du ni mi snang 'gyur/ /de bas de nyid bsam par 'os/ /de 'dra'i rang bzhin ngo bo la/ /sgom pas rtag tu mnyam zhog la/ /khyad bdag rim bzhin rtogs
79b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /bdag ni rtag tu gsol ba 'debs/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /bla ma'i zhal snga bsgrubs pas na/ /sbyor ba bdun gyi bdud rtsi mchog /sman pa'i zhabs kyis thob pa'o/ /de 'dra'i bdud rtsi de la ni/ /'thung byed de ni log pa yi/ /
79b4(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa yis ni rab 'chi ba'i/ /nad ni kun nas med gyur cig /de med bas na sems can kun/ /yang dag phung po rgyas 'gyur te/ /sbyor ba bdun phyi rang bzhin mchog /'bras bu de nyid rtogs par shog /sbyor ba bdun pa zhes bya ba/ /dbang bzhi'i rab
79b5(rgyud 'grel): tu byed pa/ /slob dpon chen po bi ta pA ngas mdzad ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu hya dang/ /bod kyi lo tsa ba mda' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
79b6(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma chen po'i cho ga slob dpon chen po bi ta pA ngas mdzad pa bzhugs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ /mahA sa laM bi d+hi/ /bod skad du/ /gtor ma chen po'i cho ga /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig shes
79b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'i sgrib sogs rab spangs nas/ /me long la sogs ye shes yang dag ldan/ /gsum gyi 'khor lo don byed rab mchog gtso/ /'jam dbyangs de la 'dud cing bla ma la'ang/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi bar chad zhi byas nas/ /mngon par don ni
80a1(rgyud 'grel): rab bsgrub phyir/ /sangs rgyas ye shes zhal snga'i rim 'ongs pa/ /ma lus bstan pa'i gtor ma bshad par bya/ /mchod sbyin rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /gtso bo gtor ma'i las yin te/ /rnal 'byor
80a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni de bsgrub 'dod/ /cho ga 'di la 'bad par bya/ /gang phyir gzhan don gnyer ba 'am/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i las byed na/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg gnyis ka pas/ /gtor ma'i las 'di mchog tu gsungs/ /de yi las ni 'di
80a3(rgyud 'grel): lta ste/ /bdag nyid bsgyur dang de mgron dang/ /de yi yo byad bsngo ba dang/ /gsol gdab gshegs su gsol ba'o/ /dang por bdag nyid yi dam lhar/ /sku dang mkhyen pa bya ba dbang/ /rim pas thams cad rdzogs bsgoms nas/
80a4(rgyud 'grel): zhe phyir don grub gtor ma btad/ /'khor lo la sogs khang pa yi/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir stegs bu brgyad/ /brgya byin dbang ldan bar du gcig /chu dang bden bral bar du gcig /dam pa'i dri yis bcu po byug /mdzes
80a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i me tog rnams kyis brgyan/ /glu dang gar dang gdugs sogs pas/ /nus pa ji snyed kyis brgyan bya/ /de nas rang nyid rnal 'byor bas/ /dngos grub myur du mi 'thob phyir/ /'khor lor bcas pa 'am yang na ni/ /khros pas
80a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nag por bsgyur/ /de yi ye shes sems dpa' las/ /'od zer lcags kyu nag 'phros pas/ /phyogs skyong rang rang phyogs gnas pa/ /chung ma 'khor bcas dgug par bya/ /brgya byin ser po spyan stod pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin
80a7(rgyud 'grel): pa sha cing bcas/ /glang chen rab tu brtan pa la/ /chibs pa shar gyis stegs dbus/ /dgug bya de g.yon mkha' lding la/ /zhon pa'i khyab 'jug nag po ste/ /g.yas pa rtse gsum 'khor lo 'dzin/ /g.yon du dung dang nor
80b1(rgyud 'grel): bu 'dzin/ /de steng dgug bya shar lho yi/ /stegs steng ra zhon me lha ni/ /ral ba'i dbu rgyan dmar mdog can/ /skyabs sbyin phreng 'dzin g.yon du ni/ /dbyug pa gu re'u 'dzin pa dgug /de bzhin lho yi stegs steng du/ /dgug bya ma he tha?
80b2(rgyud 'grel): zhon ba/ /gshin rje nag po brkyang bskum tshul/ /rgyan 'bar phyag na dbyug pa dang/ /sdigs 'dzub 'dzin pa gnas par bya/ /lho nub stegs steng la dgug pa/ /mi ro la zhon brkyang bskum tshul/ /gcer bu mche gtsigs skra bzhin gnag /bden bral
80b3(rgyud 'grel): gri dang ka pA la 'dzin/ /nub kyi stegs bu'i steng dgug pa/ /mkha' 'gro lho 'phye zhon pa yi/ /chu lha dkar po klu zhags 'dzin/ /klu mgo bdun pa zhabs klu gcig /de bzhin nub byang steng dgug pa/ /dgo ba ser zhon rlung lha ljang/ /phyag gnyis
80b4(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi gos 'dzin cing/ /nam mkha' i khams su brkyang ba'o/ /byang gi stegs bu la dgug pa/ /mi zhon gnod sbyin ser bo ste/ /pi dza pu ra sa bon gang/ /ne'u le btsir nas 'dzin pa'o/ /de steng byi ba la zhon pa/ /log 'dren dpon po glang
80b5(rgyud 'grel): chen mgo /dkar po la phug phreng ba dang/ /mngar bsres dbyug 'dzin dgug pa'o/ /byang shar stegs bu la dgug pa/ /glang la zhon pa'i dbang phyug dkar/ /ral can rus pa'i phreng ba can/ /kha TwAM rde'u chud 'dzin pa'o/ /brgya byin dbang ldan
80b6(rgyud 'grel): par dgug pa/ /rta bdun shing rta la zhon pa/ /nyi ma dmar po zer bcas pa/ /phyag mtshan pad+ma dmar po 'dzin/ /de g.yon utpa la gnas pa/ /zla ba dkar po la gnas pa/ /phreng ba 'dzin pa 'khor /dang bcas/ /bkug nas de ru gnas pa'o/ /
80b7(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dbus su de steng dgug /dang pa zhon pa tshangs pa che/ /thung du zhal bzhi tshangs skud can/ /tshon po phreng ba dbyug pa 'dzin/ /klu dang cig shos gnyis par steng/ /shing rta la zhon thang bzang gnag /dgug bya ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /lha ma ni
81a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dang bcas pa'o/ /de yi g.yon du de steng du/ /pad+ma la zhugs dgug bya ba/ /sa yi lha mo ser mo ste/ /bum pa 'dzin pa bsam par bya/ /'di rnams rin chen dbu brgyan can/ /rin chen rnam pa sna
81a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis/ /rab tu spras pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /phyogs skyong shin tu che ba rnams/ /rang 'dra ba yi tshogs bskor ba/ /rnam smin 'od dang sku mdog gis/ /mun pa thams cad sel byed pa/ /rang gi lha yis dgug byas dgod/ /de ltar
81a3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bkug byas nas/ /cho ga'i rim pa 'di yis ni/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa mun bsal nas/ /de rnams rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /thugs kyi 'od zer las byung ba/ /gshin? rje gshed sogs khro bo bcu/ /sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug bltam/ /smad
81a4(rgyud 'grel): ni gsal shing gzugs gnas pa/ /g.yas pas mgul ma brtan byas nas/ /ri rab las grub tho ba yis/ /g.yon pas brdab cing gong ma rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du gdab par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): big+h+naM ta krita sarba du Sh+Ta na/ ku be ra ga na pa
81a5(rgyud 'grel): ti sa pa ri wa ra Na kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): Tak+ki sarba duSh+Tana/ ag+he sa pa ri wa ra na kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): nI la daN+Da sarba duSh+Ta na/ /naie ti sa pa ri wa ra Na kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba la sarba duSh+Ta na bA yu ni sa pa ri wa ra Na kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM
81a6(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): a tsa la sarba du Sh+Tana/ a'i sha na sa pa ri wa ra Na kI la ye hUM phaT/ oM bruM tsakra sarba duSh+Thana/ a rka tsan+d+ra bra ti mahA sa pa ri wa ra Na kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): suM b+ha sarba du Sh+Ta na tsa ma ri pa ti de ba pra Na sa pi ri wa ra Na kI la ya hUM phaT/ sngags de dag ni brjod
81a7(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /gdab bya gang ba byed gdab pa rnams/ /sgrib pa mnyam nyid shis pa yis/ /brtsal phyir rims bzhin phur bas gdab/ /de dag lus 'di phung btab nas/ /thal ba nyid 'gyur brlag byas nas/ /rnam par shes pa mar me ltar/ /gnas?
81b1(rgyud 'grel): pa sa bon gyis bkug ltar/ /zhal bzhugs byang chub sems gyur nas/ /rdo rje'i lam byung mtsho skyes nang/ /babs pa bsam pa'i gnod sems rnams/ /bsal phyir sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): oM sh+rI he ru ka badzra sa ma ya h+ri sarba Sh+Tana
81b2(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya mu dra pra ban tsakra e shaM a shad+ho shaM a pa na ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje he ru ka yis ni/ /sngags kyis shes bya'i sgrib mun bsal/ /de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi/ /phreng ba bzlas pas nyon mongs bsal/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta 'a? ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra nAM/ na
81b3(rgyud 'grel): mo badzra daMSh+To Ta ka Ta b+hai ra ba ya a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha ha sta ya/ oM amrita kuN+Da li/ /kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ de ha da ha/ /gardza gardza/ pi spho Ta ya bi spo Ta ya/ sarba bag+h+nin na ya kA nAM/ /ma hA ga na pa ti dzI bi tA na ta ka rA ya/ /
81b4(rgyud 'grel): sarba ShuM a sha ya dro shaM a pa na ya hUM phaT/ de yis sgrib mun bsal nas su/ /mtsho skyes nang gnas khu ba las/ /cho ga gsum gyi legs bsgrubs pa'i/ /sku rnams phyogs su dgod par bya/ /badzra hUM ruM kaM muM baM yaM 'um a b+he ma maM laM/ bya ba'i
81b5(rgyud 'grel): sa bon rnams su gyur/ /de las rdo rje 'khor lo gu De'u dang/ /dbyug pa gri dang klu zhags dang/ /rlung gos bi dza bu ra dang/ /pad+ma rtse gsum pad+ma dang/ /utpal pad+ma ral gri dang/ /pad+ma mtshan ma rnams kyi nang/ /rang rang sa bon mtshan par bsam/ /
81b6(rgyud 'grel): sa bon phyag mtshan de nyid las/ /brgya byin rdo rje mtshan du gyur/ /ser po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /rdo rje ral gri phyag g.yas la/ /'khor lo pad+ma g.yon du 'dzin/ /thugs rigs zla ba'i steng du dgod/ /khyab 'jug sgyu ma rdo rje gyur/ /nag po zhal
81b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum phyag drug pa/ /'khor lo ral gri phyag g.yas la/ /dung dang pad+ma g.yon du 'dzin/ /'di yang thugs rigs nyi mar dgod/ /drang srod rdo rje me ru gyur/ /dmar ser zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /skyabs sbyin dang ni phreng ba g.yas/ gu De dbyug pa
82a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du 'dzin/ /'di yang thugs rigs zur gsum dang/ /nyi ma'i gdan la dgong pa'o/ /gshin rje rdo rje tshe zang gyur/ /nag po skra 'greng zhal gsum pa/ /phyag drug dbyug pa ral gri dang/ nor bu sar
82a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin brkyang bskum tshul/ /thugs rigs nyi ma'i gdan la dgod/ /bden gral rdo rje gtun tu gyur/ /bung 'dra zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /gri gug ral gri phyag g.yas pa/ /ka pA la rin chen g.yon du 'dzin/ /thugs rigs nyi ma'i gdan
82a3(rgyud 'grel): la dgod/ /de rnams dbu rgyan mi bskyod pas/ /cod pan la ni mtshan pa'o/ /chu lha klu yi rdo rjer gyur/ /zhal gsum dkar po klu gdod dang/ /klu yi zhabs can phyag drug pa/ /klu zhags ral gri phyag g.yas la/ /rin chen pad+ma g.yon du 'dzin/ /

82a5(rgyud 'grel): sgra yis ni dbu brgyan pa'o/ /lus ngan rdo rje'i 'jigs byed gyur/ /gser 'dra zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /pi dza pu dra ral gri g.yas/ /pad+ma dung ni g.yon du 'dzin/ /gsung rigs nyi ma la dgod bya/ /log 'dren dro rje mchu dngis gyur/ /dkar po zhal

82b1(rgyud 'grel): po che/ /rin chen rigs te nyi mar dgod/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /zla ba rdo rje 'od du gyur/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dkar po'i mdog /utpal ral gri phyag g.yas la/ /rin chen pad+ma g.yon du 'dzin/ /sku yi rigs de

82b4(rgyud 'grel): skyes te/ /sku rigs 'di yang zla bar dgod/ /bzhi po rtag pas brgyan pa'o/ /sgyu ma rdo rje byin phra? dang/ /ma bdag sha rlon za ba dang/ /lus ngan log par 'dron pa dang/ /lha dmag zlog par byed pa rnams/ /nyi ma yi? 'od kyi 'khor/ /
82b5(rgyud 'grel): rten pa'i rgya ba na gnas pa'o/ /lhag ma zla ba'i rgyab brten can/ /dang po rang 'od reg ma 'khyud/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung gnas pa/ /zab mo yang dag gsal ba'i sku/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kyis 'od gsal/ /
82b6(rgyud 'grel): rang rang phyogs kyi nam mkha' gang/ /rang dang dang 'dra 'khor tshogs rnams/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rig mang ldan/ /yang dag bskyed nas nyer? bsgrub sogs/ /yid 'od gsal ba 'dus pa yi/ /gzhung gis byin brlabs sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin
82b7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' mnyam pa yi/ /'gro ba ma lus sa bon gyis/ /bkug nas zhal zhugs zhu bar gyur/ /rdo rje'i lam 'byung mtsho skyes nang/ /ye shes rim pa lnga las byung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i mos pa yis/ /zhu gyur pad+ma'i nang gnas pa/ /
83a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan sogs lha mo glu dbyangs kyis/ /skul bas k+ShiM la sogs pa yi/ /sa bon nyi shu gcig tu gyur/ /de las mtshan ma sa bon mtshan/ /sa bon phyag mtshan las byung ba/ /sa snying la sogs gzugs bskyes?
83a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /sku mdog zhal dang phyag mtshan rnams/ /sgrub pa'i thabs gsungs grags pa rnams/ /nam mkha' i khams kun sgros pas gang/ /de ltar mgron rnams kun sbyangs nas/ /yo byad rnams ni sto gan gnas/ /gser dang dngul dang zangs/ /
83a3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i snod/ /lcags dang nya phyis la sogs pa'i/ /snod mchog nang du khur ba dang/ /zan dang sdig med sha khrag dang/ /mdzes pa'i lha bshos nya sha dang/ /mon sran gre'u 'o mdang/ /chu dang mar me dri me tog /lngag rgyu btung rgyu bzab rgyu sogs

83a6(rgyud 'grel): rab bkang nas/ /mgron rnams so so 'khyud byas te/ /de bzhin me tog la sogs pa/ /sa bon gyis bskul so sor thengs/ /mchod pa mnyam nyid bye ba'i phyir/ /sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza badzra swa
83a7(rgyud 'grel): b+hA ba At+ma kro haM/ de nas rdo rje dril bu ni/ /gsor gsil bskor ba'i bde bas kyang/ /lha rnams thams cad dges bya'i phyir/ /chos thams cad kyis bstod par bya/ /rdo rje mi bskyed ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po/ /rdo rje
83b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /rdo rje sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad dag chen po/ /rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog /ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin che na rgyal po rab tu zab/ /
83b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dpag med 'dod chags che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' i rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa thob/ /'od gsal rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos grub rdo rje rdzogs
83b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /rang bzhin dag pa rdo rje sems/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas yaM byung gzhu 'dra dang/ /raM byung gru gsum me dkyil du/ /ya byung pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /rdzas rnams mi
83b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chi lnga du dmigs/ /de steng zla ba nyi ma la/ /bru sogs bsams nas de'i 'od kyis/ /rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bkug byas te/ /sa bon las ni thim gyur stobs/ /rlung gi me bus pad nang gi /bdu rtsi khol bas gcig gyur te/ /rlangs pa hUM
83b5(rgyud 'grel): byung rdo rje dkar/ /lte bar hUM bsams zhu gyur pas/ /pad nang bdud rtsi la babs te/ /zla ba shel ltar dag bsams nas/ /steng du oM bsams zhu gyur bas/ /nang du thim byas gsal byas te/ /'od zer lnga ni rab 'bar bsam/ /de nyid gsum gyis?
83b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags nyid/ /rab tu bzlas pas byin brlabs te/ /de ltar spyang byas gtor ma rnams/ /sa bon gyis bskul pad+ma yis/ /nam mkha' i khams kun bkang byas te/ /lha rnams ji snyed phyag g.yon bteg /thengs par byas nas so so yi/ /

84a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod de dbul bar bya/ /oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams gnas pa/ /dus gsum las ni byung ba kun/ /mkha' dang rgya mtsho sprin gyi tshogs/ /shin tu rgya che phra rab kyi/ /rdul gyi dkyil 'khor so so yi/ /nang?
84a2(rgyud 'grel): du gnas pa'i tshogs chen po/ /nam mkha' i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can/ /phyogs bcu skyong ba thams cad dang/ /sems can khams rnams ma lus pa'i/ /so so sbyor ba'i tshul gnas pa/ /de dag kyang ni 'di lta ste/ /
84a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mtshon cha sgyu ma rdo rje dang/ /rdo rje me dang rdo rje zad dus dang/ /rdo rje gtun dang klu yi rdo rje dang/ /rdo rje rlung dang rdo rje 'jigs byad dang/ /rdo rje mchu rings rdo rje khro bo dang/ /rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje 'od chen dang/ /thub pa'i rdo rje rdo rje thag bzang dang/ /sa yi rdo
84a4(rgyud 'grel): rje 'khor rang so sor bcas/ /sa snying phyag na rdo rje nam snying dang/ /'jig rten dbang dang sgrib sel kun tu bzang/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri yi rdo rje ma/ /ro dang reg bya chos dbyings rdo rje dang/ /spyan ma dang ni mA ma kI dang ni/ /na dza' dkar mo dam tshig
84a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma dang/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen dbang phyug dang/ /snang mdza' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams/ /mi bskyed pa yi tshogs chen thams cad la/ /bdag gis me tog dang ni spos dang ni/ /mar me dri zhim zhal zas dam pa dbul/ /rol mo la
84a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs dag dang ldan pa yi/ /gtor ma'i yo byang 'di ni thugs rje yis/ /bzhes shing dgongs shig bdag la rab tu dgongs/ /bdag la gser dang dngul dang mgron bu dang/ /nor phyug tshe ring ba dang bzhon pa dang/ /na tsha med dang dam tshig bde ba kun/ /
84a7(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog? par byed pa bgegs kyi sda dpon dang/ /gdug dang shin tu bdug pa can dag dang/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dag /rmugs par gyis shig rab tu rmugs par gyis/ /chings shig chings shig khyed kyis yang dag chom/ /de bas ja? yi
84b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gron bu gser dngul dang/ /nor gyi 'byor dang tshe? ni ring ba dang/ /gzhon pa dang ni na tsha med la sogs/ /bde ba chen po rab tu 'phel bar mdzod/ /bdag ni byang chub snying po ma thob par/ /khyed rnams bdag gi grogs la rtag tu spyon/ /bdag
84b2(rgyud 'grel): gi nad rnams dag ni zhi ba dang/ /bdag la bgegs kyi gnod pa zhi bar gyis/ /kye bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog /skyon can kun gyi phyag rgya gshig pa po/ /bdag gis gtor phul bdag la zhi ba dang/ /dus 'di nas ni srung pa
84b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol/ /de ltar 'dod bzhin gsol btab nas/ /de dag rnams kyang mthun pa ru/ /bdag la dngos grub gnang bsams nas/ /mgrin gcig tu ni legs so zhes/ /gsungs pa'i ku cos khams bkang ba'i/ /sgra kun grags par dmigs
84b4(rgyud 'grel): nas su/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis bshags par bya/ /'jig rten 'di na 'khod pa'i mgron rnams kun/ /phyogs skyong sems can kun dang lha yi lha/ /rang bzhin gyis grub sbyor bas sbyangs pa rnams/ /bdag ni brtson dang mi ldan bkren chen te/ /
84b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod gzhan ci yang bdag la ma mchis na/ /gzhan don dgengs pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis/ /thugs dang mi 'gal rang gi mthus bzhes shig /bdag ni rnam g.yeng rmugs dang le lo yis/ /sems ma 'dus dang mi gsal la bsgrubs pa
84b6(rgyud 'grel): mgon po khyed rnams thugs dang 'gal ba gang/ /rang bzhin bdag gis chos gzigs bzod pa mdzod/ /de ltar brjod pas dga' 'gyur te/ /'gal ba dag ni sos par dmigs/ /yang na a yis dang por rdzogs/ /brjod pa byin brlabs
84b7(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma dbul/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i/ /bde ba'i dbyings rab brjod bya ste/ /bskor nas pad+ma'i lag bskor lnga/ /byas nas sngags 'dis gshegs su gsol/ /oM sems can don kun byas nas su/ /rang gi yul du gshegs su gsol/ /
85a1(rgyud 'grel): yang ni byon par mdzod cig mu:/ /gshegs gsol yi ge brgya pa yis/ /las kyi skyon kun gsal bar bya/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma 'gam nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa no pa ti Sh+Tha dri Dta mi b+hab a nu rak+to me b+ha ba su to Dyo me b+ha ba su po Sh+yo pa lha
85a2(rgyud 'grel): sarba sid+d+hi mme pra yats+tsha/ /sarba karma su ca me/ tsit+taM sh+re yaM(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM(rgyud 'grel): ha ha ha ha ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga ba na/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra mA me muny+tsa/ badzra b+ha ba mahA sa ma ya satwa A(rgyud 'grel): de ltar brjod nas gtor ma rnams/ /mngon sum dus su phyogs bcur gtor/ /gzhes
85a3(rgyud 'grel): ma sa phyogs gtsang sar spung/ /chu gnas sems can rnams dang ni/ /me ni dbul ba rnams la sbyin/ /khyi dang bya rog la sogs la/ /nan tan gyis ni sbyin mi bya/ /de bzhin de yi rim pa yis/ /zhi ba la sogs ji bzhin dang/ /rang 'dod
85a4(rgyud 'grel): ma sa phyogs gtsang sar spung/ /chu gnas sems can rnams dang ni/ /me ni dbul ba rnams la sbyin/ /khyi dang bya rog la sogs la/ /nan tan gyis ni sbyin mi bya/ /de bzhin de yi rim pa yis/ /zhi ba la sogs ji bzhin dang/ /rang 'dod
85a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su kha bltas te/ /de yi kha dog 'khor lor ldan/ /sngon bzhin phyogs su skyong ba rnams/ /bkug nas bsam pa'i nyon mongs bsal/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa yang gsal nas/ /de dag stong byas sa bon las/ /bsregs nas rje dpon du gyur pa
85a6(rgyud 'grel): yi dam lha yi phyag mtshan sogs/ /spro dang bsdu ba byas nas su/ /snga ma'i rten ni gyur byas nas/ /thams cad kun mkhyen sku thob bya/ /'phro ba'i zer byung thugs dbang gis/ /phyogs bcu khams kun khyab par byas/ /sku dang mkhyen pa byed pa
85a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang/ /rgyas btab mtshan nyid shes byas nas/ /myur ba sa bon sogs tshul gyis/ /mchod byas dgos byas tshim par byas/ /gtor ma sngon bzhin byin brlabs nas/ /phul te tshim byas gnyis med kyi/ /ye shes yongs su myong bar bsam/ /
85a8(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis rdo rje dril bzung nas/ /mi bskyod las gos tshigs bcad kyis/ /bstod pas dgyes te lan cig gsungs/ /de nas phrin las bsgrub pa rnams/ /bsgrub bya'i don du gsol ba gdab/ /'di yis gtor ma byin brlab sngags/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra shtrika
85b1(rgyud 'grel): sarba duSh+Ta na sa ma ya mu draM pra b+haM dza ka ma ma shan+ti ku ru swAhA 'hUM/ de bzhin rgyas pa'i mdza' ru oM/ /puSh+Ti ku ru zhes bya'o/ /pa shaM ku ru zhes bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni hUM dang phaT/ /mA ra ya ni zhes bya'o/ /dgug pa'i mdza' ru dza zhes bya'o/ /
85b2(rgyud 'grel): bskrad pa la ni phaT mthar bzhag /u tsa ta ya zhes pa'o/ /de bzhin las kyi bye brag gis/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i sngags rnams brjod/ /de dag rab tu dgyes bsams nas/ /rang gi gnas su gshegs su gsor?
85b3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar ma lus bstan pa yi/ /gtor ma'i cho ga mchog 'di ni/ /bla ma mchog gis legs sbyangs pa'i/ /sems dul dang ldan brtson 'grus can/ /gsang shes de nyid rigs pa po/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs rtog pa'i tshogs/ /shes shing
85b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa lhur len pa/ /de la 'di ni sbyin par bya/ /gang zhig bla ma la mi gus/ /dang med 'jungs pa rnam g.yeng ba/ /le los sems sbyong rnam spangs pa/ /blun chen de la sbyin mi bya/ /bdag gis gtor ma'i
85b5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga 'di byas dge ba yis/ /rnal 'byor 'di sgrub bar chad zhi zhing 'dod don grub/ /gtsug lag tshad mas rnal 'byor chen po'i lam bgrod de/ /bcu gsum dge ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar 'gro shog /gtor ma chen po'i rim pa slob dpon chen
85b6(rgyud 'grel): po bi ta pA ngas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab po// //
85b7(rgyud 'grel): mi shigs pa'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mjad pa bzhugs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ /ratna ma ti nA ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ mi shigs pa'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la
86a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig dri med gzi brjid ldan/ /spros pa'i rnam pa kun bral te/ /mdza' yas rigs kyi sprul 'phro ba/ /'jam dbyangs de btung bla ma la'ang/ /blo gros gzhan yang dang pa yis/ /'dus pa'i don gyis de
86a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid/ /rang gzhan dran par byed pa'i don/ /mi shigs rin chen bshad ba'i bya/ /de la yang dag pa'i man ngag dang bral ba rnams na chos kyi phung po brgyud khri bzhi stong ston cing shes kyang/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du bsgrubs
86a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang thob par mi nus so/ /de'i phyir bdag gis kyang bdag cag gi bla ma chen po sangs rgyas ye shes kyi zhal snga nas kyi rim pa nas 'ongs pa'i rlung gi de nyid kyi sgo nas mi shigs pa'i rin po che sgrub pa'i
86a4(rgyud 'grel): thabs cung zad ston pas skyes bu chen po rnams kyis 'bad de bzung bar bya'o/ /de la dngos po thams cad kyi mdza' i de bzhin nyid ni zab mo dang gsal ba gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ /de yang chos kyi dbyings spros pa'i mdza' thams cad dang
86a5(rgyud 'grel): bral ba nam mkha' i dkyil ltar rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'o/ /de lta bu'i rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo la thon ma med pa'i dus nas sems can rnams kyi phyin ci log tu brtags pas rlung gi khams bsgrubs te/ de las me/ de las chu/ de las sa'i khams
86a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrubs pas phung po dang skye mched dang khams su snang zhing 'khor ba'i chos kyis rnam par snang ngo/ /de ltar snang ba'i dus nyid na yang rnam par dag pa'i don la ni g.yo ba rdul tsam yang med do/ /de lta bu'i don de sems can thams cad la kun rdzob
86a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnam pa'i gzugs kyi gnas su rnam par gnas kyang bla ma'i zhal las bstan pa med par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na lhan cig byed pa'i slob dpon gyis byin gyis brlabs pas rlung gi sgo nas spros pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo gnas dang/ /ngal
86b1(rgyud 'grel): gso ba'i de kho na nyid bla ma'i kha las rtogs 'gyur ro/ /rtogs pa de bsgoms pas phyin ci log tu snang ba'i phung po la sogs pa rim gyis log pas yang dag pa'i phung po la sogs pa zab pa dang gsal ba dbyer med pa'i ngo bo 'thob pa'i rtags rnams rnyed
86b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /de rnyed pas bsgoms pa la sogs pa dang bcas pas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur te/ /de bas na ji skad bshad pa'i bya bas de rtogs par bya ste/ de phyin chad dgon pa 'am gang yang rung ba'i gnas su rnam
86b3(rgyud 'grel): par gnas nas/ /sngon du bya bar 'os pa thams cad tshogs par byas te/ thabs 'dir ni rim pa gnyis pa'i don bsgom par bya'o/ /de yang dang po sems can thams cad la mi btang ba'i snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/ de nas rang gi thugs ka na
86b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' i sa bon de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rim pa dang po pa rnams la yi ge'i gzugs su snang ba gzhom du mang pa de las/ yi ge kha dog lnga'i 'od zer steng gi sgo'i g.yas nas byung ste/ de'i rtse las dkyil 'khor
86b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spros pas phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi kun tu rtog pa rlung gi gzhon pa dang ldan pa rnams/ /de rnams bla ma lta bur gyur pa la thim pas rnam par dag par byas te/ de nyid slar bsdus te ye shes kyi ngo
86b6(rgyud 'grel): bod gyur te g.yon nas zhugs te/ mtshan ma'i dbus kyi bum pa'i sa bon la thim pas/ de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan bskyed pa'i rin po che dngos po thams cad la khyab pa'i rang bzhin mi shigs pa'i thig le 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa tsan ka'i
86b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bru chang tsam/ du gyur par bsam mo/ /de'i 'od zer gyis gnas dang ye shes sems dpa' la sogs pa gsal bar byas nas/ bdog gi mthe bo'i rtsa ba dang rje dar dang/ brla gnyis dang/ gsang ba'i gnas dang/ lte ba dang/ gsus pa dang/
87a1(rgyud 'grel): nu ma gnyis dang/ lag rtse dang/ mgrin pa dang/ mchu dang/ 'gram pa dang/ mig gnyis dang/ rna ba'i rtsa dang/ spyi bo dang/ lus kun gyi nang gsal bar byas te/ de dag na gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems sgra
87a2(rgyud 'grel): yig bcu drug gi gzugs su snang ba bkug ste/ thig ler zhugs par bsam mo/ /de bsams pa tsam gyis de'i nang du lha bcu dgu rten dang brten can lhag par mos pas bsgoms te/ de'i dbus kyi gtso bo'i thugs kar gong ma ltar ye shes kyi thig
87a3(rgyud 'grel): le bsgoms nas/ de'i 'od kyi rim pas rten gyi thig le'i bar gsal bar bya'o/ /de nas gnas bcu drug nas 'od zer bzhag pa phyung ste/ nges dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa gsal bar byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
87a4(rgyud 'grel): na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhal du zhugs nas mi shigs pa'i thig ler song nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi blangs te/ rdo rje'i lam nas byung ste/ 'o ma'i rgyun ltar 'du shing thabs dang shes rab kyi dbye bas/ sna bug g.yas
87a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du zhugs te ye shes kyi thig le la thim pas/ de 'jog pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa de la sems bzung ste yang gong gi rim pas spro ba dang bsdu ba dang gzung ba byas pas rtags rnams gdon mi za bar rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de rnyed pas
87a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /mi shigs pa'i thig le bsgom pa'i cho ga'o /gal te des rtags rnyed par ma gyur na de'i tshe ma shigs pa'i thig le de nyid rim pa 'dis bsgom par bya'o/ /de yang dang por rang gi ye
87a7(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi lcags kyus dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bsdus te/ rang gi snying gar btsung pas thams cad zhu ste 'dzag pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pas yang rdul dang mun pa dang snying
87b1(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyi tshul du snying ga'i pad+ma la babs nas/ rang gi rdo rje'i bum pa'i dkyil du gnas pa las de byung ba dang ye shes lnga'i ngo bo'i rang gi mtshan ma phra mo 'od zer lnga dang ldan par bsams nas/ de'i bum pa la lhag par chos pas/ rten dang brten can gyi
87b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo thig le dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /gal te der sems bying bar song bas skyo bar gyur na nang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje las phyung ste/ lha mo'i pad+ma'i ge sar la bzhag nas bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i thig le las gong gi rim pa ltar 'od
87b3(rgyud 'grel): zer sna lnga pa/ steng gi sgo nas byung ba dang slar bdud rtsi bkug nas slar 'jug pa'i rim pa byang ba'o/ /de dbugs dgag stong gi yan lag go /de nas de lta bu'i gsang ba'i thig le la gong gi rim pa ltar sems dal bus bzung bas dngos po med pa'i
87b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas su 'gyur ro/ /de yang gzung ba yang dang yang du goms pa'i stobs kyis phyin ci log gis rnam par log pas smig rgyu lta bu byung ba ni rtags dang po'o/ /chu rnam par log pas du ba lta ba lta bu byung ba ni rtags gnyis pa'o/ /me rnam par 'gyur bas srin
87b5(rgyud 'grel): bu mi khyer lta bu gyur ba ni rtags gsum pa'o/ /rlung rnam par log pas mar me ltar 'bar ba ni rtags bzhi pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa log pas zab mo dang gsal ba gnyis su med pa'i nam mkha' ltar gsal ba ni rtags lnga pa'o/ /gzung ba'i yan
87b6(rgyud 'grel): lag go /de ltar mtshan ma lnga thob nas de kun khyab par bya ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje'i lam nas nam mkha' i khams su ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas spro bar bya'o/ /spro ba de las sngon du mthong ba'i don rjes su dran par bskyed/ /de yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ chos
87b7(rgyud 'grel): rjes su dran pa dang/ rdo rje rjes su dran pa dang/ rigs rjes su dran pa dang/ khro bo rjes su dran pa dang/ lha rjes su dran pa ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo re re'i dbang du byas pa yin no/ /gcig pa la yang rtogs par bya'o/ /lha rjes su dran pa ni kun la yang rtog par
88a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de yang rjes su dran pa lnga ni/ sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sngon du bstan pa de spro ba dang bsdugs gsal bar bya'o/ /dam tshig rjes su dran pa ning de dang spro ba las sngags brjod pa dang/ cho ga gsol
88a2(rgyud 'grel): don rjes su dran pas so/ /dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ni cho ga gnyis pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de dang de spro ba las dran pa'o/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rjes su dran pa dang sems can rjes su dran pa ni/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje bsgom pa rnam
88a3(rgyud 'grel): par smon pa ste/ /spros pa las rjes su dran pa'o/ /sngags thams cad kyi spyi gzugs rjes su dran pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang rang gi lha'i gzugs longs spyod bzhis brgyan pa spros pa las rjes su dran pa'o/ /dam tshig rjes su dran pa ni bdud rtsis byin gyis brlabs
88a4(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa las rjes su dran pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ ma skyes pa rjes su dran pa ni/ spros pa de dag kyang ci yang med ces bya ba dang/ de gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo yin pas rjes su dran pa'o/ /zhe sdang gi rigs la sogs pa'i mchod
88a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rjes su dran pa ni/ rang gi rigs kyi bu mo 'bring gi yan lag bzhis dag pa ni/ rjes su chags pas mnyes par byas pa'i don rjes su dran pa'o/ /gang dag gzung ba las nyams pa'i blo gros dman pa rnams kyis/ /bcu drug po 'di bya'o zhes gzhan dag
88a6(rgyud 'grel): 'chad do/ /rjes su dran pa bcu drug po 'di phra mo'i rnal 'byor pas gzhan dang gzhan du spros pa les grub par shes par bya'o/ /de bzhin bsdu ba yang shes par bya'o/ /rjes su dran pa'i yan lag go /gsang ba'i thig le bsgom pa'i cho ga'o/ /
