110b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang mtshan ma dang/ /sku rnams kun yang de bzhin te/ /rdo rje skyil krung dang brtan zhing/ /phyag gnyis rang 'od rig ma 'khyud/ /rin chen dbu rgyan ldan pa'o/ /bsnyen pa'i grub pa'i yan lag dang/ /rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /de nas snying
110b7(rgyud 'grel): ga'i zla ba la/ /nag po hUM las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje bum pa hUM gas mtshan/ /de nas rdo rje bum pa la/ /hUM gis mtshan pa bsgom byas te/ /nang gi hUM dang rdo rje las/ /phyag na rdo rje lta bu yi/ /thugs kyi rdo rje lta bu yi/ /thugs kyi rdo rje bsam byas te/ /de yi thugs
111a1(rgyud 'grel): kar zla ba la/ /hUM gis mtshan pa bsam par bya/ /lce rtsa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dmar po a(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba yi/ /pad+ma'i dbus na a(rgyud 'grel): yis mtshan/ /de las pad+ma a(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa/ /nang gi a(rgyud 'grel): dang pad+ma las/ /
111a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug lta bu yi/ /ngag gi rdo rje bsam byas te/ /de yi thugs kar zla ba la/ /a(rgyud 'grel): las pad+ma dbus su yang/ /a(rgyud 'grel): yig mtshan pa bsam par bya/ /mgo dbus zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /oM las 'khor lo lte ba la/ /
111a3(rgyud 'grel): oM gyis mtshan ba bsam par bya/ /de las 'khor lo oM gyis mtshan/ /nang gi oM dang 'khor lo las/ /sa yi snying po lta bu yi/ /sku yi rdo rje bsam par bya/ /de yi thugs kar zla ba la/ /oM las 'khor lo lte ba la/ /oM gyis
111a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa bsam par bya/ /de nas thugs sogs rdo rje yi/ /thugs las 'od zer rab spros nas/ /spyan sogs lha mo bcu rnams kyis/ /mkha' la gnas pa'i bde gshegs rnams/ /so so thugs ka la sogs la/ /gnas pa'i
111a5(rgyud 'grel): thugs sogs rdo rje la/ /mchod nas zhu ba gsol bar bya/ /dpal ldan thugs ni rdo rje 'chang/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /de ring bdag dbang byin gyis rlobs/ /rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol/ /de ni rang gis bsgoms pa la'o
111a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms kun/ /de ring bdag dbang byin gyis brlabs/ /rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol/ /de ni lhun gyis grub pa yi/ /thugs ka na ni gnas pa la'o/ /de nas lhun gyis grub pa
111a7(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /thugs kyi rdo rje ma lus rnams/ /rang gi nyid la zhugs byas la/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko nya haM/ zhes gnyis su med par byin gyis brlab/ /chos kyi ngag lam dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /de
111b1(rgyud 'grel): ring bdag dbang byin gyis brlabs/ /rdo rje gsung can mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms kun/ /de ring bdag dbang byin gyis rlobs/ /rdo rje gsung can mdzad du gsol/ /de yis
111b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /gsung gi rdo rje ji snyed rnams/ /rang gi nyid la zhugs byas la/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta bAka badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko nya haM/ zhes gnyis su med par byin gyis brlab/ /dpal ldan sku ni rdo rje 'chang/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsuM
111b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas/ /de ring bdag dbang byin gyis rlobs/ /rdo rje sku can mdzed du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms kun/ /de ring bdag dbang byin gyis rlobs/ /rdo rje sku can mdzad du gsol/ /de yis
111b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /sku yi rdo rje ji snyed rnams/ /rang gi nyid la zhugs byas la/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko nyra haM/ /zhes gnyis su med par byin gyis brlab/ /bsnyen pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag dang/ /skyes bu byed pa'i
111b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu'o/ /de nas nu ma'i bar du ni/ /zla ba'i dbus su mi las byung/ /ral gri'i yu ba maM gis mtshan/ /de nas ral gri'i yu ba la'ang/ /maM gis mtshan par rab bsams te/ /nang gi de gnyis las byung ba'i/ /dam tshig sems dpa' 
111b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba yi/ /ye shes sems dpa' gnas dang bcas/ /de yi thugs kar zla ba la/ /maM las ral gri'i yu ba la'ang/ /zla ba'i steng du maM bsams te/ /de yi 'od zer gyis bskul nas/ /nam mkhar gnas pa'i bde gshegs rnams/ /so sor 'od
111b7(rgyud 'grel): zer las byung ba'i/ /spyan sogs lha mo bcu rnams kyis/ /bum pa'i ye shes chu rgyun gyis/ /dri ma med byas dbang bskur nas/ /chu dang lha mo skur thim ste/ /mi bskyod dbu rgyan rab tu grub/ /bsnyen pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag dang/ /dri ma med pa'i
112a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu'o/ /de nas mdun du zla ba bsam/ /yi ge gsum la gnas byed pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sems nyid ni/ /bag chags dngos po gang yin te/ /zla ba'i dbus su gnas byas la/ /sngon bzhin 'gro ba'i
112a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rgyur/ /'thad pa'i bde gshegs ma lus kyis/ /zla ba gnyis pa grub la sogs/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lngas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom/ /gnyi ga'i dga' ba dag dang ni/ /'gro ba'i dbang bskur ma byas par/ /snga ma
112a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du yi ge gsum/ /zhal gyi lam du zhugs byas nas/ /zhu nas rdo rje lam nas su/ /phyung nas pad+ma'i nang du gnas/ /de yi 'od zer 'phro ba yis/ /'od rigs bcas par zhu bar gyur/ /lha mos dbyangs kyis bskul ba las/ /khu ba las
112a4(rgyud 'grel): byung maM gis mdog /gur gum lta bu las byung ba'i/ /ral gri'i yu bar zla ba la'ang/ /mi gis mtshan pa bsam byas te/ /de yi 'od kyis mkha' dbyings na/ /gnas pa'i bde gshegs ji snyed rnams/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje mar byas te/ /
112a5(rgyud 'grel): bkug nas de la zhugs par bya/ /mAM dang ral gri de gyur pas/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje lta bu yi/ /'jam dbyangs ma ni bdag nyid kyi/ /'od kyi thabs la 'khyud ba bsgom/ /oM d+harmmA d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma ko nya haM/ zhes bdag nyid nga rgyal bskyed pa
112a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /bar gyi bsnyen pa'i yan lag dang/ /'dra bar 'byung ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /de nas sngon du bstan pa bzhin/ /mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab/ /bar gyi nye ba'i sgrub pa dang/ /rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /sngon bzhin thugs sogs rdo
112a7(rgyud 'grel): rje rnams/ /grub par gyur par rab bsgoms te/ /sngar gyis byin gyis brlabs pa tsam/ /bar gyi grub pa'i yan lag dang/ /skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /de nas 'jam pa'i rdo rje yi/ /ye shes sems pa'i sa bon gyi/ /'od kyis bde gshegs
112b1(rgyud 'grel): ma lus rnams/ /bskul ba'i 'od zer las byung ba'i/ /spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur nas/ /mi bskyod dbu rgyan ldan par bya/ /bar gyi sgrub pa chen po dang/ /dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /de nas skra yi lam nang gi /zla ba'i dbus su oM dkangs
112b2(rgyud 'grel): po/ /sku yi rigs kyi rang bzhin te/ /de yi oM ni phra mo yis/ /nu ma yan chad khyab par bsam/ /snying gar nyi ma steng du ni/ /nag po hUM ni bsam bya ba/ /thugs kyi rigs kyi rang bzhin te/ /de yi hUM ni phra mo yis/ /lte ba yan chad khyab par bsam
112b3(rgyud 'grel): lte ba'i 'og tu nyi ma la/ /sA nyi ser po rin chen rigs/ /de yi swA ni phra mo yis/ /rked pa yan chad khyab par bsam/ /gsang ba'i dbus su nyi ma la/ /A nyid dmar po 'dod chags rigs/ /de las 'phros pa'i a rnams kyis/ /rkaid pa ma lus
112b4(rgyud 'grel): khyab par bsam/ /brla gnyis dbus na nyi ma la/ /hA nyid ljang gu las kyi rigs/ /de yi ha ni phra mo rnams/ /rkang mthil yan chad khyab par bsam/ /rigs lnga'i tshogs dang ldan byas te/ /hUM gis rang gi rdo rje nyid/ /bum par byas pa bsaM
112b5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /oM gyis bu ga grub par bya/ /de yi nang du phaT ser po/ /rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma la/ /nag po hUM nyid phra mo yis/ /khyab par rab tu bsam byas nas/ /A(rgyud 'grel): yig snying po 'grub bya zhing/ /bu gar phaT kyang bsam par bya/ /gnas skabs
112b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang ldan gyur pa'i/ /shes rab ma nyid grub byas la/ /rang gis 'od zer gyis bskul nas/ /rang gi rig ma nyid la thim/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko nya haM/ zhes sngags nyid rab tu bzlas par bya/ /dang po'i rnal
112b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// //de nas rang gi sa bon gyi/ /'od kyi bde gshegs rnams bkug ste/ /zhal du zhugs te zhu gyur nas/ /pad+ma'i nang du 'bab par bya/ /de las gyur pa'i sa bon ma/ /de las gtso bo
113a1(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa/ /'khor lor bcas pa bsgom byas te/ /'phro ba'i sngags kyis rim bzhin spro/ /badzra d+h+rika ka zhes pas su/ /phyag na rdo rje lta bu yi/ /mi bskyod pa ni 'phro kyas te/ /sangs rgyas bya ba kun mdzad nas/ /'gyur
113a2(rgyud 'grel): nas bdag la zhugs par bya/ /dzi na dzi ka ka ces pas su/ /sa yi snying po lta bu yi/ /gong ma lta bu rnam snang mdzad/ /'phros te 'dus nas rang mdun du/ /shar gyi zla bar gnas par bsam/ /ratna d+hwa kaM ka zhes bsu/ /nam mkha' i
113a3(rgyud 'grel): snying po 'dra ba yi/ /rin chen 'byung ldan 'phros byas nas/ /lho yi nyi mar gnas par bsam/ /A ro li ka zhes pas su/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'dra ba yi/ /'od dpag med pa 'bros byas nas/ /nub kyi nyi mar gnas par bya/ /badz+nyA d+h+ra ka?
113a4(rgyud 'grel): ka ces pas su/ /sgrib pa rnam sel 'dra ba yi/ /don yod grub pa 'phro byas nas/ /byang gi nyi mar gnas par bsam/ /kun kyang ral pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /gsum po nyi ma'i 'od dang ni/ /snang mdzad zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor rgyab
113a5(rgyud 'grel): rten ldan pa'o/ /mo ha ra ti zhes pas su/ /sa yi snying po lta bu yi/ /spyan ma shar lho mtshams su bsam/ /dwe Sha ra ti zhes pas su/ /phyag na rdo rje lta bu yi/ /mA ma kI ni lho nub mtshams/ /rA ga ra ti zhes bsu/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'dra
113a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yi/ /gos dkar mo ni nub byang mtshams/ /badzra rA ti zhes bya bas/ /nam mkha' i snying po 'dra ba yi/ /sgrol ma byang shar mtshams su bsam/ /de rnaMs rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan ni/ /'khor lo u tpal pad+ma dmar/ /utpal ser por shes par bya/ /
113a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo phyi rol grwa bzhi dang/ /shar gyi g.yas g.yon phyogs gnyis la/ /de nyid gsum gyi gong ma ltar/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dang/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje dam/ /sa snying la sogs 'dra ba'i rnams/ /me long pi thang dri yi drung/ /ro yi snod
113b1(rgyud 'grel): dang sna tshogs gos/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas phyag rgya rnams/ /rim bzhin rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan ldan/ /ya mAn+ta kri ta ces pas su/ /mi bskyod lta bu'i gshin rje gshed/ /gong ma lta bur shar sgor bsam/ /bra dz+nyA na tA kri ta ces bas su/ /rnam par snang mdzad?
113b2(rgyud 'grel): lta bu yi/ /shes rab mthar byed nyi ma'i gdan/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /bye brag byas pa lho sgor bsam/ /padmA na ta krita ces pas su/ /'od dpag med pa lta bu yin/ /pad+ma mthar byed nub sgor bsam/ /big+h+nan ta kri ta ces bsu/ gshin rje?
113b3(rgyud 'grel): mthar 'byin lta bu yi/ /bgegs mthar 'byin pa byang gi sgor/ /de rnams rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan ni/ /rdo rje tho ba rdo rje dbyug /pad+ma rdo rje kha bye ba'o/ /kun kyang g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang zhabs/ /zhal ni rgod dang gdangs pa dang/ /khro dang mche ba gtsigs
113b4(rgyud 'grel): par ldan/ /ljags 'dril spyan zlum 'dril ba dang/ /nyi ma gsar shar lta bu dang/ /zhal ni khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ /gsus pa che zhing yangs pa dang/ /sra zhing phye ba 'phyang bar ldan/ /brla dang brang yang de bzhin te/ /lus dang yan lag nying lag
113b5(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /thung zhing rab tu sbem pa dang/ /sma ra dmar ser 'od dang ldan/ /skra yang dmar ser 'od dang ldan/ /gyen du 'khyil zhing 'bar ba ste/ /'od zer 'bar bar ldan pa rnams/ /rang 'od rig ma sma ra med/ /dang po phyag gi 'khyud pa dang/ /stag lpags
113b6(rgyud 'grel): smad g.yogs dang ldan pa/ /bum pa nag po lta bu yi/ /mdza' yas dbu yi thod du bcings/ /mdog dmar drag po lta bu yi/ /'jog po yi ni snyan cha dang/ /pad+ma chen po dkar po yis/ /do shal rgyan ni byas pa ste/ /stobs rgyu ljang gu se ral
113b7(rgyud 'grel): kha/ /dung skyong ser pos phyag gdub byas/ /kha dog sna tshogs lta bu yi/ /rigs ldan gyis ni dpung brgyan dang/ /nor rgyas mdog dkar ska rags byas/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba lta bu yi /pad+mas rkang gdub byas pa yis/ /de rnams rab tu bsam par byas/ /de
114a1(rgyud 'grel): nas rang gi sa bon gyis/ /'od zer lcags kyu 'dra rnams kyis/ /khro bo bzhi yi thugs bskul nas/ /gshin rje gshed kyis dza zhes brjod/ /de yi thugs las 'phros pa yi/ /khro bo rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyis/ /
114a2(rgyud 'grel): bgegs rnams med par bsrung byas te/ /lcags kyus dgugs par byas nas su/ /rdo rje rab bshigs byas te/ /zhugs te rang gi mdun du ni/ /sna tshogs pad+mar gnas par bsam/ /de nas snying las 'phros pa yin/ /khro bo rnams kyang rab
114a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /bshig pa brtsigs par byas nas su/ /phyir yang snying la zhugs par bya/ /de nas rang gi mdun du ni/ /man 'ji gsum la dung phor gsum/ /me tog dkar po dang ldan pa/ /can dan chu yis gang bar bya/ /de mdun man 'ji gnyis steng du
114a4(rgyud 'grel): gser dang rin chen las byas pa'i/ /gsol ba'i snod gnyis bzhag par bya/ /g.yas phyogs dung gi gsum pa la/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i cho gas su/ /byin brlabs bdud rtsi lnga blug bya/ /yi ge gsum gyis bar yas te/ /yi dam lha yi
114a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas la/ /ku sha'i bam po dang po yi/ /dung gi chu yis gsol ba'i snod/ /dang po lan gsum btud gtor bya/ /gnyis pa'i chu dang me tog bcas/ /bzung ste de yi snod nyid la/ /lan gsum nye reg sbyin par bya/ /gsum pa bdud rtsi
114a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas/ /gnyis pa mchod yon chu yang sbyin/ /de nas me tog bzung byas te/ /zhabs bsil phyag rgya dang ldan par/ /de yi snod la zhabs bsil sbyin/ /de nas rang snying 'od zer gyis/ /shes rab mthar byed bskul byas nas/ /de yi hUM brjod
114a7(rgyud 'grel): snying las su/ /byung ba'i 'od zer dkar po yis/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bteg byas nas/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor zhugs par bya/ /de nas rang snying 'od zer gyis/ /pad+ma mthar byed bskul byas nas/ /de yis baM brjod thugs las su/ /'od zer
114b1(rgyud 'grel): ser po 'phros pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor khyab par byas nas bcing/ /de nas rang snying 'od zer gyis/ /bgegs mthar phyin pa bskul byas nas/ /de yis ho brjod de snying las/ /'od zer dmar po 'phros pa yis/ /khyab par rab tu dga' bar bsam
114b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bsnyen pa'i yan lag dang/ /'dra bar 'byung ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /kun gyi mig la sogs pa rnams/ /sa yi snying po la sogs par/ /rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /yang dag sgrub pa'i yan lag dang/ /rnam par
114b3(rgyud 'grel): smin pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /de rnams kun la gnas gsum du/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje nyid/ /sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs byas te/ /rdzogs pa'i tshul du bsgom par bya/ /yang dag sgrub pa yan lag dang/ /skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras
114b4(rgyud 'grel): bu'o/ /rang gi sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /bskul nas nam mkhar gnas pa yis/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi 'od zer las/ /spyan sogs lha mo bcu rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur byas nas dpu rgyan la/ /rang rang bdag po grub bya ba/ /bde gshegs
114b5(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang mA ma kI/ /sgra dang chos dbyings rdo rje dang/ /shes rab mthar phyin bgegs mthar phyin/ /de rnams bdag po mi bskyod pa/ /spyan ma gzugs kyi rdo rje dang/ /gshin rje mthar phyin rnam snang mdzad/ /dri yi rdo rje rin chen 'byung/ /ro yi rdo rje
114b6(rgyud 'grel): gos dkar mo/ /pad+ma mthar phyin 'od dpag med/ /sgrol ma reg gi rdo rje ma'i/ /dbu rgyan bdag po don yong grub/ /mi bskyod dbu rgyan rdo rje sems/ /sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag dang/ /dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /de nas rang gi sa bon gyi/ /
114b7(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi bde gshegs rnams bkug ste/ /zhal du zhugs nas zhu byas la/ /pad+ma'i dbus su 'bab par bya/ /khu ba de las gyur pa yi/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM hos khaM raM zhes/ /dang po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa/ /de steng maM laM paM taM zhes/ /gzhan gyi steng du gnas
115a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /rang gis sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /gzugs sogs rdo rje dgug byas la/ /rang rang sa bon la ni thim/ /de yi sa bon rgyas par 'gyur/ /rig ma'i ba spu'i bu ga nas/ /sa bon rnams las 'od 'phros te/ /dkyil
115a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor las byung mthong bar bya/ /de las byung ba'i spyan la sogs/ /dkyil 'khor la ni 'phro byas la/ /rang rang rigs dang 'brel rnams kyis/ /rang gi 'khor lo rab tu mchod/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga tA pu dza badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko nya haM/ zhes sngags
115a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang rab tu brjod par bya/ /de nas rab tu bstod par bya'o/ /mi skyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchod dkyil 'khor gsum/ /dbyangs kyi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par snang mdzad dag chen po/ /rdo
115a4(rgyud 'grel): rje zhi ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog /zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rin chen rgyal po shin tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje bdud
115a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsi rgyal po che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' i rdo rje 'chang/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa thob/ /'od gsal rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje don grub rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su grub/ /rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung/ /rdo rje sems
115a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas sa bon yaM gi mdog /du ba lta bu las byung ba'i/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu/ /g.yas g.yon ba dan gyis mtshan pa/ /yaM gis mtshen pa bsam par bya/ /de steng raM ni dmar po las/ /byung
115a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'i? me yid dkyil 'khor ni/ /gru gsum 'bar ba raM gyis mtshan/ /de steng a dkar byung ba yi/ /pad+ma'i snod ni a yis mtshan/ /de nang dbus kyi phyogs dang ni/ /shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi ru/ /rim bzhin dri chu dri chen dang/ rak+ta
115b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ni byang chub sems/ /ma hA maM sa bzhag par bya/ /de steng shar du zla ba dang/ /lhag ma bzhi ni nyi ma'i gdan/ /de steng hUM bruM aM dzriM khaM/ /sa bon rnam lnga mthong byas nas/ /ye shes sems dpa' i sa bon gyis/ /'od kyis bde gshegs
115b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams bkug ste/ /rang rang sa bon nyid du thim/ /de nas rlung gis me bskyod nas/ /me yi thod pa bcos pa yi/ /rlangs pa las byung hUM gi tshogs/ /dkar po las byung rdo rje tshogs/ /bum pa hUM gis mtshan ba bsam/ /de rnams phreng ba
115b3(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i rgyun/ /zhu nas snod la zhugs par bya/ /de bzhin lan gnyis gsum bzhi'i bar/ /bsams te rlung me la sogs pa/ /de rnams ma lus gyur pa las/ /me tog pad+ma dkar po nang/ /bdud rtsis gang bar gyur pa bsam/ /bsil
115b4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya phyir de steng du/ /dkar po aM ni bsam byas te/ /zhu nas nad du zhugs par bya/ /de nas 'od zer 'bar 'gyur te/ /phyir yang de nyid zhugs par bya/ /rang gi lce yi dkyil du yang/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse gsum pa/ dum par hUM gis byin rlabs
115b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /de nyid gsum gyi gsang sngags nyid/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzlas byas te/ /bdud rtsis bkang ba'i pad+ma la/ /ye shes sems dpa' sa bon las/ /'od zer byung bas bskul byas nas/ /pad+ma bcu dgur 'phros gyur te/ /lha rnams
115b6(rgyud 'grel): so so'i phyag gnas nas/ /yab yum dus gcig mthun par ru/ /bdud rtsi'i ro mchog myong bar bsam/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// //de nas ye shes sems
115b7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' yi/ /sa bon las ni 'od zer tshogs/ /gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol tu/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'phros pa yi/ /rtse las bde gshegs byung rnams kyis/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas par byas nas/ /sa bon nyid la thim gyur te/ /de yis
116a1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rgyas par 'gyur/ /'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab phyir/ /maM de nyid ni thig ler gyur/ /de yi 'od zer rim pa yis/ /dang por ral gri snang bar byas/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /nang dang phyi yi
116a2(rgyud 'grel): lus dang ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' dkyil 'khor rnams/ /gnas pa'i ral gri dag dang ni/ /dam tshig sems dpa' i sku gsung thugs/ /rdo rje tshun chad snang byas nas/ /de nas rang sems yi ge maM/ /thig le lta bur zhugs par bya/ /??
116a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa de ma thag /ting 'dzin gsum gyis yongs su grub/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje bsam byas nas/ /dam tshig sems dang 'brel ba yi/ /rdo rje thugs sogs yan ched gsal/ /bzhag pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis ni/ /dam tshig sems dpa' i phyi yi sgu?
116a4(rgyud 'grel): de yi dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ /gzhal med khang nas phyi rol tu/ /byung nas 'gro rnams gsal byas nas/ /yang ni de bzhin zhugs bar bya/ /de lta'i rim pa rab 'phro zhing/ /ji tsam 'dod par 'phro 'du bya/ /'di ltar thig le rnal 'byor
116a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /las kyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// //thig le rnal 'byor bsdu byas nas/ /phra mo rnal 'byor bsgom par bya/ /ye shes sems dpa' i sa bon gyi/ /??
116a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi bde gshegs rnams bkug nas/ /zhal gyi lam du zhugs byas nas/ /rdo rje'i lam nas pad+mar gnas/ /de nas las kyi tshad tsam gyi/ /ral gri yu bar gzhal med khang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor ldan/ /
116a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dbus na mthong bar bya/ /gnyi ga'i dga' ba la sogs pa/ /thig le rnal 'byor yan chad par/ /ting 'dzin gsum nyid rdzogs pa yi/ /rang gi rdo rje rtse lnga yi/ /rtse dbus lcags kyu lta bu ru/ /bsam de de yi lcags kyu yis/ /dam tshig
116b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor dang/ /ldan pa'i ral gri phra mo nyid/ /phyi rol tu ni phyung byas te/ /pad+ma'i sna rtser gnas par bya/ /'di yi thig le rnal 'byor la/ /dam tshig sems dang 'brel pa yi/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje la/ /snang bar
116b2(rgyud 'grel): byas pa yan chad kyi/ /'od kyis dam tshig sems dpa' yi/ /phyi yi lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /lha rnams rab tu gsal byas nas/ /gzhal med khang nas phyir byung ba'i/ /'od kyis nam mkha' khyab byas te/ /phyir yang de nyid zhugs par bya/
116b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin yang dang yang ni bsam/ /mtshan ma ma byung bar du ni/ /'od zer tsam gyi 'phro 'du nyid/ /ji tsam 'dod pa rab tu bya/ /mtshan ma rnam pa lnga mthong nas/ /lha dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa/ /yang nas yang du 'phro 'du bya/ /phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin
116b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsdus ma thag /sku yi rdo rje la sogs pa'i/ /thugs kyi zla ba la gnas pa'i/ /phyag mtshan dkyil na gnas pa yi/ /oM sogs bzlas pa'i dus su ni/ /sku yi rdo rje la sogs dang/ /
116b5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo bde gshegs bcas pa rnams/ /pad+ma'i dkyil na gnas pa yi/ /lha mo'i sa bon dzwa la sogs/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa'i/ /mchod pa'i lha mor ldan ba rnams/ /rim par bye brag so so nas/ /bzlas ma thag tu 'phro byas te/ /bzlas
116b6(rgyud 'grel): ba zin pa'i skad cig la/ /rang rang sa bon zhugs par bya/ /'di ltar rim pa'i bzlas brjod rdzogs/ /rdzogs pa'i bzlas brjod phyogs su ni/ /re re brjod pa'i skad cig la/ /rang rang sa bon rnams las ni/ /sku yi rdo rje la sogs dang/ /lha mo de
116b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs dang bcas/ /oM la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams/ /bzlas pa zin pa'i skad cig la/ /rang rang sa bon rnams la ni/ /sku yi rdo rje la sogs dang/ /lha mo dang bcas bde gshegs kun/ /mchod pa dang ldan zhugs par bya/ /de ltar rdzogs
117a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bzlas brjod bsgom/ /bzlas pas ngal bar gyur na yang/ /sbyan sogs lha mo bzhi rnams kyis/ /dbyangs kyis blang zhing bskul nas ni/ /sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor mchod par bya/ /sbyi bor mthog pa cam du ni/ /mtho gang
117a2(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyi zla ba bsam/ /de steng zla ba nyi ma la/ /bruM aM dzri khaM hUM rnam lnga/ /dri chen rdzas sogs steng du bsam/ /de rnams dbus su oM dkar bo/ /de nas rang rang sa bon gyi/ /'od kyis bde gshegs bkug byas nas/ /zhugs te gcig tu gyur byas
117a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /sa bon 'od kyis bskul byas nas/ /zhu ste oM gyis reg byas la/ /de rgyun mgo la 'bab byas te/ /gzi byin ldan par shes par bya/ /de nas skad cig ngal bsos te/ /gong ma lta bu'i cho ga yis/ /gsang
117a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas brjod yang bya'o/ /gal te gshegs su gsol 'dod na/ /sngon bzhin mchod dang bstod pa dang/ /bdud rtsi bya ba'i bar byas te/ /de nyid gsum gyi gsang sngags kyis/ /ye shes sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor la/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor
117a5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs par bya/ /de nas sdug bsngal ldan pa yi/ /sems can mthong bar byas nas su/ /sngon du smon lam byas pa nyid/ /mngon sum nyid du bsam byas te/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje sbyor ldan pas/ /rang sems dag byas langs par bya/ /gzugs
117a6(rgyud 'grel): sgra dri ro reg bya rnams/ /rang gi sems tsam yin pa'i phyir/ /rim bzhin rnam par snang mdzad dang/ /mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung/ /snang ba mdza' yas don yod grub/ /yang na 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid/ /yang na rdo rje sems par bsam/ /bya ba ma
117a7(rgyud 'grel): lus byed do cog /lha yi de nyid dag ldan bya/ /de yi thugs kyi zla ba la/ /ye shes sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /sems kyi bsam par byas nas su/ /bza' btung bdud rtsir rab byas te/ /gong ma lta bu'i cho ga yis/ /yi ge gsum gyi sngags
117b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod la/ /lce la rdo rje hUM dkar po/ /de las rdo rje rtse gsum pa/ /bum par hUM gis mtshan byas te/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams ma lus par/ /tshim pa'i bsam byas myang bar bya/ /khyim nas 'byung dang 'jug la sogs/ /lus ngag yid kyi las rnams kun/ /
117b2(rgyud 'grel): sems can don la sbyor ba dang/ /sangs rgyas mchod par rnam dag bsam/ /dam tshig nyams pa gso ba'i phyir/ /sna tshogs pad+mar zla ba la/ /don long grub pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /'gro rnams rang bzhin dag bsams te/ /rang gi snying gar zla ba la/ /khaM las
117b3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /de dkyil zla bar khaM yang bsam/ /de las 'od zer rnams spros pas/ /bde gshegs ma lus bskul byas te/ /de rnams las byung 'od zer las/ /spyan sogs lha mo bcu rnams kyis/ /rang la dbang bskur byas par bsam/ /bla ma
117b4(rgyud 'grel): brnyas sogs skyon byung na/ /yon dang ldan pa'i mchod bstod dag /bla ma la ni dbul byas te/ /dbang bskur cho gas khrus kyang bya/ /de nas tho rangs dus dang ni/ /nyi ma phyed dang nub pa dang/ /nam phyed dus dang rtse gcig par/ /de bzhin thams cad bsgom par
117b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /bya bas skal pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /tho rangs dus na ting 'dzin gsum/ /ma lus par ni bsgom par bya/ /de las gzhan pa'i dus na ni/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te/ /yi dam lha yi snying ga ru/ /mtshan ma la sogs bsam byas la/ /de nyid gsum gyis
117b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyis/ /ye shes sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor las/ /dam tshig sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor spro/ /de bzhin dbang bskur mchod ba dang/ /bstod dang bdud rtsi mya ngal la sogs/ /byas nas sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya/ /langs par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor
117b7(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /sngon bzhin mchod dang bstong pa dang/ /bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar byas te/ /yi ge gsum gyis phyi rol gyi/ /dkyil 'khor ye shes sems dpa' yi /'khor lo nyid la zhugs par bya/ /gong ma lta bur bya ba rnams/ /ma lus rab tu spyod byed cing/ /nam
118a1(rgyud 'grel): phyed dus su rnal 'byor bas/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes sngags kyis/ /mchod pa la sogs rab byas te/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor gshegs par bya/ /de nyid gsum gyi dam tshig gi/ /dkyil 'khor ye shes sems
118a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' yi/ /'khor lo la ni zhugs bar bya/ /nyal ba'i dus na thabs nyid ni/ /shes rab ma dang bcas par nyal/ /tho rangs langs pa'i dus na ni/ /lha mos dbyangs kyis bskul nas langs/ /kha dog sna tshogs bsgyur byas la/ /rang gis
118a3(rgyud 'grel): snying gar zla ba la/ /sa bon maM tsam bsam byas la/ /tha mal pa yi lus nyid ni/ /gong ma lta bus tho rang kyi/ /dus la sogs par bsgom par bya/ /sgrub thabs 'di ni byis pa yis/ /bsod nams tshogs ni gang thob des/ /'gro ba thams
118a4(rgyud 'grel): cad bcom ldan 'das/ /'jam pa'i rdo rjer grub gyur cig /slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa'i/ /gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rnam par bshad pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mkhas pa chen po/ /dpal
118a5(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bod yul du bod ris kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i mda' bdag dpal lha btsan po khri mgon btsan gyis yon bdag byas nas/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti ki rtis
118a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa'o// // */ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i mngon rtogs zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa'o// / */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI sa mA dzA b+hi sa ma ya nA ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal
118a7(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba 'dus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nad par dang por bsam gtan gyi khang pa yid dang rjes su mthun pa shin tu dpon par stan 'jam po la 'jug ste/ 'gro ba drug gi
118b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad la blos bltas la byams pa'i sems bskyed de bdag gir byas nas/ de rnams phol mig la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang/ de'i rgyu mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yin par shes par byas te/ de nas snying rje'i
118b2(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed pas gdungs pa'i blos gnod pa de bsal ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid 'jam pa'i rdo rjer gyur nas sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya'o/ /zhes smon lam bya'o/ /de nas bsgom pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya ste rang gi snying gar
118b3(rgyud 'grel): yi ge a yongs su gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge maM mdog ser po bsams nas/ de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas lnga rnams dang/ rang gi 'dod pa'i lha rnams dang/ slob dpon mdun du nam mkha' la bsams te/ snying po'i
118b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyi sgo las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag byas te/ sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de la tshigs su bcad pa ni 'di yin te/ gang zhig thog
118b5(rgyud 'grel): med srid pa'i chu klung du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /de nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid rnam par bsgoms la/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa Adma koTa haM/ zhes bya ba'i sngaT kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas sems
118b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig bu ?? ?? bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'o/ /so sor ba'i bdag nyid can ni smon pa'o/ /de la yang bgegs 'byung bar gyur na mdun du yi ge a(rgyud 'grel): las byung
118b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/ de'i steng du yi ge hUM dang bcas pa'i rdo rje drag po nag po bsams te/ de'i 'od zer rnams kyis bgegs bsal bar bsams la/ de nyid kyis rdo rje dra bar byas bar chos 'byung ba dkar po gru gsum nang
119a1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa gyen kar 'dug pa'o/ /de'i 'og logs su yi ge A(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge baM yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba la khaM ljang gu yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje
119a2(rgyud 'grel): der zla ba la bruM yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo yi ge hUM? dang bcas pa'o/ /de gnyis yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po zhal g.yas gnag pa/ g.yon dmar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyung pa/ g.yas
119a3(rgyud 'grel): na 'khor lo dang ral gri dang/ g.yon na rin po che dang pad+ma bsnams pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i cod pan can bsams la/ de'i ye shes sems dpa' i snying po'i 'od zer rnams
119a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis sangs rgyas rnams yang dag bar bskul nas bcug la/ de yongs su gyur pa las/ khang pa brtsegs pa zur bzhi pa la sogs pa dang yang dag par ldan pa bsams la/ de'i dbus ma'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ stong pa nyid bcu drug
119a5(rgyud 'grel): gi ngo bo a la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa'i zla bde rnams kyis mtshan pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rnam pa'o/ /de'i steng du skyes bu chen pe'i/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dzin pa'i ngo bo ka la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa la/ de rnams kyi mtshan pa'i
119a6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnam pa'o/ /de'i steng du yi ge hUM dmar po ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis dang yi ge hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar por gyur pa la yi ge hUM gis mtshan pa ni snang ba mdza' yas kyi rnam pa'o/ /
119a7(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'od zer rnams kyis sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul nas bcug ste/ de'i nga rgyal du byas pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni don yong grub pa'i rnam pa ste/ de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' i skur bdag nyid bsam pa ni/ sku mdog
119b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar po/ zhal g.yas gnag /g.yon dmar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na rdo rje dang ral gri/ g.yon rin chen dang pad+ma bsnams pa/ rin po che'i cod pan dang/ zla ba'i gdan dang/ zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba/ rdo rje'i
119b2(rgyud 'grel): skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'i skur bdag nyid bsems la/ sems can rnams 'dod chags chen pos 'dul bar shes nas dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgras sangs rgyas rnams bdag nyid la bcug la/ de la spyan la sogs pa dgu'i gzugs kyi
119b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi/ /lha mo'i nang du chud par byas nas/ de nas yi ge hUM gi 'od zer rnams kyis sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par bskul nas khar bcug ste /rdo rje'i lan nas nges par phyung la/ pad+ma'i nang du byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam par blta ste/ de
119b4(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa las dkyil 'khor du bsams la/ sems can ma lus pa yid kyis rab tu bcug ste?/ de byang chub kyi sems su yongs su gyur nas/ rdo rje'i lam nas nges par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur par bya'o/ /de nas
119b5(rgyud 'grel): de bruM AM dzreM khaM hUM/ lAM mAM pAM tAM/ dza hUM baM hUM khaM raM/ k+ShiM dzriM khaM sh+kaM saM/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i yi ge las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pad+ma'i nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo'i ba ba spu'i bu ga na
119b6(rgyud 'grel): bla? dbyung ngo/ /de ltar sems can gyi khams rnam par dag nas/ hUM las 'od zer byung bas yi ge ho(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba'i 'jug pa'i sems spel ba bkug la khar bcug ste/ rdo rje'i lam nas nges par phyung nas byang chub kyi
119b7(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi rnam par lha mo'i pad+ma'i nang du babs pa dang/ de'i 'od zer rnams kyis reg pa tsam gyis rig pa rdo rje rdzun pa dang bcas par zhu bar gyur par bsam mo/ /de nas 'byung ba chen po bzhi spyan la sogs pa'i lha mor gyur pas/ /sems
120a1(rgyud 'grel): can khams na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glus bskul?  bar bsam mo/ /'di rnams kyis yang dag par bskul bar gyur pa dang/ sems kyi 'od zer de 'byung ba bzhi dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskul nas zhugs par gyur pa
120a2(rgyud 'grel): las rang gi sngags kyi gzugs su bdag nyid bsams nas/ de yongs su gyur pa las/ ral gri yi ge maM gis mtshan pa'o/ /de gnyis yongs su gyur pa las 'jam pa'i rdo rje sku mdog ser po/ zhal g.yas nag po g.yon dkar po phyag gnyis kyis shes
120a3(rgyud 'grel): rab dam pa la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na ral gri dam pa dang/ mda' g.yon na utpal dang gzhu bsnams pa/ zla ba'i 'od dang rin po che'i cod pan mda' ba/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng na zla ba la rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs par bsams la/ de'i snying gar zla ba la ral
120a4(rgyud 'grel): gri/ de'i dbus su de dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' de'i thugs kar zla ba la ral gri /de'i dbus su yi ge mi gnas par bsam la/ oM d+harmmA d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma konya haM/ zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /'di dag ni mchog gi
120a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa'i yan lag ste/ rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu chung ba'o/ /de'i mig tu zla ba la k+ShiM dkar po yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo k+ShiM gis mtshan pa'o/ /de gnyis yongs su gyur pa las sa'i snying po sku mdog dkar po/ zhal g.yas gnag g.yon dmar
120a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud/ g.yas na 'khor lo dang ral gri/ g.yon na nor bu dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba la yi ge dzri dang bcas pa'i rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las phyag na rdo rje sku mdog nag po/ zhal g.yas dkar g.yon
120a7(rgyud 'grel): dmar/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa'o/ /g.yas na rdo rje dang ral gri/ g.yon rin po che dang pad+ma'o/ /de bzhin du sna la yi ge khaM dang bcas pa'i rin po che yongs su gyur pa las nam mkha' i snying po sku mdog ser po/ zhal g.yas
120b1(rgyud 'grel): gnag g.yon dkar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na rin po che dang ral gri /g.yon na 'khor lo dang pad+ma'o/ /de bzhin du lce la yi ge gaM dang bcas pa'i pad+ma yongs su gur pa las/ 'jig rten dbang phyug sku mdog dmar po zhal g.yas
120b2(rgyud 'grel): gnag g.yon dkar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na pad+ma dang ral gro /g.yon rin po che dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /de bzhin du mgo la yi ge Sh+kaM bcas pa'i rol gri yongs su gyur pa las sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
120b3(rgyud 'grel): sel ba sku mdog ljang gu /zhal g.yas gnag g.yon dmar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dmar ba la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na rin po che dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /de bzhin du lte ba la/ yi ge saM dang bcas ba'i rdo rje yongs su gyur pa
120b4(rgyud 'grel): las kun tu bzang po sku mdog dkar po/ g.yas gnag g.yon dmar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje dang ral gri /g.yon na rin po che dang pad+ma bsnams pa ste/ sa'i snying po la sogs pa 'di rnams kyang zla ba'i
120b5(rgyud 'grel): gdan dang zla ba'i 'od dang/ rin po che'i cod pan mda' ba/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /de dag ni mchog gi nye bar sgrub pI ni yan lag ste/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu cung du'o/ /kun tu bzang po'i steng du zla ba la yi ge hUM nag po yongs su gyur
120b6(rgyud 'grel): pa las rdo rje lte ba la hUM dang bcas pa'i rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las thugs rdo rje phyag na rdo rje lta bu thugs ka'i zla ba la yi ge hUM nag pa'o/ /lce rtsar yi ge A yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma lte ba yi ge a dang bcas pa'i pad+ma yongs su gyur pa las gsung rdo rje
120b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug lta bu'o/ /de'i thugs ka'i zla ba la yi ge a dmar po'o/ /dpral bar yi ge aM yongs su gyur pa las/ 'khor lo lte bar oM dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo yongs su gyur pa las stsa? rdo rje sa'i snying po lta bus so /de'i thugs kar
121a1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la yi ge oM dkar po snying po de rnams kyi 'od zer gyis thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par mchod nas/ dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod de/ yang dag par bsku
121a2(rgyud 'grel): la sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de dag ni mchog gi sgrub pa'i yan lag ste/ skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu chung ngu'o/ /snying po'i 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas thams cad bskul ba dang de rnams kyis 'od zer btang ba'i sgo nas byung ba'i spyan la
121a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i rig ma rnams kyis rin po che'i bum pa nas bdud rtsis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa dang/ rang gi rigs kyi bdag po cod pan du thogs pa'o/ /de dag ni mchog gi bsgrub pa chen po'i yan lag ste/ dbang gi 'bras bu chung ngu'o/ /yan
121a4(rgyud 'grel): lag bzhi pa'i dang po'o/ /rnal 'byor pa mchog gi bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i yan lag 'di dag gis rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'bring po la sogs pa ni rang dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya'o/ /gzhan yang oM hUM swAhA A(rgyud 'grel): hU zhes bya ba'i yi ge las bskying
121a5(rgyud 'grel): par byas te/ de'i mgo dang/ snying ga dang/ lte ba dang/ gsang ba dang/ brla dang/ rkang pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar ro/ /yi ge hUM las pad+ma a las lte ba/ phaT las dbab pa dgag pa'o/ /bdag nyid kyis yang yi ge hUM las rdo rje/ oM las nor bu phaT gyis
121a6(rgyud 'grel): dgag pa'o/ /de nas snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyis bskul la drangs te/ de dang lhan cig sngags pas dga' ba brtsam par bya'o/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko nya haM/ yan lag bzhi ba'i gnyis pas te/ 'di dag ni dang po'i
121a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /snying po'i gsang sngags kyi 'od zer rnams kyis sangs rgyas rnams bskul la/ bkug nas khar bcug ste/ lha mo'i 'dod chags kyis zla ba zhu bar gyur pa dang/ pad+ma'i nang du phab pa las byung ba'i rang gi sa bon yongs su
121b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las bdag po dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor ba bsams la cho ga 'dis 'byung bar bya'o/ /badzra Dh+ri ka tses bya bar las mi bskyod pa bskul te/ sku mdog nag po zhal g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab
121b2(rgyud 'grel): dam pa la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na rdo rje ral gri/ g.yon na rin po che dang pad+ma bsnams pa/ nyi ma'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba/ ral pa dang cod pan can/ rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa dngos po thams cad kyis bdag la zhugs par bya'o
121b3(rgyud 'grel): dzi na dzi ka ces bya bas rnam par snang mdzad dgong de/ sku mdog dkar po zhal g.yas gnag /g.yon dmar ba phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na 'khor lo dang ral gri/ g.yon na rin po che dang pad+ma bsnams pa/ zla ba'i
121b4(rgyud 'grel): gdan dang zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba/ shar gyi pad+ma la bzhugs par bya'o/ /ratna d+h+rika ces bya bas rin chen 'byung ldan dgong de/ sku mdog ser po zhal g.yas gnag g.yon dkar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na rin po
121b5(rgyud 'grel): che dang ral gri/ g.yon na 'khor lo dang pad+ma bsnams pa/ lhor bzhugs par bya'o/ /A ro lika ces bya bas 'od dpag tu med pa dgod de/ /sku mdog dmar po zhal g.yas gnag /g.yon dkar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyung
121b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ g.yas na pad+ma dang ral gri/ g.yon na rin po che dang 'khor lo bsnams pa/ /nub tu bzhugs par bya'o/ /pradz+nyA d+h+rika ces bya bas don yong grub pa dgong de/ sku mdog ljang gu zhal g.yas gnag /g.yon dkar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab
121b7(rgyud 'grel): dam pa las byung pa/ g.yas na ral gri dang 'khor lo/ /g.yon na rin po che dang pad+ma bsnams pa/ byang du bzhugs par bya'o/ /'di rnams ni nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od dang na bza' dang rgyan bzang po dang/ ral gri dang cod pan mnga' ba/ rdo rje
122a1(rgyud 'grel): skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /mo ha rA ti zhes bya bas shar lhor spyan dgod de/ sku mdog dkar mo/ /zhal g.yas gnag g.yon dmar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis thabs la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na 'khor lo dang ral gri
122a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na rin po che dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /dwe Sha ra ti zhes bya bas lho nub tu mA ma kI dgod de/ /sku mdog nag po zhal g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis thabs la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na utpal dmar po dang ral gri/ g.yon
122a3(rgyud 'grel): na rin po che dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /rA ga ra ti zhes bya ba las nub byang du gos dkar mo dgod de/ sku mdog dmar mo zhal g.yas gnag /g.yon dkar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis thabs la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na pad+ma dang ral gri/ g.yon na nor/
122a4(rgyud 'grel): bu dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /badzra rA ti zhes bya ba las byang shar du sgrol ma dgod de/ sku mdog ser po zhal g.yas gnag /g.yon dkar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis thabs la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na utpal ser po dang ral gri/ g.yon na rin po
122a5(rgyud 'grel): che dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /phyi rim gyi shar lhor de kho na nyid/ gsum las gzuT rdo rje sa'i snying po lta bu me long la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin du lho nub tu sgra rdo rje phyag na rdo rje lta bu la pi bar la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin du nub byang
122a6(rgyud 'grel): du twi rdo rje nam mkha' i snying po lta bu la dri'i dung chos la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin du byang shar du ro rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug lta bu la thod pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /shar gyi sgo'i g.yon du reg rdo rje sgrib pa rnam par sel ba lta bu la/ /
122a7(rgyud 'grel): lha'i gos sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /shar gyi sgo'i g.yas su chos kyi dbyings rdo rje kun tu bzang po lta bu la chos 'byung ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa ste/ lha mo bcu po de rnams ni zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bri
122b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i cod pan dang/ na bza' bzang po dang ldan pa'o/ /ya mAn+ta krita ces bya ba las/ shar phyogs kyi sgor gshin rje gshed dgod de/ sku mdog nag po/ zhal g.yas dkar ba g.yon dmar ba/ phyag gnyis gyis shes rab dam pa
122b2(rgyud 'grel): la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i tho ba dang ral gri/ g.yon na rin po che dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /pra dz+nyAn ta krita ces bya ba las lho phyogs kyi sgor shes rab mthar byed dgod de/ sku mdog dkar po/ zhal g.yas gnag /g.yon dmar pa/ phyag
122b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyes kyis shes rab dam ba la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na rin po ches mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dang ral gri/ g.yon na rin po che dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /padmAn ta krita ces bya ba las nub phyogs kyi sgor pad+ma mthar byed dgod de/ sku mdog dmar po zhal g.yas
122b4(rgyud 'grel): gnag g.yon dkar ba/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rang dam pa la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na pad+ma dang ral gri/ g.yon na rin po che dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /bag+hIn ta krita ces bya ba las byang phyogs kyi sgor bgegs mthar byed dgod de/ sku mdog
122b5(rgyud 'grel): nag po/ zhal g.yas dkar/ g.yon dmar po/ phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa/ g.yas na rdo rje dang ral gri/ /g.yon na rin po che dang pad+ma bsnams pa ste/ khro bo 'di rnams nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba/ khro bo'i
122b6(rgyud 'grel): skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ stag gi lpags pa mnabs pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ smin ma dang ag tshoms dang spyan ser ba/ dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa ljags 'dril ba/ de ltar dngos po thams cad kyis rdzogs pa'i
122b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bstan nas/ snying ga'i sa bon gyis 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sangs rgyas rnams spyan drangs nas mdun du bltas la/ de rnams dang lhan cig 'ongs pa'i bgegs gshin rje gshed la sogs pas bskrad sna?
123a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mngon par bsrung ba dang/ bcing ba dang mnyes par byas nas/ bdud rtsis gang ba'i snod kyis mchod yon phul la/ snying po'i 'od zer las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing
123a2(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i rang gi gsang sngags kyis dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang /dbang du bya'o/ /de dag ni thun mong gi bsnyen pa'i yan lag ste/ rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu chen po'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad la
123a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ spyi'i nye bar bsgrub pa'i yan lag ste/ /rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu chen po'o/ /de bzhin du sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa ni/ spyi'i sgrub pa'i
123a4(rgyud 'grel): yan lag ste/ skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu chen po'o/ /de nyid bzhin du dbang bskur bar gyur pa ni/ sangs rgyas rnams rdo rje 'chang ba dang/ mA ma kI dang/ sgra rdo rje dang chos kyi dbyings rdo rje dang/ shes rab mthar byed/ bgegs mthar byed kyi cod
123a5(rgyud 'grel): pan la ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /spyan dang gzugs rdo rje dang/ gshin rje gshed kyi cod pan la ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /gos dkar mo dang ro rdo rje ma dang/ pad+ma mthar byed kyi cod pan la ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o/ /sgrol ma dang reg rdo rje'i cod pan la ni don
123a6(rgyud 'grel): yod grub pa'o/ /dri rdo rje cod pan la ni rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /'di dag ni spyi'i sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag ste/ dbang gi 'bras bu chen po'i yan lag bzhi pa'i gsum pa'o/ /snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyis sangs rgyas rnams bskul la
123a7(rgyud 'grel): khar bcug ste/ rdo rje'i lam nas nges par phyung nas/ lha mo'i chags pas pad+ma'i nang du zla bzhu ba'i gzugs can du bsams la/ de'i 'od zer las byung pa'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa phyung bas yang dag par mchod nas/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta
123b1(rgyud 'grel): pU dza badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko nya haM/ zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi yid lhag pa'i lhar gyur pa las chos rnams kyi mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje che zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i stong pa'i sgra brag ca lta bus bstod pa byed par
123b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /de nas bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga 'di yin te/ yi ge yaM yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu la ba dan gyis mtshan pa/ du ba'i mdog can yi ge yaM dang bcas pa/ de'i steng du yi ge raM yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil
123b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gru gsum zur gsum la rdo rjes mtshan pa'i yi ge raM dang bcas pa'o de'i steng du zla ba la yi ge a yongs su gyur pa las thod pa'o/ /der sngags pas bi mu shu ma da ste bdud rtsi lnga dang/ ha d+ho go sha ma ste dpa' bo lnga bkod la/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i
123b4(rgyud 'grel): mes thod pa de la gnas pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsir gyur par bsams la/ der yi ge hUM las rdo rjer gyur pa yang nang du bsam mo/ /yang yi ge oM gyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon drangs la 'dres par gyur par byas nas/ der yi ge gsum
123b5(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bzlas la rnal 'byor pas hUM bkod pa'i rdo rje'i lce bzang po dang/ de lha rnams tshim par bya'o/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /snying po las nges par byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag pa ma
123b6(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i rtog pa spangs pas de'i bdag nyid du 'gro ba rnams byas nas rang gi sa bon gyi nang du bcug ste/ thig le'i gzugs su rang gi yid yongs su bsgoms la/ /sems de'i 'od zer gyis phreng ba'i snang bas sku dang gsung dang thugs dang lus kyi mchog
123b7(rgyud 'grel): gi bar sar par byas la/ yang de nyid du zhugs pas ye shes bdud rtsi 'bab par bsam mo/ /des nang gi lus dang de bzhin du thams cad snang bar byas te/ ba spu'i bu ga re re nas byung ba'i mdza' yas pa'i 'od kyi tshogs rnams kyis sna tshogs pa kun
124a1(rgyud 'grel): tu bkang nas slar 'dus te gnas pa dang/ brtan par gyur pa ni thig le'i rnal 'byor ro/ /de nas rang gi sngags kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas bcu ga la/ rdo rje'i lam nas nges par phyung nas zla ba zhu bar gyur pa la/ de yongs
124a2(rgyud 'grel): su gyur pa'i mtshan ma phra mo'i lte bar ting nge 'dzin gnyis bskyed la/ sna tshogs pa sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid du rang gi sngags kyi nang du bcug la/ thig le de'i gzugs can 'od gsal bar bdag nyid bsams te/ de'i 'od zer rnams kyis dkyil 'khor la
124a3(rgyud 'grel): bltas la sems brtan par gyur nas rjes su dran pa bcu drug bsgom par bya'o/ /bsgom pas dub na cig car ram rim gyis sems ma yengs par bzlas brjod bya'o/ /rang gi rgyud chim par bya ba bsam pa ni mtho gang gis pags pa la spyi bo'i steng
124a4(rgyud 'grel): du bdugs dkar po bzhin bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge oM/ de'i 'od zer rnams kyis bdud rtsi phab la/ de nas srog gi rlung dang rang gi sngags kyi 'od zer gyis drangs nas/ rkan gyi phyogs su phab nas ba spu'i khung bu dang rtsa rgyud las sku
124a5(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs tshim par bya'o/ /de nas bzlas pa dpag tu med par byas nas/ oM la sogs pa de kho na nyid gsum gyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsdus la yang dag pa'i smon lam sngon du bya'o/ /de nas rang gi lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas/ langs
124a6(rgyud 'grel): nas thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bar bsams nas gnas par bya'o/ /bdud rtsi myang ba'i rim gyis zas la sogs pa spyad par bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba'i rim pas khrus bya'o/ /rgyu mthun pa 'bring po la sogs pas grong gi chos bya'o/ /thun mtshams
124a7(rgyud 'grel): su yang de kho na nyid gsum gyis dkyil 'khor rnam par sbros la/ mchod pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas bzlas pa byas na/ yang de kho na nyid gsum gyi dkyil 'khor bsdus la nyal bar bya'o/ /yang nang par gyi dus su bskyed pa'i rim gyis
124b1(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gsum rdzogs par byas la mnyam par bzhag nas bzlas brjod la sogs pa bya'o/ /bsgom pa'i cho ga 'di ni shes rab dman pa'i sems can mthong nas/ slob dpon gyis 'di nyid gsar du brtsams pa yin no/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i mngon
124b2(rgyud 'grel): bar rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAd+d+hA ka ra ba rma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus
124b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ slad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// //*/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga slob dpon bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ maN+Da la bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /
124b4(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi shes mun pa'i bgegs sel cing/ /'gro ba'i phun tshogs mchog gyur pa/ /'jam mchog bla ma la btud de/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba gsal bshad bya/ /ngo tsha yang ni rnams spangs te/ /slob ma
124b5(rgyud 'grel): blo dman la brtse bas/ /phan phyir cho ga 'di brtsams gyis/ /skye bo dam pa bzod mdzad rigs/ /thog mar re zhig sngags pa grags pa dang ma grags pa dang/ rnyed pa dang/ ma rnyed pa dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ kha stod pa dang/ smad pa zhes bya ba'i
124b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis sems ma 'phrogs pa/ 'jig pa med pa/ g.yo dang bral ba/ lus dang srog la bltos pa med pa/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang/ gtong ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan bas/ thun bzhis dang po'i sbyor
124b7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang las kyi rgyal po mchog ste/ ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bas sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o/ /de la thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin na ni 'khor lo'i gtso bo mi bskyod pa'i sngags bzlas brjod 'bum
125a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor la ni/ 'khor lo'i gtso bo 'od dpag tu med pa dang/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags de bzhin du bzlas par bya'o/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sngags 'bum dang/ dkyil 'khor pa'i sngags de
125a2(rgyud 'grel): re zhing khri khri bzla'o/ /yang na 'khor lo can gyi bka' thob na dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags bzlas pa'i chus bsang zhing byug pa byas la/ sa'i
125a3(rgyud 'grel): lha mo la yang dam tshig gis gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa bsgoms te bgegs rnams bskrad nas/ 'byor pa ci yod pas mchod pa dang/ gtor ma dang/ sbyin bsreg byas la sa'i lha mo blos nam mkha' la bzhag ste/ bus mo tsam
125a4(rgyud 'grel): brkos nas/ gyo mo la sogs pa bsal te/ sa de nyid kyi khung bu dgang bar bya'o/ /yang gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud las/ pus mo nub tsam brkos nas ni/ /sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya/ /gal te lhag par gyur na ni/ /de tshe dngos grub yod par bshad/ /
125a5(rgyud 'grel): ces gsungs pa yin no/ /khung bu dgang pa'i dus su yang mchod pa dang/ sbyin sreg dang gtor ma bya'o/ /phyi'i sa sbyang ba'o/ /yang slob dpon rang gi slob ma dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyi khang par mchod pa dang/ sa sbyang ba byas la 'khor lo rtsibs
125a6(rgyud 'grel): bcu pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa 'am/ rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ oM b+hu khaM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis sa nam mkha' i rang bzhin du bsgoms la/ hUM laM hUM/ zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsams la/ oM me di ni badzri b+ha ba
125a7(rgyud 'grel): badzra band+ha hUM/ zhes bya ba 'dis sa byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /nang gi bdag nyid can gyi sa sbyang ba'i rim pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang ba la/ rnam pa
125b1(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma bzhi po rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin cing phyogs bzhir gnas pas tshigs su bcad pa bzhis gsol ba gdab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos 'bun
125b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag med pa yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos
125b3(rgyud 'grel): ni mchog las byung/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med/ /kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur/ /
125b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs la/ sems can gyi khams rnams nyon mongs pas khyab pa la bltas la/ nyon mongs pa la khros pas bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi
125b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i bdag nyid can du bsgoms te/ hUM badzra tsakra tishThA zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nam mkhar bteg nas/ yi ge maM gis mig g.yon par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ Ta zhes bya bas mig g.yas par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas/ phyogs bcu'i
125b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba dus gsum du gtogs pa rnams la bltas te/ langs nas rkang pa'i 'og tu rdo rje 'bar ba dang bcas pa rnam par bsgoms la/ yi ge hUM zlos shing dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te/ rdo rje 'gros kyis gar byed pas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi bskor
125b7(rgyud 'grel): la/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi la gnas pa'i lha la sogs pa'i bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o/ /sku gsung thugs la gnas pa yi/ /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams thams cad nyon/ /nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor pa/ /gal
126a1(rgyud 'grel): te bdag sgo las 'das na/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs ldan pa/ /sku gsum 'byung bas dag byas te/ /'jig 'gyur 'dir ni gdon mi za/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis bskrad par bya'o/ /sa yongs su bzung ba'o/ /de nas yang dgegs/?
126a2(rgyud 'grel): zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su bdud rtsi thab sbyor sku smad rtse gcig pa 'dra ba la/ sku stod khro bo'i sku'i rnam pa phyogs bcur bsams la/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarbba du Sh+Ta na phaT/ kI la yA kI la yA/ sarbba pA baM phaT/
126a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la yA badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pA ya taM/ kA ya bA gatsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ ces bya ba'i phur bu'i sngags kyis phur bus gdab par bya'o/ /de nas sa gzhi bgegs dang bral ba/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od zer gyis khyab par bsams la/
126a4(rgyud 'grel): phur bu'i phyi rol tu rdo rje'i ra ba'i 'od zer dang bcas pa bsam mo/ /de'i phyi rol tu rdo rje ra ba/ de'i phyi rol tu dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog ser po zur bzhi pas phyogs bcing ngo/ /de nas me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum bas mtshams bcing bar bsaM
126a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la sa'i lha mo me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par dang/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /shA kya seng+ge skyob pa yis/ /
126a6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde/ /pham par byas de dkyil 'khor bri/ zhes bya bas lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi sa dri zhim pos byugs la/ der me tog sil ma yang bkram la/
126a7(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi de la bdud rtsi lnga po legs par sbyangs ba dang bcas pa'i dris dkyil 'khor bcu dgu byas nas/ /nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo blos bkug ste/ dri zhim po'i dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas/ /yang mtshams
126b1(rgyud 'grel): dang phyogs gcing ba byas la/ 'byor ba ci yod pas phyi dang yid kyis mchod pa byas la/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /de nas bum pa lhag par gnas par bya ba ni/ rnam par
126b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i bum pa/ mgrin pa ring ba/ chu 'phyang ba gsus pa che ba la/ nas dang/ gro dang/ ma sha dang/ 'bras so ba dang/ til te 'bru lnga dang/ 'bri ha ti dang/ kan da ka ri dang/ gi ri kar ni dkar po dang/ sa ha dang/ sa ha de ba ste sman lnga dang/ gser
126b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ byu ru dang mu tig dang dung dang nor bu ste/ rin po che sna lnga dang ldan pa/ spos chus gang ba mgrin pa gos sar pas dkris pa/ yal ga dri zhim pos kha brgyan pa lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ rnam par rgyal pa'i bum pa la
126b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i gtso bo bsams te/ gsang ba dang/ mchod yon la sogs pa phul la/ me tog dang/ spos dang/ mar me dang/ dris mchod cing bstod pa yang byas nas/ me tog gi phreng bas dkris pa'i rdo rje rnam par rgyal pa'i bum pa'i khar
126b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag la/ bdag po'i sngags yi ge gsum dang spel ba de la bzla bar bya'o/ /de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor pa'i bum pa bco brgyad kyang spos chus bkang la/ a mra la sogs pa'i yal ga dang ldan pa/ mgul pa ras sna tshogs kyis
126b6(rgyud 'grel): bkris pa la/ /dkyil 'khor pa'i sngags yi ge gsum dang spel ba thun gsum du mngon par bzlas par bya'o/ /yang bum pa gzhan sems can thams cad la bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags oM A(rgyud 'grel): bagrin? ta kri ta hUM zhes bya
126b7(rgyud 'grel): ba mngon par bzla'o/ /gtor ma yang sbyin no/ /bum ba lhag par gnas pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas spos snod thogs la/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lhang nga sa la btsugs te/ /sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i 'khor lo'i gtso bo lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /
127a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchog /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor
127a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni 'dri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de ni gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs/ /sangs rgyas 'gro 'khor bya don stsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang/ /gang yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang/ /'jig rten
127a3(rgyud 'grel): skyong pa'i lha rnams dang/ /gang yang 'byung po mthu can dang/ /gang yang lha yi spyan mnga' ba/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor che ge
127a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba 'di/ /'gro ba dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /yo byad ci 'byor pas 'drin/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /lha lhag
127a5(rgyud 'grel): par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas bzlas brjod kyang ni ci nus bya'o/ /de'i rjes la slob ma re re zhing yang me tog gi phreng ba thogs la/ /yid gzhung spro ba che ba dang/ /byas pa gzo zhing nga rgyal med/ /rigs mtho yon tan ldan zhing dang/ /gzugs
127a6(rgyud 'grel): dang kha dog lang tshor ldan/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /sgrub la don gnyer mngon brtson na/ /zhes bya ba ni slob ma'i mtshan nyid do/ /gzugs dan yon tan med pa 'am/ dman pa 'am lhag par gnas par bya/ /zhes
127a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni slob ma phal ba rnams so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga las/ /'khor bzhi char yang rjes su gnang/ /rang gi bslab dang shin tu ldan/ /theg chen la dga' bdag nyid can/ /la la gsang sngags sgrub don gnyer/ /'di na dkyil
127b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'jug par byed/ /bsod nams 'dod pa de las gzhan/ /gzhan dag 'jig rten gzhan don gnyer/ /'jig rten pha rol don gnyer ba'i/ /dad pa mang du byed pa yis/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug bya yi/ /tshe 'di 'bras bu 'dod ma bya/ /tshe
127b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di 'dod par gyur pa la/ /'jig rten pha rol don mi 'grub/ /'jig rten pha rol don gnyer skyes/ /'jig rten 'di yis 'bras bu rgyas/ /ces brjod la/ slob ma de blos rang gi nang du bcug ste/ /rang gi rdo rje las phyung nas/ /rang gi sor snang si
127b3(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i pad+mar gnas pa la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zhu ba'i tshul du gyur pas dbang bskur bar bsams la/ /dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i sgor 'dug nas gsol ba 'debs par bya'o/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs
127b4(rgyud 'grel): su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems ni bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag ni bdag gsol lo/ /thang pa chen
127b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /zhes bya bas gsol ba btab pa dang/ slob dpon gyis slob pa'i gtso bo gcig la dmigs te/ bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bstan
127b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag /de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bos
127b7(rgyud 'grel): byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shA kya seng+ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis
128a1(rgyud 'grel): blo gros 'di gyis shig /ces brjod la/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung/ /zhes bya ba'i
128a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshigs su bcad pa lan gsum zlos su gzhug go /de nas bdud rtsi thob sbyor gyi sngags kyis/ mngon par bsrungs la de rnams kyi snying ga dang lkog ma dang spyi bor rdo rje dang pad+ma dang/ 'khor lo bsams la/ mtshan ma
128a3(rgyud 'grel): de rnams nyid kyi lte ba'i dbus su hUM A(rgyud 'grel): oM zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur g.yas pas bzung la btag ste/ slob dpon gyis slob ma'i snyang ga dang spyi bo dang lkog mar gtugs la/ hUM oM A(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas
128a4(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i spyi bor me tog dang/ mdun du spos dang/ mar me dang/ snying gar du sbyin par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la a shwat+tha la sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa/ yon po ma yin pa/ rtse mo'i cha me tog gi phreng bas bkris pa la bdud rtsi thab
128a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor gyi sngags bzlas pa slob ma rnams la sbyin par bya'o/ /slob ma de rnams kyang shar ram nub tu kha bltas te/ so shing de bcas la ba lang gi ko ba tsam gyi sa'i cha ba'i lci bas byugs la/ /so shing bltos pa med par dor bar bya'o/ /
128a6(rgyud 'grel): gal te so shing gi rtse mo shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su bltas na/ /zhib la sogs pa'i dngos grub yod par ston to/ /de nas skyor chu gsum sbyin par bya ste/ oM h+rI bi shud+d+ha d+harmmA sa rbba pA paM ni tsa saM sho d+ha ya/ sarbba bi ka la pa a pa na ya hUM/
128a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i chu des kha bkru bar bya'o/ /yang de 'dug pa la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags bzlas pa'i ku sha sngas dang stan gyi phyir byin la/ bdud rtsi thab sbyar gyi sngags bzlas pa'i bsrung skud kyis slob ma rnams bsrung ba'i phyir
128b1(rgyud 'grel): dpung pa g.yas par bcing bar bya'o/ /de yang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las/ /srad bus g.yas par bcing bya zhing/ /ku sha dag ni lag par ro/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de nas/ 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u dum pa ra'i me tog bzhin
128b2(rgyud 'grel): brgya laM na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni ma 'byung ngo/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gis mnyam med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /bskal pa bye ba du ma ru/ /sdig pa bgyis
128b3(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa gang/ /de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba/ /mthong bas 'byang bar 'gyur lags na/ /grags pa mdza' yas sngags spyod pa'i/ /tshul la gnas pa smos ci 'tshal/ /skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni/ /go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur/ /gang
128b4(rgyud 'grel): dag spyod pa mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shin tu mi g.yo ba/ /de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ding rnyed?/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa/ /bdag nyid
128b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po kun gyi ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la/ /sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams 'dir ni dod bas
128b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rang 'byung skal ba chen po pa/ /'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /zhes chos bshad pa bsgrag par bya'o/ /slob dpon nyid don du gnyer ba'i slob ma ni/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags kyis bsrungs te
128b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pa/ khyad par gyi sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug go /mi ldog 'khor lo'i dbang bskur ba/ /stsal ba'i mgon po bdag la gsungs/ /'khor lo lha yi de nyid dang/ /slob dpon gyi ni las rnams dang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang/ /sdom dang gsang
129a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dam tshig gsum/ /sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur/ /gsol ba btab pa dang/ slob ma de ku sha'i stan la nyal du gzhug go /slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'i/ /yang slob dpon
129a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs la/ bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags yang dang yang du bzlas par bya'o/ /yang nang par gyi dus su phyir byung la slob ma bos te/ de rnams la rmi lam dge mi dge dri bar bya'o/ /mi dge ba mthong na
129a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas yang nang par dkyil 'khor mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba la sogs pa byas la/ dri'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gshegs gar bya
129a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don du blos bteg la nam mkhar bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor zung bzhi pa la sogs pa phyi'i srad bus thig gdab bo/ /de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ /de la sngags pas re zhig dang bor changs pa'i thig gnyis pa mi yo ba dang/ de'i
129a5(rgyud 'grel): rjes la khru gang la sogs pa'i tshad kyi zur bzhi pa'i thig mi g.yo ba dang/ de'i 'og tu mtshams kyi thig gnyis pa gdab bo/ /'khor lo zur bzhi pa'i brgyad cha'i tshad ni sgo'i sa'i cha'i thig gdab bo/ /de nas tshon sna lnga'i sa la sogs
129a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshad la ji skad bshad pa bzhin du thig gdab par bya'o/ /lha'i snam bu'i sa'i thig gdab bo/ /de'i nang gi zur bzhi'i nang du snying po'i dkyil 'khor dri'o/ /zur bzhi'i sgo'i tshad tsam ni tshon sna lnga'i sa'i tshad do/ /ka ba ni rdo rje dang/ rin po
129a7(rgyud 'grel): che la sogs pas mtshan pa dang ldan pa la/ /rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba bris 'drir gzhug go /phyi rol tu rta babs sgo'i cha'i sum 'gyur du byas la/ de'i phyir rol tu dkyil 'khor dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshad kyi lcags ri ji ltar mdzes par
129b1(rgyud 'grel): bri'o/ /sa'i thig gdab pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas ye shes kyi thig gi tsho na sna lnga'i brang bu ye shes lnga dang ldan pa la rdzi ma bskyed cing g.yo ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i thugs ka nas drangs pa'i ye shes kyi srang bus byin gyis
129b2(rgyud 'grel): rlob pa'o/ /de yang de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ rab tu myur bar mig bsgul zhing/ mig gi rdzi ma 'gugs byed pa/ /lta ba gzi can yin par bshad/ /'gro ba thams cad 'grugs byed pa'o/ /zhes bshad pa dang yi ge dza las zla ba dang nyi ma'i
129b3(rgyud 'grel): mig sngags pas bsgom par bya'o/ /ye shes kyi thig de mchung ni dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur la/ /sboms su sgo'i nyi shu cha'i tshad kyi srad bu de zlum por bya zhing/ dri dang bdud rtsi lngas byugs la/ yi ge gsum dang spel ba'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi
129b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis bsrungs nas/ b+ha ga ban pra yats+tsha sha shwad tam su traM swa tsakra su tra na ya/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas mi bskyod pa'i bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsol ba gdab po/ /de nas a n+yo?
129b5(rgyud 'grel): n+ya a nu ga ta sarbba d+ha rmma? pa ra spa ra sarbba d+harmma/ a tya na ta a nu pra biSh+Ta sarbba d+harmma/ zhes bya bas thig 'dzin pa'i slob ma bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas lhan cig bsgril bar bya/ /de'i rjes la slob dpon nub sgor 'dug ste/ bdag nyid dza dza dza
129b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba bzlos shing khu tshur g.yon mas thig bzung la lte bar bzhag ste/ slob mas shar phyogs kyi sgong gnas pa la dza gsum gyis de'i lag tu btang la/ oM badzra sa ma ya su tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ nam mkha' gang pa'i bde gshegs rnams/ /byed
129b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'gro don mdzod dus lags/ /thig gi sgra yis bskul nas ni/ /de rnams 'dir ni gshegs su gsol/ /zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod de nam mkhar thig gdab la/ thig gi sgra des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul nas byon par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i rjes
130a1(rgyud 'grel): la bskor phyogs su song ste/ lho phyogs su song la der 'dug ste/ slob ma byang phyogs su 'dug pa dang lhan cig thig gdab bo/ /'og tu thig gdab pa la yang rim pa de nyid yin no/ /de nas me'i phyogs su song ste/ /de bzhin
130a2(rgyud 'grel): du 'dug ste/ byang phyogs su bltas la/ slob ma dbang ldan gyi phyogs su 'dug ste/ lho phyogs su bltas pa dang lhan cig shar gyi cha'i thig gdab par bya'o/ /de nas rlung gi phyogs su song la lho phyogs su bltas te/ slob ma bden bral gyi phyogs su gnas pa
130a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lhan cig nub kyi cha'i thig gdab bo/ /yang skor phyogs su song ste/ rlung gi phyogs su 'dug la/ slob ma dbang ldan gyi phyogs su 'dug pa dang/ lhan cig byang gi chir thig gdab bo/ /de'i rjes la de bzhin du me'i phyogs su song ste/ de nyid du
130a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dug la slob ma bden bral gyi phyogs su 'dug pa dang/ lhan cig lha'i cha'i thig gdab pa/ /de nyid du 'dug la slob ma rlung gi phyogs su 'dug pa dang/ lhan cig mtshams kyi thig gdab bo/ /de nas bden bral gyi phyogs su song la/ /slob ma dbang ldan
130a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyogs su song ba dang/ lhan cig byang gi mtshams kyi thig gdab bo/ /thig de nyis ba ltab du byas la slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug pas bzung la/ blob mas thig gi phyogs gcig nas gzung ste/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtse
130a6(rgyud 'grel): nam g.yas phyogs nas bskor te de dang lhan cig rdo rje lta bu'i phyi'i thig gdab bo/ /srang bu de nyid yang nyis bltab du byas la slob dpon rang nyid kyis dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te/ skor phyogs su nang gi 'khor lo'i thig gdab po/ /
130a7(rgyud 'grel): de ltar thig btab nas/ khro gnyer gnyer ma rab bsdus pa/ /khro ba'i mig ni btsum pa ste/ zhes bya ba'i khro bo'i lta ba dang/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa h+ri zhes brjod de sgo bzhi dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ de nas dbus su
130b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag bas/ /rdo rje'i sgo ni rnam bzhi po/ /yid kyis su ni dbye bas bya/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de nas tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu de yi ge mu(rgyud 'grel): dang/ yi ge gsum gyis gshegs su gsol la gnas su bzhag
130b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /ye shes kyi thig gi cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog can gyi chon du mu tig gi phye ma la sogs pa 'am/ de ma 'byor na 'bras sA lu'i phye ma legs par btags shing/
130b3(rgyud 'grel): legs par brdungs pa ci rnyed pa'i snod du bzhag ste/ 'di dag la yang snga ma bzhin du bltas te/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshon gyi mdog can ji lta bar bcug ste/ oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ zhes bya ba 'di
130b4(rgyud 'grel): bzla bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i yi shes kyi thig yid kyis bteg ste/ badzra be ga zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod la nang du zhugs te/ 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni dgrol byed pa/ /rnams snang
130b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po rang nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /zhes brjod la/ /tshon de re re zhing g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis blangs la/ dbang ldan gyis phyogs nas brtsams te/ phyi rol nas dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu
130b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ nag po phan tshun ma reg ma yo bar slob dpon gyis dgye bar bya'o/ /de yang gsang ba'i tshogs mthon po las/ /dkar po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin/ /gzhan dag gser la dmigs pa ste/ /pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin rtse/ /de bzhin gzhan dag
130b7(rgyud 'grel): mrgad do/ /nag po nang du shes byas te/ /'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad/ /ces gsungs pa yin no/ /de nas dam tshig las nyams pa rnams spangs par bya ba'i phyir/ ri mo blos nam mkhar bteg ste/ /slar yang badzra be ga zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod
131a1(rgyud 'grel): la slob dpon phyir 'byung bar bya'o/ /de yang de kho na nyid bsdus ba las/ yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni/ /rdo rje srad bu 'am gzhan yang rung/ /phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang ni/ /dam tshig 'gal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes
131a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa yin no/ /de'i 'og tu slob mas kyang slob dpon 'jug pa dang 'byung ba'i rim bas dgye par bya'o/ /mtshon dgye pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /mi bskyod pa bdag por gyur pa'i dus su ni/ shar phyogs kyi sa'i cha ni dkar po'o/ /lho phyogs
131a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi sa'i cha ni ser po'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sa'i cha ni dmar po'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sa'i cha ni ljang bu'o/ /rdo rje'i thig gi mthar thug pa'i nang snying po'i dkyil 'khor dbus ma ni sngon po'o/ /der dbus ma ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
131a4(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i rdo rje kha gyes pa sngon po 'bar ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi char ni sna tshogs pad+ma'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i 'khor lo'o/ /lho dang nub dang byang gi phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
131a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi steng du/ rin po che cha dgu pa sngon po dang/ pad+ma dmar po dang/ ral gri ste mtshan ma 'di dag bri bar bya'o/ /me dang bden bral dang/ rlung dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams rnams su/ sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la mig
131a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras sngo ba'i spyan dang/ rdo rje sngon po dang/ pad+ma dmar po ni kha bye ba sdong bu dang bcas pa dang/ utpal sngon 'dra 'am 'drir gzhug go /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams dang/ shar sgo'i ngos gnyis
131a7(rgyud 'grel): su sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du me long dang/ pi wang dang/ dung chos dang/ pad+ma'i snod dang/ ras sna tshogs dang/ chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bri'o/ /shar sgor sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi mi'i dkyil
131b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la thob/ de bzhin du lto sgor dbyug pa/ nub sgor pad+ma dmar po'o/ /byang sgor rdo rje bri bar bya'o/ /tshon dgye zin pa dang/ khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gon te/ yang phyi dro'i dus su dkyil 'khor gyi khang par gzhug la/ tshon lhag ma
131b2(rgyud 'grel): de rnams de kho na nyid gsum yi ge mu'i mdza' dang bcas pas gshegs su gsol lo/ /tshon gyi snod skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs su bzhag nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyir mi ba'i lci bas byugs la spos chu dri zhim pos kyang byugs te/ de nyid du me tog sil
131b3(rgyud 'grel): ma dgram bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa'i yo byang bre ba dang/ bum pa dgod par byas te/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gtso bo'i g.yas kyi char bzhag go /bum pa gzhan rnams
131b4(rgyud 'grel): ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i phyi rol gyi grwa bzhir bzhag go /yang bum pa gzhan zhig la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags bzlas la ku sha'i khres chung dang bcas pa ni bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi sgo logs su bzhag bar bya'o/ /bum pa de rnams
131b5(rgyud 'grel): las chu nyung zad nyung zad blangs te/ mchod yon gyi snod du blugs la/ mchod yon gyi snod de yang bdag dang slob ma dbang bskur bar bya ba'i don du rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i khar bzhag go /de nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas la phyogs mtshams bzhir
131b6(rgyud 'grel): mar me brgyad bzhag pa dang/ de las lhag pa'i spos snod spos dri zhim pa dang bcas par bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon cho ga bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi sgor stan nang tshangs can la lta la mngon
131b7(rgyud 'grel): bang phyogs pas 'dug ste/ dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ba/ /de'i rim pa ni 'di yin no/ /rgyud las ji skad bshad pa lta bu'i phyi'i rig pa dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya'o/ /de med na yid kyis bsgom par bya'o/ /de yang dgu?
132a1(rgyud 'grel): por re zhig slob dpon gyi ting 'dzin gsuM gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas rang gi rdo rje dang/ chu skyes yang dag par sbyor ba'i sgras nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams blos rang gi nang du bcug nas slar
132a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lta bur rang gi lus las byung nas nam mkha' la khyab par spro bar bya'o/ /de nas slar yang bkug la dkyil 'khor gyi ngos su bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas gshin rje gshed la sogs pas bgegs bskrad la/
132a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rab la sogs pa rnam par bsgom nas/ de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi ngos la bzhugs pa yi ge dzas dgug pa dang/ hUM gis dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rang rang gi mtshan mar gzhug pa dang/ de bzhin du baM gis brtan par bya ba
132a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ hos mnyes par byas nas nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pas byin gyis brlab par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la mchod yon dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa yi ge gsum gyi mngon par bzlas pa dang/ ras zung re de bzhin du
132a5(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bzlas pa lta re re zhing dbul ba dang/ nang gis mchod pa yang byas nas/ rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing bstod pa bya ste/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /rdo
132a6(rgyud 'grel): rje dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che/ /rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog /ston pa rdo rje khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /rang bzhin
132a7(rgyud 'grel): dag pa gos pa med/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che/ /me tog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams
132b1(rgyud 'grel): cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar bstod pa byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bdag nyid bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o/ /de nas sgrub ba'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la
132b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir byung ste/ bza' ba dang bca' ba sna tshogs nya dang sha la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i gtor ma rgya chen po rang rang gi phyogs kyi gtor ma'i sngags mngon par bzlas la phyogs skyong rnams la phul nas/ yang dkyil 'khor gyi khang par gzhug ste/ rdo
132b3(rgyud 'grel): rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa/ dkyil 'khor la phyag byas la/ rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing slob ma dang lhan cig bskor ba lan gsum bya'o/ /yang phyir byung la nang par gyi dus su rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste/ de bzhin nang par rgyas par bya/ zhes
132b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i phyir ro/ /slar yang zhugs te 'og nas bshad pa'i cho gas rjes su gnang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i mdza' thugs pa'i 'jug pa'i cho ga bcom ldan 'das bdag po las thab par blos bsam par bya'o/ /'dod chags che las byung de nyid/ /
132b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gzugs brnyan lta bur ni/ /shes par byas la dkyil 'khor du/ /slob ma gzhug par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag por gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha med pa yi mchog
132b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' ched de bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' deng grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa
132b7(rgyud 'grel): khyod/ /'dod chags kun gyi ?? chags pa/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems
