133a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya mchog /grub pa'i rdo rje che la bstod pa/ /rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig /sems can kun gyi yid khyab cig /sems can
133a2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi snying la bzhugs/ /sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid/ /'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'o/ /bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog /shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor yin/ /bden pa de yis mgon bdag la/ /khyod kyi
133a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa rab rdzogs shog /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu byung/ /de bzhin nyid las des par skyes/ /bden pa 'di yis dkyil 'khor du/ /gzu
133a4(rgyud 'grel): brnyan gsal ba slob ma ni/ /kun gyis dri ma med mthong shig /ces bden pa sgrags par bya'o/ /slob ma re re zhing yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la gos dmar po bskon pa dang/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dang? ?? pos
133a5(rgyud 'grel): gdod g.yogs shing/ /mgo la me tog gi phreng ba dkris pa lag na me tog gi phreng ba thogs pa yol ba'i bar du bzhag la/ dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i sgor bzhag pa'i bum pa'i chus bsang gtor byas nas/ slob ma la sdugs/ khyod su yin
133a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes dri bar bya'o/ /slob mas kyang sdug pa bdag ni bskal pa bzang po'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma de'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag nas 'og nas bshad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi sems bskyed par bya ste/ oM sarbba yo ga tsit+ta utpA da yA mi su ra te sa ma ya
133a7(rgyud 'grel): staM ho/ sid+d+hi badzra ya ta su khaM/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba 'di/ khyed kyis dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar ma byed cig /dad
133b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang mi ldan pa rnams yang ma yin no/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes brjod pa 'dis kyang slob dpon gyis slob ma dgug pa dang/ gzhug par bya zhing/ /A khaM bi ra hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o/ /dam tshig gi mchog 'dzin du gzhag par
133b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir slob ma de dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo'i mdun du bzhag la/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob na/ dngos? grubs zhan
133b3(rgyud 'grel): lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ /de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra zhig /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes brjod la slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /
133b4(rgyud 'grel): snying la yang dag bzhugs par gyur/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs/ /zhes brjod nas bdud rtsi lnga pad+ma'i snod du bzhag ste/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms te/ 'di ni khyod kyi
133b5(rgyud 'grel): dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na bsreg par 'gyur/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ste/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung zhig /oM badzra u da ka Tha Tha Tha zhes brjod de/ slob ma 'thung du gzhug go /slob dpon gyis slob ma la dam bca' ba brtan par gyur ba'i
133b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /'og nas bshad pa 'di yang brjod do/ /deng phyin chad khyod kyis phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/ ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas
133b7(rgyud 'grel): dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la/ /de nas slob ma la 'di skad du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' 'bab par gyur cig ces smros shig ces bsgo la/ slob ma'i snying gar laM las byung ba'i
134a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa kha dog ser po rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa dbus su yi ge hUM gnas pa sgom mo/ /lkog mar yang baM las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po kha dog dkar po bum pas mtshan
134a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ dbus na yi ge a gnas pa bsgom mo/ /spyi bor yi ge yaM las byung ba'i rlung gis dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can kha dog sngon po ba dan gyis mtshan pa la dbus su yi ge ha gnas par bsam mo/ /slob
134a3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rkang pa'i 'og tu yang yi ge dzhai 'od zer 'bar ba dang bcas pa bsams la/ de'i yang 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na re las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar po bsams nas/ /dril bu dkrol zhing/
134a4(rgyud 'grel): A be sha ya staM b+ha ya/ ra ra ra ra/ hUM la ya/ tsA la ya/ hUM ha a dzhaiM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /slob ma de'i lce la yi ge h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dmar po bsams la/ de'i 'od dpag tu med pa'i skur bsams nas/ babs par gyur pa dang/ 'dod chags
134a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bde gnas pa la/ rdo rje dge ba dang mi dge ba smros shig /ces dris nas/ e taSh+Ti badzra zhes bya ba 'dis slob ma de brtan par bya'o/ /de nas pra tIts+tsha badzra ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de/ me tog gi phreng ba dkyil 'khor du dor la/ de blangs nas pra ti grih+Na twa mi maM sa twa ma tA
134a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ zhes bya ba 'dis slob ma'i mgo po la bcings nas/ de'i mig gnyis su yi ge oM 'od zer dang bcas ba bsams la/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de/ /rdo
134a7(rgyud 'grel): rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod la/ gdod g.yogs dkrol nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nas bdud rtsi thab sbyor kyi bar du bstan par bya'o/ /de la lha rnams kyi mtshan ma'am/ /mtshan ma dang nye bar me tog
134b1(rgyud 'grel): gi phred ba gang du bab pas de'i rnal 'byor sbyin par bya'o/ /yang na slob ma gang la dad pa de'i sbyor ba sbyin par bya'o/ /slob ma gzhug pa'i tshe ga'o/ /da ni dbang bskur ba yin te/ /de'i rim pa ni 'di yin no/ /sngar bshad pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ??
134b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pa'i snod la gnas pa'i chus slob ma rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms pa'i spyi por/ /oM badzra i b+ha Shiny+tsa zhes zlos shing dbang bskur ba ni chu'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /gser la sogs pa khams kyi rang bzhin las byas pa 'am/ /'bur ?? brkos pa
134b3(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ ri mo bris pa'i cod pan nam/ de ma 'byor na ras las byas pa de'i spyi bor bzhag la/ lag pas 'dzin du bcu gnas spyi bo de mi bskyod pa dum par snams pa bsam zhing/ rig pa du mas kyang slob ma la dbang bskur ba bsam pa'i bya ba ni
134b4(rgyud 'grel): cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /de'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag la de yang lag pas 'dzin du bcug nas de'i spyi bor mi bskyod pa bum pa bsnams pa bsams nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun
134b5(rgyud 'grel): tu rab grub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyi long/ /zhes brjod/ /ni rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de'i rang gi gdod ma'i lha'i rnal 'byor byin la slob ma rdo rje dang dril bu dag 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin du bcug la/ oM badzra a d+hi pa ti twaM a b+hi Shinyu?
134b6(rgyud 'grel): mi tiTh+Sha badzra sa ma ya staM zhes brjod par bya ste/ 'di ni bdag po'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de'i spyi bor lag pa bzhag la/ oM badzra satwa twaM a d+hi Shiny+tsa mi badzra na ma(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi she kA ta/ kye che ge mo rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas/ rang gi dngos kun gang
134b7(rgyud 'grel): gang snang/ /gtso bo da ni rnam rgyal rang/ /rang bzhin gyis ni chos dag pas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes gang yin de'o/ /zhes slob ma la bsgo bar bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'o/ /rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'i rnam par dag pa ni 'di lta ste/ chu'i
135a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba ni/ me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can/ mi bskyod pa'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid can rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o/ /rdo
135a2(rgyud 'grel): rje'i dbang bskur ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can 'od dpag tu med pa'i 'o/ /bdag po'i dbang bskur ba ni bya ba bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can don yod par grub pa'i 'o/ /ming gi dbang bskur ba ni/ ma rig pa
135a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gags nas rig pa'i khams dang/ rigs rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid can rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam par dag pa yin no/ /de'i rjes la gal te phyir mi ldog pa'o dbang bskur bar mi byed na/ rig lnga'i dbang
135a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba la yang rdo rje'i brtul zhugs dang/ lung bstan pa dang/ dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya'o/ /yang na rig pa'i dbang bskur btsam byed na/ de'i tshe de'i rjes la rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kho na tsam sbyin par bya ba la phyir mi ldog
135a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su ni 'di la lung bstan sbyin par bya'o/ /de la rdo rje'i brtul zhugs ni 'di yin te/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i lag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i
135a6(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs brtan/ /zhes brjod la rdo rje slob ma 'dzin tu bcug la sngags 'di brjod du gzhug ste/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha? e Sha twaM b+ha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi hi hUM /de nas thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje
135a7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdrag /ces brjod cing 'dis rdo rje 'dzin du gzhug go /de'i rjes la rdo rje dril bu 'dzin du bcug la/ 'di te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab sgra yi
135b1(rgyud 'grel): rjer bgror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba gzhed/ /ces bya ba 'dis 'dzin tu bcug pa ste/ chos kyi tshul nyid du 'dis dkrol bar bya'o/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas/ /ngo bo nyid
135b2(rgyud 'grel): dag sems dpa' mchog /srid pa'i mchog ni byed bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so/ /de la khu tshur g.yon pas chos gos kyi mdza' nas bzung ste/ snying gar bzhag la lags pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin par byas nas/ slob dpon dang de bzhin
135b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pas lung bstan par bya ste/ 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa mchog gi sgrub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton/ /kye de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba/ sid+d+hi b+hur b+hu ba
135b4(rgyud 'grel): swa/ 'di yis dbang bskur gyur pa yi/ /sngags pa 'gro ba kun gyi bdag /bla na med pa'i byang chub tu/ /bde gshegs kyis kyang lung bstan mdzad/ /ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni lung bstan pa'o/ /de nas der tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
135b5(rgyud 'grel): dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste/ mchog gsad dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /mthong ba dang ni zugs gyur bas/ /sdig pa kun las nges grol ba/ /khyed rnams ded nyid legs par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /slar khyod 'chi ba
135b6(rgyud 'grel): yod min te/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi song ba/ /kyis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /dam tshig sdom
135b7(rgyud 'grel): pa grub pa 'di/ /rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid du dog med pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni btad mi bya/ /phyag na
136a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gang yin pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos ni mi spang zhing/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /mi shes pa 'am rmongs pa yis/ /tshul chen bstan par mi bya'o/ /bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su/ /dka' thub kyis ni ma dbus
136a2(rgyud 'grel): shing/ /ci bde bas ni bde bar bzung/ /'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang yongs su mi dor zhing/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs blo yis
136a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /slob dpon la ni gang smod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun smad pa/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gces pa dang/ /gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis/ /bsad nas sems
136a4(rgyud 'grel): can dmyal bar 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ /dge ba rab tu mi sbyoms pa/ /nam yang smad par mi bya'o/ /bla ma la ni gus bcas yon/ /rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya/ /des ni rims sogs
136a5(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa rnams/ /phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rang gis dam tshig bsrungs/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu
136a6(rgyud 'grel): byin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de byin bsod nams tshogs yin te/ /chogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /gar phyir 'dir ni legs gnas pas/ /deng khyed skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /dam tshig lha rnams kun mnyam par/ /deng khyod gyur par
136a7(rgyud 'grel): the tshoms med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /rgyal po'i bdag por brtan pa yin/ /der ni 'dud las rnam rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab zhugs pa/ /khyed
136b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /de nyid thob par the tshom med/ /de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde bskyed brten par gyis/ /deng ni 'gro la myur bde rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ /rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid du
136b2(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'i 'gyur/ /de nas de'i rjes la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis chos bshad par bya ste/ /snying po bsnyen pa sogs bshad pas/ /phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs la/ /dam tshig 'dod pa'i gzugs sogs kyis/ /ma chags gsang sngags
136b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bzla/ /rang rig pa yi ngo bo nyid/ /phyogs bcur dus gsum bzhugs pa de/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /dka' thub sdom pa mi zad pa/ /brten pas 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi/ /nang gi mngon par
136b4(rgyud 'grel): shes pas 'grub/ /de bas sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog/ sngags kyi spyod mchog spyod pa rnams/ /chos kyi yi ge mchog thob pa/ /'dod pa thams cad bsten pas so/ /bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis bdag can/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lta rnams bsten/ /
136b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sha gnyer 'dod chags can/ /sbyor ras bsgrubs na myur du 'grub/ /sku gsung thugs ni yang dag 'grub/ /gang gzhan sman par bshad pa ni/ /sngags kyis bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pas so/ /
136b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni chos bshad pa'o/ /de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje bzung ba dang/ /chos kyi dril bu dkrol ba la sogs pa shes par bya ba'i phyir/ /de nyid kyi ni rdo rje bzung/ /chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla/ /zhes bya ba de ni 'di
136b7(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /rig pa'i dpar bskur ba'i cho ga'o/ /nga ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba ste/ /de'i rim pa ni 'di yin no/ /slob mas phyog byas la/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas kyis/ /mchod chen ji ltar gsal ba bzhin/ /bdag kyang rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir
137a1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' rdo rje bdag la gsol/ /zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu o byad 'byor na/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gdags pa dang/ /'khor lo dang/ dung la sogs pa dbang?
137a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba'i rdzas rnams nye bar bsags la/ snga ma bzhin du slob ma sgor seng+ge'i stan la bzhag pa'i stan nang tshangs can la 'dug tu bcug ste/ /steng nas bla re bre ba dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /de dag ma 'byor na sna tshogs pad+ma
137a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dab brgyad par khri'u dang stan bzhag la rang gi lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan par bzhag la/ ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka nas byung ba'i 'od zer las/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' khyab par byung ba rnams
137a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis phyag na bum pa bsnams shing/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan la sogs pas dbang bskur bar mdzad par bsams la/ slob dpon gyis rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba/ khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa/ /gsang ba gsum
137a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi gnas las byung/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya/ /zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor zhes bya gang bshad pa/ /yid ni dkyil 'khor dam pa yin
137a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang ni ye shes te/ /sems kyi brtsegs pa bsgred pa yin/ /phyi yi gru bzhi pa gang yin/ /tshad kyis mnyam nyid gyur ba yin/ /byams pa la sogs sems gang yin/ /thig bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /chos kyi
137a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba rjes dran nyid/ /gang de rdo rje'i thig tu bshad/ /lta ba kun las rnam grol ba/ ye shes thig tu bshad pa yin/ /tshul khrims tshogs kyi dam pa ni/ /gang yin rgyun tu bshad pa yin/ /dad dbang la sogs sems gang yin/ /ra ba
137b1(rgyud 'grel): lngar ni yang dag byung/ /rnam par thar pa bzhi po ni/ /sgo rnams su ni yang dag bshad/ /yang dag spong ba bzhi po ni/ /rta babs rnaMs dang ka bar byung/ /dran pa nyer bzhag bzhi po ni/ /khyams rnams bzhi bor shes par bya/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi

137b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis brtags pa/ /lam gyi ye shes khyad par rnams/ /rnga yab ces ni yang dag bshad/ /nyon mongs thams cad des gcod cing/ /nyon mongs 'phrog pas dra ba ste/ /yang dag gcod cing sbong ba nyid/ /sel ba'i spong ba la gnas pa/ /tshogs
137b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi na sbyor ba nyid/ /nyon mongs pa yi phyed 'phrog pa/ /dra ba phyed ces bya bar bshad/ /ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid bsgrags par bya'o/ /phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na/ /sangs rgyas ldur ni rab tu bshad/ /rdo rje skye mched

137b6(rgyud 'grel): zad phyir gshin rje gshed/ /de nas lus mthar byed pa ste/ /des na shes bya mthar byed 'gyur/ /nyes pa nyes pa longs spyod pas/ /nyes pa zad phyir shes mthar byed/ /des na sems ni mthar byed de/ /des na nyon mongs mthar byed
137b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas/ /'dod chags zad pas pad mthar byed/ /des na chags pa mthar byed de/ /de bzhin snyoms 'jug mthar byed 'gyur/ /nyon mongs kun zad gang yin dang/ /de bzhin las ni thams cad
138a1(rgyud 'grel): zad/ /sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni/ /bgegs mthar byed ces bya bar bshad/ /ces bya ba ni lha'i de kho na nyid do/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba'i rim pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu rjes su gnang ba'i dbang bskur bsbyin? n+ya na par
138a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /de lta de ltar chags la sogs/ /gtsang bas sems can don bya'o/ /nyin re zhing ni thun bzhi ru/ /ting 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ldan pas/ /gyur nas thun mong cig shos kyi/ /dngos grub thob pa sgrub
138a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du bcug la/ de dang lhan cig gsang ba'i mchod pa byas nas/ /thub pa'i dbang tshogs rdo rje mthar/ /yang dag 'bab ste bde
138a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog ste/ /thu bo tha ma min par bsngam/ /snod gyur sgor ni nges par dbang?/ /brtan pa'i blo ldan snod kyis kun/ /rnam snang bdag nyid can 'thungs la/ /sna tshogs bzhin te sna tshogs 'gyur/ /kye ma shin tu bden tshig brjod/ /gzur?
138a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di shin tu yid 'ong ste/ /brten byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis btags/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i rab sbyor bas/ /bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid can bde spyad/ /rdo rje skyil krung nyid dang sems/ /nor ldan khongs su gtogs par ldan/ /de ltar slob
138a6(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyi/ shes rab dang 'dus pa'i rgyur gyur pas de kho na nyid nye bar mtshon par bya'o/ /de yang de bzhin no/ /zhes bya ba yang bstan par bya ste/ /'di dag ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang/ shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /de'i rjes
138a7(rgyud 'grel): la dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa nas phyir byung la ji skad du bshad pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas/ slar yang dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs nas/ shar sgor 'dug la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ bstod pa yang byas nas/ yi ge gsum
138b1(rgyud 'grel): tha ma mu dang bcas pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /tshon rtsa yid phyags nas snod gtsang mar bzhag la/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bor dor bar bya'o/ /de nas oM a kA ro mu khaM sarbba d+ha rmA NaM A dya nu tpanan ta twA te ces bya ba'i sngags brjod cing dkyil
138b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyis gzhi byug pa'am byug tu gzhug par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gtor ma rgya chen po byas la/ gtor ma'i sngags kyis byin par bya'o/ /'khor lo 'dri ba'i cho ga bris pa las/ bdag gis bsod nams dri med gang bsags las/ /des
138b3(rgyud 'grel): ni 'gro ba ma lus 'di dag kun/ /rgyal pa'i go 'phang myur du thob par shog /de bzhin blo gras rno zhing 'gro ba rnams/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho las ni 'don pa dang/ sngags pa ma lus gsang sngags tshul gyis ni/ /yang dag man ngag legs par
138b4(rgyud 'grel): thob par shog /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i chog /slob dpon bsod snyoms pa yis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba chen po/ dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba dge legs 'phel// //
138b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rgyal bas byin gyis mdzad pa bzhugs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ /pri ya sA d+ha ni nA ma/ /bod skad du/ dga' ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ /dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos
138b6(rgyud 'grel): dang longs spyod sprul pa yi/ /sku gsum rnam par gnas gyur pa/ /'jam dpal yang dag phyag 'tshal nas/ /de yi sgrub thabs rim bshad bya/ /dpal ldan gsang 'dus la brten nas/ /phun sum tshogs pa kun byed pa/ /bla mas ji ltar
138b7(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa yi/ /ye shes zhabs kyi lam brten pas/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /shes sgrub ldan pa'i sems dag la/ /phal cher gsal ba'i sgra yi don/ /bdag mnyam blo ldan la phan par/ /bla ma rnyed dka' 'jig rten na/ /dal 'byor
139a1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu g.yo ba ste/ /snod la shes rab thabs 'di ni/ /de phyir sems kyis bya bar rigs/ /byams dang snying rje mnyam ldan pas/ /sems ni byang chub bskyed byas pa/ /sangs rgyas rnaMs kyi rab zab pa'i/ /tshul la/
139a2(rgyud 'grel): lhag par mos pa'i yid/ /sbyin dang khrims sogs phun sum tshogs/ /srid dang longs spyod la phyir phyogs/ /sems kyi sdug bsngal yang skyo med/ /lha rnams bsten pa byed gyur pa/ /chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang/ /bdag po ming dar
139a3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gsang/ /shes rab ye shes brtul zhugs sogs/ /bsod nams ye shes cher 'bar? ba'i/ /dpal ldan gsang 'dus dkyil 'khor du/ /ji lar rigs par dbang bskur ba/ /bla ma yongs su mnyes pa yis/ /dbang
139a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur rdo rje sems brten pa/ /rnal 'byor spyod nus rnal 'byor pas/ /ri bo la sogs yid 'ong bar/ /gnas byas mgon po bsgrub par bya/ /bsam gtan sogs pa la brtson pa/ /mtshan mo phyed kyis lhag ma la/ /cho ga bzhin du langs
139a5(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /snying zlar de nyid maM 'od ldan/ /gdong la sogs pa dag par bya/ /de nas chu bzang sman dang ni/ /me tog ga pur tsdan gyis/ /bsam gtan gnas ni yang dag byas/ /bsams pas kyang ni yid 'ong bya/ /bde ba'i stan la gnas nas?
139a6(rgyud 'grel): na/ /legs brten rdo rje'i skyil mo krung/ /de ru yang na bder gnas pas/ /bsam gtan rab tu bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /kun tu bla mar bcas pa yi/ /dus gsum gshegs pas yongs gang ba/ /naM
139a7(rgyud 'grel): mkhar mngon sum bzhin bltas la/ /sa bon maM byung gzugs sogs pas/ /de bzhin rin chen phung po yis/ /mchod sogs rtog pa spangs byas nas/ /rab tu 'bad par de rnams mchod/ /de rnams spyan sngar gnas byas la/ /pus mo gtsuT
139b1(rgyud 'grel): te thal sbyar nas/ /dmigs pa med par byas nas ni/ /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya/ /gang zhig thog med srid pa'i chu klung du/ /ma lus kun rtog gis bsags snyog pa rnams/ /thugs rje cher ldan spyan sngar de dag ni/ /cho ga bzhin
139b2(rgyud 'grel): du thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /'phags pa gzhan gyis dge ba gang mdzad pa/ /de dag kun la yang dag yi rang zhing/ /byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo bar bgyi/ /yid kyi rol pa dri med zla
139b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dras bsgrubs/ /snying rje dam pa mdza' yas pa yi thabs/ /rang gi yid la gnas par gyur pa yi/ /bde gshegs rnams la rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing/ /sems dpa' dam pa kun gyi phun tshogs
139b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhi/ /dngos po thams cad ro gcig ngo bo nyid/ /dam pa'i chos la rtag par skyabs su mchi/ /'ching ba rnams las yang dag grol 'gyur zhing/ /snying rje mchog gis bskrun pa'i dpal dang ldan/ /rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab bzhugs pa/
139b5(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi/ /bsam dang rnam par smin pa dag gyur cing/ /sgrib pa kun gyi bag chags yang dag 'byin/ /lhag par mos pas rnam par brgyan pa yi/ /sems ni byang chub dam par bskyed par bgyi/ /bde
139b6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs sngas bcas rnams kyi lam gcig pu/ /sbyin sogs rnam bcu dkar po'i yon tan tshul/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ma lus ngo bo'i blos/ /yang dag nyid du da ni gnas par bgyi/ /'jig rten mthar 'byin bsam pa dang/ /log
139b7(rgyud 'grel): par lta ba'i bsgom pa dang/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin pa'i/ /nyes pas 'gro ba 'di bskyed pas/ /snying rje thams cad dmigs byas te/ /don dam pa ni ji lta bar/ /byang chub sems mchog bsgom par bya/ /tshigs
140a1(rgyud 'grel): bcad don 'di bsam bya ste/ /ngo bo nyid dang bral phyir stong pa ste/ /de phyir rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med/ /rtogs pa rnams dang bral phyir dngos po ni/ /ma lus smon pa las ni nges par grol/ /de ltar stong pa dang ldan par
140a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba 'di kun blta byas nas/ /ji srid sems ni brtan 'dod pas/ /sngags 'di nye bar brjod par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha'a ba A t+ma ko haM/ stong nyid ro gcig gang sems dpa' / /byang chub mchog tu mi 'gyur ro/ /gnas dang gzhal
140a3(rgyud 'grel): yas bdag nyid de/ /rang gi sems kyis 'di ltar bya/ /sangs rgyas zhing du nam yang ni/ /ma dag pa yis 'tshang mi rgya/ /de yis dang por zhing dag phyir/ /rang sems nyi mar bsgom par bya/ /de ru hUM skyes rdo rje ni/ /kha gyes sngon po 'od
140a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba/ /de yi dbus gnas hUM yig las/ /rdo rje phra mo rnam spro bya/ /'og dang steng dang phyogs bzhi ru/ /rdo rje ra ba gur dang ni/ /rdo rje rang bzhin sa gzhi bya/ /bsrung ba'i don du bsam par bya/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung shes par dang/
140a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa dang ni lam dang ni/ /zad dang mi skye chos dang ni/ /de bzhin rjes dang kun rdzob dang/ /sngon gyi gnas 'gro shes pa dang/ /ji ltar thos pa rnams rab shes/ /chos dbyings tha dad med pa rnams/ /shes pa 'di rnams su 'gyur ro/ /'di
140a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar shes pa bcu gcig ni/ /legs par rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin te/ /rtsibs bcu la ni khro bo bcu/ /lte bar mchog ni bcu gcig pa/ /shar sogs phyogs ni de rnams su/ /gor mi bzhin du de rnams la/ /gshin rje shes rang mthar
140a7(rgyud 'grel): khyed bsgom/ /pad+ma bgegs ni mthar byed kyang/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su/ /'dod sngon stobs dang mi g.yo rnams/ /steng du gtsug tor rgyal por 'gyur/ /'og tu gnod mdzes 'dren pa'o/ /lte bar rdo rje hUM mdzad dpal/ /
140b1(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa la sogs par yang 'gyur/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha yang 'dir/ /rnal 'byor ba ni kha cig 'dod/ /tho ba lcags kyu dbyug pa dang/ /dbyug pa pad+ma rtse gsum dang/ /rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo dang/ /rdo rje rdo rje g.yas na 'dzin/ /phyag?

140b4(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor kha dog ser por 'gyur/ /lhag ma rdo rje 'dzin nag po/ /dmar dang ser dang lus dkar rnams/ /g.yas pa'i gdong ni mnag po mdzes/ /bden bral dang ni rlung gi mtshams/ /gar zhig phyogs su gnas pa rnams/ /thams cad mi sdug thub pa ste/ /

140b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar sems mdangs ldan mor? rgyas ni/ /sku reg su ni rnam par gnas/ /rkang pa dpung par dkar ba yi/ /padm pad+ma chen po gnas/ /kar ko Ta dang mdza' yas dag /ljang sngo ser ral mgo la'o/ /mche bas cung zad mchu mnan te/ /zhal ni rma

143b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rang bzhin la sogs rnam par spangs/ /mi chod mi phyed sreg tu med/ /lhag ma med pa chos kyi sku/ /rdo rje bdag nyid yang dag 'byung/ /rdo rje sku ni bla na med/ /ces gsungs so/ /rang gi sems kyi 'phen pa yis/ /byang sems

143b7(rgyud 'grel): rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sku/ /rdo rje ral gri nor bu pad/ /gnyis kyis shes rab la 'khyud pa/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas/ /mi bskyod pa yis spyi bor brgyan/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/

144a2(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /sems can khams la kun tu ni/ /snod ldan la ni bltas nas ni/ /gsang ba 'dus pa'i don bstan phyir/ /dag pa'i skyu ma'i sgra rnams kyis/ /lus la sangs rgyas rnams bcug ste/ /bde ba rdzogs pa yang dag grub/ /thams cad sangs

144a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /lha mo'i pad+mar spro byas la/ /rdo rje can gyis gnas par blta/ /de dag yongs su gyur bsems/ /rten dang brten bcas dkyil 'khor te/ /mi bskyod gtso bo bsgom byas la/ /skye bo'i tshogs ni yang dag gzhug /rnam snang la sogs
144a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams/ /de bzhin rdo rje can gyis gzhug /byang chub sems su zhu ldan pas/ de yis skye bo dbang bskur bya/ /de nas byang chub sems kyis ni/ /'gro la 'od zer reg gyur pas/ /ston pa'i byin gyis brlabs dbang gis/ /yang
144a6(rgyud 'grel): dag byang chub bde thob pa/ /thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug ste/ /sa snying la sogs ngo bo nyid/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo can gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan ldan/ /de phyir de rnams mnyam par ldan/ /der gnas
144a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mkhas pa yis/ /sems kyis mang po gden par bya/ /na snyug ma'i sa bon ji lta bas/ /dam pa'i mig dang rna ba sna/ /lce dang lus dang yid rnams kyis/ /yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /de ni ye shes bzang shar
144b1(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /sa snying la sogs drug po yi/ /sa bon la sogs rim bzhin yin/ /k+Shi dzraM khaM gaM de bzhin du/ /skaM saM zhes pa yi ge'i rim/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du/ /khaM raM sa bon rim 'di rnams/ /gzugs sogs rdo rje drug rnams kyi/ /gzugs
144b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs skye mched bdag nyid do/ /lAM mAM pAM tAM 'di zhes bya/ /sa bon sa bon rig pas brjod/ /spyan ma la sogs bzhi po ni/ /sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin/ /gzugs der tshor ba 'du shes dang/ /'du byed dang ni rnams shes kyang
144b3(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu rnam par dag grub pa'i/ /rtag pa la sogs par gsal lo/ /bruM oM badzrI khaM hUM sa bon/ /'di rnams go rims ji bzhin 'gyur/ /'di ltar thams cad phyung nas ni/ /lhag pa'i lha rnams bsgrub par bya/ /de la lhag pa'i lha rnams ni/ /sangs
144b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo can/ /sngon bzhin rnal 'byor pas bskul byas/ /rang gi kha ru gzhug par bya/ /de ni byang chub sems byes la/ /rdo rje nas ni son par blta/ /rig pa'i pad+ma'i nang song ba/ /kha dog gzugs su gyur pa'o/ /shes
144b5(rgyud 'grel): rab thabs kyi chags chen gyi/ /rang bzhin phyir na 'od gsal ba'o/ /de ru oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM bsam mo/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): dmar gnyis kyi dbus bcug pa/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /me 'bar bas ni zhu bar byas/ /'od kyi tshogs su zhu bar byas/ /de ni 'bar
144b6(rgyud 'grel): bas yab yum yang/ /zla ba dar 'dra zhu ba'i gzugs/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /myang na 'das pa'i lam bzhin gnas/ /dogs med rang yid kyis bltas la/ /byams pa snying rje'i rgyu mthun dang/ /dga' dang btab snyoms rang bzhin
144b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ /mA ma kI dang spyan mar grags/ /gos dkar sgrol ma mnyam pa ru/ /mi dmigs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /de yi 'od zer las byung ba/ /'di rnams rang gi gnas bzhugs pas/ /bskul bas rtsol ba bsgom par bya/ /sems can khams
145a1(rgyud 'grel): na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs/ /dga' pa'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la skyabs su gsol/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzheng na/ /sems can yab chen gnyan mchog pa ga
145a2(rgyud 'grel): la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan/ /sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam rab tu phan par gzigs/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /'dod chags dam tshig chags
145a3(rgyud 'grel): pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung sde kun la phan zhir thugs brtse ba/ /'jig rten dag gi don dang dgos pa mdzad la rab tu brtson/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /dga' ba'i
145a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa kun tu bzang po bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don cha/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid thugs brtse ba/ /mgon po gal ta de ring bdag ni gson par
145a5(rgyud 'grel): mchis bzheng na/ /yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter 'gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /'di rnams kyis ni bskul ba'i sems/ /zhu ba'i gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /sems can don nyams mthong bas na/ /bdag nyid phun tshogs nyams pa 'dra
145a6(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma lta bur mos pa yis/ /chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya/ /yongs su gyur nas sangs rgyas spros/ /zhu ba'i yi ge maM tu bsgom/ /de yongs su gyur nas ral gri ste/ /sa bon maM 'bar yu bar no/ /bdag gi rang bzhin de ltar bsgom/ /

145b1(rgyud 'grel): mda' dang chu skyes sngo/ /gzhu yis mtshan pa bzhi po dag /rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pa/ /shes rab 'di zhal myang bas 'gying/ /zla bar rdo rje skyil mos gnas/ /na bza' dam pas rgyan gyis mdzes/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhas dag ni
145b2(rgyud 'grel): sngo dkar sgeg pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas tshogs ni ma lus spro/ /sring gsum ma ni rab tu bsgrubs/ /srid pa sdug bsngal dbang song ba/ /nyon mongs kun skyes bsal bar mdzad/ /bdag nyid bde ba dang mnyam bas/ /sdug bsngal thams
145b3(rgyud 'grel): cad rnam par spangs/ /rab tu rtogs pa'i snod rung ba/ /sems can kun gyis don byas te/ /snying rje chags med ngo bo yis/ /kun rdzob tu ni thabs bstan to/ /mya ngan 'das kyang tshul bzhin du/ /yang dag ma yin sgo 'dogs srid/ /so so'i skye bor bden

145b7(rgyud 'grel): nang du mkha' snying po/ /rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'dra bar/ /kha dog mtshan ma zhal rnams so/ /sgrol ma'i bdag por yang dag gnas/ /gaM dang mtsho skyes las byung ba/ /'jig rten mgon po lce la'o/ /kha dog la sogs dpag med 'dra/

146b4(rgyud 'grel): brlabs/ /rdo rje'i tshigs brjod bstan pa yin/ /dpal ldan gsang 'dus rdzogs byang chub/ /sgrub par 'dod pa'i sems la ni/ /byang chub mngon du byed 'dod pas/ /btang snyoms lam la zhugs gyur ba/ /dkar dang dkar min ljang ser dang/ /
146b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po ljang sngon 'od 'dra ba/ /oM hUM swA dang A(rgyud 'grel): tAra bcas/ /go rims 'dir ni byin gyis brlab/ /snying min sku yi rdo rjer grags/ /lte mid rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /gsang min rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /gsang bar 'dod chags rdo rje'o/ /brla nas rkad
146b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la gzugs? pa/ /don yod bltas de yi ge des/ /lha mo'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni/ /de la de rnams rtag par bya/ /hUM skyes pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /de ni dmar po 'od phred ba/ /gsang yin rang gi gsang bar yang/ /rdo rjer gyur pa rnam par bsaM/
146b7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge A(rgyud 'grel): dang oM las byung/ /de dag ze 'bru nor bu dang/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni du ma ru/ /bdag kyang bsgom par bya ba'i/ /'dod chags chags pa'i spyan gyis blta/ /de nas de dang bde 'dod pas/ /rgyal ba'i rjes chags bya ba yi/ /
147a1(rgyud 'grel): lugs yin zhes ni byas pa'i sems/ /mnyam pa'i ye shes sbyor ba yis/ /'od zer zhags pas bkug nas ni/ /sngags pas dga' ba brtsam par bya/ /rang 'dra'i nang du lhung gyur pas/ /'dod chags nyes pa spangs bzhi

147b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /lkog mar a skyes chu skyes las/ /a(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i pad+ma ni/ /phra mo sa bon bcas pa bsgom/ /gsung gi rdo rje bsam par bya/ /spyan ras gzigs de dang 'dra bsgom/ /mkha' gnas gsung gi rdo rje bsnams

149a1(rgyud 'grel): byon gnas par yang dag blta/ /phrag dog la zhugs rnam par shes/ /'du byed phung po dag pa yi/ /gcig tu ljang gu mdza' yas 'od/ /ral gri 'khor lo nor bu pad/ /pradz+nyA d+h+rika gis don yod grags/ /
149a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba nan tan bden pa'i lam/ /sems can kun don mdzad pa'o/ /nam mkha' khyab par spro bar bya/ /phrag dog gtso bo'i phrag dog la/ /bzlog pas rim gyis brtul nas ni/ /bya nan ye shes dang ldan par/ /'gro ba'i rang bzhin byas nas ni/ /
149a3(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas byang gi phyogs su ni/ /mcho skyes nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /slar yang bzhugs par bsgom par bya/ /rtse gcig yid kyis gsal bar bsgom/ /kun kyang dam pa'i shes rab 'khyud/ /legs brgyan rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis/ /
149a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje skyil mo krung bsgom bya/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /sa dang snying po thabs dang ni/ /stong pa nyid sgo'i rang bzhin can/ /rtag pa'i gzugs kyi spyan ma ni/ /mo ha ra ti zhes pas gdon/ /sems can don la brtson pa dang/ /snying
149a5(rgyud 'grel): rje stong pa nyid kyi sgo/ /rang gi nyes spong bsam gtan dang/ /yang dag pa yi las dang ni/ /myur bar bde ba'i byang chub dang/ /ma lus thabs ni gsum dag dang/ /'gro ba ring du song ba las/ /ji lta'i stobs kyis bzhag byas nas/ /nyes dang
149a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa kun nyen la/ /phan phyir de ni yang dag gnas/ /bsdus nas yid kyis blta byas te/ /me ru zhi ba sgrub bye ma'o/ /byams dang smon lam yang dag ldan/ /chu khams mtshan ma med pa yis/ /rnam dag lha mo mA ma kI /mi bskyod rang 'od dang
149a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs pa/ /dwa Sha ra ti zhes bskul nas/ /kun nas 'od zer mi mnyam dang/ /tshogs ni gsog par rtsom pa dang/ /sems can don la rjes 'brel dang/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag dang/ /'dir ni smon lam gsum dag dang/ /mi g.yo mthar? nges
149b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs nas/ /byams sogs dam pa la gzhugs pas/ /'gro ba kun gyi don byas te/ /'gro ba de de 'od 'bar byas/ /bsdus nas bden bral du bkod pa/ /yang dag 'jigs pa 'joms byed ma'o/ /stobs kyi pha rol phyin dang me/ /dga' ba dang ni smon pa med/
149b2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i gos dkar mo gdon bya/ /'od dpag med pa'i btsun mor mtshungs/ /rA ga ra ti zhes bskul nas/ /sgeg pa'i nyams dang dam pa'i dga' / /dga' ba la sogs yon tan dang/ /rang las nyon mongs bdud sogs las/ /rnam par bzlog la dged pa ste/ /
149b3(rgyud 'grel): de yis 'gro la phan par byas/ /'dir ni stobs ni rnam gsum dang/ /legs pa'i glo gros la bzhag pa/ /ji ltar byas nas yang dag 'ongs/ /'od mdzes khrigs pa'i phreng ba can/ /rlung du rgyas pa 'phel mdzad ma/ /rnal 'byor ba yis bzhugs par
149b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /btang snyoms ye shes pha rol phyin/ /rlung dang rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /rnam dag sgrol ma gdon par bya/ /btso ma'i gser gyi 'od dang ldan/ /badzra ra ti zhes sngags kyis/ /rin chen dbang gis zhal mdzes ma/ /'gro ba'i bya kun rang gi ni/ /
149b5(rgyud 'grel): btang snyoms yon tan sogs kyis mdzad/ /mi rtog pa dang rnam rtog dag /mnyam par rab tu rtog pa dang/ /sems can don thabs phun sum tshogs/ /lkog tu gyur pa'i rjes 'jug la/ /'gro ba thams cad nges par sbyar/ /ye shes pha rol phyin gsuM
149b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /chos kyi sprin gyi rang bzhin gyi/ /sa la yang dag gzhug par bya/ /de nas sna tshogs yon tan rten/ /bsgoms nas sbyor bas bsdu byas te/ /dbang ldan du ni lha mo de/ /dbang gi las ni sgrub byed bzhugs/ /thams cad rin chen cod pan
149b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /lang cho sar pas 'gying bag can/ /rdo rje skyil krung rnal 'byor ldan/ /zwa? mdzes gdan dang de yi 'od/ /bdag 'dra'i thabs la yang dag 'khyud/ /mdzes ma dga' bar bsgom par bya/ /phyogs kyi 'gro ba'i don byas nas/ /ji lta ji ltar da ltar
150a1(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /'khor lo utpal dmar po pad/ /utpal ser po dang 'dra ba/ /phyag mtshan 'di rnams gtso bor 'gyur/ /lhag ma rang gi bdag por mtshungs/ /ser sna'i gnyen por gyur pa yis/ /spyan ma gnyis pa nyid yin te// //
150a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dag pa/ /'di ltar gzugs kyi rdo rje gdon/ /chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs grags/ /ji ltar nus pas sbyin pa la/ /ser sna'i dri ma las grol phyir/ /'gro ba ma lus dgod par bya/ /rab ni sngon song dga' ba'i sar/ /
150a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i dam pa bzhag nas ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams kyi/ me yi mtshams su bzhag par bya/ /rnam dag tshul khrims las grub pa/ /mA ma kI dang mtshungs pa de/ /sgra rdo rje grags gngon par bya/ /ngan song gis 'jigs skrag byed pa/ /
150a4(rgyud 'grel): sngom dang shin tu sems can don/ /dam chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ /'dir ni tshul khrims rnam gsum la/ /tshul khrims 'chal la zhugs pa dag /snod ni ji ltar bzhag par bya/ /de bzhin dri med sa la bzhag /slar ni ji ltar gshegs
150a5(rgyud 'grel): bltas la/ /bden bral du ni yid 'ong ma'o/ /de bzhin bzod pa rnam dag mchog /rin chen dbang phyug shes rab mtshungs/ /sems can kun la phan ldan pa/ /dri yi rdo rje yang dag gdon/ /chos la dmigs ba? phun tshogs dang/ /sems can
150a6(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal lhag gnas dang/ /gzhan gyis gnod pa la bzod la/ /'gro ba ma lus bkod byas te/ /des ni 'od byed sa la ni/ /rtag tu brtan par byed pa'o/ /rlung du mdzes pa'i gzugs can te/ /byon nas gnas par blta ba bya/ /brtson
150a7(rgyud 'grel): 'grus phun tshogs rnam dag pa/ /gos dkar mo dang 'dra ba gzhan/ /slar yang 'od dpag med 'dzin ma/ /ro yi rdo rje yang dga' byung/ /go cha bzhin dang rab sbyor dang/ /yongs su brtan bar gyur pa yi/ /'dir yang brtson 'grus rnam gsum
150b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sems can 'od 'phro la 'god de/ /ye shes bdud rtsi tshim byed pas/ /'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed/ /de byon nas ni dbang ldan du/ /yang dag gnas par mkhas pas bsgom/ /bsam gtan rnam dag yang dag grub/ /don yod rang
150b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od rjes byed ma/ /'jig rten rnam g.yeng zhi ba'i phyir/ /reg bya rdo rje yang dag gdon/ /mthong ba'i chos la gnas pa dang/ /nyes bsel bar byed pa dang/ /khyab bdag dam ba'i bsam gtan la/ /skye bo ma lus res sbyar te/ /kun kyang
150b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyang dka' i sa la ni/ /brtan par yang dag sbyar byas te/ /shar gyi sgo yi byang du ni/ /byon nas yang dag gnas par bsgom /shes rab pha rol byin rnam dag /rang bzhin zhi ba'i gzugs can ma/ /kun tu bzang po'i rig ma 'dra/ /de nas chos
150b4(rgyud 'grel): dbyings rdo rje gdon/ /sbyar bya thos dang bsam pa dang/ /bsgom pa la yang bye brag tu/ /gti mug mun pa'i skye bo kun/ /mngon du gyur la brtan par byas/ /shar sgo'i lho yi cha la ni/ /dam pa'i lam mchog gsal byed ma/ /mdza' 
150b5(rgyud 'grel): yas yon tan rgyal mtsho ni/ /blo dang ldan bas gnas par bsgom/ /thams cad 'di la shes byas te/ /thabs dang rgyan dang cod pan dag /'di rnams thams cad kyi yang ni/ /rtsa ba'i mtshan ma'i khyad par ni/ /mdzes pa'i me long pi bang can /dri
150b6(rgyud 'grel): yi rab gang dung dang ni/ /ye shes bdud rtsis gang ba yi/ /ro yi snod ni shin tu mdzes/ /sna tshogs kha dog gos dang ni/ /chos 'byung gi na phyag rgya yang/ /phyag ni g.yas pa nyid kyis ni/ /phyag rgya mchog ni yin phyir 'dzin/ /sku gsung thugs
150b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbye ba yis/ /rigs kyi rim bas dgod par bya/ /gang phyir 'di rskad le'u ni/ /bco brgyad pa las yang gsungs ba/ /kun kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dgod pa'i phyir/ /de rnams gzhan du thos gyur pas/ /de
151a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'byin pa yig gsum 'dod/ /ma dang phung po 'dzig tshogs lta/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa zad ces bya/ /dad pa'i rang bzhin yang dag grub pa/ /khro bo'i tshogs ni yang dag spros/ /gdul dka' 'dul
151a2(rgyud 'grel): la rab brtson pa/ /thams cad du ni 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /ya mAn+ta krita zhes pas khro/ /gshin rje 'joms? byed spro bar bya/ /rang gi yon tan la bkod nas/ /rnam mnan rim pa bsgoms pa las/ /de ni shar phyogs sgor gnas bsam
151a3(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su'o/ /le lo nyon mongs bdud dang ni/ /mthar 'jig lta ba mi thun phyogs/ /rnam dag brtson 'grus yang dag 'byung/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /ma lus sdang ba'i tshogs dag ni/ /gdul ba'i
151a4(rgyud 'grel): don du yang dag brtson/ /bskal pa 'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs/ /de yi 'od zer nam mkha' khyab/ /lha dang lha min spyi bo yi/ /rin po che yis zhabs gnyis brgyan/ /pradz+nyAn ta krita zhes pas khro/ /shes rab mthar byed zhes pas gdon/ /
151a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi brtson 'grus sogs ldan par/ /'gro ba 'dir byas byon gyur pa/ /lho yi sgo ru bsgom par bya/ /mtsho skyes nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /'chi bdag rjes ngas log bar lta/ /skye ba'i sgrib pa mi mthun phyogs/ /rnam dag dran
151a6(rgyud 'grel): pa las skyes pa/ /padmAna ta krita kyis khyab bdag /gdon bya phyogs su sems can don/ /byas pas dran sogs mchog gyur pas/ /byon nas nub phyogs sgo ru ni/ /nyi dkyil yang dag gnas pa bsgom/ /rnam g.yeng lta ba mchog tu
151a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /lha yi bdung dang las sgrib dag /rnam par g.yeng la rab gtum gzugs/ /ting 'dzin dam pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /big+h+nan ta krita zhes pas kho/ /bgegs 'joms pa ni gdon par bya/ /de nas 'gro ba'i bya ba byas?/ /maM
151b1(rgyud 'grel): mthun phyogs zad las de grub/ /de ni byon nas yang dag gnas/ /byang gi sgo yi nyi ma la'o/ /bgegs kyi tshogs ni ma lus pa/ /kun tu 'jams par byed pa'o/ /'di dag zhal mdog mtshon cha rnams/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lor brjod
151b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /de yi phyir na 'phral du ni/ /bsgom bya de rnams 'dir ma brjod/ /dgug pa dang ni gzhug pa dang/ /bcing ba dang ni mnyes pa yang/ /nyams pa med pa'i bya ba dag /'di rnams bye brag shes par bya/ /thams cad gdan la skyil krung
151b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /bcas pas yang dag gnas pa rnams/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po la mngon phyogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dir mi 'dod/ /gzhan dag sems dpa' i skyil krung ngo/ /khro bo rnams ni g.yon brkyang gis/ /bye brag tu ni 'dir gnas so/ /'di
151b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar thams cad du grub pa/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor bltas nas ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' i snying 'od kyis/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug par bya/ /bgegs ni mthar byed la sogs pas/ /bgegs bskrad yang dag bsrungs nas ni/ /mchod
151b5(rgyud 'grel): yon dbul bya rang sngags kyis/ /dam pa'i tsan dan la sogs pa'i/ /dgug pa la sogs las rnams ni/ /man ngag gis ni rig par bya/ /gshin rje mthar byed sogs khro bos/ /ji ltar slar yang rim bzhin du'o/ /'di ni chen po'i rgyu mthun
151b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ /yang dag 'bras skyes dam pa dang/ /chen po'i bsnyen par shes par bya/ /bsgom pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /so sor dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi/ /mig sogs byin gyis brlabs pas na/ /chen po'i rnam smin 'bras don dang/ /
151b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i nye bar bsgrub pa'o/ /thugs sogs byin gyis brlabs pa las/ /chen po yi ni bsgrub pa dang/ /chen po de las grub gyur pa/ /'bras buAng skyes bu byed pa'o/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thob pa/ /chen por son par gyur pa ste/
152a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dir yang bsgrub pa chen po ste/ /de yang dri med 'bras bur grags/ /sangs rgyas rnams la rdo rje sems/ /mA ma kI dang sgra rdor dag/ phyag na rdo rje khro rnams las/ /pad+ma gshin gshed ma gtogs pa'i/ /
152a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyi bor mi bskyod don gyis so/ /de la'ang rdo rje 'dzin chen gnas/ /thugs gsung sku rdo rje rnams kyi/ /mi bskyod dpag med rtag pa rnams/ /kha cig rdo rje 'dzin par smra/ /rnam par ma spros rang bzhin la/ /ye shes lnga gcig rang bzhin pas/ /
152a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas lnga ru bsgrags pa yin/ /sa yi snying po gshin rje gshed/ /spyan dang gzugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /spyi bor rtag pa rin chen dbang/ /dri yi rdo rje mkha' snying la'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug pad mthar byed/ /ges dkar ro yi rdo rje yi/ /
152a4(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor 'od dpag med par 'gyur/ /gtsug tu nor bu bzhin du gsal/ /sgrol ma sgrib pa rnam sel dang/ /reg bya'i rdo rje cod pan yang/ /dbang bskur go 'phang thob gyur nas/ /'dren pa don yod grub pa bzhugs/ /kun tu bzang po
152a5(rgyud 'grel): chos dbyings kyi/ /spyi bor yang ni gsal gyur pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o/ /gang gis gang la dbang bskur 'dir/ /de yi de ni bdag por 'dod/ /dbang gi go 'phang gnas gyur pa/ /spyi bor rang gi bdag por mnan/ /de rnams dkyil 'khor
152a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di rim bsgom/ /ltag mnang bdag dkyil 'khor min/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis mtshan pa dang/ /rigs kyi bdag po dbang bskur min/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin min/ /gang rnams zhal gsum phyag drug min/ /gang gi gang la phyogs
152a7(rgyud 'grel): bcu ru/ /'gro ba'i don ni byed pa min/ /dbang bskur gyi ni rjes thogs la/ /blo dang ldan pas mchod par byas/ /chogs gnyis po ni 'phel phyir dang/ /yid ni bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ /ye shes snying ga'i sa bon gyi/ /'od kyis thams cad kun
152b1(rgyud 'grel): nas dkug /de la gzugs la sogs pa'i yul/ /rang gi snying gar gzhug par bya/ /de nas zhu bar gyur bsams la/ /rdo rje lam nas rnam par 'byung/ /lha mo'i pad+mar blta bar bya/ /de ni ba spu'i bu ga las/ /'od zer gzugs kyi de rnams dbyung/ /de
152b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'od zer sgo dbyung ba/ /rgyan ni thams cad 'dzin pa rnams/ /rtog pa las ni grol 'gyur bas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bde rgyu yis/ /sgyu ma la sogs yang dag lta/ /'jig rten lta la mkhas pa rnams/ /nam mkhar ma lus sprul byas la/ /
152b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa 'dzin pas brel ba'i phyag/ gzugs rdo rje sogs lha mo'i tshogs/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pas/ /kun nas de las byung gyur pa/ /lha rdzas spos ni yid 'ong dang/ /sna tshogs phyi yi me tog sogs/ /rang gi bde bar gshegs kyang mchod
152b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i bdag nyid mnyan son par/ /mchod pa nyid du sems kyis bsam/ /mi brtan pa ni rang bzhi nyid/ /sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hU ba At+ma konya haM/ thams cad sgra brnyan dang mnyam par/ /sgra yi tshogs ni nges
152b5(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ /chos rnams rang las dbyer med pas/ /'dod pa'i lha yi bstod par bya/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /rdo rje dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par
152b6(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad dag pa che/ /rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog /ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri med mkha' / /rang bzhin dag pa gas ba med/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal
152b7(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rang bzhin dag pa nyid las
153a1(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nam mkha' i phyogs gnas zla ba la/ /gnas pa'i hUM skyes bsgom bya ste/ /de ni rdo rje hUM bcas so/ /de yi 'og tu 'di bsam bya/ /dung mdog gzhu dbyibs rgyal mtshan ldan/ /
153a2(rgyud 'grel): yaM skyes rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de dbus ri skyes dmar po ni/ /zur gsum me yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de steng a las byung ba yi/ /pad+ma'i snod kyi dbus su ni/ /bi mu ras su dang bcas pa/ /go kud ha dang lnga'o/ /sangs rgyas sa bon bum
153a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs kyi/ /go ra me ji bzhin byin gyis brlab/ /de ru rdo rje dbab par bya'o/ /zhu gyur 'od zer rnams kyis ni/ /de nas thams cad zhu byas te/ /me ni rab tu gsal bas so/ /yi ge oM ni de ru dgod/ /ston zla'i 'od zer phung po 'dra/ /
153a4(rgyud 'grel): de 'od kyis bkug sangs rgyas kyi/ /bdud rtsim lus nang du gzhug /blo dang ldan pas bdud rtsi bzhin/ /de ni 'od zer gyis gang lta/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba yi/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab/ /rang gi snying gar 'khor lo ni/ /
153a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ba' i blo yis bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi/ /lce la rdo rje 'bar ba ste/ /yang dag hUM hUM nas 'bras skyes/ /rtse lnga dkar po bsgom par bya/ /rang bzhin spyi bor bsams nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs
153a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams tshim par bya/ /rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /blo dang ldan pas 'di bas mo/ /lce yi rdo rje spu gu yis/ /bo dang ldan pas bkug bar bya/ /bdag dang dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyang/ /ye shes bdud rtsi chu nges tshim/ /dkyil 'khor
153a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byin pa sngon 'gro ba'i/ /bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga ni/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi/ /ting nge 'dzin tu yongs su gnas/ /rang sems dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ /thig le rnal 'byor la sogs bsgom/ /ji ltar rig par bsgom bya ste/ /
153b1(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rgyal mchog sgrub pa la'o/ /gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo yis/ /phyi rol dngos po yid ma yin/ /de phyir de yi 'dzin pa med/ /rnam par shes kyang yod ma yin/ /re phyir 'di dag rang yid dngos/ /bag chags kyis dkrugs rmi lam ban+ni?
153b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba ji ltar ji ltar min/ /'di dag rab tu rtogs par bya/ /'di ltar spyad byas rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ye shes snying ga'i sa bon rnams/ /spros pas 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /des ni rdzogs sangs rgyas su byas/ /slar yang yid kyis bkug nas
153b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rang gi snying gar gzhug par bya/ /tsa na ka gnas dbang gyur lta/ /rang sngags thig le'i gzugs can no/ /de yi nang song blta bar bya/ /bdag nyid lha yi 'khor lor ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' i de 'od kyis/ /thugs la sogs pa sang par bya/ /
153b4(rgyud 'grel): slar yang de yis thams cad ni/ /bar med rab tu gsal bar ro/ /ba sdu'i khung bu las song ba/ /'od kyis sna tshogs kyang gsal lo/ /slar yang de nyid du bsams te/ /rab zhugs gsal ba'i gzugs su lta/ /rnam 'byor de ltar sems rtse gcig/
153b5(rgyud 'grel): de ni ye shes bdud rtsi 'bab/ /'di ni thig le'i rnal 'byor ro/ /sngar bzhin 'od zer gyis bskul bas/ /sangs rgyas tshogs ni yang dag gzhug /rang gi sa bon rtags las grub/ /zhu bar gyur ces bsam par bya/ /rang shi gsang ba'i sna rtse
153b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /nas tsam gyi ni tshad dag ni/ /ral gri rang sa bon skyes lta/ /de dbus yungs dkar dang mnyam pa'i/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin phyir/ /kha dog lnga ldan bsgom par bya/ /ji skad brjod pa de yi dbus su/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgoM
153b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /dang por smig rgyu 'dra ba ste/ /du ba lta bu gnyis pa yin/ /mkha' snang lta bu gsum pa yin/ /mar me ltar 'bar bzhi pa yin/ /sprin med nam mkha' lta bur ni/ /rtag tu snang ba lnga pa yin/ /'di ltar mtshan ma lnga rnams ni/ /sems
154a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis rab tu brtan gyur pas/ /rnal 'byor pa yi shes par bya/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /sprul pa yi ni dbang gyur pas/ /phan sems snying rje'i bsam pa yis/ /gzung ba la sogs ma myong bas/ /bdag
154a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid rigs la brten nas ni/ /sangs rgyas spro bar bya ba ste/ /mtshan ma 'am 'od zer las sprul pas/ /'di ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro/ /sku gsung ye shes thugs rnams kyi/ /bdag nyid bsgom la rab brtson pa/ /rang mtshan lte bar gnas gyur pa
154a3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar ji lta rang brtan la/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): maM hUM zhes gsal bar/ /blta bya der gnas blo yis ni/ /sngags kyi bzlas ba'i cho ga bya/ /'di ni kha cig yang dag gnas/ /rlung dang chu dang dbang chen dang/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /sku sogs
154a4(rgyud 'grel): sa bon gzhan dag ni/ /gzhung lugs smra bas brjod pa'o/ /de rjes rang gi ting 'dzin gnas/ /mkhas pas rang sngags dbye ba med/ /ring min thung ba ma yin no/ /sngags ni 'di ltar gdon par bya/ /srog gi rlung gis khyab par bya/ /oM la sogs pa'i
154a5(rgyud 'grel): sa bon gyi/ /sku la sogs pa spro bar bya/ /thams cad thugs sogs byin brlab bzhin/ /de rnams gzugs rdo rje sogs kyis/ /der gnas mchod pa byas nas ni/ /blta bya bde mchog thob pa yis/ /rtsol ba'i rlung gis bkug nas ni/ /rang
154a6(rgyud 'grel): rang sa bon du gzhug bya/ /rim pa 'di ltar bya ba ni/ /so sor rim ni gsum spro ba/ /brjod pas ma lus spro bar bya/ /sngags kyi blo ni bsdus byas te/ /ye shes sa bon ye shes la/ /kun rnam rtag tu spro bar bya/ /'dir ni rnal 'byor kha cig gis/ /
154a7(rgyud 'grel): thig le phra mor yang dag ldan/ /chung du sogs dbye sbyor ba yis/ /dang por ma skyes rang bzhin du/ /skul sogs pa rnam par brtag /rang gis bon byang chub brtag /bsam gtan bzlas pa'i cho gas gnas/ /'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga'o/ /zhum
154b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems dang le lo dang/ /rgong pa la ni lhag mthong bya/ /'di ltar zhum pas bzung gyur na/ /lha mo'i glu yis bskul ba ste/ /rgod pa thig le'i sbyor sogs kyis/ /de nyid bsgom pa zhi bar bya/ /dngos po rnam par dpyad pa yis/ /stong pa nyid ni yid
154b2(rgyud 'grel): la bya/ /bsgom pas bskyod pas ngal gyur na/ /de rnams zhi bar bya nyed la/ /'di ltar tshim pa'i cho ga bya/ /nyams stobs 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ /spyi bor mtho gang gis spags bar/ /bdud rtsi dkyil 'khor bdud rtsir bcas/ /oM yig dkar po
154b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan lta/ /bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i 'od dang bcas/ /de nas bdung rtsi'i rang bzhin rgyun/ /rtag tu 'dzag par byed pa ni/ /srog rtsol 'od kyis bkug bya ste/ /blo ldan gyis sku sogs la dbab/ /'di ni tshim byed cho ga'o/ /'di ltar thang cig ngal
154b4(rgyud 'grel): gso ste/ /bde zhen gyis ni ma dkrugs par/ /thig le la sogs sngon 'gro ba'i/ /ma zhen pa yi sngags bzlas bya/ /gang tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa dang/ /bsgom pa gtong bar 'dod pa yis/ /de che mchod bstong bdud rtsi myang/ /cho ga bzhin du
154b5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /mtshan ma'i sa bon la bsdu bya/ /sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ni/ /cho ga bzhin du rim gyis so/ /gdod nas ma skyes bsgom bya ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid do/ /nam mkha' bzhin du ma
154b6(rgyud 'grel): gos pa /gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin no/ /'di ni las kyi rgyal mchog gi /ting nge 'dzin du yongs su bsgrags/ /slar yang smon lam gdab bya ste/ /sems can don ni nyer 'phel phyir/ /bdag gi bsod nams gang bsags dang/ /'jam
154b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rje brten pa yis/ /'jam pa'i rdo rjer bdag gyur nas/ /sems can sdug bsngal sgrol gyur cig /sems can don thabs phun sum tshogs/ /rnam par rgyal bas legs grub shog /sems can 'khor ba ji srid du/ /de srid 'gro la phan
155a1(rgyud 'grel): byed shog /chos dang longs spyod sbrul pa yi/ /sku gsum rnam par gnas pa dang/ /bdag la 'gro ba re ba dang/ /'dod pa bdag la sgrub par shog /'jig rten khams ni thams cad na/ /skad cig gis ni ??
155a2(rgyud 'grel): can du/ /gdul ba'i thabs ni rig pa yis/ /snod dang snod min bskang bar bya/ /gdul bya ma yin kha cig ni/ /khams gsum dag tu byung gyur na/ /thams cad byang chub lam la ni/ /de rnams bdag gis bzung bar bgyi/ /'di ni
155a3(rgyud 'grel): smon lam mo// //lhag pa'i lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /ting nge 'dzin las langs nas ni/ /rnal 'byor yid ni chags med pas/ /snang ba'i go 'phang la gnas te/ /thams cad rang gi lha gzugs sam/ /rang gi rigs
155a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rjes rim 'am/ /gzugs sogs rdo rje'i ngo bo'am/ /rang rang dag par rnam par gnas/ /gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin gyis/ /rdo rje 'chang chen bdag nyid rnams/ /ji ltar thob pa'i yul rnams ni/ /dogs pa med par nye bar spyad/ /
155a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni mdza' yas mchod mchog tu/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag gsungs/ /rtag tu bar med sbyor bas na/ /byang chub 'bras bu ster bar byed/ /zas la sbyor na sngar bzhin du/ /bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho gas brten/ /'di ni phyi yi sbyin
155a6(rgyud 'grel): sreg gam/ /gzhan nyid kyis kyang bsgre bar bya/ /yid kyis bsams pa tsam gyis kyang/ /legs par brten pas de bzhin spyod/ /phung po 'dud shing bsreg pa yis/ sreg pa yis/ /ye shes me ru bla na med/ /bdag nyid mchod pa nyid ni bya/ /gzhan nam
155a7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lhag pa'i lha/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis/ /dam tshig 'di ni bder gshegs bzhed/ /sngom la gnas pas ji ltar rnyed/ /bdag nyid dam tshig ma nyams pas/ /rnyed pas nyid mo 'am mtshan mo ru/ /legs par sbros par
155b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag spyad/ /gang gis sems can mnyan med don/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa mchog yin te/ /gang yang lus la sogs pa'i las/ /snying rje'i bsam pas bya ba ste/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kyis/ /de kun de yir 'gyur ba
155b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /lhag pa'i lha yi sbyor bdag nyid/ /gang nyid thams cad du bya ste/ /'di 'am gzhan du sman pa 'am/ /pha yis bu la bslab ched du/ /'bras bu med la phan bsams pas/ /las kyi gnod pa rtsom par byed/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho
155b3(rgyud 'grel): ga dang/ /dngos kun bdag nyid rig pa yis/ /nam mkha' dang ni? mnyam pa'i sems/ /gnyis med rnal 'byor min zhes 'gyur/ /don yod grub pa'i sbyor ldan pas/ /da yid 'khor lo'i dbus gnas te/ /ji ltar tshul bzhin dbang
155b4(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba/ /dam tshig nyams pa blang bar bya/ /rang gi ye shes thugs zla ru/ /khaM skyes sna tshogs rdo rjer gnas/ /zla ba khaM yig bcas bsams nas/ /'od zer gyis ni rgyal ba bskul/ /slar yang 'di ni khyad par te/ /dbang bskur sngon du song ba yis
155b5(rgyud 'grel): bla ma brnyas la sogs nyes pa/ /bshags dang sbyin dang mchod ston no/ /sngar gyi dbang bskur bzhin du khrus/ /rang gi 'khor lo'i bdag sbyor ldan/ /thun mtshams gsum du bsgom bya ste/ /las dang pho yis mnyam par bya/ /rang gis sprul pa'i
155b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ni/ /sngar bzhin du ni nyer bsdus te/ /ye shes 'khor lor mnyam son pas/ /shes rab snying rjer ldan pas nyal/ /nang par nyal las ldang ba na/ /lha mo glu yis bskul ba ste/ /sngar bzhin bsgom pa sngon 'gro bas/ /
155b7(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu sngags kyis bzlas pa brtsam/ /nye ba'i sgrub par nas brtsams te/ /ye shes cud zad thob bdag po/ /sngags kyi tshul khrims brtul zhugs ldan/ /dang po'i las dang 'dra bar bsgom/ /spro ba dang ni bsdu bar ldan/ /slar yang yang dag
156a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes so/ /skad cig gis ni ye shes rdzogs/ /mtshan min rnal 'byor yang dag bsten/ /so sor dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /rtag tu snang bas phan pa bsgom/ /'khor lo bdag nyid gzugs kyis mi/ /mtshan
156a2(rgyud 'grel): ma gnyis ni thob gyur pa/ /dang po'i las can 'dir shes bya/ /de nas re re 'phel ba ni/ /lhag ma'i rnal 'byor par shes bya/ /ting 'dzin gsum ni yongs rdzogs pa/ /snga ma bzhin du las dang po'i/ /'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor
156a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon song ba/ /lhag ma'i mtshams la bsgom pa yi/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor 'byin pa dang/ /slar yang sprul pa'i 'khor bsdud pa/ /gang cho nyal bar 'dod gyur ces/ /rnal 'byor pa ni gzhan dag smra/ /rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bri pa'i/
156a4(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis sprul par bya ba yang/ /sku gsung thugs ni legs mchod pa/ /cho ga bzhin du der mchod nas/ /rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /'khor lo'i dbus su yang dag gnas/ /'dod pa'i dngos po bsgrub bar bya/ /de yi rgyu la
156a5(rgyud 'grel): sems brtan pas/ /sngar gsungs bdud rtsi 'khyil pa spro ba'i khro bo'i 'od zer nam mkhar 'bar/ /'khor lo'i bdag po shes bya cho ga yis ni rang nyid de yi rnal 'byor ldan/ /nges par chos kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog nyid ces pa nyid du
156a6(rgyud 'grel): rig par bya/ /log 'dren bgegs ni sun phyung bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag nyid dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /mi bskyod pas dben slar yang gal te sangs rgyas de yi bdag por 'gyur/ /'khor lo'i bdag po de'i gnas zhugs pa'i cha la
156a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /de ni bcom ldan mi bskyod cas su gsal bar gzhan gyi gzhung dag smra byed kyang/ /gsang bar yang ni 'khor lo'i bdag po gsang ba de yang 'gyur zhes 'dir smra mi rigs min/ /'dir ni dag pa'i blo can rnams kyis me long la sogs
156b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la sogs pa dag par brjod/ /rnam par shes pa de yi bdag por gyur pas dpus kyi gdan la rigs par 'dod/ /spyir btang las gzhan dag ni/ /nyams myong gcig pa nyid ste de kho nas/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas ma yin nyid du mnyam
156b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sangs rgyas min par ji ltar rten/ /zhi dang 'khrul pa'i dri ma'i rnyog pa'i gos pa'i yid ni dag pas dkar pa'i gzugs/ /sems can bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i yid kyis rgyal ba ser po'i 'od/ /dmar po 'dod chags
156b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag kun gyi dbang gi cho ga la ni sbyor gyur pa/ /bya ba nan tan zhes bya'i ngo bor gyur pas bai DU rya yi kha dog 'bar/ /zhe sdang nyon mongs rnam dag kyang ni shin tu sdang ba rnams la gnag pa'i 'od/ /me long la sogs mi 'dod pas na ji ltar
156b4(rgyud 'grel): yang 'dir zhe sdang dag /rdo rje can gyis me long sogs su gyur pa sngon po'i gzugs su gang gis yin/ /ci'i phyir dbus su zhe sdang rnam dag grub sku dkar po la sogs mdzes par 'gyur/ /ji ltar spyir btang la yang 'di ni nang 'dus rang gi bdag dang mi bskyod gnyis/ /de'i phyir bde bar gshegs par gcig gyur gzhan min de yi gzugs mi bsten/ /'di ltar gzhan du 'gal ba spang ba'i blo rnams ji ltar yang dag gsungs/ /tha dad ye shes kyis byas gyur pas ji ltar sgrol ma la sogs
156b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su rtogs/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid rnams ni 'di rnams nges par ye shes so sor te/ /lhag par grags pa gang gis gang du myur ba ye shes de'i dag ba/ /ye shes kyis 'gyur kha dog gnas pa rtog pas gal te kha dog yin gyur
156b6(rgyud 'grel): na/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po 'jam dpal gsal ba nyid du nges par nag po nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje can gyis lugs ni gal te 'ga' zhig yod na bde gshegs gnas la brten/ /rang rigs dbang phyug dang ni rgyal pa'i sras po 'khor lo'i bdag por gnas
157a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas ma yin bdag nyid ngor mtshon gang zhig gsang ba'i 'khor dbang phyug /mi bskyod nges par bdag por gyur na rnam par snang mdzad la sogs gnyis su 'gyur/ /dpal ldan ye shes zhabs kyi zaM?
157a2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs bla ma rjes bsten pas/ /bdag gis man ngag khyad par gang zhig cung zad thob gyur pa/ /'dir ni de yi dran pa nyams par ma gyur zhes phyir dang/ /de phyir 'di ni yang dag spel ba bdag mnyam blo la phyir ro/ /legs par bsdu
157a3(rgyud 'grel): byas bde ba'i sgrub thabs byang chub lam thob pa/ /'dir ni bdag gang zhig mnyam med pa'i bsod nams grangs/ /dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa'i cho ga nyid kyis skyon spangs pa/ /de yis byang chub mchog gi go 'phang skye bos thob par
157a4(rgyud 'grel): shog /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyi gdul bya ma yin spangs gyur pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rnams la phyogs bcu ra gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /de yis byang chub sgrub pa'i ched du rgyal bas byin zhes pas/ dga' ba'i sgrub thabs zhes
157a5(rgyud 'grel): grags 'di ni bdag gis bkod/ /dga' ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon chen po rgyal nga sa byin pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta pad+ma ka ra wa rma dang/ lo tsha ba rin chen bzang po'i 'gyur lags so// //
157a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal mi bskyod rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon dpal rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa bzhugs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ak+Sha b+hya badzra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal mi bskyod rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems
157a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyab bdag sgrib pa kun las grol /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid can/ /rang snang rig pa'i yan lag 'dus/ /mi bskyod bla ma yang btud nas/ /dka' bas thob dang 'khrul 'jigs pas/ /ye shes zhal snga'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /
157b1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rdo rjes rnams gsal ba'i/ /de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya/ /de la sngags pa snying rje chen po'i rgyus byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ sbyin pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i zab mo'i
157b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul la lhag par mos pa dang/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du chu dang/ cod pan dang/ rdo rje dang/ bdag po dang/ ming dang/ bum pa dang/ gsang ba dang/ shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba dang/ brtul zhugs dang/ lung bstan
157b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ dbugs dbyung ba dang/ rjes su gnang ba cho ga bzhin du thob pas/ ri bo la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun pa 'ga' zhig tu/ zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ chu dang/ sman dang/ dri zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byugs la/ me tog dri zhim po sna
157b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa'i sil ma gtor bar bya'o/ /de dag med na ni thams cad yid kyis byas nas/ der bstan bde ba la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rnam par dag cing byams pa la sogs bsgom pa sngon du song ba dang/ rang gi snying ga'i nyi ma'i
157b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la yi ge hUM sngon po mgo gyen du bltas pa bsams la/ nam mkha' i ngos su rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang/ de dang tha mi dad pa'i gzugs can gyi bla ma rnams kyis kyang til gyi gang bu ltar/ par mtshams med par
157b6(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gang bar dmigs shing bsams la hUM de las gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang/ reg bya rdo rje rnams dang/ rin po che sna bdun dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lha bshos la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa sna tshogs pa thams cad kyang rnam par spro bar bya'o/ /spyan
157b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i rig pa rnams dang/ chos kyi dbyings rdo rje yang la la'i gzhung gis 'byin par byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad yang dag par mchod cing bdag nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ gus pas btung nas
158a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyar te pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gnas bar bsam par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu mchod pa dang/ mchod par byed pa dang mchod pa ste gsum char yang rmi laM phyi nang gi rmi lam ltar rdzun zhing/ /so so rang
158a2(rgyud 'grel): gis rig pa'i bdag nyid can du lhag par mos par bya'o/ /de bzhin du bshags par bya ba dang/ bshags par byed pa dang/ bshags pa dang/ gang rnams kyi mdun du bshags par bya ba dang/ rjes su yi rang bar bya ba dang/ /rjes su yi ran bar
158a3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa dang/ rjes su yid rang ba dang bsngo par bya ba dang/ bsngo bar byed pa dang/ bsngo ba dang/ gang du bsngo bar bya ba dang/ gsol par bya ba dang/ gsol ba po dang/ gsol ba ste/ gsum char yang snga ma bzhin du bsams la/ sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa 'di
158a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar bya'o/ /gang zhig thog med ces bya ba la sogs pa dang/ kun 'dod dbugs 'byin sogs mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun la bdag bskul pa/ /bstan pa nam mkha' i mdza' mnyam pas/ 'jig rten kun sdig med snang mdzod ces bya ba dang
158a5(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis rol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsuM la skyabs su 'gro ba nas/ yang dag nyid du da ni gnas par bgyi/ /ces bya ba'i bar gyis bya'o/ /de nas srid pa gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnams 'jig tshogs la sogs
158a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lta bar bshad pa rnams dang/ skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis gzir bar gyur pa la dmigs la/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i chu srin gyi sos kyis kun tu dkrugs pa bdag dang bdag gi rnam par
158a7(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa shin tu zab pa'i chu dang ldan pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por thabs dang shes rab bla na med pa'i de kho na nyid kyi gru rnam par zhig pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i dpa' rlabs rnams kyis skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams su phan tshun rnam
158b1(rgyud 'grel): par g.yengs pa/ skyabs med par gyur pas yongs su nyon mongs pa de rnams la/ bdag dpal mi bskyod rdo rje gyur nas de dag sdug bsngal chen po dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyur gyur pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i las bton nas thabs dang shes rang gyi
158b2(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus blangs te/ mchog tu bde ba dam pa rgya che ba'i rang bzhin can gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rin po che'i gling du bzhag par bya'o/ /zhes de rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed nas 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can
158b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom par bya'o /de yang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral bas stong pa nyid yin la/ de lta bu ni shes pa gzhan mi bskyed pas de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa yin no/ /shes pa tsam las tha dad
158b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khams gsum pa ni shin tu yang med pas na rten pa med pa nyid du nges par brtags na gang du yang smon par mi byed pas ra'i phyir rgyud dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po ma lus pa ni smin pa med pa yin no/ /de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang gi sems
158b5(rgyud 'grel): so sor rang gis rig pa bems po ma yin pa bsams la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i sngags kyis don lnga lhag par mos pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM hUM n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa btA ba A t+ma ko haM/ de nas sems de nyid nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng
158b6(rgyud 'grel): du yi ge hUM sngon po las rdo rje de'i lte bar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM gis mtshan par bsams la de las rdo rje rnams kun tu spros te/ sa yang rdo rje'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsgom mo/ /de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol tu raM las byung ba'i me'i
158b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po gsal bar dri ma med pas rang 'dod pa'i phyogs bcings la/ de'i nang du yi ge laM ser po las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse gsum pas phyi'i mtshams gzhir mtshan pa'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor mtshams bcings te
159a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM las byung ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar bar snang bas mtshams kyi nang du nga ba byas nas/ baM las byung ba chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po rab tu 'bar ba'i me ltar snang bas ra ba'i steng du rdo rje dra ba bsgom yang
159a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu ra ba dang dra ba'i dbus su rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa bzhir skad cig gis 'khor bar byed pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa mdog ser po/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs pa shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las
159a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam dang/ zad pa dang/ zad pa dang/ mi skye ba dang/ chos dang rjes su rtogs pa dang/ yongs su byang ba shes pa zhes bya ba ste/ kun rdzob dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa zhes bya ba ste/ shes pa
159a4(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i ngo bo khro bo bcu'o/ /yang na re re zhing ye shes bcu'i bdag nyid can du bya ste/ me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga po dang/ rnam par byang ba'i phung po ldan de'i rgyur gyur pa yin pas na ye shes lnga'i yin zhes bya ba ni gzhung gzhan
159a5(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /man dag ji lta ba bzhin du/ phyogs dang mtshams dang steng dang 'og gi rtsibs bcu po rnams dang/ 'khor lo'i lte ba la bshad ma thag pa'i shes pa bcu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'i sgra ji bzhin pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rdo rje hUM mdzad
159a6(rgyud 'grel): dam gzhan yang gtsug tor dang rnam mdzad la sogs pa bgegs rab tu 'joms par byed pa rnams ji la ba bzhin du bsam par bya'o/ /de la khro bo rnams kyi phyogs dang sku mdog gi nges pa ni 'di yin te/ shar phyogs kyi rtsibs la khro bo
159a7(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje'i gsh+rEd? pho sku mdog sngon po zhal gsum pa zhag g.yas dang g.yon gnyis dkar ba dang/ dmar ba thams cad kyi phyag dang po gnyis kyi rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma la yang dag par 'khyud pa ni nges pa yin la/ phyag ltag ma rnams mzi? pa
159b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ral gri dang/ nor bu dang/ pad+ma rim bzhin bsnams par mdzad pa'o/ /lhor shes rab mthar byed sku mdog dkar po/ /zhal g.yas dang g.yon sngon po dang dmar po/ /dbyug pa dang ral gri dang/ nor bu dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /nub tu
159b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma mthar byed sku mdog dmar po/ /zhal g.yas dang g.yon sngon po dang/ dkar po dang/ pad+ma dang ral gri dang/ nor bu dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /byang du bgegs mthar byed gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba las/ khro bo'i rdo rje dang bal
159b3(rgyud 'grel): gri dang nor bu dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /shar lhor 'dod pa'i rgyal po khro bo sgeg pa sku mdog sngo ba/ zhal g.yas dang g.yon dkar ba dang dmar ba/ lcags kyu dang ral gri dang/ nor bu dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /lho nub tu dbyug sngon sku mdog sngo pa/
159b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal g.yas dang g.yon dkar ba dang dmar ba/ dbyug pa dang/ ral gri dang nor bu dang/ pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /nub byang du stobs po che gshin rje dang 'dra ba/ rtse gsum dang/ ral gri dang nor bu dang pad+ma bsnams pa'i/ /'di dag pas
159b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i rgyal po ma gtogs pa gshin rje gshed nas stobs po che'i bar ni gzugs mi sdug pa/ smin bsdus dbu skra gyen 'bar ba/ /a tshom smin ma spyan dmar ser/ /zhal gdangs ba dang/ ljags bskyod pa/ /mche gtsigs ha ha zhes
159b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhad pa/ /gdug pa'i sbrul gyi sku brgyan pa/ /mi'u thung gsus pa 'phyang ba'o/ /byar shar du mi g.yo ba ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po lta bu ral gri dang/ rdo rje dang nor bu dang pad+ma bsnams ba mi g.yo ba'o/ /steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgur ba sku mdog ser po
159b7(rgyud 'grel): zhal g.yas dang g.yon sngon po dang/ dkar po ste/ 'khor lo ser po dang ral gri dang/ nor bu dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /'khor lo 'bar bas rab tu bskor ba'o/ /'og tu nig nong mdzes rgyal po 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra ba las rdo rje dang ral gri dang/ nor bu
160a1(rgyud 'grel): dang pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /'khro lo'i lte ba la ni hUM mdzad gnod mdzes dang 'dra ba las rdo rje dang/ ral gri dang lcags kyu dang zhabs pa bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon dang g.yas lo gsu dbang phyug chen po chung ma dang bcas pa
160a2(rgyud 'grel): gan rkyal du 'dug pa la/ rna ba g.yon pa'i steng dang/ nub gnyis la rim bzhin du g.yon brkyang bas mnan te bzhugs pa'i/ /'di ngag las 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa nas rdo rje'i hUM mdzad kyi bar ni khro bo sgeg ba mtshe ba cung zad gcigs
160a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ ag tshoms med pa yin po che'i cod bzhe dang rin po che'i rgyan mnga' ba'o/ /gshin rje gshed la sogs pa nas rdo rje gshed la sogs pa nas rdo rje hUM mdzad 'di ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la gyon brkyang bas gnas pa dang/ nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
160a4(rgyud 'grel): mnga' o/ /de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa'i rdo rje hUM mdzad dam/ /rang gi 'dod a'i lha gang yang rung ba yongs su gyur pa las chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya gyen du bltas te gnas pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rnam par dag pa'i gru gsum pa/ /
160a5(rgyud 'grel): nang na nam mkha' i rang bzhin yod na/ dbus na pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje gnas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /chos 'byung ba'i nang der sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i b+h+rUM yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu gnyis pa
160a6(rgyud 'grel): ma rig pa la sogs rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i lte ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bruM nyid bsams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spros pa sngon du 'gro bas yi ge
160a7(rgyud 'grel): hUM dang 'khor lo de yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad rig pa dang bcas pa'i yan lag las yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzhi'i dkyil 'khor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /de yang
160b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dang so so'i skye bo dag de kho na nyid gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi mnyaM pa med pas na zur bzhi pa'o/ /de bzhin du lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos rnams gcig dang bral ba nyid kyi sbyor ba gang yan lag sna tshogs pa la 'jug pa
160b2(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyi lus 'di ni gzung bal sogs pas rnam par dben pa'i sems kyi rnam par dran pa nye bar 'jog pas na/ lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos zhes bya ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po rnam par dag pa ni shar gyi sgo'o/ /mid ge ba skyes
160b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ ma skyes pa rnams spangs zhing mi skye ba'i phyir dang/ dge ba ma skyes pa dang/ skyes pa rnams bskyed pa dang gnas pa'i phyir rim gyis rtsom pa dang/ yongs su skyong pa dang/ so sor rtog pa dang/ nan tan lhur byed pa zhes bya ba'i brtson 'grus bzhi
160b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa ni gnyis pa ste lho'i sgo'o/ /'dun pa dang brtson 'grus dang sems dang spyod pa ste rdzu 'phrul gyi rkong pa bzhi rnam par dag pa ni gsum pa nub kyi sgo'o/ /dang po dang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang dbang po lnga rnam par
160b5(rgyud 'grel): dag pa ni bzhi pa byang gi sgo'o/ /rtog pa dang/ dpyod pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ sems rtse gcig pa ste yan lag lnga pa'i bsam gtan dang po dang/ nang gi bdag nyid rab tu dang ba /dang/ dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ sems rtse gcig
160b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ yan lag bzhi pa dang ldan pa'i gnyis pa dang/ btang snyoms dang/ dran pa dang/ shes bzhin dang/ bde ba dang/ sems rtse gcig pa ste/ yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsum pa dang/ btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang/ dran pa yongs
160b7(rgyud 'grel): su dag pa dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ bde ba'i tshor ba med pa dang/ sems rtse gcig pa ste yan lag bzhi pa dang ldan pa'i bzhi pa ste/ de ltar rim bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi rnam par dag pa ni rta babs bzhi yin no/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba dang/ nams
161a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dzod dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ seng+ge rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i kha khyer bzhis yongs su bskor ba dang/ de bzhin du bzod pa dang/ chos dang/ don dang sngags kyi gzungs rnam par
161a2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i lha mo'i tshogs lag na mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa thogs pa kha khyer la gnas pa dang/ 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs pa so sor skyong ba'i rin po che ma lus pas rnam par spras pa'i rgyan sna tshogs pas rnam par brgyan pa

161a5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang dga' ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ btang snyoms te/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid can la sogs pa'i me tog phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam
161a6(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa dang/ dra ba dang dra phyed pa dang/ zla ba dang nyi ma dang/ me long dang/ me tog gi phreng ba dang/ rnga yang 'bar ba dang ldan pa dang/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba ni rnam par thar ba dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas
161a7(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa de ni gsum pa'o/ /nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched ni bzhi pa'o/ /rnam shes mda'? yas
161b1(rgyud 'grel): skye mched ni lnga pa'o/ /ci yang med pa'i skye mched ni drug pa'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni bdun pa'o/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni brgyad pa ste/ de ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/ rgyal pa'i yum las gzugs can
161b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs rnams la lta ba de stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par zil gyis mnan nas mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /zhes bya ba nas de nyid du 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med
161b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam pas de zil gyis mnan nas mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /zhes 'byung ba dang/ yang 'di dpal mchog dang po'i rgya tshor bshad pa kun dga' snying po'i zhal snga nas kyi bshad pa yin te/ rnam par thar pa brgyad
